MAT 19:7 Amate in Jesus kungah, Moses in zi khul na lai at in, khul tahen, ci in banghang thupia ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
MAT 19:8 Jesus in amate tung ah, Moses in na thinpui lei uh hang in zi khul tu hong oai hi: ahihang a kipatcil in tabang hi ngawl hi.
MAT 19:9 Keima in hibang kong ci hi, khatpo in paktat na simngawl thudang hang in a zi khul in, zi dang a nei peuma palngul mawna vawt a hihi, taciang a khul sa sia a tenpui pa zong palngul mawna vawt a hihi, ci hi.
MAT 19:10 A nungzui te in Jesus kungah, pasal le a zi thu sia tabang a hile, ki ten awl vet tu phazaw hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 19:11 Jesus in amate tung ah, Tabang thu sia, mi theampo i san thei hi ngawl hi, tua tel a ki pia teng bek in nga tu hi.
MAT 19:12 Banghangziam cile, pawlkhat te sia a nu sung pan a sua lilim in cilkhe in suak hi: pawlkhat te sia amate vawttawm in cilkhe hi: pawlkhat te sia vantung kumpingam atu in amate le amate cilkhe in ki vawt uh hi. Tabang in a sang te bek in sang ta uh hen, ci hi.
MAT 19:13 Tuazawkciang in patangno te lu tungah khut nga a, thungetsak tu dei in Jesus kungah paipui uh a; nungzui te in tei hi.
MAT 19:14 Ahihang Jesus in, Patangno te ka kungah hongpai tahen, khak heak vun: banghangziam cile vantung kumpingam sia hibang te atu a hihi, ci hi.
MAT 19:15 Jesus in patangno te i lutung ah khutnga a, tuazawkciang paisan hi.
MAT 19:16 Khat hongpai in, sya pha awng, tawntung nuntakna ka nei natu in bang ngamtatpha seam tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 19:17 Jesus in, Banghang in, pha, hong ci ni niam? A pha khat bek om a, tua in Pathian a hihi: ahihang nuntakna sungah na tum nuam le thupiak te zui in, ci hi.
MAT 19:18 Tua pa in koisia bel ziam? ci in dong hi. Jesus in, Tualthat heak in, palngul mawna vawt heak in, nguta heak in, tetti man ngawl pang heak in,
MAT 19:19 Na nule na pa zakta in: nangma le nangma na ki it bang in na innpam te zong it in, ci in zo kik hi.
MAT 19:20 Tangval pa in hi te theampo ka no lai pan in ka zui siat sa hi: bang kisamlai khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 19:21 Jesus in ama kungah, Na cialcing nuam le va pai tan a, na neisa te zuak in a, a zawngte pia in, tua hile vantung ah neisa na nei tu hi: tuazawkciang hongpai tan a, hong zui tan, ci hi.
MAT 19:22 Ahihang tangvalpa in a zakciang in a thin nuam ngawl in pusuak hi: banghangziam cile ama sia nei le lam tam mama nei hi.
MAT 19:23 Tuazawkciang Jesus in a nungzui te kungah, A man tatak in kong ci ciang, vantung kumpingam sungah tua mihaupa sia haksa tak in tum tu hi.
MAT 19:24 Kong ci kik hi, mihau khat Pathian kumpingam sung a tum sang in, kala-uk khat phil bilvang sung a tum tu ol zaw lai hi, ci hi.
MAT 19:25 Tua thu a nungzui te in a zakciang in lamdangsa mama uh a, a kua peuma ngupna nga zo thong tu ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 19:26 Ahihang Jesus in amate en a, Hi thu sia mihing te atu in piang thei ngawl hi; ahihang Pathian atu in na theampo piang thei siat hi, ci hi.
MAT 19:27 Taciang Peter in, En in, na theampo nusia khu hi; bang ka nga tu uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 19:28 Jesus in amate tung ah, A man tatak kong ci ciang, na theampo puaphat hun hong theng tu hi, mihing Tapa sia a vangletna tokhum tung a to ciang in, no ka nungzui te tokhum sawmleni tungah to in, Israel minam sawmleni te thu na khen tu uh hi.
MAT 19:29 Khatpo in keima hang in a inn le a lo, a nu le a pa, a suapui, a zi le a ta a nusia a hile, a se zakhat in sang kik tu a, tawntung nuntakna ngamh in lua tu uh hi.
MAT 19:30 Ahihang amasa te nungkhak tu a, a nungkhak te amasa hi tu hi.
MAT 20:1 Vantung kumpingam sia, ama sapit huan sungah naseam tu te sam tu in zingtung a vak innteakpa taw kibang hi.
MAT 20:2 Nikhat thaman dangkasan pheak khat piak tu in naseam tute taw a thukim zawkciang, amate sia sapit huan ah sawl hi.
MAT 20:3 Zingsang nai kua ciang hong pusuak a, ngual sumbuk ah a ding thathong mu hi,
MAT 20:4 Amate kungah, note zong sapit huan ah pai tavun a, a kiphu bang in hong pia tu khi hi, a ci ciang, amate zong pai hi.
MAT 20:5 Ama sia nai sawmleni le nitaksang nai thum ciang in vakkik a, a dang te zong sawl leleau hi.
MAT 20:6 'Nitaksang nai nga kimpawl in paikik leleau a, bangma seam ngawl in a ding thathong te mu hi, taciang, banghang in na seam ngawl in sun khuateak ziaksung ah ding nu ziam? ci hi.
MAT 20:7 Amate in ko kuama in hong cial ngawl hi, ci uh hi. Ama in, no zong ka sapit huan ah thalaw vun a; a kilawm za nga tu nu hi, ci hi.
MAT 20:8 Nitakciang in sapit huanneipa in sumkeampa kungah, a khakbel pan a masabel dong a seam te theampo sam siat in a, a thaman pia in, ci hi.
MAT 20:9 Nitaksang nai nga pan nasep kipan te hongpai ciang, ngun dangka piakhat tek nga uh hi.
MAT 20:10 Amasabel te hongpai ciang in, a tamzaw nga tu in ngaisun hi kale; ngun dangka piakhat tek ma nga uh hi.
MAT 20:11 Amate in thaman a nga uh ciang in, innteakpa phunsan uh a,
MAT 20:12 Hi a khakbel a seam te sia nai khat sung bek seam napi, vanngit pua in, nisaham thuak ko te taw a kikim in hong vawt ni hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 20:13 Hi kamale, ama in amate sung pan khat tungah hibang in zo kik hi, lawm awng, na tungah khialna vawt ngawl khi hi: ngun dangka piakhat piak tu in i thukim sa hi ngawl ziam?
MAT 20:14 Na thaman la in a, cia in: a khakbel te zong nangma kong piak za pia tu khi hi.
MAT 20:15 Keima neisa sia ka ukbang zeak thei natu ngeina om ngawl ziam? Keima phatna hang in banghang hong mu khial ni ziam?
MAT 20:16 Tua ahikom a khakbel te sia masabel tu a, a masabel te sia nungkhakbel tu hi: banghangziam cile sapna nga tam hi ka le, a ki teal tawm hi, ci hi.
MAT 20:17 Jesus Jerusalem a pai ciang in, a nungzui sawmleni te a tuam in sam a,
MAT 20:18 En vun! Jerusalem ah i pai hi; mihing Tapa sia thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te kungah ki zuak tu a, that tu in thukhen tu uh hi.
MAT 20:19 Mihing Tapa sia selno tu, sat tu le thinglamte tungah khai tu in Gentile te kungah ap tu a, nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 20:20 Zebedee zi sia Jesus kungah a tate ni taw hongpai in bia a, a dei thu khat ngen hi.
MAT 20:21 Jesus in, Bang dei ni ziam? ci in dong hi. Ama in, na kumpingam sungah hi ka tapa te ni sia na ziatsang ah khat, na veisang ah a dang khat tosak in, ci hi.
MAT 20:22 Ahihang Jesus in, Bang thu hong ngen nu ziam ci na he bua uh hi. Ka dawn tu hai dawn zo tu nu ziam, ka thuak tu baptisma thuak zo tu nu ziam? ci in zo kik hi. Amate in zo tu khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 20:23 Jesus in, Ka dawn tu hai sia dawn takpi tu nu hi, ka thuak tu baptisma zong thuak takpi tu nu hi: ahihang ka ziatsang le ka veisang ah a to tu sia Kei i piak tu hi ngawl a, Ka Pa in a ngealkholsa te pia tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 20:24 Hi thu a dang sawm te in a zak uh ciang, tuate u nau tungah thin-uk mama uh hi.
MAT 20:25 Ahihang Jesus in amate a kungah sam a, Na heaksa uh bangma in Gentile kumpi te in a mihing te sia zawthawk thu taw uk a, ulian te in thuneina taw uk uh hi.
MAT 20:26 Ahizong note sungah tabang hisak heak vun: note sungah khatpo a lian nuam le, note i naseam hi tahen,
MAT 20:27 Note sungah khatpo in a lu bel a hi nuam le, note i sila hi tahen.
MAT 20:28 Mihing Tapa sia ngual a sawl tu in hongpai ngawl hi, ngual atu seam tu in le mi tampi tatkhiat natu a nuntakna pia tu in hongpai hi, ci hi.
MAT 20:29 Amate Jericho pan in a pusua uh ciang, mihon tampi in zui uh hi.
MAT 20:30 En vun, mittaw ni te lamhui ah to in, Jesus in hong kantan hi, ci a zak uh ciang, maw Topa, nang David Tapa, hong hesuak po tan, ci in au uh hi.
MAT 20:31 Mihonpi te in a om khipkhep natu in tei uh hi: ahihang amate au seseam uh a, nang David Tapa, hong hesuak po tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 20:32 Jesus ding in amate sam a, Bang kong vawtsak tu uk nu ziam? ci hi.
MAT 20:33 Amate in, Topa awng, ka mit uh hong in khua hong musak tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 20:34 Jesus in amate tungah hesuakna nei a, a mit te uh a thamsak ciang in thakhatthu in khuamu uh a, amate in a nung zui hi.
MAT 21:1 Amate Jerusalem a thet ma, Olive mual nai Bethphage a thet uh ciang, Jesus in a nungzui te ni sawl in,
MAT 21:2 Na mai khua ah pai tavun a, Lapui a ki khit a no taw mu tu nu hi: a khau sut vun a ka kungah hong paipui tavun.
MAT 21:3 Mi khatpo in thu khatpo hong ci le, Topa in tulmaw hi ci vun; tua hile hong paisak pai tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:4 Hi bangin a pian thei na sia kamsangpa sonkhol thu a tangtunna a hihi.
MAT 21:5 Zion tanu tungah son vun, en in, na kumpipa sia kiniamkhiak a, laa tungah to hi, lano to in na kungah hongpai hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:6 A nungzui te pai uh a, Jesus thupiak bang in vawt uh hi,
MAT 21:7 Laa le a no hong paipui uh a, a nungzang ah puan pha in Ama tosak uh hi.
MAT 21:8 Mihon tampi in a puan te uh lampi tungah pha uh hi; midang te zong in thingsawl te sat in lampi tungah pha uh hi.
MAT 21:9 Taciang mihonpi te a mai ah pai a, a nung pan zong zui in, David Tapa tungah Hosanna: Topa min taw hongpai pa thupha nga tahen; a sangbel na mun ah Hosanna, ci in au uh hi.
MAT 21:10 Jerusalem khua sung a tum ciang in, khuapi sung theampo linglawng a, hi sia a kua ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 21:11 Tasiaciang in mihonpi te in, hisia pa sia Galilee ngam Nazareth khuami kamsang Jesus hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 21:12 Jesus Pathian biakinn sungah tum in, biakinn sungah vanzuak te le vanlei te a vekpi in notkeak siat hi, sum theak te i sabuai te le vakhu zuak te tokhum te theampo zong lawnthal siat hi,
MAT 21:13 Taciang amate kungah, Ka inn sia thungetna mun, kici tu hi; ci in ki atkhol napi, note in nguta te kua suaksak nu hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:14 Mittaw le peangbai te biakinn sung ama kungah hongpai uh a, damsak siat hi.
MAT 21:15 Na lamdang a vawt te le biakinn sung pan patangno te in, David Tapa tungah Hosanna, ci in a au na uh thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in a mu uh ciang, a thin-uk mama uh hi,
MAT 21:16 Amate in ama kungah, hi te bang au ci na za ziam? ci in dong uh hi. Jesus in amate tung ah, Za khi hi, nausen noaitawp te kam sung pan in pokna cialcing na suaksak hi, ci thu sim ngei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
MAT 21:17 Jesus in amate nusia a, khuapi puasang ah paisuak in, Bethany khua ah zuan a, tuak ah tam hi.
MAT 21:18 A zingsang ciang in Jesus khuapi sang a heakkik ciang, a ngilkial hi.
MAT 21:19 Lamhui ah theikung khat a mu ciang, a tungah a te simngawl bangma a mu ngawl hu in, Bangmahun in nga nawn heak in, ci hi. Tasia pociang tua theikung ko hi.
MAT 21:20 Nungzui te in a mu uh ciang, lamdangsa mama in, bangbang in hizata manlang in ko pai ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 21:21 Jesus in, A tatak in kong ci ciang, um in muang la bua po le uh te, theikung tungah a ki vawt bang bek hi ngawl, hi mual tung ah, ki khin in a, tuipi sungah tak in, na ci uh le, na ci uh bang in piang tu hi.
MAT 21:22 Na um uh le thungetna taw na nget uh theampo na nga tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:23 Jesus biakinn sung hongpai in, thu a hil laitak, thiampi lian te le ulian te a kungah hongpai a, bang thuneina taw hibang te seam ni ziam? Akua in hibang thuneina hong pia ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 21:24 Jesus in, Kei zong thu khat kong dong tu hi, tua thu nong son thei uh le, kua thu taw hite vawt khi ziam, ci kong son tu hi.
MAT 21:25 John i tuiphumna sia koisung pan ziam? van pan ziam maw, mihing te kung pan ziam? ci in dong hi. Tasiaciang amate ngaisun tek a, van pan ci leang, banghang in um ngawl nu ziam? hong ci tu hi.
MAT 21:26 Ahihang, mihing tung pan ci thong leang, mipite ki lau si: banghangziam cile mi theampo in kamsang khat in sang uh hi.
MAT 21:27 Tasiaciang amate in Jesus kungah, hong son thei ngawl khu hi, ci in zo kik uh hi. Tasiaciang Jesus in, Kei zong bang thuneina taw hite vawt, ci hong son ngawl tu khi hi.
MAT 21:28 Ahihang, bangbang na ngaisun uh ziam? Mi khat in tapa ni nei hi; a tapa a lianzaw pa kungah pai a, ka tapa awng, tu ni sun ka sapithuan ah pai in a, naseam in, ci hi.
MAT 21:29 A tapa in, kuan ngawl tu khi hi: ci in zokik napi, a zawkciang ki sikkik in kuankik hi.
MAT 21:30 Tuazawkciang a tapa nozaw kungah pai in, tabangma in son hi. Taciang a tapa in, kuan tu khi hi, topa, ci in zo napi, kuan ngawl hi.
MAT 21:31 Hi tapa te ni sung pan a kua in a pa deina seam ziam? Amate in a tapa lianzaw, ci in zo kik uh hi.
MAT 21:32 Banghangziam cile John sia thutang in note kungah hongpai napi, um ngawl nu hi, ahihang siadong te le pumpi zuak te in um hi: note sia na mu zawk uh ciang zong um tu in na thinsung uh na kikheal nuam bua uh hi.
MAT 21:33 A dang sontena ngai lai vun: innteakpa khat in sapit huan sungah sapit cing hi; a kimkot pan dal um in, sapit sukna mun dum to hi, teitan te zong daw in, huan naseam te sap thaw sak a, ama sia ngam khuala mama na ah khualhaw hi:
MAT 21:34 A nga hun a cin ciang, huan naseam te tung pan sapit nga ama nga tu teng la tu in a naseam te paisak hi.
MAT 21:35 Huan tho te in a naseam te man in, khat sia vel hi, khat sia that in, a dang khat sia suangtum taw deang hi.
MAT 21:36 Amasa sang in a tamzaw naseam te paisak kik a, amasa te bangma in vawt leleau uh hi.
MAT 21:37 Ahihang a khakbel ciang in, a tapa paisak hi, amate in ka tapa sia upat tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:38 Ahihang huan naseam te in a tapa a mu uh ciang in, hi sia a ngamhlua tu pa hi, pai tavun, thatlum in a ngamh sut tawng, ci uh hi.
MAT 21:39 Tabang in a tapa sia man in, sapit huan puasang ah pusua in that uh hi.
MAT 21:40 Tua ahikom sapit huannei pa hongpai ciang, huan naseam te sia bangbang in vawt tu ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 21:41 Amate in, tua ngamtat sia te susia tu a, a hun a cin ciang thing nga te a pia tu lo tho dang te sapthawsak tu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 21:42 Jesus in amate tung ah, Innsa te in a nil uh suangtum sia innbul thupibel hongsuak hi, hi thu sia Topa i nasep hi a, i mu na ah, lamdang mama hi, ci Lai Thiangtho sungah sim ngei ngawl nu ziam?
MAT 21:43 Tua ahikom kong ci hi, Pathian kumpingam sia note kung pan in la tu a, nga tampi a nga minam te pia tu hi.
MAT 21:44 A kuamapo hi suang tungah a tak le tam tham tu hi: ahihang hi suang a takna mun po, ki ngoai in hui siat tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 21:45 Jesus i sontena te sia thiampi te le Pharisee te in a zak uh ciang, amate thu son hi, ci tel uh hi.
MAT 21:46 Amate in Jesus mat sawm uh hi napi, mihonpi te kita uh hi, banghangziam cile amate in kamsang khat bang in ngaisun uh hi.
MAT 22:1 Jesus in amate tungah sontena son kik a,
MAT 22:2 Vantung kumpingam sia a tapa atu mopoai a vawt kumpipa taw kibang hi,
MAT 22:3 A naseam te sawl in, a khualhil sa teng samsak napi, kuama pai ngawl hi.
MAT 22:4 A naseam te sawlkik a, khualhil sa teng tung son vun, nitak an sia ki nginkhol sa in om zo hi: ka khui tal te le nganno thau mamate ki ngo siat zo a, na theampo ki nginsa hi zo hi, mopoai ah hongpai tek tavun, ci hi.
MAT 22:5 Ahihang a khualhil nate in, bangma thusim ngawl in, khat sia lo ah, a dang khat sia sumzonna mun ah, tabang in amate uk na tek ah pai veve uh hi:
MAT 22:6 A dang a tang lai te in a naseam te man a, vawtsia in that uh hi.
MAT 22:7 Kumpipa in a zak ciang thin-uk mama a, a ngalkap te sawl in tualthat te siatsua in, amate khuapi te zong mei taw hal siat hi.
MAT 22:8 Tua mun ah a naseam te hibang in ci hi, mopoai sia kinging siset zo hi, ahihang ka khualhil sa teng a sap thamman om ngawl hi.
MAT 22:9 Tua ahikom lamzikpi ah pai vun a, na mu uh theampo mopoai pai tu in hil vun, ci hi.
MAT 22:10 Tua ahikom a naseamte lamzikpi ah pai uh a, miphangawl le a pha a kibang in a mu uh theampo kaikhawm in, mopoai ah leangna dim siat hi.
MAT 22:11 Taciang kumpipa a leangna te en tu in a tum ciang, mopoai puan a sil ngawl mi khat mu a:
MAT 22:12 Lawm awng, hi mun ah bangbang in mopoai puan sil ngawl in hongpai ni ziam? ci in a dok ciang, bangma son tu a nei bua hi.
MAT 22:13 Tuazawkciang, kumpipa in a naseam te kungah, a khut le a peang hencip in paipui vun a, a puasang khuazing na ah khia vun; tua mun ah kaana le ha ngoai na om tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 22:14 Banghangziam cile a kisam tam mama napi, a ki teal tawm hi, ci hi.
MAT 22:15 Tuazawkciang Pharisee te hongpai in, Jesus pauna pan, bangbang in aita thei tu, ci in ngaisun tek uh hi.
MAT 22:16 Amate in a nungzui te le Herod i mihing te sawl in, Topa awng, nangma sia na thuman hi, kuama zong lau ngawl in le kuama mai zong zakta tuan ngawl a, Pathian thuman lampi hil ni hi, ci kong he uh hi.
MAT 22:17 Tua ahikom, bangbang in ngaisun ni ziam? Caesar tungah shia pia tu khu ziam maw, pia ngawl tu khu ziam? hong son tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 22:18 Ahihang Jesus in amate tatsiatna he a, No a ki hitheamsak te, banghang in hong aita nu ziam
MAT 22:19 Shia dangka hong lak tavun, ci hi, amate in zong dangka tangkhat paipui uh hi.
MAT 22:20 Jesus in, Hi sia a kua lim le ceptena ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 22:21 Amate in, Caesar lim le ceptena hi, ci uh hi, tasiaciang, Caesar neisa te Caesar pia vun a, Pathian a te Pathian pia vun, ci hi.
MAT 22:22 Amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, lamdangsa tek mama uh a, ama nusia in paisan uh hi.
MAT 22:23 Tua ni in thawkikna om ngawl hi, a ci Saducee te a kungah hongpai in, thu dong hi.
MAT 22:24 Syapa awng, mi khat in ta nei ngawl in a thi le, a ci-mit ngawl tu in a nau in a mo tenpui tahen, ci in Moses in ci hi.
MAT 22:25 Tu in u nau pa sali om hi: a lianbel sia in zi nei napi, ta nei ngawl in thi hi, tasiaciang a nau kungah a zi nusiat hi:
MAT 22:26 Tabangma in a ni na, a thum na le a sali na dong in thi hi.
MAT 22:27 A khakbel ciang in tua numei nu zong thi hi.
MAT 22:28 Tua ahikom thawkikni ciang tua numei nu sia, sali sung pan a kua bel i zi hi tu ziam? banghangziam cile a u nau vekpi in tenpui ngeitek uh hi, ci in dong uh hi.
MAT 22:29 Jesus in amate zo kik a, Lai thiangtho le Pathian vangletna na heak ngawl uh hang in khial siat nu hi:
MAT 22:30 Banghangziam cile, thawkik ni ciang in kipui na le tenpui tu in ki pia, cite om nawn ngawl tu a, vantung ngam ah Pathian i vantung mite bang hi tu hi.
MAT 22:31 Ahihang mithi te thawkikna thu taw kisai Pathian in note tung hong son na ah,
MAT 22:32 Keima in Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian, Jacob Pathian ka hihi, ci in a son thu sim ngei ngawl nu ziam? Pathian sia mithi te Pathian hi ngawl a, a nungta te pathian a hihi, ci hi.
MAT 22:33 Tasiaciang mihonpi te in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, Jesus thuhilna lamdangsa mama uh hi.
MAT 22:34 Jesus in Sadducee te pau natu he ngawl in vawt hi, ci Pharisee te in a zak uh ciang, amate munkhat ah ki kaikhawm uh hi.
MAT 22:35 Tuazawkciang amate sungah thukhamhil khat in Jesus aita nuam ahikom,
MAT 22:36 Syapa awng, thukham sung pan a lianbel thupiak sia bang ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAT 22:37 Jesus in ama tung ah, Topa na Pathian sia na thinsung theampo, na nuntakna theampo le na ngaisutna theampo taw it in.
MAT 22:38 Hi thu sia thupiak masabel le a lian thupiak a hihi.
MAT 22:39 Taciang a ni na sia, nangma le nangma na ki it bang in, na innpam te it in, a ci sia a masabel taw a kibang a hihi.
MAT 22:40 Hi thupiak ni te tungah thukham theampo le kamsang te thu theampo khuangkhim siat hi, ci hi.
MAT 22:41 Pharisee te munkhat ah a ki kaikhop laitak in, Jesus in amate tung ah,
MAT 22:42 Christ sia bangbang in ngaisun nu ziam? akua tapa ziam? ci in dong hi; amate in, David Tapa hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 22:43 Jesus in amate mun ah, Tabang a hile David in Christ sia; Topa, ci in Thaa taw banghang in sam thei ziam, David i ci na ah,
MAT 22:44 Topa in ka Topa kungah, na ngal te na peang koina in ka vawt mateng Ka ziatsang ah to in, ci hi.
MAT 22:45 David in Christ sia ka Topa ci in a sam le, banghang in a tapa hi thei tu ziam? ci hi.
MAT 22:46 Kuama in kamkhat zong zo kik thei ngawl ahikom, tua ni pan kipan in, kuama in thu dong ngam nawn ngawl uh hi.
MAT 23:1 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in mihonpi te le a nungzui te kungah thuhil a,
MAT 23:2 Thukhamhil te le Pharisee te sia Moses tokhum ah to uh hi:
MAT 23:3 Tua ahikom amate in vawt a hong sawl peuma zui vun a, ahihang amate ngamtat bang in ngamta heak vun, banghangziam cile amate in a son uh bang in seam ngawl uh hi.
MAT 23:4 Banghangziam cile amate in a puak zawk ngawl tu vanngit te hen in mihing te i liangko tungah suan uh a, puasak uh a hihang amate a hile, a khutme dawn taw zong tham nuam ngawl uh hi.
MAT 23:5 Ahihang amate i a vawt theampo te sia, mite mu thei tu in vawt uh hi: Amate lai thiangtho bu koi na savun ip te nangawn a lianpui in vawt uh a, a puan kiil te zong a zai tatak in vawt uh hi.
MAT 23:6 Poai sungah a sangbel khan sungah to nuam in, synagogue sungah zong tokhum thupibel tungah to nuam uh hi,
MAT 23:7 Sumbuk te ah ngual i paupui tu le Rabbi, Rabbi, ci in sap tu dei uh hi.
MAT 23:8 Hi kale note sia, Rabbi ci in sap tu uk heak vun; banghangziam cile, na Topa uh khatbek om a, tua in Christ a hihi, note sia u nau khat na hi uh hi.
MAT 23:9 Taciang in hileitung ah kuama, pa, ci heak vun: banghangziam cile vantung a om na Pa uh khat bekma om hi.
MAT 23:10 Christ bekma na Topa uh ahikom kuama peuma, topa, ci in ki sam heak tahen.
MAT 23:11 Ahizong note sung pan a lianbel sia na naseam uh hi tu hi,
MAT 23:12 Akua mapo ama le ama a ki lamsang sia khiaksuk na thuak tu hi.
MAT 23:13 Ahihang thukhamhil te le Pharisee te, a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi, banghangziam cile, vantung kumpingam na khaktan uh a, noma le tum nuam ngawl bekdom ngawl a tum nuam te zong na tumsak bua uh hi.
MAT 23:14 Thukhamhil te le Pharisee te awng! na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile note in meingong te inn te sia ngongtat in na suttol uh a, a sau theiza in thu ki ngen theamsak nu hi: Tua ahikom dan a lianzaw na thuak tu uh hi.
MAT 23:15 Thukhamhil te le Pharisee te, a kihitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile mi khat biakna lai tu in tuipi le leitung kimveal in na vak uh a, a ki kheal zawkciang note sang in a se ni tamzaw Hell ngam i ta na suaksak uh hi.
MAT 23:16 No mittaw lamlak te, na mailam uh bing hi, khatpo in biakinn sam in a kiciam le bangma poimaw ngawl hi, ahihang a kuamapo biakinn a om kham sam in a kiciam le ama sia leiba nei hi, na ci uh hi.
MAT 23:17 No mi mawmaw le mittaw te: bang lianzaw ziam, kham maw, a hibale kham a thiangthosak biakinn koisia hi zaw?
MAT 23:18 Khat po in biaktau sam in a kiciam le bangma poimaw ngawl hi, ahihang khatpo in tua tungah biakpiakna a ki piasia sam in a kiciam le ama sia mawnei hi.
MAT 23:19 No mi mawmaw le mittaw te! bang lianzaw ziam; biaktau ah a ki pia sia maw, a hibale a ki pia sia a thiangsak biaktau lianzaw ziam?
MAT 23:20 Tua ahikom mihing khat in biaktau sam in a kiciam le tua tungah a omte theampo sam in kiciam a hihi.
MAT 23:21 Taciang khatpo in biakinn sam in a kiciam le tua biakinn sungah a om sia sam in kiciam a hihi.
MAT 23:22 Taciang van le Pathian tokhum sam in a kiciam peuma tokhum tungah a to pa sam in kiciam a hihi.
MAT 23:23 Thukhamhil te, Pharisee te le a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile note in lenmui, thihawm le, lonamsia te se sawm sua se khat pia tek napi, thukham sungah a thupi zaw thukhenna, hesuakna le upna thu te zui ngawl in khe nu hi: tua te sia na vawt tu uh hi a, a dang te zong vawt ngawl in nusiat thong tu hi ngawl hi.
MAT 23:24 No mittaw lamlak te, thosi no khat zong ki hel ngawl tu in hawp napi, kala-uk lopval nu hi.
MAT 23:25 Thukhamhil te, Pharisee te le a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile hai le kuang na sil uh ciang in, a puasang bek na sil uh a, a sungsang sia ngual neisa na lak uh le duhopna taw kidim hi.
MAT 23:26 Nang Pharisee mittaw pa, hai le kuang te a sungsang sil masa in a, a puasang zong thiang tu hi.
MAT 23:27 Thukhamhil te, Pharisee te le a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile, note sia za ngo a ki zut thankul taw na kibang uh hi, a puasang sia a hoi tu bang in kilang napi, a sungsang sia mithi ngu le a thiang ngawl taw kidim hi.
MAT 23:28 Tasia bangma in note zong na puasang uh sia mihing te mai ah a thutang in kilang napi, na sungsang uh sia ki hitheamsak na le siatna taw dim hi.
MAT 23:29 Thukhamhil te, Pharisee te le a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile kamsang te thankul na sa uh a, mi thutang te thankul te zong a hoi mama in zeam nu hi,
MAT 23:30 Ka pu ka pa te hun lai koma om kana le ung, kamsang te thisan luan na ah ki hel ngawl tu kana khu hi, ci nu hi.
MAT 23:31 Tua ahikom kamsangte a that te na hi uh hi, ci noma mama tetti te na hi uh hi.
MAT 23:32 Tua ahikom na pu na pa te i ki te na note in dim tavun.
MAT 23:33 No ngul suan te, hell ngam thet natu pan bangbang suakta thei tu nu ziam?
MAT 23:34 Tua ahikom, en vun, note kungah kamsang te, mipil te le thukhamhil te kong paisak a, pawlkhat te sia that in thinglamte tungah khai tu nu hi; taciang pawlkhat te sia synagogue sungah vel in le khuapi khat zawkciang khat ah vawtsia tu nu hi.
MAT 23:35 Tua ahikom a thutang Abel thisan pan kipan biakinn le biaktau ki kal ah na thalup uh Barachias tapa Zachariah thisan ciangdong, leitung ah a luang thisan theampo note tungah hong theng tu hi.
MAT 23:36 A tatak in kong ci ciang, hi thu te theampo sia tu hun mihing te tungah theng tu hi.
MAT 23:37 Maw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, kamsang te na that a, na kungah hongpai te suangtum taw sep ni hi, akpui in a no te a thakhui nuai ah a uap bang in, tamveipi hong uap nuam hi kaleng, na uk bua hi!
MAT 23:38 En vun, na inn uh ngamkhing dide in ki nusia zo hi.
MAT 23:39 Banghangziam cile Topa min taw hongpai pa sia thuphatoai hi, na ci uh mateng, note in hong mu nawn ngawl tu nu hi, ci in kong son hi, ci hi.
MAT 24:1 Jesus biakinn pan pusuak in a pai laitak, a nungzui te in biakinn kisa lak tu in a kungah hongpai uh hi.
MAT 24:2 Jesus in, Hi bang van te a vekpi in mu hi ngawl nu ziam? a tatak in kong ci ciang, phelthap ngawl bul in suangtum khat zong kithuap nawn ngawl in cimtham lai tu hi. ci hi.
MAT 24:3 Jesus Olive mualtung ah to a, a nungzui te kuama heak ngawl in a kungah hongpai uh hi, hi thu te banghun ciang hong piang tu ziam, nangma paikik tu le leitung bo tu thu musakna sia bangbang ziam? ci hong son tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 24:4 Jesus in, Kuama in hong theam ngawl natu in kidawm vun.
MAT 24:5 Banghangziam cile mi tampi te keima min taw hongpai tu a, keima in Christ ka hihi; ci in mi tampi theam tu hi.
MAT 24:6 Taciang ngal kido na le ngal ki sim tu thu te na zak uh ciang in thinngim le buai in om heak vun, banghangziam cile hibang te theampo a piang hamtang tu thu hi a, a tawpna hi ngawl lai hi.
MAT 24:7 Banghangziam cile minam khat le minam khat ki do tu a, kumpingam khat le kumpingam khat kisim tu uh hi, mun tatuam ah kial le pul te hong tung tu a, zinling tu hi.
MAT 24:8 Hite theampo sia hena dana kipat na a hihi.
MAT 24:9 Tuazawkciang note vawtsiat tu le thalup tu in hong ki ap tu a, Keima min hang in, minam theampo in hong ensan tu hi.
MAT 24:10 Mi tampi te thin-uk tu in kivawt tu uh a, khat le khat ki leheak tu uh hi.
MAT 24:11 Kamsang tampi te hong piang tu a, mi tampi theam tu hi.
MAT 24:12 Siatna hong khang va-ial tu ahikom, mi tampi te itna kiam va-ial tu hi.
MAT 24:13 Ahihang a tawp dong a thuak te in ngupna nga tu hi.
MAT 24:14 Minam theampo atu tetti hi tu in kumpingam lungdamna thu sia leitung theampo ah ki son tu a, tua zawkciang in a tawpna hong theng tu hi.
MAT 24:15 Tua ahikom kamsang Daniel sonkholna bang in suksiatna, a lipkhaphuai sia mun thiangtho ah a din ciang in, hi lai a sim peuma in tel tahen.
MAT 24:16 Taciang Judah ngam sungah omte mualtung ah tai tahen.
MAT 24:17 Inn tungah a omte sia innsung van la tu in tuaksuk heak tahen.
MAT 24:18 Lo sungah a omte in a nik le puan la tu in cia heak hen.
MAT 24:19 Tua hun ciang in, naupai te le nau noailuai te sia haksa mama tu hi.
MAT 24:20 Ahihang na tai tu uh hun sia phalbi hun le sabbath ni a hi ngawl natu in thungen vun:
MAT 24:21 Banghangziam cile leitung ki bitphua pan kipan a om ngei ngawl le mailam hun ah zong a om nawn ngawl tu haksatna lianpi a hihi.
MAT 24:22 Tua ni te tomsak ngawl hile kuama in thuakzo ngawl tu hi: ahihang a tealsa te atu in, tua ni te tomsak tu hi.
MAT 24:23 Tasiaciang khatpo in Christ sia ziak ah om hi, a hibale zesung ah om hi, hong ci le um heak vun.
MAT 24:24 Banghangziam cile Christ phaw a sil te le leilot kamsang te hong theng tu a, a suak thei le a tealsa te zong theam tu in musakna le nalamdang tampi lak tu uh hi.
MAT 24:25 En vun, hi thu te kong sonkhol zo hi.
MAT 24:26 Tua ahikom, mihing te in en vun Christ sia duisung ah om hi, hong cile pai heak vun: en vun, inndoi sungah om hi, a ci le zong um heak vun.
MAT 24:27 Banghangziam cile, khualeng sia nisuana sang pan hong leng in nitumna sang dong taan hi; mihing Tapa hongpai ciang zong tabangma hi tu hi.
MAT 24:28 Banghangziam cile, mithi luang omna mun theampo ah vaciik te hong ki kaikhawm tu hi.
MAT 24:29 Tua ngimna ni te zawk pociang ni hong mial tu a, tha zong tang nawn ngawl tu hi, taciang aksi te van pan in tak tu a, vantung vangletna te zong ling tu hi.
MAT 24:30 Tasiaciang mihing Tapa musakna van ah hong kilang tu a, leitung minam theampo tau tu hi, taciang amate in vangletna le minthanna lianpi taw mihing Tapa mei tungah hongpai mu tu uh hi.
MAT 24:31 Ama vantungmi te a lian mama lemle tum tu in sawl tu a, a tealsa te van mongkhat pan mongkhat dong leitung kingli a a omte theampo munkhat ah hong kaikhawm tu hi.
MAT 24:32 Theikung pan in sontena khat sin vun; a bak te pan in a dawnmoi hong sua ciang, khal hun hong nai zo hi, na ci thei uh hi:
MAT 24:33 Tasia bangma in hi thu te na mu uh ciang a hun hong nai zo a, kongbiang bul vacin hong theng zo hi, ci he tavun.
MAT 24:34 A tatak in kong ci ciang, hi thu te theampo a tangtut dong hi minam te bo ngawl tu hi.
MAT 24:35 Van le lei bo tu hi, ahihang ka kammal te a bo batu hi.
MAT 24:36 Ahizong tua ni le hun sia kuama in he ngawl hi, vantungmi te in zong he ngawl hi, Ka Pa bek in he hi.
MAT 24:37 Hikama le Noah hun lai bangma in mihing Tapa hongpai ciang zong tabangma hitu hi.
MAT 24:38 Banghangziam cile tuipiliim ma, Noah tembaw sung a tum ni dong mihing te, ne in dawn in, kipui le mopoai vawt in om tek uh hi,
MAT 24:39 Tuipi a liim hunlam zong he ngawl in, tui in a khu siat bangma in mihing Tapa hongpai ciang zong tabangma hi tu hi.
MAT 24:40 Tua hun ciang in lolai ah mi ni sung pan khat la tu a, a khat ki nusia tu hi.
MAT 24:41 An ngoai numei ni sung pan khat ki la tu a, khat ki nusia tu hi.
MAT 24:42 Na Topa uh hongpai tu hun he ngawl na hi uh ciang in, encik in ngak vun.
MAT 24:43 Nguta hongpai tu hun innteakpa in he hile, a inn encik nginge tu a, nguta te i phulsak na thuak ngawl tu hi.
MAT 24:44 Tua a hiciang kinging kholsa in om vun, banghangziam cile mihing Tapa siana ki ngin ngawl hun laitak in hongpai tu hi.
MAT 24:45 A topa in ama innkuanpui te a hun cinciang neaktu an a pia thei sia a makai in koi tu a, a muanhuai le a ciim naseam sia a kua ziam?
MAT 24:46 A topa hongpai ciang in na a sep laitak a mu thak naseampa sia thuphatoai a hihi.
MAT 24:47 A tatak in kong ci ciang, tua naseam pa sia a topa in a neisa theampo tungah thunei tu in koi tu hi.
MAT 24:48 Ahihang naseam phangawl in a thinsung pan in ka topa hong cia hak tu zam, ci in ngaisun a;
MAT 24:49 Naseam dang te vel in zukham thei te taw ne le dawn in om tu hi,
MAT 24:50 Tua naseampa in a upmawk ngawl ni le a kingin ngawl laitak in a topa hong theng tu hi,
MAT 24:51 Tua naseampa sia a topa in nasiatak in sat tu a, kana le ha ngoaina om na mun ah a ki hitheamsak te taw koi khawm tu hi.
MAT 25:1 Tasiaciang in vantung kumpingam sia Zineipa a muak tu in mei-inn taw a pai ngaknu thiangtho sawm taw sonte hi.
MAT 25:2 Nga te sia ciim a, a dang nga te sia mawmaw uh hi.
MAT 25:3 A mawmaw nga teng in mei-inn keng ahihang meitui keng thua ngawl uh hi,
MAT 25:4 A ciim te a hile bungsung ah a mei-inn taw keng uh hi.
MAT 25:5 Zineipa hong theng hak ahikom a vekpi in lusu in mu siat uh hi.
MAT 25:6 Zankim ciang in, en vun, zineipa hongpai zo hi; pai vun a, muak vun, ci hong ki tangko hi.
MAT 25:7 Tasiaciang ngaknu thiangtho te a vekpi in tho uh a, amate mei-inn tek vak tek uh hi.
MAT 25:8 A mawmaw te in, a ciim te kungah, na meitui hong pia tavun; banghangziam cile ka mei-inn te uh mitsiat hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 25:9 Ahihang a ciim te in, tabang hi ngawl hi; ka meitui uh no atu taw kicing ngawl hi: meitui zuak te kungah pai tavun a, lei tavun, ci in zo kik uh hi.
MAT 25:10 Amate meitui lei tu a pai lan in zineipa hongpai hi; taciang a ki ngingsa in a omte taw mopoai sungah tum tek uh a: tuazawkciang kongkha sia kikhak hi.
MAT 25:11 Tuazawkciang, a dang ngaknu thiangtho te zong hongpai uh a, Topa, Topa, kong hong hon tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 25:12 Ahihang ama in, amantak in kong son hi, note kong he ngei bua hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAT 25:13 Tua a hikom, mihing Tapa hongpai tu ni le a hun he ngawl na hi uh ciang in, encik in ngak nginge tavun.
MAT 25:14 Banghangziam cile, vantung kumpingam sia khual khuala a haw tu hu in, a naseam te sam a, a neisa te a ap pa taw kibang hi.
MAT 25:15 Amate hitheiza taw kisi in, khat tungah tatent nga, a dang khat tungah talent ni le a dang khat tungah talent khat pia in; a piak zawk pociang in khualhaw hi.
MAT 25:16 Talent nga a sang pa sia pai in summet a vawt ciang a dang talent nga metsak hi.
MAT 25:17 Tasia bangma in talent ni a sang pa in zong a dang talent ni nga thua hi.
MAT 25:18 Ahihang talent khat a sang pa sia pai in, dum a taw zawkciang a topa i sum sia phual hi.
MAT 25:19 A khuangei zawkciang in, a topa hongpai a, a naseam te san za tek en hi.
MAT 25:20 Talent nga a sang pa sia a dang talent nga keng in hongpai a, topa nangma in talent nga hong ap ni hi: en in, talent nga ma a met nga khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:21 A topa in, a pha in na seam hi, nang a pha le a thuman naseam pa: na tawmno tungah thuman na hikom in, na tampi uk tu in kong koi tu hi: na topa lungdamna sungah tum in, ci hi.
MAT 25:22 Talen ni a sang pa zong hongpai in, topa, talent ni hong ap ni hi: en in, a dang talent ni nga thua khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:23 A topa in, a pha in na seam hi, nang a pha le a thuman naseam pa; na tawmno tungah thuman na hikom in na tampi uk tu in kong koi tu hi: na topa lungdamna sungah tum in, ci hi.
MAT 25:24 Tuazawkciang in, talent khat a sang pa zong hongpai a, topa awng, nangma sia mi sonhak ni hi, ci kong he hi, na poai ngawl na mun ah na at a, na ciin ngawl na mun ah anla ni hi:
MAT 25:25 Lau ka hikom pai in, lei sungah na talent ka phual hi: en in, na neisa tuak sungah om nginge hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:26 A topa in, nang naseam tatsia le datham pa, ka poai ngawl na ah ka at le ka ciin ngawl na pan ka lak, na he a hile:
MAT 25:27 Ka sum teng sumtheak te kung ap le te pha hi, tabang hile kongpai ciang ka sum le a met nga tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:28 Tua ahikom a talent laksak vun a, talent sawm a nei pa tungah pia vun.
MAT 25:29 Banghangziam cile, a neite ki pia thua tu a, a dimlet in nei tu hi: ahihang a nei ngawl te sia a neisun uh zong ki laksak tu hi.
MAT 25:30 Phattuamna om ngawl naseam pa sia kana le ha ngoaina mun doipua khuazing sungah khia vun, ci hi.
MAT 25:31 Mihing Tapa minthanna taw, a thiangtho vantungmi theampo taw hongpai ciang in a vangletna kumpi tokhum tungah to tu hi:
MAT 25:32 Taciang in a mai ah mi theampo te kaikhawm tu a: tuucing pa in tuu le keal te a khen bang in khat le khat khen tu hi.
MAT 25:33 Tuu te sia a ziatsang ah koi tu a, keal te sia a veisang ah koi tu hi.
MAT 25:34 Tuazawkciang in, kumpipa in a ziatsang a te tung ah, hongpai tavun, no ka Pa thupha sang te, leitung bitphua pan kipan in note atu a kipua kholsa kumpingam lua tavun:
MAT 25:35 Banghangziam cile, ka ngilkial laitak in, an nong pia uh hi: ka dangko laitak in, tui nong pia uh hi: zin ka hi laitak in, nong tungsak uh hi:
MAT 25:36 Pum nguak in ka om laitak in, puan nong silsak uh hi: ka cinat laitak in, nong ve uh hi: ka thongtak laitak in, nong pai uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:37 Tasiaciang in a thutang te in, Topa, banghun lai na ngilkial hong mu in, an hong pia khu ziam? a hibale na dangko in dawn tu hong pia khu ziam?
MAT 25:38 Banghun lai in zin na hi hong mu in, hong tungsak khu ziam, na pum nguak hong mu in, puan hong silsak khu ziam?
MAT 25:39 Banghun lai na nat le na thongtak hong mu in, hong ve khu ziam? ci in zokik uh hi.
MAT 25:40 Kumpipa in, a mantak ka ci ciang, ka suapui te sung a nobel te tungah na vawt uh te, keima tungah hong vawt na hi uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:41 Tasiaciang in a veisang a to te tung ah, Topa in, no hamsiat thuak te ka kung pan in kiheam tavun, doaimangpa le a nungzui te a tu a ki vawtkhol tawntung mei sungah pai vun:
MAT 25:42 Banghangziam cile, ka ngilkial a, an hong pia ngawl nu hi: ka dangko a, tui hong pia ngawl nu hi:
MAT 25:43 Zin ka hi lai in, hong tungsak ngawl nu hi: pum nguak in ka om a, puan hong silsak ngawl nu hi: ka nat le thong ka tak ciang in, hong ve ngawl nu hi, ci hi.
MAT 25:44 Tasiaciang a mate in, Topa, banghun lai na ngilkial, na dangko, zin na hile thong na tak hong mu in hong khoi ngawl khu ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 25:45 Tasiaciang ama in, kei kong cina pan, hi teng sung pan a nobel tungah na vawt ngawl uh teng sia kei tungah vawt ngawl na hi uh hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAT 25:46 Hite sia tawntung ngim na sungah pai tu a: mi thutang te a hile tawntung nuntakna sungah pai tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:1 Hi thu te a hil zawkciang in Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah,
MAT 26:2 Tuzawk ni ni ciang in, paisan poai hi tu hi, ci na he uh hi, taciang mihing Tapa sia thinglamte tungah khai tu in ap tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:3 Taciang in thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le mi upa te thiampi sang Caiaphas leitual ah ki kaikhawm uh a,
MAT 26:4 Jesus man ku in, a thalup thei natu thu ngeal uh hi.
MAT 26:5 Poai hun sungah vawt ngawl tu hi, tabang hi thong leang, mipite hong ngamlum tu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 26:6 Bethany khua ah Simon kici miphak pa inn ah Jesus a om laitak in,
MAT 26:7 Anne in a to na mun ah numei khat, a manham mama sathau namtui alabaster thawlkhat keng in hongpai a, Jesus lu tung pan buak hi.
MAT 26:8 Ahihang a nungzui te in a mu uh ciang in thin-uk uh a, banghang in hibang ki pakvawt ziam?
MAT 26:9 Banghangziam cile hi sathau namtui sia a mantam in zuak in, mizawng te piak tu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 26:10 Tua thu Jesus in a heak ciang in, Banghang in numei nu nawngkaisak nu ziam? hi numei nu in ka tungah napha vawt hi.
MAT 26:11 Banghangziam cile mizawng te noma taw om tawntung hi; ahihang kei hong om tawntung ngawl khi hi.
MAT 26:12 Ka pumpi tungah sathau namtui hong buak na sia, keima ki vui natu in hong vawt a hihi.
MAT 26:13 A tatak in kong ci ciang, leitung theampo lungdamna thu ki son na theampo ah hi numei nu vawt thu zong ama phaw tawntung na in son tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:14 Tuazawkciang Judas Iscariot a kici, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat pa sia, thiampi lian te kungah pai a,
MAT 26:15 Amate tung ah, Jesus note hong ap leng bang hong pia tu nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in dangka sawmthum taw thukim na vawt uh hi.
MAT 26:16 Tua hun pan kipan Jesus a ap thei natu hunpha zong tan hi.
MAT 26:17 Tol saw ngawl anluum poai ni masabel ni in nungzui te Jesus kungah hongpai a, paisan poai ciang in, koisung ah anneak natu mun vawtsak tu khu ziam? ci uh hi.
MAT 26:18 Jesus in, Khuapi sungah pai tavun a, khat i tungah hibang son vun, Syapa in ka hun cing zo hi; ka nungzui te taw na inn ah paisan poai vawt tu khi hi, ci hi, ci in sawl hi.
MAT 26:19 A nungzui te in Jesus sawl bangin vawt uh a, paisan poai atu kinging khol uh hi.
MAT 26:20 Nitaksang ciang in Jesus a nungzui sawmleni te taw to uh hi.
MAT 26:21 Amate an a neak uh laitak Jesus in, A mantak in ka ci ciang, note sung pan khat in kei hong leheak tu nu hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:22 Amate sia he mama uh a, khat zawkciang khat in, Topa, keima ka hi ziam? ci in dong tek uh hi.
MAT 26:23 Jesus in, Keima taw kuang sung a sawkkhawm sia in kei hong leheak tu hi.
MAT 26:24 A ki atsa om bang in, mihing Tapa sia pai tu hi: ahihang mihing Tapa a leheak sia a hile, a mailam bing hi, ama sia piang bale phazaw hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAT 26:25 Topa a leheak pa Judas in, Topa, keima khi ziam? ci in dong a, Jesus in, Na ci bang in man hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAT 26:26 Amate an a neak uh laitak in, Jesus in anluum la a, thupha a piak zawkciang phel in, a nungzui te pia a, La vun a, ne vun, hisia in ka pumpi hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:27 Tuazawkciang hai zong la in, lungdam a ko zawkciang, amate pia a, Na vekpi in dawn vun;
MAT 26:28 Banghangziam cile, hisia in thuciam thak taw kisai mi tampi te mawna maisakna tu in a luang ka thisan a hihi.
MAT 26:29 Ahihang kei kong ci na pan, hibang sapittui a thak sia ka Pa kumpingam sungah note taw ka dawn kik mateng, bangmahun in dawn kik ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:30 Amate la a sak zawk uh ciang, Olive mualtung zuan in pai uh hi.
MAT 26:31 Tuazawkciang Jesus in, Tuucingpa ka that tu a, tuu hon te kikhen in peakkeak tu hi, ci in a ki atkhol bang in, na vekpi in tu zan keima hang in thinkiam mama tu nu hi.
MAT 26:32 Ahihang ka thawkik zawkciang in, Galilee ah note mai ah ka na paikhol tu hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:33 Peter in, mi theampo nangma hang in thinkiam in om kale, kei ka thinkiam batu hi, ci in zokik hi.
MAT 26:34 Jesus in, A tatak kong ci ciang, tu zan ak khuan ma thum vei hong nial tu ni hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:35 Peter in, nangma taw ka thi tu ahizong hong nial ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi. Tasia bangma in nungzui dang theampo in zong citek uh hi.
MAT 26:36 Jesus amate taw Gethsemane a kici huan ah pai uh a, Zia sungah thu ka nget laitak ziak ah to vun, ci in a nungzui te son hi.
MAT 26:37 Peter le Zebedee tapa ni te paipui a, thinngim mama le thuakhak na hong kipan hi.
MAT 26:38 Tasiaciang amate tung ah, Thi tu za dong in ka thinngim hi: ziak ah om vun a, keima taw ngak nginge vun, ci hi.
MAT 26:39 Tua mun pan in khua la zaw hiat na mun ah pai a, bok in thungen hi; Maw ka Pa, a hi thei le, hi hai sia kei taw ki pealsak tan: ahihang kei deina bang hi ngawl in nangma deina bang hi zaw tahen, ci in thungen hi.
MAT 26:40 A nungzui te kungah hongpai a, a mate a mutthip sa in mu hi, taciang Peter kungah, Nai khatpo zong hong ngak zo ngawl nu ziam?
MAT 26:41 Ze-etna sungah na tum ngawl natu thungen in ngak vun: thaa sia ukna nei ahihang, pumpi sia thaneam hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:42 Jesus a ni veina paikik a, Maw ka Pa, a hi thei le, hi hai sia kei taw ki pealsak in: ahihang kei deina bang hi ngawl in nangma deina bang hi zaw tahen, ci in thungen hi.
MAT 26:43 A nungzui te kungah hongpai a, a mutthip sa ma in mu kik hi: banghangziam cile amate a mutsuak mama uh hi.
MAT 26:44 Jesus in amate nusia in khatvei paikik a, a ngetsa bangma in a thumvei na ngen hi.
MAT 26:45 Tuazawkciang nungzui te kungah hongpai a, Tu in mu vun a, tawlnga vun, mihing Tapa sia mawnei te khut ah ap tu hun hong theng zo hi.
MAT 26:46 Tho vun a, pai tawng, en vun keima hong ap sia pa hong theng zo hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:47 Tabang in Jesus a pau laitak in, en vun, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat a hi, Judas hongpai a, thiampi lian te le ulian te i sawl mihon tampi te zong namsau le moltum te toai in hongpai hi.
MAT 26:48 Jesus a ap sia pa in, ka nap sia Ama hi, man vun; ci in heaksakna pia khol zo hi.
MAT 26:49 Taciang Jesu kungah manlang tak in hongpai a, Topa, na tungah thupha om tahen; ci in nam hi.
MAT 26:50 Jesus in, Lawm awng, banghang hongpai ni ziam? ci hi. Tuazawkciang amate hongpai a, Jesus man in paipui uh hi.
MAT 26:51 En vun, Jesus taw a omkhawm khat in, a namsau dok in thiampi lian pa i naseam pa sat ahikom, a bil tawng pai hi.
MAT 26:52 Tasiaciang in Jesus in ama kungah, Na namsau ama omna mun ah koikik in: banghangziam cile namsau a zam te, namsau taw ma in thi kik tu hi.
MAT 26:53 Tu mama in ka Pa tungah ngen thei khi hi, ci le, ngen leng vantungmi hon sawmleni sang tamzaw hong sawl tu hi, ci thu ngaisun ngawl ni ziam?
MAT 26:54 Ahihang hibang hi tu hi, ci laithiangtho sung a ki atkholsa thu te bangbang tangtung thei tu ziam? ci hi.
MAT 26:55 Tua hun laitak in mihonpi te tung ah, Note, banghang nguta man tu bang in namsau le moltum taw kei man tu in hongpai nu ziam? biakinn sungah thuhil in nisim note taw ka to lai hong man ngawl nu hi.
MAT 26:56 Ahihang hi thu te sia, kamsang te atkholsa laithiangtho a tangtun natu a hihi, ci hi. Tasiaciang in a nungzui te theampo ama nusia in, tai siat uh hi.
MAT 26:57 Jesus a man te in thukhamhil te le ulian te ki kaikhop na mun thiampi sang Caiaphas kungah paipui uh hi.
MAT 26:58 Peter in a khuala thithim na pan zui in thiampi sangbel pa leitual dong pai a, a tawp dong en tu in naseam te taw to khawm hi.
MAT 26:59 Thiampi lian te, upa te le council te theampo in Jesus that thei tu in leilot tetti te zong uh hi;
MAT 26:60 Ahihang khat zong a mu bua uh hi, leilot tetti tam mama hongpai napi khat zong a mu bua uh hi. A khakbel ciang leilot tetti ni hongpai a,
MAT 26:61 Hisia pa in Pathian biakinn sia pheltam in nithum sung sa kik thei tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:62 Thiampi lianbelpa hong ding a, bangma zo kik ngawl tu ni ziam? Hite tetti te in bangbang in nangma hong langpan ziam? ci hi.
MAT 26:63 Ahihang Jesus huthe ngawl hi. Thiampi sangbel pa in, nang Christ a kici Pathian Tapa na hile hi ngawl nong son tu in a nungta Pathian min taw kong ngen hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:64 Jesus in, Na ci bang in man hi: ahihang keima in kong ci hi, tu zo mihing Tapa sia vangletna ziatsang ah to in mei tung pan hong tuaksuk na mu tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:65 Tasiaciang in thiampi sangbel in a puan eaukeak a, hisia pa in Pathian min daisak in pau hi, tetti dang bang kul lai ziam? en vun, Pathian min a daisak, na za zo uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:66 Bangbang ngaisun nu ziam? ci a dok ciang in, amate in hisia pa in, thina tu kilawm mawna nei hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 26:67 Tuazawkciang a maitang cilphi uh a, sat cip uh hi; a khut zapheak uh taw beang uh hi,
MAT 26:68 Kua na hong beang ziam? nang Christ, kamsang bang in hong son tan, ci uh hi.
MAT 26:69 Peter sia leitual ah a to laitak in, naseam numei khat a kungah hongpai a, nang zong Galilee mi Jesus taw om khawm nu hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:70 Ahihang Peter in, amate theampo mai ah nial a, bang son ni ziam, ci kong he bua hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:71 Tuazawkciang Peter sia innmai kongbiang ah pai a, a dang naseam numei khat in a mu ciang in, tua mun a omte sungah hisia pa zong Nazareth mi Jesus taw om khawm hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:72 Peter in kiciam na kammal taw hisia pa he ngawl khi hi, ci nial leleau hi.
MAT 26:73 Tuazawk a ngei ngawl in tua mun ah a ding te Peter kungah hongpai a, nang sia hi mite sungah ki hel te khat hi lalawm ni hi; banghangziam cile na paudan taw ki he hi, ci hi.
MAT 26:74 Tasiaciang Peter in, kiciam in, hisia pa he ngawl khi hi, ci hi. Tasia pociang akkhuang hi.
MAT 26:75 Jesus in, Ak khuan ma thumvei dong hong nial tu ni hi, a ci sia Peter in phawkkik hi. Taciang a puasang ah pusuak in, nasiatak in kap hi.
MAT 27:1 Zingsang hong thet ciang in thiampi lian te le upa te theampo in Jesus that tu in kikum khawm uh hi:
MAT 27:2 Amate in a lehhen zawk uh ciang, ngam uk Pontius Pilate kungah paipui in ap uh hi.
MAT 27:3 Tuazawkciang in Jesus a leheak pa Judas in, Topa sia thalup tu in maw ki suan hi, ci a mu ciang in, ki sikkik a, dangka sawmthum sia thiampi lian te le upa te kungah puak kik in,
MAT 27:4 Mawna nei ngawl pa thisan ka ap thak man in khial khi hi, ci hi. Amate in, ko taw bang kisai ziam? nangma taw kisai bek hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:5 Ama in tua dangka sia biakinn sungah lawn a, mundang ah pai in ama le ama ngui awk hi.
MAT 27:6 Thiampi lian te in, tua dangka te la a, hi sum sia thisan man a hikom in, biakinn neisa te sungah koi tu kilawm ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:7 Amate kikum khawm uh a, ngamdang mite ki phum natu in bealvawtpa lo lei uh hi.
MAT 27:8 Tua ahikom tua lo sia, tu ni dong in thisan lo, kici hi.
MAT 27:9 Kamsang Jeremiah in a sonkholna ah, Israel mite in a kitat na uh man dangka sawmthum sia amate in la a;
MAT 27:10 Topa thupiak na bang in bealvawtpa lo lei hi, a ci thu tangtung hi.
MAT 27:11 Jesus sia ngam uk pa mai ah ding a, tua ngam uk pa in, nangma sia Judah Kumpipa ni ziam? ci in dong hi; taciang Jesus in, Na ci bang in hi khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 27:12 Thiampi lian te le upa te in ama a mawsiat ciang in kamkhat zong zo kik ngawl hi.
MAT 27:13 Tuazawkciang in Pilate in, nangma hong ki mawsiat na tetti theampo za ngawl ni ziam? ci hi.
MAT 27:14 Jesus in kamkhat zong a zo kik ngawl ciang in: ngam uk pa in lamdangsa mama hi.
MAT 27:15 Tua poai sungah ngam uk pa in thongtak te sung pan, mipi te dei khat suatak thei hi.
MAT 27:16 Tua ahikom thongtak te sungah Barabbas a kici a minthang mama khat om hi.
MAT 27:17 Tua ahikom mipite hong ki kaikhop ciang, Pilate in amate tung ah, kua na suaktasak nuam uh ziam? Barabbas maw, Christ a kici Jesus? ci hi.
MAT 27:18 Banghangziam cile Pilate in amate in Jesus sia el ahikom hong ap hi, ci he hi.
MAT 27:19 Pilate sia thukhenna tokhum tung a to ciang in, a zi in mikhat sawl a, hi thutangpa tungah bangma vawt heak in, banghangziam cile tuni ka mang sungah ama hang in tampitak thuak khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 27:20 Ahihang thiampi lian te le upa te in mihonpi te sia Barabbas ngen tu le Jesus that tu in hol uh hi.
MAT 27:21 Pilate in hi ni te sung pan a kua suatak tu dei nu ziam? ci in a dok ciang, amate in Barabbas suatak tu dei khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:22 Tua a hile Christ a kici Jesus sia banglaw tu khi ziam? ci in Pilate in a dok ciang in, amate theampo in, thinglamte tungah khaina thuak tahen, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:23 Taciang ngam uk pa in, banghangziam, bang khialna vawt ziam? a ci ciang in, amate in thinglamte tungah ki khai tahen, ci in au seseam uh hi.
MAT 27:24 Pilate in zo nawn ngawl khi hi, mipi te ngamlum siat hi, ci a mu ciang, tui la in, a khut sil a, hi a thutang pa thisan pan ka thiang hi: no ma khensat tavun, ci hi.
MAT 27:25 Tasiaciang in mi theampo in, hi sia pa i thisan koma le ka tate tungah om tahen, ci tek uh hi.
MAT 27:26 Taciang Pilate in Barabbas suatak a: Jesus sia a sat zawkciang thinglamte tungah khai tu in ap hi.
MAT 27:27 Tuazawkciang Pilate ngalkap te in Jesus sia ngam uk pa inn ah paipui uh a, ngalkap hon bup ama kim ah kikhawm hi.
MAT 27:28 Amate in a puan te sutkeak in, puan sannum silsak uh hi.
MAT 27:29 Amate in lingtaw a ki pheak ling lukhu a lu tungah khusak uh a, a ziatsang khut ah phai kung khat toaisak uh hi: taciang a mai ah khupdin in, Judah te kumpipa! na khansau tahen, ci in selno uh hi.
MAT 27:30 Amate in ama tungah cilphi uh a, a phaikung la in a lu pan vel uh hi.
MAT 27:31 Tabang in a selno uh zawkciang a puan tual hawksak kik in, ama puan sil sakkik uh hi, tua zawkciang thinglamte tungah khen tu in paipui uh hi.
MAT 27:32 Tabang in a paipui uh laitak, Simon a kici, Cyrene khuami khat mu uh a: thinglamte zawthawk thu taw puasak uh hi.
MAT 27:33 Amate in Golgotha a kici lu ngu mual a thet uh ciang in,
MAT 27:34 Jesus sia sapittui le a kha a kihel pia uh hi: ama in tep bek a, dawn nuam ngawl hi.
MAT 27:35 Jesus sia thinglamte tungah khai uh a, a puan te a khen zawk uh ciang in, aisan nataw hawm uh hi: tua thu sia kamsangpa sonkholna, amate in ka puan te aisan in hawm uh hi, ci thu a tangtunna a hihi.
MAT 27:36 Tuazawkciang tua mun ah to in ama encik uh hi.
MAT 27:37 A lu tung san ah mawsiatna lai, HI SIA JUDAH TE KUMPIPA JESUS HI ci in at uh hi.
MAT 27:38 Ama taw nguta ni te zong a ziatsang ah khat, a veisang zong ah a dang khat, thinglamte tungah khai uh hi.
MAT 27:39 Lampi ah a vak te in zong nu nau in, a lu thin uh a;
MAT 27:40 Biakinn pheltham in nithum sung a sakik tu pa, nangma le nangma ki hun in. Pathian Tapa na hile, thinglamte tung pan tuaksuk in, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:41 Tasia bangma in thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le, upa te zong in nu nau in,
MAT 27:42 Ama in ngualdang ngum thei a, ama le ama ki ngum thei ngawl hi. Ama sia Israel te kumpipa a hile thinglamte tung pan tu mama in tuak hen a, tasiaciang in ka um tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:43 Ama in Pathian muang a; keima sia Pathian Tapa khi hi, ci a hi ciang, tu mama in Pathian in suaktasak hen: ci in nu nau tek uh hi.
MAT 27:44 Ama taw thinglamte tungah a ki khai nguta te zong in, tabangma in nu nau uh hi.
MAT 27:45 Sun nai sawmleni pan nitak sang nai thum dong leitung theampo khuazing hi.
MAT 27:46 Nai thum kim ciang in, Jesus a nging tatak in, Eli, Eli, Lama sabachthani? ci in au hi, a khiakna sia, Ka Pathian, Ka Pathian, banghang in hong taisan ni ziam? a cinopna hi.
MAT 27:47 Tua mun ah a ding te pawlkhat in a zak uh ciang in, Elijah sam hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:48 Tasia pociang amate sung pan khat tai a, tuihup puan la in, sapittui hau sungah a papsuk zawkciang, phaikung dawn ah hen in, Jesus dawn tu in pia hi.
MAT 27:49 A dang te in, ngak hi vun, Elijah ama hun tu in hongpai tha tu hi, ci en tawng, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:50 Jesus ngingtak in au kik in thi hi.
MAT 27:51 Taciang in, en vun, biakinn sung sang kidalna puan sia a lu pan a taw dong khen ni in ki khen suk hi; zin zong ling in, suangtum te zong kektham a,
MAT 27:52 Thankul te ki hong in; a thisa mithiangtho tampi te thokik hi,
MAT 27:53 Amate than sung pan pusuak uh a, Jesus thawkik zawkciang in, khuapi thiangtho sungah pai uh a, mi tampi te kungah kilang uh hi.
MAT 27:54 Ngalkap zakhat uk pa le a kungah omte in Jesus en in, zinling le thupiang dang te a mu uh ciang in, lau mama uh a, hisia pa Pathian Tapa tatak hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:55 Galilee pan Jesus a zui te le a khoi numei tampi te in, a khuala na pan en tek uh hi:
MAT 27:56 Tua numei te sungah Mary Magdalene, James le Joses te nu Mary le Zebedee zi zong ki hel hi.
MAT 27:57 Nitak sang ciang in, Arimathea khua pan mihau pa khat hongpai hi, a min sia Joseph kici a, Jesus nungzui khat a hihi:
MAT 27:58 Ama Pilate kungah pai a, Jesus luanghawm ngen hi. Tasiaciang Pilate in Jesus luanghawm piak tu in thupia hi.
MAT 27:59 Taciang Joseph in Jesus luanghawm a lak zawkciang, puanneam thiang taw tun in,
MAT 27:60 Ama atu in a taw suang hawng thankul sungah vui hi: than kongkha ah suangtum lian mama khat lik in a kha zawkciang pai hi.
MAT 27:61 Mary Magdalene le a dang Mary te sia tua mun ah thankul sang nga in to uh hi.
MAT 27:62 Ki ngin ni a zingciang in, thiampi lian te le Pharisee te Pilate kungah hongpai uh a,
MAT 27:63 Topa awng, tua leilot thu son pa in a nuntak lai in, nithum zawkciang thokik tu khi hi, a ci sia phawkkik khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:64 A nungzui te zan ciang hongpai in a luanghawm ngu a, thina pan thokik zo hi: ci in midang te tungah son a hile, a nungsang thu sia a masa sang in poimaw zaw tu hi, tua ahiciang a than sia nithum dong cing tu in thupia in, ci uh hi.
MAT 27:65 Pilate in amate tung ah, a cing tu nei nu hi: pai tavun a, na hitheitawp in vawt vun, ci hi.
MAT 27:66 Tua ahikom amate zong than ah pai in, thankul kha na suangpheak tungah ceptena khen in, a cing te koi uh hi.
MAT 28:1 Sabbath ni bo in nipi khat sung ni masabel khuavak tu hong kipat ciang in, Mary Magdalene le a dang Mary te than en tu in pai uh hi.
MAT 28:2 Tua laitak in nasiatak in zinling hi: banghangziam cile Topa vantungmi van pan hong tuaksuk in, than kongkha suangtum sia lik a, a tungah to hi.
MAT 28:3 A mai sia khualeng bang hi a, a puan vukbang in pak hi:
MAT 28:4 Taciang than cing te lau in ling uh a, mithi bang hi uh hi.
MAT 28:5 Vantungmi in numei te kungah, lau heak vun: banghangziam cile, thinglamte tungah a ki khai Jesus zong nu hi, ci kong he hi.
MAT 28:6 Ama ziak ah om ngawl hi: banghangziam cile, a sonsa bang in thokik zo hi. Hongpai tavun a, a ki sial na en vun.
MAT 28:7 Taciang manlang in pai tavun a, thina pan thokik zo hi, ci in a nungzui te son vun; en vun, ama note mai Galilee ah pai hi; tuak ah mu tu nu hi: en vun, hong son zo khi hi, ci hi.
MAT 28:8 Amate than pan in launa le lungdamna lianpi taw ciakik uh a; a nungzui te son tu in tai uh hi.
MAT 28:9 A nungzui te son tu in a tai uh laitak in, en vun, Jesus a mate kung hongpai a, Note tungah nopna om tahen, ci hi. Taciang amate Jesus peang ah hongpai in, a peang len in bia uh hi.
MAT 28:10 Tuazawkciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Lau heak vun, ka suapui te Galilee ah pai tu in son vun a, tuaksung ah hong mu tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAT 28:11 Amate a pai zawkciang in than cing pawlkhat te khuapi sungah pai uh a, thiampi lian te kungah thupiang teng theampo son uh hi.
MAT 28:12 Ama te upa te taw ki kaikhawm in, thu a kikup zawk uh ciang in, ngalkap te sum tampi pia uh a,
MAT 28:13 A nungzui te zan in hongpai uh a, ka mut uh lan in a luang ngu uh hi, ci vun.
MAT 28:14 Hi thu te ngam uk pa i nakheng ah a theng zong in, na suatak thei natu uh, koma in hong sonsak tu khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAT 28:15 Tua ahikom amate in sum la in, a son uh bang in vawt uh hi: taciang tua thu sia Judah mite in tuni dong in mun theampo ah hil uh hi.
MAT 28:16 A nung zui sawm le khat te Galilee ah pai uh a, Jesus in a ciamsa mun mualtung ah ka to uh hi.
MAT 28:17 Amate in Jesus a mu uh ciang bia tek uh hi: ahihang pawlkhat te in muang ngam ngawl uh hi.
MAT 28:18 Jesus hongpai a, amate tung ah, Van le lei thuneina theampo hongpia siat zo hi.
MAT 28:19 Tua a hiciang note pai tavun a, minam theampo te hil tavun, Pa, Tapa le Tha Thiangtho min taw tuiphumna pia tavun:
MAT 28:20 Keima i kong thupiak teng theampo a vekpi zui tu in hil tavun: taciang en vun, leitung bo dong in a tawntung keima in kong ompui hi, ci hi. Amen.
MAR 1:1 Pathian Tapa Jesus Christ lungdamna thu a kipatna in;
MAR 1:2 Kamsang te in a sonkholsa bangma in, en vun, na pai natu lampi a pua tu in, ka kamtaipa na mai ah sawl khi hi.
MAR 1:3 Senneal ngam sungah a au aw khat in, Topa lampi puakhol vun a, tangsak vun, ci hi.
MAR 1:4 John in senneal ngam ah tuiphumna pia a, mawmaisakna tu in ki sikkik na tuiphumna thu tangko hi.
MAR 1:5 Jerusalem le Judah ngam theampo pan in mi tampi te John kungah hongpai uh a, amate mawna te pualak in Jordan ngun ah tui ki phum tek uh hi.
MAR 1:6 John sia kala-uk mul taw a ki tak puan sil a, a kawng sia savun kawngkhau taw kil hi; khaumaw le khuaitui te ne hi;
MAR 1:7 Ka nung pan hongpai pa sia kei sang in thahat zaw a, kei ka hile kun in a peangdap khau sutsak tu in zong ka kiphu bua hi:
MAR 1:8 Keima in tui taw tuiphumna kong pia hi: ahizong Ama in Tha Thiangtho taw tuiphumna hong pia tu hi, ci in pualak hi.
MAR 1:9 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus sia Galilee ngam Nazareth pan hongpai in, John in Jordan ngun ah tuiphumna pia hi.
MAR 1:10 Jesus tuisung pan a thawto pociang, van hong ki hong in, Thaa sia vakhu bang in a tungah hong tuaksuk John in mu hi:
MAR 1:11 Van pan in aw khat hong nging a, Nangma sia ka it ka Tapa na hihi, Na tungah ka lungkim mama hi, ci hi.
MAR 1:12 Tuazawk pociang in, Thaa in Jesus sia senneal ngam ah paisak hi.
MAR 1:13 Tua senneal ngam ah ni sawm li om a, Satan in ze-et hi; senneal ngam sung ngamsa te taw omkhawm a; vantung mite in khoi hi.
MAR 1:14 John thong a tak zawkciang in Jesus Galilee ah pai a, Pathian kumpingam lungdamna thuhil hi.
MAR 1:15 A hun hong cing zo a, Pathian kumpingam hong nai zo hi, na mawna uh kisik vun a, lungdamna thu um vun, ci hi.
MAR 1:16 Jesus Galilee tuili hui ah a pai laitak in Simon le a suapuipa Andrew sia tuili sungah ngenpai in a om laitak mu hi:
MAR 1:17 Jesus in amate tung ah, Ka nung hong zui tavun, mihing man te kong suaksak tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 1:18 Taciang amate in thakhatthu in a ngen te nusia in, a nungzui uh hi.
MAR 1:19 A khuala hiat na mun a thet uh ciang in Zebedee tapa James le John te u nau ngunkuang sungah ngen a phaw uh laitak mu hi.
MAR 1:20 Jesus in a mu pociang in sam a; amate zong ngunkuang sungah a pa Zebedee le a naseam te nusia in a nung zui uh hi.
MAR 1:21 Amate Capernaum khua ah pai uh a; sabbath ni hong thet pociang synagogue sungah tum in, thuhil hi.
MAR 1:22 Amate in a hil na lamdangsa tek uh hi: banghangziam cile thukhamhil te bang in hil ngawl in, thunei te khat bang in hil hi.
MAR 1:23 Amate synagogue sungah doai ngilo vei pasal khat om a,
MAR 1:24 Nang Nazareth mi Jesus, hong om nginge sak po tan; nang taw bang sep tu nei khu ziam? hong susia tu in hongpai hi ngawl ni ziam? Nangma in Pathian mithiangtho ni hi, ci hong he khi hi, ci au hi.
MAR 1:25 Tasiaciang Jesus in ama tei a, Om nginge po in a, hisia pa sung pan pusuak in, ci hi.
MAR 1:26 Doai ngilo in tuapa huangsak vadil a, a nging tatak a au zawkciang, a sung pan pusuak hi.
MAR 1:27 Amate theampo in lamdangsa mama uh a, hisia in bangbang hithong ziam? hibang te koibang hil na thak ziam? banghangziam cile thuneina taw thupia in, doai ngilo te nangawn in a thuni hi, ci in amate sungah ki dong tek uh hi.
MAR 1:28 Taciang a min sia Galilee ngam kimkot teng theampo ah manlangtak in thang hi.
MAR 1:29 Amate synagogue sung pan a pusua zawk uh ciang in, James le John te taw Simon le Andrew te innsung ah tumsuak pai uh hi.
MAR 1:30 Ahihang Simon zi i a nu sia a cisa in lum hi, ci manlang tak in son uh hi.
MAR 1:31 Taciang Jesus hongpai a, a ban pan len in kaito hi; tasia pociang in a cisa thai a, amate leangna do hi.
MAR 1:32 Nitak sang ni tum ciang in, cina te le doai te a kungah puak uh hi.
MAR 1:33 Tua khuapi sung mihing theampo a kongbiang ah hong ki kaikhawm siat uh hi.
MAR 1:34 Jesus in natna namcin a thuak te damsak a, doai tam mama hawlkhia hi; Jesus in doai te pausak ngawl hi, banghangziam cile amate in Jesus he uh hi.
MAR 1:35 A zingciang khuavak ma in Jesus tho a, khuapua sangah pusuak in kuama om ngawl na mun ah thungen hi.
MAR 1:36 Simon le a lawmte in ama zui tek uh hi.
MAR 1:37 Amate in a mu uh ciang in, a kungah, mi theampo in hong zong uh hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 1:38 Jesus in, Khuapi dang te ah zong pai tawng, tuak sungah thuhil tu khi hi: banghangziam cile thuhil tu in hongpai ka hihi, ci hi.
MAR 1:39 Galilee ngam mun tatuam synagogue te ah thuhil a, doai te zong hawlkhia hi.
MAR 1:40 Miphak khat ama kungah hongpai a, khupdin in, Topa uk hi po le te keima hong thiangsak thei ni hi, ci in thum hi.
MAR 1:41 Jesus in tuapa tungah hesuakna nei in, a khut tham a, Uk khi hi; thiang tan, ci hi.
MAR 1:42 Jesus in a ci zawkpociang in, a phak natna bo vingveng a, ama thiang hi.
MAR 1:43 Jesus in ama phatak in thu a vaithak zawkciang, paisak hi;
MAR 1:44 Ama kungah, Kuama son heak in: ahizong thiampi te kungah pai tan a, nangma le nangma ki lak in, amate tungah tetti na lak natu in Moses thupiak biakpiakna pia in, ci hi.
MAR 1:45 Ahihang tua pa pai in, mun theampo ah a pualak kakoai hu in, Jesus khuapi sungah a kilang in tum thei ngawl a, khua pua sang duisung ah om hi: taciang mun theampo pan in a kungah hongpai tek uh hi.
MAR 2:1 Tuazawk ni tam ki hal ngawl in Jesus Capernaum khua ah hong theng kik a; inn ah om hi, ci thu hong kison hi.
MAR 2:2 Tasia pociang in mihing tam mama hong theng tek uh a, innsung ah a awng na munkhat mama zong om ngawl in, kongkha hui a puasang dong in dimteak uh hi: tua mun ah Jesus in amate thuhil hi.
MAR 2:3 Tualaitak in mihing li in pumzawpa khat zawng khawm uh a, hong paipui uh hi.
MAR 2:4 Mihing tamlei ahikom in Jesus kung dong pai thei ngawl hi, tua ahikom Jesus om na tungsan pan inn khuvum sulet uh a: pumzawpa a lupna taw khiasuk uh hi.
MAR 2:5 Jesus in amate upna uh a mu ciang, pumzawpa kungah, Ka tapa awng, na mawna te hong ki maisak zo hi, ci hi.
MAR 2:6 Ahihang tua mun ah thukhamhil te pawlkhat tokhawm uh a, amate thinsung uh ah,
MAR 2:7 Banghang in hisia pa in Pathian mindaisak in pau ziam? Pathian bek in mawna maisak thei hi ngawl ziam? ci in ngaisun uh hi.
MAR 2:8 Thakhatthu in Jesus in amate ngaisutna a thaa taw he a, Banghang in na thinsung uh ah hi thu te ngaisun nu ziam?
MAR 2:9 Hi pumzawpa kungah, na mawna te hong ki maisak zo hi; ci le, tho in a, na lupna zial in, pai in, ci tu koisia ol zaw ziam?
MAR 2:10 Ahihang, mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawna te maisak thei na vangletna nei hi, ci na tel thei natu uh in, (pumzawpa kungah),
MAR 2:11 Nangma tungah kong ci hi, tho in a, na lupna zial in, pai in a, cia in, hong ci khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 2:12 Tasia pociang thakhatthu in tho a, a lupna la in mi theampo i mai ah pai hi; amate theampo in lamdangsa mama uh a, hibang thu i mu ngei bua hi, ci in Pathian minthang pok uh hi.
MAR 2:13 Jesus tuili hui ah pai kik hi; taciang mihonpi te a kungah hongpai uh a, amate thuhil hi.
MAR 2:14 Lampi ah a pai uh laitak in Alphaeus i tapa Levi sia shia ki dong na mun innsung ah a to mu a, Hong zui tan, ci hi. Tasia ciang ama zong ding in, Jesus nungzui hi.
MAR 2:15 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus Levi innsung anneakna mun ah to hi, siadong te le mawnei tampi te zong Jesus le a nungzui te taw to khawmtek uh hi: banghangziam cile mitampi in a nung pan zui hi.
MAR 2:16 Taciang siadong te le mawnei te taw an a neak khop uh, thukhamhil te le Pharisee te in a mu uh ciang in, a nungzui te kungah, bangbang in siadong te le mawnei te taw annekhawm ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 2:17 Tua thu Jesus in a zakciang in amate tung ah, A cidam te in syavuan kul ngawl hi, ahihang cina te in kul hi: mipha te sam tu in hongpai ngawl khi hi, mawnei te ki sikkiksak tu in hongpai khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 2:18 John le Pharisee te zungzui te antang tawntung uh hi: amate Jesus kungah hongpai uh a, John le Pharisee te i nungzui te antang uh hi, banghang in na nungzui te tang ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 2:19 Jesus in amate kungah, Zineipa sia a lawmte taw a om laitak in amate antang thei tu ziam? zineipa om sung theampo antang thei ngawl hi.
MAR 2:20 Ahihang amate kung pan zineipa a ki lak ni hong theng tu a, tasiaciang antang kik lai tu hi.
MAR 2:21 Puan lui sia puan thak taw kuama in phaw ngei ngawl hi: tabang in phaw le tua a phawna puan thak in puan lui sia kaikin tu a, a ek zai seseam tu hi.
MAR 2:22 Tasia bangma in savun um lui sungah kuama in sapittui thak thun ngei ngawl hi: a thun le savun um tamtham tu a, sapittui bua siat in, savun um zong laltham tu hi: ahihang sapittui thak sia savun um thak sungah a thun hamtang tu uh a hihi, ci hi.
MAR 2:23 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus sabbath ni khat lo sung kantan in pai a; a nungzui te a ngilkial ahikom, zungtang hui te hiat in ne uh hi.
MAR 2:24 Ahihang Pharisee te in a mu uh ciang, Jesus kungah, en in, na nungzui te in sabbath ngeina a hi ngawl te banghang seam uh ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 2:25 Jesus in amate tung ah, David le a lawmte a ngilkial uh a, kisap na a nei ciang in, bang vawt ci thu simngei ngawl nu ziam?
MAR 2:26 Thiampi sangbel Abiathar hun lai in Pathian innsung ah bangbang tum in, thiampi te bek i a neak thei, Pathian mai ah a ki lui anluum te ne in, a lawmte zong pia hi ngawl ziam? amate neak tu a kilawm ngawl, thiampi te bek i a neak thei tu in Pathian mai ah a ki lui anluum te ne uh hi, ci hi.
MAR 2:27 Tasiaciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Sabbath sia mihing te atu a kivawt hi a, mihing sia sabbath atu in a ki vawt hi ngawl hi:
MAR 2:28 Tua ahikom mihing Tapa sia sabbath i tungah Topa a hihi, ci hi.
MAR 3:1 Jesus synagogue sungah tumkik a; tuaksung ah khut langzaw khat om hi.
MAR 3:2 Ama maw zong nuam te in sabbath ni in damsak maw, damsak ngawl; ci encik uh hi.
MAR 3:3 Jesus in tua khut langzaw pa tung ah, A maisang ah hong ding tan, ci hi.
MAR 3:4 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Sabbath ni in a pha sep tu kilawm ziam maw, a hibale a phangawl sep tu kilawm ziam? ngual nuntakna ngum tu maw, that tuh?, ci hi. Ahihang amate a huthe bua uh hi.
MAR 3:5 Jesus in a kimkot teng thin-uk kawm in en a, amate thinpui uh hu in khuangai a, tua pa kungah, Na khut phal in, ci hi. Tasiaciang ama in a khut phal a: tua a khut sia a langkhat bangma in dam kik hi.
MAR 3:6 Tasia pociang, Pharisee te pai in Herod mihing te taw Jesus suksiat thei natu thu kikum pai uh hi.
MAR 3:7 Ahihang Jesus a nungzui te taw tuili sangah pai uh a: a zui mihon tampi te sia, Galilee le Judah,
MAR 3:8 Jerusalem, Idumea le Jordan ngunngal; Tyre le Sidon kim teng pan hongpai te a hi uh hi. Tua mihon tampi te sia Jesus i na lianpi a vawt te a zak uh ciang in, a kungah hongpai tek uh hi.
MAR 3:9 Mihonpi te in phulcip tha tu a hi ciang in ngunkuang no khat taw ngak khol tu in a nungzui te sawl hi.
MAR 3:10 Banghangziam cile mi tam mama damsak zo a; natna a thuak te theampo in ama tham tu in kitu ngawp uh hi.
MAR 3:11 Doai ngilo te in Ama a mu uh ciang in, a mai ah bok uh a, nang sia Pathian Tapa ni hi, ci in au uh hi.
MAR 3:12 Jesus in amate tung ah, Ama thu kuama hesak ngawl tu in nasiatak in vaitha hi.
MAR 3:13 Jesus mualtung ah kato hi, taciang Ama i dei te teal a: tua te a kungah hongpai hi.
MAR 3:14 Mihing sawmleni te sia ama kungah om tu in ahizong, thuhil tu in paisak tu ahizong, nasep pia in,
MAR 3:15 Natna te damsak tu in ahizong, doai te hawlkhiat zawk na vangletna nei tu in ahizong:
MAR 3:16 Peter kici Simon;
MAR 3:17 Zebedee tapa James le John; amate sia Boanerges ci in min kivaw a, a khiakna sia vanto tate, cinopna a hihi:
MAR 3:18 Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Thaddaeus, Canaan mi Simon,
MAR 3:19 Jesus leheakpa Judas Iscariot te a hi uh hi: Taciang amate innsung ah tum tek uh hi.
MAR 3:20 Taciang mihonpi te hongpai kik uh hi, tua ahikom amate anneak hun zong a nei bua hi.
MAR 3:21 Tua thu a mealheak te in a zak uh ciang in, Jesus sia a thin-am zo hi, a ci uh hu in Ama pui tu in pai tek uh hi.
MAR 3:22 Jerusalem pan hongpai thukhamhil te in, Jesus sungah Beelzabub om hi, doai ngilo le topa vang taw in doai te hawlkhia hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 3:23 Taciang Jesus in amate a kungah sam in, sontena te taw thu son a, Bangbang in Satan in Satan hawlkhia thei tu ziam?
MAR 3:24 Kumpingam khat kikhen in kido a hile, tua kumpingam sia kho ngawl tu hi.
MAR 3:25 Inn khat sia kikhen in kido a hile, tua inn kho ngawl tu hi.
MAR 3:26 Tasia bangma in Satan zong ama le ama kikhen in a kido le, kho ngawl tu a, bo in mangthang tu hi.
MAR 3:27 “Kuama in mihing thahatpa hencip masa ngawl in, a innsung ah tum in a neisa te sut thei ngawl tu hi, mihing thahatpa a hencip zawkciang bek in; a innsung van te sut thei tu hi.
MAR 3:28 A tatak ka ci ciang, mihing te mawna namcin le sonsiatna te kimaisak tu hi:
MAR 3:29 Ahihang Tha Thiangtho a sonsiate, bangmahun in ki maisak ngei ngawl tu hi, banghangziam cile tawntung thukhenna dan thuak tu kilawm hi: ci hi.
MAR 3:30 Amate in Jesus sungah tha-nin om hi, a ci uh hu in Jesus in hibang in a pau a hihi.
MAR 3:31 Tuazawkciang Jesus nu le a nau te hongpai a, a puasang ah ding in, mikhat Jesus kungah sawl in sam hi.
MAR 3:32 A kim a mihonpi te to a, a kungah, en in, na nu le na nau te nangma zong in a puasang ah om hi, ci hi.
MAR 3:33 Jesus in, Ka nu, a hibale, ka suapui te kua te ziam? ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 3:34 Taciang a kim a pam a to te en in, En vun, ka nu le ka suapui te!
MAR 3:35 Banghangziam cile a kuamapo Pathian deina a seam peuma sia, ka suapui le ka nu a hihi, ci hi.
MAR 4:1 Jesus tuili hui ah thuhil kipan kik hi: a kungah mihon tampi te hong ki kaikhop ciang in tuili sung ngunkuang sungah tuak in to a; mihonpi te sia tuili hui ah om uh hi.
MAR 4:2 Tasiaciang sontena te zang in thuhil a,
MAR 4:3 Ngai vun a; en vun, thaici poaipa khat thaici poai tu in pai hi:
MAR 4:4 Tabang a poai ciang in, thaici pawlkhat te lampi ah tak a, tungleang te hongpai in ne siat hi.
MAR 4:5 Pawlkhat te suang tam na mun ah tak a, lei tawm a hi man in thaici te hong po pai hi, banghangziam cile lei thuk ngawl hi:
MAR 4:6 Ni hong sua ciang in, nisa in kang a; zung tha ngawl ahikom ngawtak hi.
MAR 4:7 Pawlkhat te lingphung sungah tak a, lingkung te a khan ciang in deapcip in, nga zo ngawl hi.
MAR 4:8 A dang te lei pha na tungah tak hi, taciang po in hong khang a, a nga hong nga hi; pawlkhat te a se sawmthum, pawlkhat te a se sawmluk, pawlkhat te a se zakhat dong in khang hi, ci hi.
MAR 4:9 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Zak natu bil a nei peuma in za tahen, ci hi.
MAR 4:10 Ama nguak a om laitak in, a nungzui sawmleni te taw a omte in sontena thu dong uh hi.
MAR 4:11 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian kumpingam thuku heak theina hong pia zo hi: ahihang a puasang a omte tung ah, tua thu te theampo sia sontena te taw son hi:
MAR 4:12 Amate in mu tu hi napi, a he bua tu uh hi; ngai tu hi napi, a tel thei bua tu uh hi; tabang hi bua le hun khatpo ah amate ki kheal in, amate i mawna ki maisak tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 4:13 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi sontena te he ngawl nu ziam? taciang sontena theampo bangbang in tel thei tu nu ziam?
MAR 4:14 Thaici poaipa in Pathian kammal poai hi.
MAR 4:15 Lampi ah a tak thaici te thu sia hibang te a hihi, amate in Pathian kammal a zak uh ciang in Satan manlang tak in hongpai a, amate thinsung pan Pathian kammal te laksak hi.
MAR 4:16 Suang tam na mun ah a tak thaici te sia hibang te a hihi; amate sia Pathian kammal a zak uh ciang in thakhatthu in lungdamna taw sang hi napi;
MAR 4:17 Amate sungah zungtha ngawl ahikom, tawmvei sung bek khom hi: Pathian thu hang in haksatna le vawtsiatna a thet ciang in, thakhathu in pukkik hi.
MAR 4:18 Lingsung a tak thaici te thu sia hibang te a hihi, Pathian kammal za napi,
MAR 4:19 Hi leitung thinngimna, hauna i theamna, nadang tampi te lungngul nate tum in Pathian thu sia deapcip ahikom, a nga toai ngawl hi.
MAR 4:20 Lei pha na a tak thaici te thu sia hibang a hihi; Pathian thu za in sang a, pawlkhat te a se sawmthum, pawlkhat te a se sawmluk, pawlkhat te a se zakhat in a nga hong toai hi, ci hi.
MAR 4:21 Jesus in amate tung ah, Khuaimei sia khum nuai ah, a hibale, lupna nuai ah koi tu in ki keng ngei ziam? meivak na tungah a ki koi tu hi ngawl ziam?
MAR 4:22 Banghangziam cile a ki lang ngawl tu in phualcip thei bangma a om ngawl bangma; pualak ngawl tu thuku zong om ngawl hi.
MAR 4:23 Zak natu bil nei theampo in za tahen, ci hi.
MAR 4:24 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na zak thu uh kidawm vun: ngualdang na te uh bangma in noma zong hong ki tekik tu hi: taciang a za te a tamzaw hong ki piakik tu hi.
MAR 4:25 Banghangziam cile a nei te ki pia thua tu a: a nei ngawl te a neisun ki laksak tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 4:26 Jesus in, Pathian kumpingam sia, mikhat in a lo ah thaici poai tu hi;
MAR 4:27 Taciang mu in, le tho in, sun le zan in thaici bangbang in po tu le bangbang in khang tu ci a he ngawl thaici poaipa taw kibang hi.
MAR 4:28 Banghangziam cile leitang in ama thu in ngasak a; a masabel in a te meangsak hi, tua zawkciang vui a, a vui zawkciang a tang hong suak hi.
MAR 4:29 Ahihang anlak hun hong thet ciang in, ama in phiau taw manlangtak in at hi, banghangziam cile anlak hun cing zo hi,
MAR 4:30 Jesus in, Kumpingam sia bangtaw sonte tu khi ziam? a hibale bangtaw tekak tu khi ziam?
MAR 4:31 Hisia in ankam cii taw kibang hi, lei ah a poai ciang in thaici dang theampo sang in no zaw hi:
MAR 4:32 Ahihang a poai zawkciang in hong khang a, an te theampo sung pan a lianbel hong suak hi, van a vacim te a lim ah tawlnga thei zadong in a bak te nei hi, ci hi.
MAR 4:33 Amate i zak thei tuh in sontena tampi taw thuhil hi.
MAR 4:34 Sontena kihel ngawl in amate tungah thuhil ngawl hi: taciang amate bek a om uh ciang in a nungzui te kungah tua thu te son thiang hi.
MAR 4:35 Tua ni nitak sang in, Jesus in a nungzui te kungah, Ngalkhat ah pai tawng, ci hi.
MAR 4:36 Amate in mihonpi te a paisak zawk uh ciang in, Ama sia nungzui te in ngunkuang taw paipui hi. Tua mun ah a dang ngunkuang no te zong om hi.
MAR 4:37 Tasiaciang huipi suangval nasiatak in hong tho a, tuihual te in ngunkuang sia nuaicip ahikom, ngunkuang sungah tui hong dim hi.
MAR 4:38 Jesus sia ngunkuang nungsang kham in mu hi: amate in phong uh a, Syapa awng, ka thisiat tu uh phamaw hong sa ngawl ni ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 4:39 Jesus hong tho in, huipi tei hi, taciang tuipi tung ah, Thim in, ci hi. Taciang hui thim in, dai dide hi.
MAR 4:40 Jesus in nungzui te kungah, Banghang in hibang lalawm in lau nu ziam? bangbang lalawm in upna nei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
MAR 4:41 Amate lau mama uh a, hisia pa sia bangbang mihing ziam, hui le tuipi in a thuni hi? ci in khat le khat kici uh hi.
MAR 5:1 Amate tuili ngalkhat Gadarenes ngam theng uh hi.
MAR 5:2 Jesus ngunkuang sung pan a pusua pociang, than pan in hongpai doai vei khat taw kisi hi,
MAR 5:3 Ama than ah om a; kuama in hen thei ngawl hi, thikkol taw nangawn in khit thei ngawl hi:
MAR 5:4 Banghangziam cile thikkol le saikhau taw tu le tu khit uh hi kale, saikhau te bot tan in, thikkol te santham hi: kuama in zualsak zo ngawl hi.
MAR 5:5 Sun le zan in, mual tung tatuam le than ah om a, au tawntung in, ama le ama suang taw ki kui hi.
MAR 5:6 Ahihang a khuala mama na pan Jesus a mu ciang, hong tai in bia hi,
MAR 5:7 Taciang a nging tak in au a, Jesus awng, nang, a sangbel Pathian Tapa, nang taw bang kisai na nei khi ziam? Nong vawtsiat ngawl natu in Pathian min taw hong ngen khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 5:8 Banghangziam cile Jesus in ama tung ah, Nang doai ngilo, hisia pa sung pan in pusuak in, ci hi.
MAR 5:9 Jesus in, Na min kua ziam? ci in dong hi. Tua pa in, ka min sia Legion hi, banghangziam cile ka tam mama uh hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 5:10 Ama in tua ngam pan hawlkhia ngawl tu in thum hi.
MAR 5:11 Mual te taw a ki nai na mun ah vokhon tampi anne keukho hi.
MAR 5:12 Doai ngilo te theampo in, vok sungah tum tu in hong sawl tan, ci ngen uh hi.
MAR 5:13 Tasia pociang Jesus in paisak hi. Doai ngilo te pusuak a, vokhon sungah tum uh hi: taciang vokhon te liang pan in manlang tak in tai uh a, tuili sungah tuita in thi siat hi. Tua vok te tul ni kiim pha uh hi.
MAR 5:14 Vokcing te tai in, khuapi le ngam sungah son hi. Mipi te tabang thu piang te en tu in hongpai tek uh hi.
MAR 5:15 Amate Jesus kungah hongpai uh a, legion a kici doai ngilo vei pa sia puansil in, a thin ciim in a to mu uh hi: amate lau mama uh hi.
MAR 5:16 Tua thu a mu te in doai ngilo vei pa le vokhon tungah thu piang te ngualdang tungah son uh hi.
MAR 5:17 Tasiaciang amate in Jesus sia amate ngam pan pusuak tu in ngen uh hi.
MAR 5:18 Jesus ngunkuang sung a tum ciang in, doai ngilo vei ngei pa in, Ama taw kikop tu in ngen hi.
MAR 5:19 Ahihang Jesus in zuisak ngawl a, ama kungah, Na inn ah cia tan a, na lawmte kungah, Topa in nangma atu hong vawtsak te bangza in lian ci le, na tungah hesuakna a nei nate son in, ci hi.
MAR 5:20 Tua pa zong pai in, Decapolis ngam sung theampo ah Jesus in ama atu a vawtsak nate bangza in lian ziam, ci thu te tangko hi: a za theampo in lamdangsa uh hi.
MAR 5:21 Jesus sia ngunkuang taw ngalkhat ah paikik a, mi tampi te a kungah hong ki kaikhawm hi: Ama sia tuili nai na ah om hi.
MAR 5:22 Taciang, en vun, Jairus a kici synagogue lampui khat Jesus kungah hongpai a; a mu ciang in a peang ah bok in,
MAR 5:23 Ka tanu a thi dektak in lum hi: hongpai tan a tungah na khut nga tu in hong ngen khi hi, tasiaciang ama dam tu a; nungta tu hi, ci in nasiatak in thum hi.
MAR 5:24 Taciang Jesus ama taw pai hi; mi tampi in zui uh a, a kiim a pam pan phul ngawp uh hi.
MAR 5:25 Taciang kum sawm le kum ni sung thisuak numei khat,
MAR 5:26 Syavuan tam mama kungah ki lak zo a, a neisa theampo zang siat zo hi kale, dam tuan ngawl bekdom ngawl in lawmawk seseam hi,
MAR 5:27 Jesus thu a zak ciang in, mihon sungah a nung pan pai in, a puan tham hi.
MAR 5:28 Banghangziam cile, a puan thamtha po leng dam tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 5:29 Thakhatthu in a thi suak kang a; tua natna pan dam khi hi, ci phawk hi.
MAR 5:30 Jesus in, a sung pan vangletna pusuak hi, ci he lian ahikom, mihonpi sangah kiheak in, A kua in ka puan hong tham nu ziam? ci hi.
MAR 5:31 A nungzui te in, mihonpi in hong phul ngawp mu nginge napi, banghang in, kua na tham nu ziam ci ni ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 5:32 Jesus in a puan tham sia nu mu nuam in a kiim teng en hi.
MAR 5:33 Ahihang numei nu in a sungah thu piang he ahikom, lau le ling kawm in, Jesus mai ah pai in bok a, thu piang theampo a man in son hi.
MAR 5:34 Jesus in a kungah, Ka ta nu awng, na upna in hong damsak zo hi; thinnuam in pai tan a, vawtsiat na pan in suakta ta in, ci hi.
MAR 5:35 Jesus a pau laitak in, synagogue lampui pa inn pan in hongpai te in, na tanu thi zo hi: banghang in syapa nawngkaisak lai ni ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 5:36 Tua thu Jesus in a zak pociang, synagogue lampui pa kungah, Lau heak in, um bek po in, ci hi.
MAR 5:37 Jesus in, Peter, James le a suapui pa John simngawl kuama zuisak ngawl hi.
MAR 5:38 Jesus synagogue lampui pa inn a thet ciang in, nasiatak in kap le tau in ngamlum lialua mu hi.
MAR 5:39 Amate kungah hong sungtan ciang in, Banghang in ngamlum lialua in kap nu ziam? numeino sia a thi hi ngawl hi, a mu hi, ci hi.
MAR 5:40 Amate in Jesus selno in nuisan uh hi. Ahihang amate a vekpi a puasang ah pusuaksak siat a, numeino i a nu le pa le a paipui teng bek sam in, numeino nu lupna mun inndoi sungah tum tek uh hi.
MAR 5:41 Taciang Jesus in numeino a khut pan len a, Talitha kumi, ci hi; a khiakna sia, numeino, tho in kong ci hi, a cinopna hi.
MAR 5:42 Taciang numeino sia thakhatthu in hong tho a, lampai hi; ama sia kum sawmleni kiim hi. Amate in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
MAR 5:43 Jesus in, hi thu te kuama hesak heak vun, ci in nasiatak in vaitha hi; tua nu i neak tu khatpo a piak natu in thu pia hi.
MAR 6:1 Jesus tua mun pan in pai a, Ama khua ah theng hi; a nungzui te in zui uh hi.
