MAR 6:2 Sabbath ni a thet ciang in, synagogue sungah thuhil kipan hi: a za mi tampi te in lamdangsa in, hi thu te koisung pan in nga ziam? ama tungah a ki pia pilna sia bang pilna ziam, bangbang in vanglian nasep te a khut taw seam thei ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 6:3 Ama sia Mary tapa, James, Joses, Judah le Simon te suapuipa, lettama pa hi ngawl ziam? a suapui numei te zong ziak ma ah om hi ngawl ziam? ci in, a sang thei bua uh hi.
MAR 6:4 Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Kamsang khat sia ama khua, mealheak suapui le, ama inn simngawl mundang ah ki upat hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:5 Tua mun ah cina tawm te tungah a khut nga in a damsak simngawl, a vanglian nasep dang bangma seam thei ngawl hi.
MAR 6:6 Amate up ngawl na hang in Jesus in lamdangsa hi. Taciang ama a kiim a pam khuapi te ah pai in thuhil hi.
MAR 6:7 A nungzui sawmleni te a kungah sam a, ni tek in sawl hi; doai ngilo te zo tu in vangletna pia hi;
MAR 6:8 A khualhaw na mun uh ah ciangkhut bek keng tu a; thung, anluum le sumbawm sungah sum te keng ngawl in:
MAR 6:9 Peangdap te bul tu le; laktong sil ni keng ngawl tu in thupia hi.
MAR 6:10 Ama te kungah, Na tum na uh inn ah tua mun pan na paikik uh dong, tam vun.
MAR 6:11 A kuapo a hi zong note hong sang nuam ngawl le na thu uh a ngai nuam ngawl peuma tua mun pan na pusua kik uh ciang in, amate langpan tu tetti tu in na peang leihui thin vun. A tatak kong ci ciang, thukhenna ni ciang in tua khuapi sang in Sodom le Gomorah te thuakna thuak nop zaw lai tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:12 Amate pai uh a, mihing te ki sikkik tu in thuhil uh hi.
MAR 6:13 Amate in doai ngilo tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina tampi te zong sathau zut in damsak uh hi.
MAR 6:14 Jesus sia muntheampo ah a minthang a, Herod kumpipa in a thu a zakciang in; tuiphumpa John thina pan thokik hi, tua hang in a vanglian nasep te lak thei hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:15 A dangte in Elijah hi, ci uh hi. A dang te in kamsang khat hi, a hibale kamsang sung pan khat papo hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 6:16 Ahihang Herod in a zakciang in, hi thu sia a ngawng ka tan John thina pan thokik hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:17 Herod in a nau Philip i zi Herodias sia tenpui a, tua Herodias thu hang in, ama vateak in mi sawl a, John man in thong ah khum hi.
MAR 6:18 John in Herod kungah, na naupa zi na tenpui sia ngeina om ngawl hi, a ci hang a hihi.
MAR 6:19 Tua ahikom Herodias in John ngaimaw in that nuam napi; that thei ngawl hi:
MAR 6:20 Banghangziam cile Herod in John sia mi thutang le mithiangtho hi, ci a heak hang in lau hi, ama in keamcing in, a sep sa tampi te lungdamtak in ngai hi.
MAR 6:21 Hunpha a thet ciang in, Herod in a suani ah, ama i to te, ngalkapmang te le Galilee ngam uk ulian te atu in nitak an vak hi;
MAR 6:22 Herodias i ta nu tum in, a lap ciang, Herod le a kiim a to te a lungkimsak mama hi, tua ahikom kumpipa in ngaknu nu kungah, na dei theampo hong ngen tan, kong pia tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:23 Nong nget theampo, ka kumpingam a lang a hi zong kong pia tu hi, ci in kamciam hi.
MAR 6:24 Tasiaciang ngaknu nu a nu kungah pai a, bang ka ngen tu ziam? ci hi. A nu in, tuiphumpa John lu ngen in, ci hi.
MAR 6:25 Ngaknu nu hongpai kik pai in, kumpipa kungah tuiphumpa John i lu sia pakandal sungah a manlang in nong piak tu ka dei hi, ci in ngen hi.
MAR 6:26 Kumpipa sia khuangai mama hi kale; a kamciam na sa le a kiim a to te hang in, ngaknu nu nget na nial ngam ngawl hi.
MAR 6:27 Taciang kumpipa in mihing that te khat sawl in paisak pai a, John lu puak tu in thupia hi: taciang mihing that pa pai a, thonginn sungah John ngawng tan hi,
MAR 6:28 Taciang pakandal taw a lu puak a, ngaknu nu pia hi: taciang ngaknu nu in a nu pia hi.
MAR 6:29 Tua thu John nungzui te in a zak ciang in, amate hongpai uh a, a luanghawm la in than ah vui uh hi.
MAR 6:30 Sawltakte Jesus kungah hong ki kaikhawm uh a, amate i vawt te le a thuhilna uh theampo son uh hi.
MAR 6:31 Jesus in amate tungah hibang in ci hi, Hongpai tavun, senneal sungah a tuam in tawmvei tawlnga tawng, ci hi: banghangziam cile a pai le a cia mihing tam mama a, amate anneak hun zong nei ngawl hi.
MAR 6:32 Taciang amate ngunkuang taw a tuam in senneal sangah pai uh hi.
MAR 6:33 Mipi te in amate pai a mu uh ciang in, mi tampi in Ama he uh ahikom, khuapi theampo sung pan in peang taw hongpai tek uh a, amate kantan in, a kungah hongpai uh hi.
MAR 6:34 Jesus hong pusua ciang in, mitampi a mu ciang, a cing nei ngawl tuuhon taw kibang uh ahikom khuangaihuai sa hi: taciang amate thu tampi hil kipan hi.
MAR 6:35 Nitak sang ciang in a nungzui te a kungah hongpai a, hi mun sia senneal ngam hi, khua zong niam zo hi:
MAR 6:36 Amate paisak in a, kiim le pam khua tatuam ah pai in, amate neak tu anluum lei tahen: banghangziam cile amate neak tu bangma nei ngawl hi, ci hi.
MAR 6:37 Jesus in, Note in amate neak tu pia vun, ci in zo kik hi. Taciang amate in, koma pai in dangka za ni man an lei in, amate neak tu pia tu hong sawl ni ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 6:38 Jesus in, Anluum bangza nei nu ziam? pai vun a en vun, ci hi. Amate in a heak uh ciang, lum nga le ngasa ni, ci uh hi.
MAR 6:39 Jesus in a vekpi in lopa hing tungah a hon a hon in to tu in thupia hi.
MAR 6:40 Taciang amate, pawlkhat zakhat, pawlkhat sawm nga ci bang in a hon a hon in to tek uh hi.
MAR 6:41 Jesus in anluum nga le ngasa ni te a lak zawkciang in, vandak to a, thupha a piak zawkciang, anluum te bal in, a nungzui te mai ah lui hi; ngasa ni te zong amate theampo hawmsak hi.
MAR 6:42 Amate theampo in ngilva tak in ne tek uh hi.
MAR 6:43 Amate in anluum le ngasa a val te tawm uh a, bawm sawm le bawm ni dim hi.
MAR 6:44 Anlum a ne teng pasal tul nga kiim pha uh hi.
MAR 6:45 Mipite a ciasak uh laitak in, a nungzui te ngunkuang sungah tumsak pai in, ngalkhat Bethsaida ah paikholsak hi.
MAR 6:46 Amate a paisak zawkciang in, mualtung ah thungen tu in pai hi.
MAR 6:47 Nitak sang ciang in, ngunkuang sia tuili laizang ah om a, Jesus ama nguak mualtung ah om hi.
MAR 6:48 Amate sangah hui hongpai ahikom a nungzui te in ngunkuang sia haksa tak in hot uh hi: zingsang nai thum le nai luk ki laklaw kiim in, Jesus amate sang tuili tungah lampai in, amate kantan tu bang in kithoai hi.
MAR 6:49 Ahihang amate in tui tungah a lampai a mu uh ciang in, thitha sa in, au ngawp uh hi.
MAR 6:50 Banghangziam cile a vekpi in mu uh a, amate lungmang mama uh hi. Tasia pociang Jesus in amate paupui a, Thinnuam in om vun: Keima khi hi; lau heak vun, ci hi.
MAR 6:51 Jesus amate kung ngunkuang tungah ka to a, a sung a thet ciang in; hui zong thim hi: taciang amate in sonzawk ngawl zadong in lamdangsa uh hi.
MAR 6:52 Amate in anluum taw kisai nalamdang thu phawk ngawl uh hi, banghangziam cile amate a thinpui lei uh hang a hihi.
MAR 6:53 Ngalkhat a thet uh ciang in, Gennesaret ah hongpai uh a, tuihui ah ngunkuang khit uh hi.
MAR 6:54 Amate ngunkuang sung pan a pusua pociang, mipi te in Jesus a hi hunlam tel pai uh hi.
MAR 6:55 Tasiaciang tua ngam kimkot theampo ah tai uh a, Jesus om hi, ci a zak na mun uh ah, cina te a lupna uh taw hong pua tek uh hi.
MAR 6:56 Jesus a tum na mun khua theampo, khuapi te le lo lam theampo ah, amate in cina te lampi tungah sial uh a, a puanmong tham tu in ngen tek uh hi: a tham tha theampo in damna nga uh hi.
MAR 7:1 Tuazawkciang in Pharisee te le thukhamhil te honkhat Jerusalem pan hongpai uh hi.
MAR 7:2 Amate in Jesus nungzui pawlkhat te khut silngawl a ninpui taw anne a mu uh ciang in, mawsiat uh hi.
MAR 7:3 Banghangziam cile amate ngeina a zui Pharisee te le Judah minam theampo, khut sil ngawl in anne ngei ngawl uh hi.
MAR 7:4 Amate sumbuk pan a cia uh ciang zong, khut a sil bua uh le anne ngawl uh hi. Thu dang tampi a zui uh te, hai, beal, danbeal le sabuai ci bang te zong sil tawntung uh hi.
MAR 7:5 Tasiaciang Pharisee te le thukhamhil te in ngeina te zui ngawl in, banghang khut sil ngawl in anne ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
MAR 7:6 Jesus in amate tung ah, Isaiah in phatak in noma a kihitheamsak te thu a sonkholna a atsa bangma in, hi mite in a muk uh bek taw hong upat uh hi, ahihang a thinsung uh sia kei kung pan khuala uh hi.
MAR 7:7 Ahihang amate in mihing thupiak te sia ki hil na phabel atu in zang uh a, a lui thathong in kei hong bia uh hi.
MAR 7:8 Banghangziam cile, Pathian thupiak te vawk in, mihing te i ngeina beal le hai te sil ngeina zui zaw nu hi, tabang thudang tampi te zong vawt nu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 7:9 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na ngeina uh na zui thei natu uh in, Pathian thupiak te nial thal nu hi.
MAR 7:10 Banghangziam cile Moses in, na nu le na pa zakta in; a pa a hibale a nu a hamsiat peuma, thina thuak tahen, ci hi:
MAR 7:11 Ahihang note in, khatpo in a nu, a hibale a pa kungah zatakna tu in van a nei te, hisia Corban hi, hisia letsong hi cinopna hi, Pathian kungah piaksa hi: ci po le ama peng tu hi.
MAR 7:12 Tabang in a pa, a hibale a nu atu in a vawtsak tu te vawt nuam nawn ngawl nu hi;
MAR 7:13 Na ki hil sawn uh na ngeina uh te zang in Pathian thu sia vang nei ngawl suaksak nu hi: tabang in na vawt uh dang tam mama lai hi, ci hi.
MAR 7:14 Jesus in mihonpi te a vekpi in a kungah sam a, Note sung pan khatsim in hong ngai tavun a, tel thei tavun:
MAR 7:15 Mihing sia a puasang pan in a sungah a tumsuk te taw a nin om ngawl hi: ahihang a sungsang pan a pusuak thu te in ninsak hi.
MAR 7:16 Khat po in zak thei na bil a nei le, za tahen, ci hi.
MAR 7:17 Jesus sia mihonpi te kung pan in innsung ah a tum ciang in, a nungzui te in sontena taw kisai in thu dong hi.
MAR 7:18 Jesus in amate tung ah, Note zong tel thei tuan ngawl nu ziam? Bangpo a hi zong a puasang pan mihing sung a tum sia in ama ninsak ngawl hi, ci sia tel thei ngawl nu ziam;
MAR 7:19 Banghangziam cile a thinsung ah tum ngawl in a ngilpi sungah tum a, taciang awng dum sungah an theampo ki thiangsak hi ngawl ziam? ci hi.
MAR 7:20 Tasiaciang Ama in, Mihing sung pan a pusuak sia in, tua mihing ninsak hi.
MAR 7:21 Banghangziam cile mihing thinsung pan in, ngaisutna phangawl, palngul mawna, paktatna, tual that,
MAR 7:22 Nguta, duhop na, ngitlona, theam na, maizum heak ngawl na, el na, sonsiat na, kiphatsakna, mawmawt na:
MAR 7:23 Hibang a phangawl theampo sia a sung pan a pusuak te hi a, mihing ninsak hi, ci hi.
MAR 7:24 Tuazawkciang Jesus tua mun pan in ding a, Tyre le Sidon ngamngi sangah pai in, innkhat sungah tum hi, kuama heak tu zong dei ngawl hi: ahihang bucip thei ngawl hi.
MAR 7:25 Banghangziam cile, doai ngilo vei numeino khat i nu in Jesus thu a zak cing, hongpai in a peang ah bok hi:
MAR 7:26 Taciang a tanu sung pan doai hawlkhiatsak tu in ngen hi; tua nupi nu sia Greek minam hi a, Syrophenicia ngammi a hihi.
MAR 7:27 Ahihang Jesus in, Tate ngilva phot tahen: banghangziam cile tate i anluum laksak in, ui piaksak tu ngeina om ngawl hi, ci hi.
MAR 7:28 Tua nupi nu in, hi hi, Topa awng: hima kale, tate sabuai pan anneng tak sabuai nuai pan ui in ne thei hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 7:29 Tasiaciang Jesus in a kungah, Hi thu hang in, pai tan a; na tanu sung pan in doai ngilo pusuak zo hi, ci hi.
MAR 7:30 A inn a thet ciang in, a tanu sung pan doai ngilo pusuak zo a, lupna tungah a lum mu hi.
MAR 7:31 Jesus Tyre le Sidon ngam kiim kot pan pai kik a, Decapolis ngam huam sung teng kantan in Galilee tuili theng hi.
MAR 7:32 Taciang amate in Jesus kungah nangong le a pau thei ngawl pa khat hong paipui uh a, a tungah khut nga tu in ngen uh hi.
MAR 7:33 Jesus in tua pa sia mihonpi te kung pan in mundang ah paipui a, a khutzung te a bil lang le lang sungah thun in, cilphi a, a lei zong thamsak hi;
MAR 7:34 Taciang Jesus vandak to in, a tau zawkciang tua pa kungah, Ephphatha, ci hi, a khiakna sia, ki hong tahen, a cinopna a hihi.
MAR 7:35 Tasia pociang in a bil te ki hong in, a lei thangui zong ki phel a, a thiang vaset in pau hi.
MAR 7:36 Jesus in tua thu kuama tungah son ngawl tu in vaitha hi: ahihang a vaithak tam seseam le nasia va-ial in pualak hi;
MAR 7:37 Tasiaciang amate in lamdangsa mama uh a, Ama in na theampo a pha in vawt hi: nangong te khua zasak zo a, a pau thei ngawl te zong pausak hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 8:1 Tuazawkciang a tam mama mihonpi te neak tu nei ngawl hi, taciang Jesus in a nungzui te a kungah sam a,
MAR 8:2 Mihonpi te hesuakhuai sa khi hi, banghangziam cile amate ka kungah nithum hong om zo a, neak tu bangma nei ngawl hi:
MAR 8:3 An ne ngawl in amate innlam zuan in ciasak hileng, amate lamkal ah puk-hong tu hi: banghangziam cile pawlkhat te a khuala mama na pan in hongpai uh hi, ci hi.
MAR 8:4 A nungzui te in, hi duisung ah a kua in mihing hi za ngilva tu in vak tu anluum kong pan nga thei tu ziam? ci in zo kik uh hi.
MAR 8:5 Taciang Jesus in, Anluum bangza nei nu ziam? ci in dong hi. Amate in sali, ci uh hi.
MAR 8:6 Jesus in mipi te lei ah to tu in thupia hi: taciang anluum sali la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang phel in, mipi te lui tu in a nungzui te mai ah koi a; a nungzui te in mipi te lui hi.
MAR 8:7 Amate in ngasa tawm nei hi: Jesus in thupha a piak zawkciang in, mipi te lui tu in thupia hi.
MAR 8:8 Amate ngilvatak in a neak zawk uh ciang in: anluum neng teng tawm uh a bawm sali dim hi.
MAR 8:9 A ne te sia tul li kiim pha uh hi: taciang Jesus in amate ciasak hi.
MAR 8:10 Tuazawk pociang ngunkuang sungah a nungzui te taw tum a, Dalmanutha ngam huam sungah pai uh hi.
MAR 8:11 Pharisee te hongpai in, Jesus thu dok kipan uh hi, Ama ze-et tu in vanlam musakna ngen uh hi.
MAR 8:12 Jesus in a thinsung tawng pan tau vahum in, Banghang in hi minam te in musakna ngen ziam? a tatak in kong ci ciang, hi minam te kungah musakna bangma pia ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 8:13 Taciang Jesus in amate nusia in, ngunkuang sungah to kik a ngalkhat ah pai hi.
MAR 8:14 Nungzuite in anluum ken tu mangil uh a, ngunkuang sungah anluum khat simngawl a dang bangma nei ngawl uh hi.
MAR 8:15 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pharisee te le Herod i tol pan kidawm vun, ci in vaitha hi.
MAR 8:16 Hi thu sia anluum i ken ngawl hang hi, ci in amate kikum uh hi.
MAR 8:17 Taciang Jesus in a heak ciang in amate tung ah, Anluum na nei ngawl uh hang hi, ci in banghang kikum nu ziam? he ngawl lai in tel thei ngawl lai nu ziam? na thin uh puisak top lai nu ziam?
MAR 8:18 Mit nei napi, mu ngawl nu ziam? bil nei napi, za ngawl nu ziam? bangma ciamte ngawl nu ziam?
MAR 8:19 Tul nga te sungah anluum nga ka phel lai, a val bawm bangza tawm nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, sawmleni, ci uh hi.
MAR 8:20 Tul li sungah sali ka phel lai in, a val bawm bangza tawm nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, sali, ci uh hi.
MAR 8:21 Jesus in amate tung ah, Bangbang in hi thu he thei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
MAR 8:22 Jesus Bethsaida ah hongpai a; amate in mittaw khat a kungah hong paipui uh hi, taciang tua pa a thamsak tu in ngen uh hi.
MAR 8:23 Jesus in mittaw pa a khut pan in len a, khuapi puasang ah paipui hi; taciang a mitte tungah cilphi in, a khut nga a, khatpo mu na nei ziam, ci in dong hi.
MAR 8:24 Mittaw pa in en a, mihing te thingkung bang in a vak mu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 8:25 Tuazawkciang Jesus in, mittaw pa mit tungah a khut nga kik a, ensak hi: a mit vak in, mihing te thiangtak in mu hi.
MAR 8:26 Jesus in a inn ah ciasak a, Khuapi sungah tum heak in a, kuama zong son heak in, ci hi.
MAR 8:27 Jesus le a nungzui te pai uh a, Caesarea Philippi khuapi kiim khua te ah pai hi: lamkal ah a nungzui te kungah, Ngual in keima sia akua hong ci uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 8:28 Taciang amate in, tuiphumpa John: pawlkhat te in Elijah; a dang te in kamsang khat papo hong ci hi, ci in zo kik uh hi.
MAR 8:29 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi kale, note in, Keima sia kua hi nong ci uh ziam? ci hi. Taciang Peter in, Nangma sia, Christ na hihi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 8:30 Tasiaciang in, Ama thu kuama tungah son ngawl tu in nungzui te vaitha hi.
MAR 8:31 Jesus in amate thuhil kipan a, mihing Tapa in tam mama thuak tu hi, upa te, thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in nial tu uh hi, that tu uh a, nithum zawkciang thokik tu hi.
MAR 8:32 Tua thu Jesus in a kilangtak in son hi. Taciang Peter in Jesus samtuam in tei hi.
MAR 8:33 Ahihang Jesus in a nungzui te kihei in a le-et kawm in, Satan: nang ka nung ah kiheam in, banghangziam cile Pathian thu sang in, mihing thu kinzaw ni hi, ci in Peter tei hi.
MAR 8:34 Taciang Jesus in mihon te le a nungzui te Ama kungah a sap zawkciang in, A kuamapo ka nung hong zui nuam peuma, ama le ama ki nial hen a, ama thinglamte pua in, hong zui tahen.
MAR 8:35 Banghangziam cile a kuamapo in, ama nuntakna a hung nuam sia in sum tu hi; ahihang a kuamapo in keima le lungdamna thu hang in a nuntakna a sum peuma in, a nuntakna hu zo tu hi.
MAR 8:36 Banghangziam cile mi khat in hileitung buppi a nei hial zong, a thaa nuntakna a sum le bang phatuam ziam?
MAR 8:37 Mihing in a thaa nuntakna bang taw theak thei tu ziam?
MAR 8:38 Tua ahikom a kuamapo in hi seksol suan te mai ah keima le ka thu a maizumpui peuma; a Pa vangletna sungah a thiangtho vantungmi te taw hongpai ciang in, mihing Tapa in maizumpui kik tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:1 Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci ciang, hi mun ah a om pawlkhat te in, Pathian kumpingam vangletna taw hongpai a mu dong thina tep tha ngawl tu uh hi. ci hi.
MAR 9:2 Ni luk zawkciang Jesus in, Peter, James le John te mualsang tungah a tuam in sam a, amate mai ah a meal kikheal hi.
MAR 9:3 A puan taang a, leitung ah koibang puansawp peuma in zong a thiansak thei ngawl tu za dong in; vuk bang in pak hi.
MAR 9:4 Elijah le Moses te hong ki lang a: Jesus taw ki paupui uh hi.
MAR 9:5 Peter in Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, eite atu in hi mun ah om tu pha hi: buk thum sa tawng; Nangma atu khat, Moses atu khat le Elijah atu khat, ci hi.
MAR 9:6 Banghangziam cile amate a laulei uh hu in, bang son tu ci zong a he bua uh hi.
MAR 9:7 Taciang amate meingo in lia a: meingo sung pan in, hisia ka it ka Tapa a hihi, ama thu ni vun, ci aw khat hong nging hi.
MAR 9:8 Tasia pociang, amate in a kiim a pam a et uh ciang in, Jesus le amate simngawl kuama a mu bua uh hi.
MAR 9:9 Amate mualtung pan a tuaksuk uh ciang in, Jesus in, mihing Tapa thina pan in a thawkik dong, a mu uh thu te kuama a son ngawl natu in vaitha hi.
MAR 9:10 Amate in tua a son thu te ciamte uh a, thina pan thokik, ci kammal sia bang a cinopna hi tu ziam, ci in khat le khat ki dong uh hi.
MAR 9:11 Taciang a nungzui te in, banghang in thukhamhil te in Elijah hongpai masa tu hi, ci ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
MAR 9:12 Jesus in, Elijah hongpai masa takpi tu a, na theampo ama in puakhol tu hi; taciang mihing Tapa thu bangbang in atkhol ziam ci le, ama in tam mama thuak tu a, bangma thusimngawl in koi tu hi.
MAR 9:13 Ahihang keima in hibang in kong ci hi, Elijah hong theng takpi a, ama thu a ki atkholsa ombang in, amate uk bang in vawt uh hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:14 A nungzui te kungah hongpai ciang in, thukhamhil te le mihonpi te a kiim ah thu kidong mu hi.
MAR 9:15 Thakhatthu in, mi theampo in Jesus a mu uh ciang in, lamdangsa uh a, ama sangah hong tai in, paupui uh hi.
MAR 9:16 Jesus in thukhamhil te kungah, Amate taw bang ki dong nu ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 9:17 Mihonpi sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, ka tapa sungah a pau thei ngawl doai lut a, na kung hong puak khi hi;
MAR 9:18 Tua a pau thei ngawl doai in a paipui na mun theampo ah, lei ah puksak in, a kam pan cilphuan te pusuak hi, a ha ngoai in, ngawm law liang hi: na nungzui te hawlkhiasak tu in ka son hang; amate in hawlkhia zo ngawl hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:19 Jesus in ama zokik a, Maw upna nei ngawl suan te, note taw bang hun dong hong om tu khi ziam? banghun dong hong khual lai tu khi ziam? ama ka kungah hong paipui tavun, ci hi.
MAR 9:20 Amate in Jesus kungah paipui uh hi: Jesus a mu ciang in, thaa in patang pa sia thakhatthu in lei ah puksak a; cilphuan te thasak hi.
MAR 9:21 Jesus in, Hi bang a hi zawk ngei zo ziam? ci in a pa dong hi. A pa in a no lai pan ma hi zo hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:22 Taciang ama siatsua tu in, tu le tu mei sungah ahizong, tui sungah ahizong, sep tawntung hi: ahihang khatpo na vawt thei le, kote tungah hesuakna nei in hong hu tan, ci hi.
MAR 9:23 Jesus in ama kungah, Na um ngam ziam, a umte atu in na theampo suakthei hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:24 Tua patang i pa in thakhatthu in, Topa, um khi hi; ka up ngawl na hong hu tan, ci in thitui taw au hi.
MAR 9:25 Jesus in mihon te tai kawm in hongpai a mu ciang, doai ngilo tung ah, Nang pau thei ngawl le nangong doai, hi sia pa sung pan pusuak tu le tumkik nawn ngawl tu in thu hong pia khi hi, ci in tei hi.
MAR 9:26 Tua thaa ngilo au a, patangno kawngkaw cip bang in a omsak zawkciang, a sung pan pusuak hi: taciang ama sia a thi bang in om a; mi tampi in, thi zo hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 9:27 Ahihang Jesus in a khut pan len in kaito hi; taciang ama ding to hi.
MAR 9:28 Jesus innsung ah a tum ciang in, a nungzui te in a, banghang in ko te in hawlkhia thei ngawl khu ziam? ci in a tuam in dong uh hi.
MAR 9:29 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi bang te sia thungetna le antan na simngawl, thudang taw pusuak thei ngawl hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:30 Amate tua mun pan Galilee ngam kantan in pai uh a; kuama i heak tu dei ngawl hi.
MAR 9:31 Banghangziam cile a nungzui te hil a, Mihing Tapa sia ngual khut ah ap tu hi, taciang amate in that tu uh a; a ma a ki thalup zawk nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:32 Ahihang amate in a son thu telthiam ngawl uh hi napi, dong ngam tuan ngawl uh hi.
MAR 9:33 Capernaum khua theng uh a: innsung a tum uh ciang in Jesus in a nungzui te kungah, Lamkal ah bang thu ki nial nu ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 9:34 Ahihang amate huthe ngawl in om uh hi: banghangziam cile lamkal ah a ki nial uh thu sia, a kua lianbel tu, ci thu ki nial uh hi.
MAR 9:35 Jesus to suk a, a nungzui sawmleni te sam in, amate tung ah, A kuamapo a masabel nuam le, tua pa sia, a khakbel le mi theampo te naseam hi tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 9:36 Taciang Jesus in patangno khat la in, amate lai ah koi hi: a toai zawkciang in, amate tung ah,
MAR 9:37 A kuama po in keima min taw hibang patang te a sang peuma keima hong sang a hihi, taciang a kuamapo keima hong sang peuma in, keima hong sang hi ngawl in, keima hong sawl pa a sang a hihi, ci hi.
MAR 9:38 John in, Syapa awng, na min taw doai te a hawlkhia khat ka mu uh a, hong zui ngawl hu in: tho khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 9:39 Ahihang Jesus in, Khak heak vun; banghangziam cile keima min taw na lamdang a vawt khat in, kei hong sonsia mameang ngawl tu hi.
MAR 9:40 Banghangziam cile ei hong langpan ngawl peuma ei sangah om hi.
MAR 9:41 A tatak in kong ci ciang, a kuapo a hi zong keima mihing na hi uh hang in, ka min taw tui dawn tu hai khat hong pia peuma, a thaman tan ngawl tu hi.
MAR 9:42 Khat po in keima hong um patangno te sung pan khat lam a khialsak peuma, a ngawng ah an ngoai na suangtum khit in, tuipi thuk na mun ah khiasuk leang ama atu phazaw lai hi.
MAR 9:43 Na khut in hong khialsak le, at tan in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah khut lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sungah tum tu phazaw hi:
MAR 9:44 Tua mei sungah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
MAR 9:45 Taciang na peang in hong khialsak le, at tan in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah peang lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sungah tum tu phazaw hi:
MAR 9:46 Tua mei sungah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
MAR 9:47 Taciang na mit in hong khialsak le, khel keak in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah mit lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sungah tum tu phazaw hi:
MAR 9:48 Tua mei sungah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
MAR 9:49 Banghangziam cile khatsim khatsim mei taw hong ki alsak tu hi, taciang biakpiakna theampo zong ci taw ki alsak tu hi.
MAR 9:50 Cii sia pha hi: ahihang a al na bo a hile, bangbang in al kiksak thei tu nu ziam? Cii bang in al vun a, khat le khat kilem vadiam in om tavun, ci hi.
MAR 10:1 Jesus tua mun pan ding in, Jordan ngun ngal khat Judah ngam kimkot teng ah pai hi: mipi te a kungah hong ki kaikhawm kik leleau a; a hil ngei bang in thuhil kik hi.
MAR 10:2 Pharisee te a kungah hongpai a, pasal khat in a zi khul tu ngeina a om ziam? ci ze-et in dong uh hi.
MAR 10:3 Jesus in amate tung ah, Moses in note bang thu hong pia ziam? ci in zo hi.
MAR 10:4 Taciang amate in, Moses in khul na lai at in, zi khul tu oai hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 10:5 Jesus in amate tung ah, Moses in na thinpui lei uh hang in hi ngeina a at a hihi.
MAR 10:6 Ahihang Pathian in a kipatcil bitphuana hun lai in pa le numei vawt hi.
MAR 10:7 Tua ahikom pasal in a pa le a nu nusia tu a, a zi beal tu hi;
MAR 10:8 Taciang amate ni sia taksa pumkhat hi tu hi: tua ahikom amate sia ni hi nawn ngawl tu a taksa pumkhat a hi uh hi.
MAR 10:9 Tua ahikom Pathian in a ngawm sa te mihing in khen heak tahen, ci in zo hi.
MAR 10:10 Innsung ah a nungzui te in tua thu ma dong kik uh hi.
MAR 10:11 Jesus in amate tung ah, A kuamapo in a zi khul in, ngualdang a tenpui le palngul mawna vawt a hihi.
MAR 10:12 Zi in a pasal nusia in, pasal dang a nei kik le, palngul mawna vawt a hihi, ci hi.
MAR 10:13 Amate in a tate uh a thamsak tu dei in Jesus kungah paipui uh a: a nungzui te in amate tei hi.
MAR 10:14 Ahihang Jesus in a mu ciang in, a thin-uk a, amate tung ah, Patangno te ka kung hong paisak tavun, khak heak vun: banghangziam cile Pathian kumpingam sia hibang patang te atu a hihi.
MAR 10:15 A tatak in kong ci ciang, a kuamapo hibang patangno bang in Pathian kumpingam a sang ngawl peuma, Pathian kumpingam sungah tum ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:16 Taciang Jesus in patang te toai a, amate tungah a khut nga in, thupha pia hi.
MAR 10:17 Jesus lamkal ah a pai laitak in, mi khat hong tai a, khupdin in, Sya pha awng, tawntung nuntakna ka nga thei natu in bang vawt tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 10:18 Taciang Jesus in ama kungah, Banghang in, pha, hong ci ni ziam? Pathian khatbek simngawl kuama a pha om ngawl hi.
MAR 10:19 Thupiak te he ni hi, palngul mawna vawt heak in, tual that heak in, nguta heak in, a man ngawl tettipang heak in, ngual neisa sut heak in, na nu le na pa zakta in, ci hi.
MAR 10:20 Taciang tua pa in Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, hite theampo ka no lai pan in zuisiat zo khi hi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 10:21 Tasiaciang Jesus in ama itna taw en a, Khat bek kisam lai ni hi: pai tan a, na neisa theampo zuak siat in, taciang mizawng te pia in, tua hile vantung ah neisa na nei tu hi: taciang hongpai tan a, thinglamte pua in hong zui tan, ci hi.
MAR 10:22 Tua thu hang in ama khuangai mama a, thinna in paisan hi: banghangziam cile a neisa tam mama hi.
MAR 10:23 Jesus in a kimkot teng en a, a nungzui te kungah, Mihau te Pathian kumpingam sung a tum tu uh bangza in haksa ziam! ci hi.
MAR 10:24 Taciang a nungzui te in Jesus i son thu hang in lungmang mamatek uh hi. Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Ka tate awng, hauna a muang te atu in Pathian kumpingam sungah tum tu sia bangza in haksa ziam!
MAR 10:25 Mihau pa Pathian kumpingam sungah a tum tu sang in, phin bilvang sungah kala-uk tum tu ol zaw hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 10:26 Amate in lamdangsa mamatek uh a, tabang hithong le, a kua peuma ngupna nga thei tu ziam? ci in amate kikum uh hi.
MAR 10:27 Taciang Jesus in amate en a, Hi thu sia mihing te atu in suak thei ngawl hi, ahihang Pathian atu in hi ngawl hi: banghangziam cile Pathian atu in na theampo suak thei hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:28 Tuazawkciang in Peter in, Jesus kungah, en in, kote ka hi uh le na theampo nusia in kong zui uh hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:29 Jesus in, A tatak in kong son hi, a kuamapo keima le lungdamna thu hang in a inn le lo a hi zong, a u le a nau a hi zong, a nu le a pa a hi zong, a zi le a ta te a hi zong, a nusia a hile,
MAR 10:30 Tu hun in inn le lo hi kale, nu te hi kale, u le nau hi kale, tate hi kale, vawtsiatna tatuam taw a se za in sang tu a; hongpai lai tu hun ah tawntung nuntakna sang tu hi.
MAR 10:31 Ahihang a masabel te nungkhakbel tu a; a nungkhakbel te masabel hi tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:32 Amate Jerusalem pai na lamkal ah hi uh a; Jesus amate mai ah pai hi: taciang amate in lamdangsa in, a nung pan zui kawm in lau tek mama uh hi. A nungzui sawmleni te sam a, a tungah thupiang tu te son kipan hi,
MAR 10:33 En vun, Jerusalem sangah i pai hi; mihing Tapa sia thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te kungah ap tu hi; amate in thi tu in thukhen tu uh a, Gentile te kungah ap tu uh hi:
MAR 10:34 Amate in selno tu a, vel in cilphi tu uh hi, taciang that tu uh a: nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:35 Zebedee tapa James le John te Jesus kungah hongpai uh a, Syapa awng, kong nget tu uh sia nong vawtsak tu ka uk uh hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 10:36 Jesus in amate tung ah, No atu in bang hong vawtsak tu khi ziam? ci hi.
MAR 10:37 Amate in, na minthanna sungah khat na ziatsang ah, a dang khat na veisang ah hong tosak tan, ci uh hi.
MAR 10:38 Hi kamale, Jesus in, Bang ngen nu ziam ci zong he ngawl nu hi: ka dawn tu hai dawn zo tu nu ziam, ka san tu baptisma sang zo tu nu ziam? ci hi.
MAR 10:39 Amate in, zo tu khu hi, ci uh hi. Jesus in, Ka dawn tu hai dawn takpi tu nu hi, ka san tu baptisma zong sang takpi tu nu hi:
MAR 10:40 Ahihang ka ziatsang le ka veisang a to tute sia kei i piak tu hi ngawl a; ka Pa in a ngealkholsa te pia tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:41 Tua thu a dang sawm te in a zak uh ciang in, James le John tungah a lung uh kim ngawl hi.
MAR 10:42 Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Na heak uh bang ma in Gentile kumpi te in a mihing te sia zawthawk thu taw uk uh a, ulian te in mipi te tungah thuneina zang tawntung uh hi.
MAR 10:43 Ahihang no sungah hibang hi ngawl tu hi: note sungah khatpo a lian nuam le, note i naseam hi tahen:
MAR 10:44 Note sung pan khatpo in a lu bel a hi nuam le, note i sila hi tahen.
MAR 10:45 Mihing Tapa sia ngual a sawl tu in hongpai ngawl hi, ngual atu seam tu in le mi tampi tatkhiat natu a nuntakna pia tu in hongpai hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:46 Jesus le a nungzui te Jericho ah hongpai uh a: amate mihon tampi taw Jericho pan a pusua uh ciang in, Timaeus i tapa, Bartimaeus a kici mittaw pa sia lamhui ah to in khutdaw ngen hi.
MAR 10:47 Ama in Nazareth khua mi Jesus hi, ci a zak ciang in, David Tapa Jesus awng, hong hesuak kapo in, ci in au hi.
MAR 10:48 Mi tampi te in ama a om khikhep natu in tei uh hi kale: Nang David Tapa awng, hong hesuak kapo in, ci in au seseam hi.
MAR 10:49 Jesus ding a, ama sam tu in thupia hi. Amate in mittaw pa kungah, thinnuam in a, ding in; Ama in hong sam hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 10:50 A puantual sil sia khia in, ding a, Jesus kungah pai hi.
MAR 10:51 Jesus in ama zo a, Nang tungah bang ka vawt tu uk ni ziam? ci hi. Mittaw pa in, Topa awng, ka mit khua mu tu uk khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 10:52 Jesus in ama kungah, pai in; na upna in hong damsak zo hi, ci hi. Tasia pociang in khuamu a, lampi ah Jesus nungzui hi.
MAR 11:1 Amate Jerusalem hong nai ciang, Olive mual a om Bethphage le Bethany a thet uh ciang in, Jesus in nungzui te ni sawl in,
MAR 11:2 Na mai uh ah pai tavun a: khuasung na tum uh pociang kuama to ngei ngawl lai laano a ki khitsa in mu tu nu hi; a khau sut vun a, ka kungah paipui tavun.
MAR 11:3 Khat po in banghang hibang ngamta nu ziam? hong ci le, Topa in tulmaw hi; ci vun, tasia pociang hong paisak pai tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 11:4 Amate pai uh a, lampi kisiktua na mun kongkha hui a puasang ah laano a ki khit mu uh hi; taciang sut uh hi.
MAR 11:5 Tua mun ah a ding te in, banghang in laano sut nu ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 11:6 A nungzui te in Jesus thupiak sa bang in a son uh ciang: amate in paisak uh hi.
MAR 11:7 Amate in laano sia Jesus kungah hong paipui uh a, a tungah puan te pha hi; taciang Jesus a tungah to hi.
MAR 11:8 Mi tampi te in lampi ah a puan uh te pha uh a: midang te in zong thingbak te sat in lampi tungah pha uh hi.
MAR 11:9 A mai ah a pai te le a nung pan a zuite in, Hosanna; Topa min taw hongpai pa thuphatoai a hihi:
MAR 11:10 I pa David kumpingam in thupha nga tahen, Topa min taw hongpaipa: a sangbelna ah Hosanna, ci in au uh hi.
MAR 11:11 Taciang Jerusalem biakinn sungah tum uh a: na theampo a et zawk, nitaksang ciang in, nungzui sawmleni te taw Bethany khua ah pai tek uh hi.
MAR 11:12 A zingciang Bethany khua pan amate a paikik uh ciang in, Jesus a ngilkial hi:
MAR 11:13 A ngalkhat pan in a te puitung mama theikung khat mu a, a nga a om tha le, ci in pai hi: a bul a thet ciang in, a te simngawl bangma mu ngawl hi; banghangziam cile a nga hun hi ngawl hi.
MAR 11:14 Jesus in tua theikung sia, Kuama in bangmahun in na nga ne nawn heak tahen, ci hi. A nungzui te in zong za uh hi.
MAR 11:15 Amate Jerusalem ah hongpai uh a: Jesus biakinn sungah tum hi, biakinn sungah vanzuak te le a lei te nawtkeak in, sum theak te sabuai te le vakhu zuak te i tokhum te lawnthal siat hi;
MAR 11:16 Biakinn hui pan zong kuama vanpua kawm in tawnsak nawn ngawl hi.
MAR 11:17 Jesus in, Ka inn sia minam theampo in thungetna inn, ci tu uh hi, ci atkhol hi ngawl ziam? ahihang note in nguta te kua in na vawt uh hi, ci hil hi.
MAR 11:18 Tua thu thukhamhil te le thiampi lian te in a zak uh ciang in, Jesus bangbang in that thei tu, ci in zong tek uh hi: banghang in amate in Jesus lau ziam cile, mi theampo in a hilna lamdang asak uh hang a hihi.
MAR 11:19 Nitak sang ciang in Jesus khuapi sung pan in pusuak hi.
MAR 11:20 A zingsang ciang lampi ah a pai uh kawm in, amate in theikung sia a sungpan kipan a ko siat mu hi.
MAR 11:21 Peter in phawkkik a, Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, en in, na hamsiat theikung sia ko siat zo hi, ci hi.
MAR 11:22 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian sungah upna nei vun.
MAR 11:23 Banghangziam cile, a mantak in kong ci hi, a kuamapo in, a thinsung ah uplakna nei ngawl in, a pau bang in a vekpi piang tu hi; ci upna taw hi mual tung ah, ki khin in a, tuipi sungah ki khiasuk in; a ci le a ci bang in piang tu hi.
MAR 11:24 Tua ahikom kong ci hi, thu na nget uh ciang in, na dei uh theampo sia nga khi hi, ci na um uh le na nga tu uh hi.
MAR 11:25 Thu na nget tu uh ciang in, khatpo i tungah diksak ngawl na na nei uh le, maisak vun: tabang in vantung a om na Pa uh zong in na vawtkhial uh te hong maisak tu hi.
MAR 11:26 Ahihang note in ngual khialna te na maisak bua uh le, vantung a om na Pa uh in note khial na zong hong maisak ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 11:27 Amate Jerusalem ah hongpaikik uh a: biakinn sungah Jesus a pai laitak in, thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le upa te a kungah hongpai uh a,
MAR 11:28 Ama tung ah, bang thuneina taw hibang nate vawt ni ziam? hibang nate vawt tu in a kua in hibang thuneina hong pia ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 11:29 Tasiaciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Kei zong thu khat hong dong tu khi hi, hong zo tavun, hibang te bang thuneina taw vawt khi ziam, ci kong son tu hi, ci zo hi.
MAR 11:30 John i tuiphumna a piak sia, vantung pan ziam, mihing tung pan ziam? hong zo tavun, ci hi.
MAR 11:31 Amate kikum uh a, vantung pan ci leang; ama in banghang ama um ngawl nu ziam? hong ci tu hi.
MAR 11:32 Ahihang, mihing tung pan hi, ci tu hile; amate in mipi te lau hi: banghangziam cile mi theampo in John sia kamsang tatak hi, ci ngaisun tek uh hi.
MAR 11:33 Taciang amate in Jesus kungah, hong son thei ngawl khu hi, ci uh hi. Tasiaciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hibang te bang thuneina taw vawt khi ziam ci keizong kong son bua tu hi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 12:1 Jesus in thu sontena te zang in amate thuhil pan hi. Mi khat in sapit huan sungah sapit cing a, a huang um in sapit sukna tu dum zong to hi, taciang teitan zong sa a, huan naseam tu te zawn in ama a khuala mama na ah khualhaw hi.
MAR 12:2 A hun a cin ciang in, huan naseam te kung pan a nga te la tu in a naseam te khat sawl hi.
MAR 12:3 Amate in man in vel uh a, khut nguak in tha kik uh hi.
MAR 12:4 A dang naseam khat sawl kik leleau hi; tua pa sia suangtum taw sep in a lu zong liam hi, taciang maizum huaitak in tha kik uh hi.
MAR 12:5 Taciang a dang khat sawl kik leleau a; amate in tua pa that uh hi, a dang tampi te zong vel in that uh hi.
MAR 12:6 Tua ahikom a it mama a tapa khat a neisun sia, amate in ka tapa sia zakta tu uh hi, ci in, a khakbel ciang in paisak hi.
MAR 12:7 Ahihang lo naseam te in, hisia pa a ngamhlua tu pa hi; pai tavun, ama that tawng, a ngamh teng eima a hi tu hi, ci in kikum uh hi.
MAR 12:8 Taciang amate in a tapa man in, that uh a, sapit huan puasang ah vawk hi.
MAR 12:9 Tua ahikom sapit huan nei topa in bangbang vawt tu ziam? ama hongpai tu a huan naseam te siatsua tu hi, taciang sapit huan sia ngualdang te kungah pia tu hi.
MAR 12:10 Innsa te in a nil uh suangtum sia innbul thupibel suak hi:
MAR 12:11 Hi thu in Topa i vawt hi a, i mu na ah, lamdang mama hi, ci in Lai Thiangtho sungah simngei ngawl lai nu ziam? ci hi.
MAR 12:12 Amate in, sontena a son te amate a cinopna hi, ci he ahikom in, Jesus sia mat sawm napi: mipi te lau a hi uhkom in Jesus paisan uh a, a kung pan in kiheam siat uh hi.
MAR 12:13 Amate in Jesus a kampauna pan man tu in, Pharisee te pawlkhat le Herod pawl te sawl uh hi.
MAR 12:14 Amate hongpai uh ciang in Jesus kungah, Syapa awng nangma sia thutang ni hi, kuama zong lau ngawl le mihing te maitang zong en ngawl in Pathian thutak lampi hil ni hi, ci kong he uh hi: Caesar kungah shia piak tu sia ngeina a hi ziam, hi ngawl ziam?
MAR 12:15 Pia tu khu ziam maw, a hibale pia ngawl tu khu ziam? ci hi. Ahihang Jesus in amate ki hitheamsak he ahikom, Banghang in hong ze-et nu ziam? dangka khat paipui tavun, en tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 12:16 Taciang amate in paipui uh hi. Jesus in, Hi lim le ceptena sia a kua ziam? ci hi. Amate in, Caesar le ceptena hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 12:17 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Caesar neisa te Caesar pia vun a, Pathian neisa te Pathian pia vun, ci in zo hi. Taciang amate in Jesus lamdangsa mama uh hi.
MAR 12:18 Thawkikna om ngawl hi; a ci Sadducee te Jesus kungah pai in, thu dong uh a,
MAR 12:19 Syapa awng, mi khat a suapuipa a thi ciang in, a zi ta nei ngawl in a nusia le, a thi pa i cimit ngawl natu in a nau in a mo tenpui hen, ci Moses in hong ci hi.
MAR 12:20 U nau sali om uh a: a lianbel sia in zi nei napi, ta nei ngawl in thi hi.
MAR 12:21 A nina pa in tua nu tenpui a, ta nei ngawl ma in thi hi: a thumna zong tabangma hi.
MAR 12:22 A sali bup in tua nu tenpui uh a, kuama in ta a nei bua uh hi: a khakbel ciang in tua nu zong thi hi.
MAR 12:23 Tua ahikom thawkikna ni, amate a thawkik uh ciang in, tua nu sia a kua zi hi tu ziam? banghangziam cile a sali bup in tenpui hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 12:24 Jesus in amate tung ah, Lai thiangtho le Pathian vangletna na heak ngawl uh hang in, khial hi ngawl nu ziam?
MAR 12:25 Banghangziam cile, amate thina pan a thawkik ciang in, kipui na le nupa tu in ki piak ci bang om nawn ngawl tu a; vantungngam ah vantung mite bang i hi tu hi.
MAR 12:26 Mithi te thawkik na thu taw kisai in: Moses laibu sungah, Pathian in lopa phung sung pan Moses a son na ah, Keima sia Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian le Jacob Pathian ka hihi, a ci na simngei ngawl nu ziam?
MAR 12:27 Pathian sia mithi te Pathian hi ngawl a, a nungta te Pathian a hihi: tua ahikom note nasiatak in khial nu hi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 12:28 Amate in tua thu a kikup uh thukhamhil te sung pan khat in a zak ciang in, Jesus in phatak in zo hi, ci a heak ciang, a kungah pai a, thupiak theampo sung pan a masabel bang ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 12:29 Jesus in ama kungah, Thupiak theampo sung pan a masabel sia, ngai vun, Maw Israel; Topa i Pathian bek Topa hi:
MAR 12:30 Topa na Pathian sia na thinsung theampo, na nuntakna theampo, na ngaisutna theampo le na hatna theampo taw it in: hi sia in a masabel thupiak a hihi.
MAR 12:31 Taciang a ni na sia, a khatna taw a kibang hi a, nangma le nangma na ki it bang in na innpam it tu ni hi. Hi te sang in a lianzaw thupiak om nawn ngawl hi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 12:32 Thukhamhil pa in Jesus kungah, pha hi, Syapa awng, nang thutak son ni hi: banghangziam cile Pathian khatbek om a; Ama simngawl a dang om ngawl hi:
MAR 12:33 Taciang Ama sia, thinsung theampo le heakna theampo, nuntakna theampo le hatna theampo taw it tu a hihi, taciang ama le ama a ki it bang in a innpam zong a it tu hi, tua thu sia meihal biakpiakna le sangaw biakpiakna theampo sang in thupi zaw hi, ci hi.
MAR 12:34 Tua pa in pilvangtak in a zo kik Jesus in a mu ciang in, ama tung ah, Nangma sia Pathian kumpingam taw na ki khuala bua hi, ci hi. Tuazawkciang kuama in Jesus thu a dong ngam nawn bua uh hi.
MAR 12:35 Jesus in, biakinn sungah thu a hil laitak in, Bangbang in thukhamhil te in Christ sia David Tapa ci thei ziam?
MAR 12:36 Banghangziam cile David in Tha Thiangtho taw in ama le ama a kici na ah, Topa in ka Topa kungah, na ngal te na peang ngakna in ka vawt mateng ka ziatsang ah to in, ci hi.
MAR 12:37 Tua ahikom David in ama le ama sia Topa kici a hile; bangbang in a tapa hi thei tu ziam? ci in zo hi. Mihonpi in lawptak in ngai tek uh hi.
MAR 12:38 Jesus in a hil na ah, Thukhamhil te kidawm vun, amate sia puantualpui taw vak nuam sap uh a, sumbuk te ah paupui na te,
MAR 12:39 Syngogues sungah tokhum tungnung te le poai mun theampo ah a sangbel inn doi te dei uh hi:
MAR 12:40 Amate in meingong te inn zawthawk thu taw sut uh a, a sau mama thu ki ngensak hi: tua ahikom hi te in a lian zaw dan thuak tu uh hi, ci hi.
MAR 12:41 Jesus sumpi kuang mai ah to a, ngual in sumpi kuang sungah bangbang in sumpi khia ziam, ci in en hi: mihau tampi te in tampitak khia uh hi.
MAR 12:42 Taciang a zawng meingongnu khat hongpai a, a son thamman ngawl dangka tang ni khia hi.
MAR 12:43 Taciang Jesus in a nungzui te a kungah sam a, A mantak in kong son hi, hi a zawng meingong nu in sumpi kuang sungah a khia theampo sang in a tamzaw khia hi:
MAR 12:44 Banghangziam cile, amate sia a dimlet a nei uh sung pan in khia uh hi; ahihang meingong nu a hile, a kivak natu kisam kawm pan in a nei theampo khia hi,
MAR 13:1 Jesus biakinn sung pan a pusua ciang in, a nungzui te sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, en in, hi suangtum te bangbang in kiphut le bangbang a kisa innpi te ziam? ci hi.
MAR 13:2 Jesus in ama kungah, Hi inn lianpui te na mu ziam? suangtum kithuap khat zong om nawn ngawl in ki lawnthal siat lai tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 13:3 Jesus biakinn ngalkhat Olive mualtung ah a to laitak in, Peter, James, John le Andrew te in,
MAR 13:4 Hi thu te banghun ciang in piang tu ziam, hong son tan? ci in a tuam in dong uh hi.
MAR 13:5 Jesus in amate tung ah, Kuama i hong theam ngawl natu in kidawm vun:
MAR 13:6 Banghangziam cile ka min taw mi tampi hongpai tu uh a, keima in Christ ka hihi; ci in mi tampi theam tu hi.
MAR 13:7 Taciang ngal ki do le ngal kisim natu thu te na zak uh ciang in thinngim heak vun: banghangziam cile tabang theampo sia a piang kul hamtang hi a; a tawpna tu hi ngawl lai hi.
MAR 13:8 Banghangziam cile minam khat le khat kido tu uh a, kumpingam khat le khat ki sim tu hi: mun tatuam ah zinling tu a, kial le haksatna te om tu hi: hi te sia ngimna te i kipatna a hihi.
MAR 13:9 Hi kamale noma le noma kidawm vun: banghangziam cile amate in hausa zum ah hong ap tu uh hi; taciang synagogue sungah zong hong vel tu uh a: keima hang in le amate atu tetti hitu in, ngam uk te le kumpi te mai ah hong paipui tu uh hi.
MAR 13:10 Lungdamna thu sia minam theampo sungah ki son masa tu hi.
MAR 13:11 Ahihang amate paipui in hong ap uh ciang, na pau tu uh ngaisun khol heak vun, ngeal zong ngealkhol heak vun: ahizong a hun ciang in hongpiak babang in pau vun: banghangziam cile tua te sia no i pau hi ngawl in, Tha Thiangtho hi.
MAR 13:12 Unau zong thi tu in ki zuak tu hi, a pa zong in a tapa zuak tu a; tate in a nu le a pa ding in langpan tu uh a, thina ciangdong ki then tu uh hi.
MAR 13:13 Mi theampo in Keima min hang in hong ensan tu uh hi: hi kamale a tawp dong in a thuakzo sia, ki ngum tu hi.
MAR 13:14 Ahihang kamsang Daniel sonkholna bang in a lipkhaphuai sia a kilawm ngawl na mun ah na mu uh ciang in, (a sim te in tel ta uh hen) Judah ngam sungah a omte mual tung pan in tai tahen:
MAR 13:15 Innkhum tung a omte inn sungah van la tu in tuaksuk nawn heak hen:
MAR 13:16 Lo sung a omte in a puan la tu in cia nawnheak hen.
MAR 13:17 Ahihang tua ni ciang naupai te le nau noailuai te haksa mama tu uh hi!
MAR 13:18 Na tai tu uh hun sia phalbi sung a hi ngawl natu in thungen vun.
MAR 13:19 Banghangziam cile tua hun ciang hong theng tu ngimna sia, Pathian in a kipatcil bitphuana pan kipan tuning dong om ngei ngawl lai a, maisang ah zong om kik nawn ngawl tu hi.
MAR 13:20 Tua hun le ni te Topa in tomsak ngawl hile, kuama suakta ngawl tu hi: ahihang a tealsa te atu in, tua ni te tomsak hi.
MAR 13:21 Taciang khatpo in, en vun, Christ ziak ah om hi; a hibale, zesung ah om hi; hong ci le um heak vun:
MAR 13:22 Banghangziam cile Christ phaw sil te le leilot kamsang te hong theng tu uh a; a hi thei le a tealsa te zong theam tu in musakna le nalamdang tampi lak tu uh hi.
MAR 13:23 Ahihang kidawm vun: en vun, hi thu te hong sonkhol zo khi hi.
MAR 13:24 Ahihang haksatna teng zawk, tua hun le ni te sungah, ni hong mial tu a, tha zong tang ngawl tu hi,
MAR 13:25 Van ah aksi te zong tak tu a, vantung vangletna te zong ki thing tu hi.
MAR 13:26 Tuazawkciang in mihing Tapa sia minthang vanglian taw meingo pan hong tuak amate in mu tu uh hi.
MAR 13:27 Taciang leitung mongkhat pan in van mongkhat dong, leitung kingli pan a tealsa te kaikhawm tu in, Ama vantungmi te sawl tu hi.
MAR 13:28 Theikung pan in sontena khat sin vun; a bak te pan in a dawnmoi te hong sua ciang khal hong nai zo hi, cina he uh hi:
MAR 13:29 Tasia bangma in hibang te na mu uh ciang in, a hun hong nai mama zo a, kongbiang kung tatak ma hong theng zo hi, ci he tavun.
MAR 13:30 A tatak kong ci ciang, hibang te theampo a piansiat mateng, hi suan le pal te bo siat ngawl tu hi.
MAR 13:31 Van le lei bo tu hi: ahihang ka kammal te a bo bua tu hi.
MAR 13:32 Ahizong tua ni le hun sia kuama in he ngawl hi, vantungmi te in zong he ngawl hi, Ka Pa bek in he hi.
MAR 13:33 Kinging khol vun a, ngak in thungen vun: banghangziam cile a hun na he bua uh hi.
MAR 13:34 Banghangziam cile, mihing Tapa sia, khual khuala mama a haw khat, a inn a om naseam te thuneina pia in, mi theampo amate nasep tek seam tu le kongcing te zong cingsak in a nusia pa taw kibang hi.
MAR 13:35 Tua ahikom, note ngak nginge vun, banghangziam cile, innteakpa sia nitak sang, a hibale zan laitak, a hibale akkhuan hun, a hibale zingsangkuan, banghun theng tu ci na he bua uh hi:
MAR 13:36 A hibale thakhatthu hong theng le na mut laitak hong si tu hi.
MAR 13:37 Ngak nginge vun, ci note kong son bang ma in, mi theampo son khi hi.
MAR 14:1 Paisanpoai le tolsaw ngawl anluum poai tu, ni ni a kisap ciang in: thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in Jesus sia bangbang man in that thei tu ci thimtheltak in kikum uh hi.
MAR 14:2 Ahihang amate in mipi te buaisak ngawl in poai ni ci bua tawng, ci uh hi.
MAR 14:3 Jesus sia Bethany khua miphak Simon inn ah anne in a om laitak, numei khat a manham mama alabaster sathau namtui thawl khat keng in hongpai a, a palang sutham in, Jesus lutung ah buak hi.
MAR 14:4 Tua mun ah a om pawlkhat te a thin-uk uh a, banghang in hi sathau namtui sia pakvawt ziam?
MAR 14:5 Banghangziam cile ta sia dangka zathum sang in a tamzaw taw zuak in, mizawng te pia leang pha hi, ci uh hi. Taciang amate in numei nu langpan in phun uh hi.
MAR 14:6 Jesus in, Ama thu in omsak po vun; banghang in nawngkaisak nu ziam? ama in ka tungah na pha vawt hi.
MAR 14:7 Banghangziam cile mizawng te sia noma taw om tawntung hi, taciang na ukhun uh po in amate tungah napha vawt thei nu hi: ahihang kei ka hile no kungah hong om tawntung ngawl khi hi.
MAR 14:8 Ama in a vawt thei za vawt hi: ka luanghawm vui natu ama in sathau namtui buakkhol hi.
MAR 14:9 A tatak in ka ci ciang, leitung mun tatuam lungdamna thu ki son na theampo ah hi numei nu i vawt thu zong ama phaw tawntung natu in kison tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:10 Taciang, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat, Judah Iscariot sia, thiampi lian te kungah Jesus ap tu in pai hi.
MAR 14:11 Amate in a zak uh ciang in, lungdam mama uh a, dangka piak tu in kamciam pia hi. Taciang ama in bangbang ap thei tu, ci hunpha zong tawntung hi.
MAR 14:12 Paisanpoai tuuno ki ngaw ni, tol saw ngawl anluum poai ni masabel ni in, a nungzui te in Jesus kungah, paisanpoai na anneak natu mun koisung ah pai in vawtkhol tu dei ni ziam? ci uh hi.
MAR 14:13 Tasiaciang a nungzui te ni sawl a, Khuapi sungah pai tavun a, tuibeal taw tui pua khat mu tu nu hi: ama zui vun.
MAR 14:14 Ama tum na innteakpa kungah, Syapa in, ka nungzui te taw paisanpoai an ka neak natu mun leangna inndoi koisung ziam? ci vun.
MAR 14:15 Tua hile ama in inntung doituam zai mama eite atu in, a ki puakholsa in a om hong lak tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:16 A nungzui te pai uh a, khuapi sung a thet uh ciang in, Jesus sonkhol bang in mu uh hi: amate in paisanpoai atu in vawtkholsiat uh hi.
MAR 14:17 Taciang nitak sang ciang in Jesus a nungzui sawmleni te taw hongpai hi.
MAR 14:18 Amate to uh a an a neak tek uh laitak in, Jesus in, A tatak kong ci ciang, note sung pan khat, keima taw anne sia in hong leheak tu hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:19 Tasiaciang amate khuangai mama uh a, khat zawkciang khat in Jesus kungah, kei ka hi ziam? a dang khat in, kei ka hi ziam? ci tek uh hi.
MAR 14:20 Jesus in amate tung ah, Sawmleni sung pan khat, keima taw kuangsung ah a sawkkhawm sia hi.
MAR 14:21 Ama thu a ki atkholsa bang in: mihing Tapa sia pai hamtang tu hi, ahihang mihing Tapa a leheak sia, a mailam bing hi! piang bua zaw le ama atu phazaw hi, ci zo kik hi.
MAR 14:22 Amate a neak tek uh laitak, Jesus in anluum la a thupha a piak zawkciang in, phel hi, taciang amate pia a, La vun a, ne vun: hisia in ka pumpi hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:23 Taciang hai zong la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang in, amate pia hi: taciang a vekpi in dawn tek uh hi.
MAR 14:24 Taciang amate tung ah, Hisia in thuciamthak taw kisai in mi tampi atu a luang ka thisan a hihi.
MAR 14:25 A mantak ka ci ciang, hibang sapittui thak sia, ka Pa kumpingam sungah note taw ka dawn kik mateng bangmahun in ka dawn nawn batu hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:26 Taciang amate la asak zawk uh ciang in, Olive mualtung sangah paito uh hi.
MAR 14:27 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Tuucingpa ka that tu a, tuu te peakkeak siat tu hi, ci a ki atkhol bangma in, tu zan in note theampo in keima hang in na thin uh no mama tu hi.
MAR 14:28 Ahihang ka thawkik zawkciang in, Galilee ah note mai ah pai tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:29 Ahihang Peter in, mi theampo nangma hang in thinkiam siat kale, kei thinkiam ngawl het tu khi hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:30 Jesus in, A mantak kong ci ciang, tuni, tuzan mama in, ak nivei a khuan ma, thumvei hong nial tu ni hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:31 Peter in nangma taw thi tu ahizong hong nial ngawl tu khi hi, ci in khotak in ci hi. Tasia bangma in a dangte theampo in zong ci tek uh hi.
MAR 14:32 Amate Gethsemane a kici huan ah theng uh hi: taciang a nungzui te kungah, Ka thunget lan ziak ah to hi vun, ci hi.
MAR 14:33 Jesus in, Peter, James le John te paipui a, lungmann ale nasiatak in thinngimna hong kipan hi.
MAR 14:34 Taciang amate tung ah, Ka thin sia thi tu za dong in nasiatak in khuangai hi: hi mun ah om in ngak nginge vun, ci hi.
MAR 14:35 Taciang a maisang tawm pai lai a, lei ah bok in, a suak thei a hile, hi hun taw a ki peal thei natu in thungen hi.
MAR 14:36 Taciang, Abba, Pa awng, nang atu in na theampo hi thei hi; hi hai ka kung pan hong laksak tan: ahihang keima deina bang hi ngawl in nangma deina bang hi zaw tahen, ci hi.
MAR 14:37 Taciang Jesus hongpai a, amate mut laitak mu hi, taciang Peter kungah, Simon, mu na hi ziam? nai khat sungbeak zong ngak zo ngawl na hi ziam?
MAR 14:38 Ze-etna sungah na tum ngawl natu in thungen in ngak vun. Thaa sia uk mama hi kale cilesa sia a thaneam hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:39 Taciang Jesus paikik a, a nget sa bangma in ngen leleau hi.
MAR 14:40 Jesus a heakkik ciang in, amate mutthip leleau mu hi, banghangziam cile amate mitte ngit mama hi, amate in bangba zo kik tu ci zong a he bua uh hi.
MAR 14:41 Thumvei na hongpaikik ciang in, amate tung ah, Tu in mu vun a, tawlnga vun: hisia in pha zo hi, a huncing hi zo hi; en vun, mihing Tapa sia mawnei te khut ah leheak hun theng zo hi.
MAR 14:42 Tho vun a, pai tawng; en vun, Keima hong leheak pa hong theng zo hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:43 Tabang a pau laitak, thakhatthu in, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat, Judas Iscariot sia, thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le upa te taw hongpai hi.
MAR 14:44 Jesus a leheak pa in, ka nap sia Ama hi, man vun a; paipui vahiat vun, ci in heaksakna piakhol hi.
MAR 14:45 Judas hong thet pociang, Jesus kungah hongpai suak a, Syapa, syapa awng; ci in nam hi.
MAR 14:46 Taciang amate in Jesus man uh a, paipui uh hi.
MAR 14:47 Taciang a kiim a ding te khat in namsau dawk in, thiampi sangbel pa naseam pa sat ahikom a bil tawng hi.
MAR 14:48 Jesus in amate tung ah, Banghang in nguta man tu bang in namsau le moltum taw keima man tu in hongpai nu ziam?
MAR 14:49 Biakinn sungah thuhil in nisim note taw om hi napi, hong man ngawl nu hi: ahihang laithiangtho sia tangtung hamtang tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
MAR 14:50 Tasiaciang amate a vekpi in Jesus nusia uh a, tai siat uh hi.
MAR 14:51 Tua mun ah tangval khat, puanneal khat bek sil in Jesus nung zui a, tangval te in ama man ahikom:
MAR 14:52 A puanneal sia nusia in, amate kung pan a pumnguak in tai keak hi.
MAR 14:53 Amate in Jesus sia thiampi sangbel pa kungah paipui uh a: ama taw thiampi lian te, upa te le thukhamhil te kaikhawm tek hi.
MAR 14:54 Taciang Peter in thiampi sangbel pa leitual dong a khuala na pan zui a: naseam te taw mei oai in to khawm hi.
MAR 14:55 Thiampi lian te le tangpi upa te theampo in Jesus thalup thei natu in a man ngawl tetti te zong napi; a mu bua uh hi.
MAR 14:56 A man ngawl tetti tu tam mama hongpai napi, amate tetti pan nate a thu uh ki si ngawl hi.
MAR 14:57 Pawlkhat te ding in a man ngawl tettipang uh a,
MAR 14:58 Khut taw a kisa hi biakinn ka pheltham tu a, khuttawsak ngawl a dang biakinn nithum sung sa tu khi hi, a ci za khu hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 14:59 Ahihang amate tetti pan nate sia a thu uh kisi thei ngawl hi.
MAR 14:60 Thiampi sangbel pa a lai ah ding a, Jesus kungah, bangma zo kik ngawl tu ni ziam? hi te in bangbang in nang hong langpan in tettipang ziam? ci hi.
MAR 14:61 Ahihang Jesus huthe ngawl in om a, bangma zong zo kik ngawl hi. Thiampi sangbel pa in, nangma sia Christ a kici, thupha taw a dim Pathian Tapa na hi ziam? ci in dong kik hi.
MAR 14:62 Jesus in, Hi khi hi: mihing Tapa vangletna ziatsang ah to in meingo sung pan hongpai na mu tu uh hi,
MAR 14:63 Tasiaciang thiampi sangbel pa in a puan eaukeak a, tetti dang bang kul nawn ziam?
MAR 14:64 Pathian a sonsiat na za zo nu hi: bangbang ngaisun nu ziam? ci hi. Amate theampo in, thi tu kilawm mawna nei hi, ci in mawsiat tek uh hi.
MAR 14:65 Pawlkhat te in Jesus sia cilphi hi, a mai humsak uh a vel in, a vel sia kamsang bang in pualak in, ci uh hi: naseam te in a khutpheak taw beang uh hi.
MAR 14:66 Peter sia a nuai sang leitual ah a om laitak in, thiampi sangbel pa naseam te sung pan khat hongpai a:
MAR 14:67 Tua nu in Peter mei oai a mu ciang in, en a, nangma zong Nazareth mi Jesus taw om nu hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:68 Ahihang ama in, he ngawl khi hi, bang son ni ziam ci zong he ngawl khi hi, ci in nial hi. Taciang ama a puasang ah pusuak a, akkhuang hi.
MAR 14:69 Naseam numei nu in mu leleau a, a kung a ding te kungah, hisia pa zong amate sungah ki hel hi, ci hi.
MAR 14:70 Taciang Peter in nial leleau hi. Tuazawk a ngei ngawl in, a kung a ding te in Peter kungah, nangma sia amate sungah kihel lalawm ni hi: banghangziam cile nangma sia Galilee mi ni hi, na kampau pan ki he hi, ci leleau hi.
MAR 14:71 Ahihang Peter in, kiciam in, na son uh sia pa he ngei ngawl khi hi, ci in kiciam hi.
MAR 14:72 Taciang ak a ni veina khuang hi. Taciang Peter in Jesus i sonkhol, ak nivei a khuan ma thumvei hong nial tu ni hi, a ci thu phawkkik hi. Taciang tua thu a ngaisut ciang in kap hi.
MAR 15:1 Zingsang ciang in thiampi lian te in upa te, thukhamhil te le thunei te teng taw manlangtak in thu kikupna nei uh hi, taciang Jesus lehhen in paipui uh a, Pilate kungah ap uh hi.
MAR 15:2 Pilate in, nangma in Judah mite Kumpipa na hi ziam? ci in dong hi. Ama in, Na ci bang in ka hihi, ci in zo hi.
MAR 15:3 Thiampi lian te in thu tatuam taw Ama mawsiat uh ahihang: bangma zo kik ngawl hi.
MAR 15:4 Taciang Pilate in, bangma zo kik ngawl tu ni ziam? en in, amate in nangma mawsiat na bangzata tettipang uh ziam, ci dong hi.
MAR 15:5 Ahihang Jesus in bangma zo kikngawl ahikom; Pilate in lamdangsa mama hi.
MAR 15:6 Tua poai sungah amate in thongtak te sung pan, mipi te i dei khat papo suatak uh hi.
MAR 15:7 Taciang ngaltho a, tualthat pa Barabbas a kici khat om hi, ama sia ngaltho dang te taw thongtak hi.
MAR 15:8 Mihonpi te in a vawt ngei uh bangma in vawtsak tu dei in, a nging tatak in au kipan uh hi.
MAR 15:9 Ahihang Pilate in, Judah te Kumpipa ka suatak tu na dei uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 15:10 Banghangziam cile ama in Jesus sia thiampi lian te in a el uh man in hong ap hi, ci he nginge hi.
MAR 15:11 Ahihang thiampi lian te in mihonpi te, Barabbas suatak zaw tu in holku uh hi.
MAR 15:12 Taciang Pilate in amate tung ah, Judah te Kumpipa a kici pa bang law tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 15:13 Taciang amate in, thinglamte tungah khai in, ci in au kik uh hi.
MAR 15:14 Taciang Pilate in amate tung ah, banghang ziam, bang mawna vawt ziam? ci hi. Amate in thinglamte tungah khai in, ci in au seseam uh hi.
MAR 15:15 Pilate in mipi te lungkimsak nuam ahikom, Barabbas suatak a, Jesus a vel zawkciang in, thinglamte tungah khai tu in ap hi.
MAR 15:16 Ngalkap te in Jesus Pilate inn ah tumpui uh a; ngalkap theampo munkhat ah sam hi.
MAR 15:17 Taciang amate in Jesus puan sannum silsak uh a, ling kipheak lukhu a lu ah khusak uh hi.
MAR 15:18 Tuazawkciang, Judah te Kumpipa! thuphatoai ta in, ci in zatakna pia uh hi.
MAR 15:19 Amate in phaikung taw a lu pan vel uh hi, cilphi uh a, khupdin in bia uh hi.
MAR 15:20 Amate in a selno zawk uh ciang in, puan sannum a silsak uh sia sutsak kik uh a, Ama puansil te silsak kik uh hi, taciang thinglamte tungah khai tu in paipui uh hi.
MAR 15:21 Alexander le Rufus te i pa, Cyrene ngam mi Simon sia, khuano pan hongpai a, lamkal ah ama a mu uh ciang zawthawk thu taw thinglamte puasak uh hi.
MAR 15:22 Amate in Jesus sia Golgotha a kici, lu ngu mun ah paipui uh hi.
MAR 15:23 Amate in myrrh taw a ki hel sapittui pia uh ahihang: Jesus in sang nuam ngawl hi.
MAR 15:24 Amate in thinglamte tungah a khai zawk uh ciang in, a puan te khen uh a, mi khatsim in a nga tu uh tek aisan in hawm uh hi.
MAR 15:25 Tabang in thinglamte tungah a khai uh sia zingsang nai kua a hihi.
MAR 15:26 Ama mawsiatna lai tak uh a, judah te kumpipa, ci in a tungah at uh hi.
MAR 15:27 Taciang Ama taw nguta ni te sia; a ziatsang ah khat le a veisang ah khat, thinglamte tungah khai uh hi.
MAR 15:28 Taciang Ama sia mawnei te taw ki sim khawm hi, ci laithiangtho tangtun na a hihi.
MAR 15:29 Lampi a tawn peuma in nu nau uh a, lupei in, biakinn phel in, nithum sung a sa kik tu pa,
MAR 15:30 Nangma le nangma ki hun in a, thinglamte tung pan hong tuaksuk tan, ci uh hi.
MAR 15:31 Tabangma in thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in zong, hisia pa sia ngualdang ngum thei a; ama le ama ki ngum thei ngawl hi.
MAR 15:32 Israel te Kumpipa, Christ sia thinglamte tung pan tu mama in tuaksuk hen a, tabang in ka mu le um tu khu hi, ci in selno uh hi. Taciang Ama taw thinglamte tung a ki khai te in zong selno uh hi.
MAR 15:33 Sun nai sawmleni pan nitak sang nai thum dong leitung theampo khuazing hi.
MAR 15:34 Nitak sang nai thum ciang in Jesus a nging tak in, ELOI, ELOI, LAMASABAKTANI? ci in au hi. A khiakna sia, Ka Pathian, Ka Pathian awng, banghang hong taisan ni ziam? a cinopna a hihi.
MAR 15:35 Tua mun ah a ding pawlkhat te in a zak uh ciang in, En vun, ama in Elijah sam hi, ci uh hi.
MAR 15:36 Amate sung pan khat hong tai a, tuihup puan la in sapittui hau sungah pap suk a, phaikung dawn ah a sawm zawkciang, Jesus dawn tu in pia hi, Koi hi po in; Elijah hongpai in a khiasuk ziam, en hi tawng, ci uh hi.
MAR 15:37 Jesus a ngingtak in a au zawkciang thi hi.
MAR 15:38 Taciang biakinn sungah kidoi na puan sia a lu pan a taw dong ki zensuk a, khen ni ki sua hi.
MAR 15:39 Taciang, Jesus au in, thi ci amai a ding ngalkap mangpa in a mu ciang in, hisia pa sia Pathian Tapa tatak hi, ci hi.
MAR 15:40 Numei te in a khuala na pan in ngal-et uh a: amate sungah Mary Magdalene, James a no le Joses te nu Mary le Salome;
MAR 15:41 Amate Jesus Galilee ngam a om lai in a nungzui te le a khoi te a hi uh hi; Jesus taw Jerusalem ah a pai khawm numei dang tampi te zong om hi.
MAR 15:42 Tua ni sia sabbath ni a thet ma, ki ngin ni hi a, nitak sang ciang in,
MAR 15:43 A zatak huai ngaisutna pia le Pathian kumpingam a ngak Arimathaea khua mi Joseph hongpai a, hangsantak in Pilate kungah pai hi, taciang Jesus luanghawm ngen hi.
MAR 15:44 Pilate in Jesus thi zo hi, a ci uh ciang lamdangsa mama hi: ngalkap mangpa sam a, Jesus a thi zawk ngei zom ziam? ci in dong hi.
MAR 15:45 Ngalkap mangpa kung pan a heak ciang in Jesus luanghawm Pilate in Joseph pia hi.
MAR 15:46 Taciang Joseph in puanneal lei a, Jesus khiasuk in, puanneal taw tuam hi, taciang a ki to tawm suang hawng sungah vui a, than kongkha ah suangtum lik hi.
MAR 15:47 Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary te in Jesus a vui na mun en uh hi.
MAR 16:1 Sabbath ni a bo ciang in, Mary Magdalene, James nu Mary le Salome te hongpai uh a, Jesus luanghawm zut tu sathau namtui te keng uh hi.
MAR 16:2 Nipikal khat sung ni masabel ni zingtung, ni sua ciang in, amate than ah pai uh hi.
MAR 16:3 Taciang amate in than kongkha a suangtum sia kua in hong liksak tu ziam? ci in kikum kawm uh hi.
MAR 16:4 Amate in a et uh ciang in, suangtum a ki lik sa in mu uh hi: banghangziam cile tua suangtum sia lian mama hi.
MAR 16:5 Than sung a tum uh ciang in, tangval khat puanpak tualpui sil in ziatsang ah a to, amate in mu uh a; lau mama uh hi.
MAR 16:6 Ama in numei te kungah, lau heak vun: thinglamte tung a ki khai Nazareth khua mi Jesus zong nu hi; Ama thokik zo hi; hi mun ah om nawn ngawl hi: Ama ki vui na hong en tavun.
MAR 16:7 Ahihang pai tavun a, a nungzui te le Peter kungah, na mai uh Galilee ah pai hi, ci in son vun: note hong sonkholsa bangma in, tua mun ah mu tu nu hi, ci in son hi.
MAR 16:8 Taciang amate than pan in manlangtak in pai uh a, tai kawm uh hi; banghangziam cile amate huang liang in lamdangsa mama uh hi: kuama kungah zong bangma son ngawl hi; banghangziam cile amate a lau uh hang a hihi.
MAR 16:9 Jesus sia nipikal khat sung ni masabel ni zingtung a thawkik ciang in, a sung pan doai ngilo sali a hawlkhiatsak Mary Magdalene kungah kilang masabel hi.
MAR 16:10 Taciang ama pai a, Jesus taw kithawl ngei in, a kap a tau te son hi.
MAR 16:11 Amate in, Jesus nungta hi, ci le Mary in mu hi, ci a zak uh ciang in, a um bua uh hi.
MAR 16:12 Tuazawkciang in amate sung pan mi ni, khuano sang a pai te kungah, Jesus meal lamdang in kilaak hi.
MAR 16:13 Taciang amate pai in a dang te son a hi uh hang: amate in a um bua uh hi.
MAR 16:14 Tuazawkciang in, nungzui sawm le khat te anneakna mun ah a to uh laitak, Jesus hong kilang a, amate tei hi, banghangziam cile amate in a thawkik zawk a mu te i son te um ngawl in a thinpui uh hang a hihi.
MAR 16:15 Jesus in amate tung ah, Note leitung theampo ah pai tavun a, piansakna theampo tungah lungdamna thu son tavun.
MAR 16:16 Um in tuiphumna a sang peuma ngupna nga tu hi; ahihang a um ngawl te sia thukhenna thuak tu hi.
MAR 16:17 A umte sia hibang musakna te in zui tu hi; ka min taw doai te hawlkhia tu uh a; kam thak taw pau tu uh hi;
MAR 16:18 Ngul te zong man tu uh a; ngu a ne hial uh zong, bangma tat ngawl tu hi; cina te tungah a khut uh te nga tu uh a, dam tu hi,
MAR 16:19 Topa in amate thu a son zawkciang in, Ama sia van ah ki la to a, Pathian ziatsang ah to hi.
MAR 16:20 Amate pai uh a, mun theampo ah thuhil uh hi, Topa amate taw naseam a, a thuhilna uh te nalamdang te in zui in kipsak hi. Amen.
LUK 1:1 Kote sungah thu piang te mitampi in a ban a ban in at zo a, tua thu tangkona te sia ka up bel uh a hihi,
LUK 1:2 A kipatcil pan in mitmu tetti te le Pathian kamal naseam te i hong son bang in a ki at a hihi;
LUK 1:3 A masabel pan in thu theampo a cialcing in he ka hikom, na tungah a ban a ban in hong at leng pha tu hi, ci ngaisun khi hi, a thupibel Theofilas awng,
LUK 1:4 Nangma hong hil sa thu te a kip a kho thei natu in hong at khi hi.
LUK 1:5 Judah kumpipa Herod hun lai in, Zacharias a kici thiampi khat om a, ama sia Abijah i thiampi pawl sungah kihel hi: a zi min sia Elizabeth hi a, Aaron suan a hihi.
LUK 1:6 Amate ni sia Pathian mai ah mi thutang te hi uh a, thupiak te le biakna ngeina te paubang ngawl in a zui te a hi uh hi.
LUK 1:7 Amate in ta a nei bua uh hi, banghangziam cile Elizabeth sia ciing hi, taciang amate a ni ma in a kum uh zong ham zo hi.
LUK 1:8 Zecharias sia ama pawl te taw a nasep hun cing a Pathian mai ah thiampi nasep a sep laitak in,
LUK 1:9 Thiampi te ngeina bang in aisan in ki teal uh a, Zecharias sia Topa biakinn sung tum a ciang in ngimnamtui hal tu a hihi.
LUK 1:10 Ngimnamtui a hal laitak in mihonpi theampo a puasang ah thungen khawm uh hi.
LUK 1:11 Topa vantungmi khat a kungah hong kilang a, ngimnamtui hal na mun biaktau ziatsang ah ding hi.
LUK 1:12 Zechariah in ama a mu ciang in, patau a, a tungah launa theng hi.
LUK 1:13 Ahihang vantungmi in, Zechariah: lau heak in, Pathian in na thungetna hong za zo hi, taciang na zi Elizabeth in tapa hing tu a, a min sia John, phuak tu ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:14 Lungdamna le thinnopna nei tu ni hi; a sua ciang in mi tampi te zong lungdam tu uh hi.
LUK 1:15 Banghangziam cile ama sia Topa mai ah mi thupi hi tu hi, sapittui ahizong, zu ahizong, dawn ngawl tu hi; a nu ngil sung pan ma in Tha Thiangtho taw kidim tu hi.
LUK 1:16 Israel mi tampi te zong amate Pathian Topa kungah heakkiksak tu hi.
LUK 1:17 Elijah i thaa le vangletna taw Topa mai ah pai tu a, pa te le ta te i thinsung te ahizong, thu ni ngawl te mi thuman te i ciimna ah ahizong; Topa atu in mihing te kinging kholsak le ki thoaikholsak tu in heakkiksak tu hi.
LUK 1:18 Zechariah in vantungmi kungah, nong son bang in piang takpi tu hi, ci bangbang in he tu khi ziam? banghangziam cile keima sia pasal huai ka hihi, taciang ka zi zong huai mama zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:19 Tasiaciang vantungmi in, keima sia Pathian mai ah a ding Gabriel ka hihi; nangma paupui tu le lungdamna thu son tu in hong sawl hi.
LUK 1:20 Taciang, en in, hi thu te a pian ni dong pau thei ngawl tu ni hi, banghangziam cile amate hun ciang a tangtung tu ka thu na up ngawl hang a hihi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 1:21 Mipi te in Zechariah ngak uh a, biakinn sungah ngei mama om ahikom in, lamdangsa uh hi.
LUK 1:22 Biakinn sung pan a pusua ciang in amate tungah bangma son thei ngawl hi: taciang biakinn sungah mangmu hi, ci amate in he uh hi: banghangziam cile a khut taw lak a, pau thei tuan ngawl hi.
LUK 1:23 Thiampi nasep ni te a khuangkhim po ciang in Zechariah sia a inn ah cia hi.
LUK 1:24 Tuazawkciang in a zi Elizabeth naupai a, tha nga sung bu hi,
LUK 1:25 Tua ahikom Elizabeth in, Topa in keima atu in hi thu hong vawtsak hi, mihing te sungah zawnsakna ka thuak nate hong laksak tu in Ama in hong ve zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:26 Tha luk a cin ciang in, Pathian in vantungmi Gabriel sia Galilee ngam Nazareth khua ah a om,
LUK 1:27 Ngaknu thiangtho khat, David suan Joseph taw nupa tu in zuthawl piaksa, Mary kungah paisak hi.
LUK 1:28 Vantungmi a kungah hongpai a, na tungah thupha om tahen, nangma sia a thupi mama maipha nga na hihi, Topa nang taw hong om hi: numei te sungah thuphatoai na hihi, ci hi.
LUK 1:29 Ama in vantungmi a mu ciang, a sonthu hang in a thinsung buai a, bangbang paupuina hi tu ziam, ci ngaisun hi.
LUK 1:30 Taciang vantungmi in, Mary awng, lau heak in, banghangziam cile Pathian mai ah maipha nga zo ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:31 En in, nau na pai tu a, tapa nei tu ni hi, taciang a min Jesus phuak tu ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:32 Ama sia mi thupi hi tu a, A sangbel i Tapa, kici tu hi: taciang Topa Pathian in a Pa David i kumpi tokhum pia tu hi:
LUK 1:33 Ama in Jacob suan te a tawntung in uk tu a; Ama ukna sia tawp hun nei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 1:34 Mary in vantungmi kungah, bangbang piang thei tu ziam, keima in pa taw ki he ngei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:35 Vantungmi in zo kik a, Tha Thiangtho na tungah hong theng tu a, A sangbel i vangletna in hong tuam tu hi: tua ahikom na sung pan in a suak tu tapa thiangtho sia Pathian Tapa kici tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:36 En in, na mealheak Elizbeth, a ciing ci in ngual i son ngei sia a kum ham zawkciang in tapa pai hi: tu in tha luk pha zo hi.
LUK 1:37 Banghangziam cile, Pathian taw a piang thei ngawl bangma om ngawl tu hi.
LUK 1:38 Mary in, keima sia Topa i sal nu ka hihi; ka tungah na ci bang in hi tahen, ci hi. Taciang vantungmi a kung pan in paikhia hi.
LUK 1:39 Tua hun in, Mary ding a, Judah ngam huam mualtung khua ah manlangtak in pai hi;
LUK 1:40 Zechariah innsung ah tum a, Elizabeth paupui hi.
LUK 1:41 Taciang, Elizabeth in Mary paupuina a zak ciang in a ngil sungah nauno tawn hi; taciang Elizabeth sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim a:
LUK 1:42 Aw ngingtak taw, nangma sia numei te sung pan thuphatoai na hihi, taciang na ngilsung a om nauno zong thuphatoai a hihi.
LUK 1:43 Bangbang in ka Topa i nu sia kei kungah hongpai ziam?
LUK 1:44 Banghangziam cile, en in, nong paupui na aw ka zak pociang, ka ngil sungah nauno sia lungdamna taw tawn hi.
LUK 1:45 A um nu sia thuphatoai a hihi: banghangziam cile tua thu te Topa in ama a son bang in vawt tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:46 Mary in, ka nuntakna in Topa lamsang hi,
LUK 1:47 Keima hong Ngum Pathian tungah ka thaa a lungdam hi.
LUK 1:48 Banghangziam cile, nunniam kei a salnu hong ve hi: en vun, tu pan kipan in khangkhat zawk khangkhat, thuphatoai nu, hong kici tu hi.
LUK 1:49 Banghangziam cile a vanglian Pathian in keima atu in a thupi mama te vawt zo hi; taciang a min thiangtho hi.
LUK 1:50 A hesuakna sia ama a zakta te tungah khangkhat zawk khangkhat om tawntung hi.
LUK 1:51 Ama in a ban taw a thahatna hong lak zo a; a ki phasak te thinsung ngaisutna zong ki thethangsak siat zo hi.
LUK 1:52 Ama in a vanglian te amate tokhum pan in a nuai ah khiasuk zo a, mi nunniam te domto zo hi.
LUK 1:53 Ama in a ngilkial te thupha te taw ngilvasak zo a; a hau te khut hawm taw ki heamsak hi.
LUK 1:54 Ama in a hesuakna phawk tawntung in a sal Israel hu zo hi;
LUK 1:55 I pu i pa te kungah a sonsa bangma in, Abraham le a suan te hu hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:56 Taciang Mary sia Elizabeth kungah tha thum sung om a, ama inn ah ciakik hi.
LUK 1:57 Elizabeth nau sua tu hun a cin ciang in tapa nei hi.
LUK 1:58 Elizabeth kungah Topa hesuakna lianpi kilang ci a innpam te le a mealheak te in a zak uh ciang in lungdampui tek mama uh hi.
LUK 1:59 Nausen ni liat a cin ciang in vunteap tan tu in hongpai a, a pa min zui in, Zechariah, ci uh hi.
LUK 1:60 A nu in, hi ngawl hi; a min John kici tu hi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 1:61 Amate in, na phung sung uh ah hibang min nei kuama om ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 1:62 Taciang amate in a pa khut taw lak uh a, bangbang ci nuam ni ziam, ci dong uh hi.
LUK 1:63 Zechariah in lai at natu ngen a, a min sia John hi, ci at hi. Taciang a vekpi in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
LUK 1:64 Taciang thatkhatthu in a kam ki hong in a lei hong suakta kik ahikom, pau in Pathian pok hi.
LUK 1:65 A kim a om theampo tungah lau na hong theng a; tua thu sia Judah kual mualtung khuano theampo ah ki zel hi.
LUK 1:66 Tua thu a za theampo in amate thinsung tek ah keam uh a, hisia bangbang nausen hi peuma tu ziam! ci tek uh hi. Taciang Topa khut sia Ama tungah om hi.
LUK 1:67 John i pa Zechariah sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim hi, taciang maisang thu a pualak na ah,
LUK 1:68 Israel te Topa Pathian minthang tahen; banghangziam cile a mite ve in hun zo hi,
LUK 1:69 Eite atu in ngupna kii sia a sal David inn sung pan in hong suaksak zo hi;
LUK 1:70 Leitung kipat lai pan in kamsang thiangtho te kam zang in son zo hi:
LUK 1:71 I ngal te le hong ensan te khutsung pan in eite ngum tu in ahizong;
LUK 1:72 I pu i pa te tungah vawt tu in thu a ciam sa hesuakna le thuciam thiangtho phawk tawntung tu in ahizong;
LUK 1:73 I pa Abraham tungah a kiciamna thukham,
LUK 1:74 Eite tungah pia tu le i ngal te khutsung pan in hong suaktasak tu a, lau na om ngawl in,
LUK 1:75 I nuntaksung theampo Ama mai ah thianthona le thutang suana taw Ama na i sep thei natu a hihi.
LUK 1:76 Taciang nang, nausen, A sangbel i kamsang, hong ci tu hi: banghangziam cile Topa mai ah a lampi puakhol tu in pai tu hi;
LUK 1:77 A mite tung ah, amate mawna pan in mawmaisak na tungtawn in ngupna thu hesak tu in,
LUK 1:78 I Pathian i a neam thuthiamna tungtawn in; van pan zing nisuak bang in hong ve zo hi,
LUK 1:79 Khuazing le thina lim sungah a to te khuavak pia tu le eite i peang te thinnopna lampi ah hong makai tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 1:80 Nausen sia khang a, thaa lam ah thahat hi, Israel te kungah a kilaak mateng duisung ah om hi.
LUK 2:1 Tua hun laitak in Caesar Augustus in leitung bup misimna vawt tu in thupia hi.
LUK 2:2 Hi misimna masabel a vawt laitak in Syrenius sia Syria ngam uk a hihi.
LUK 2:3 Taciang mi theampo misimna nei tu in amate khua tek ah pai uh hi.
LUK 2:4 Joseph zong Galilee ngam, Nazareth khua pan in David khua, Judah ngam Bethlehem khua ah pai hi; banghangziam cile ama sia David i suan le minam a hihi:
LUK 2:5 Misimna nei tu in dokzu a piaksa Mary taw pai uh hi, Mary sia naungil lian mama zo hi.
LUK 2:6 Bethlehem ah a om uh laitak in, Mary a naunei tu ni hong cing hi.
LUK 2:7 A tacil tapa hong nei a, puan taw a tun zawkciang, khui ankuang sungah sial hi, banghangziam cile zintun inn ah amate atu inndoi om nawn ngawl hi.
LUK 2:8 Tua ngamsung ah tuucing te duisung ah ngiak uh a, zan in a tuuhon te cing in om uh hi.
LUK 2:9 Taciang, en vun, Topa vantungmi amate kungah hongpai a, Topa vangletna sia amate kiim teng ah taang hi: taciang amate lau mama uh hi.
LUK 2:10 Vantungmi in amate tung ah, lau heak vun: banghangziam cile, en vun, note tungah lungdamna thu hong puak khi hi, tua thu sia mi theampo atu in lungdamna lianpi hi tu hi.
LUK 2:11 Banghangziam cile tuni in David khuapi sungah Ngumpa Christ Topa suak zo hi.
LUK 2:12 Hisia in note atu musakna a hihi; nausen sia puan taw tun a, khui ankuang sungah a kisial na mu tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 2:13 Thakhatthu in vantungmi taw vantungmi honpi te Pathian pok uh a,
LUK 2:14 Van a sangbel na ah Pathian minthang tahen, leitung ah thinnop na om tahen a, mihing te tungah deisakna pha om tahen, ci hi.
LUK 2:15 Vantungmi te amate kung pan van ah a heakkik zawkciang in tuucing te in, tu in Bethlehem khua ah pai tawng, Topa i hong heaksak thu en tawng, khat le khat kici uh hi.
LUK 2:16 Taciang manlangtak in pai uh a, Mary, Joseph le khui ankuang sungah a kisial nausen mu uh hi.
LUK 2:17 Tuucing te in ama a mu uh ciang in, vantungmi in hi nausen thu taw kisai amate a son thu te midang te tungah son uh hi.
LUK 2:18 Tuucing te i son thu te a za theampo in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
LUK 2:19 Ahihang Mary in hi thu te theampo, a thinsung ah keam in ngaisun hi.
LUK 2:20 Vantungmi in amate tungah a son bang in, a zak uh le a mu uh thu te hang in tuucing te in Pathian vangletna le minthanna pok in heakkik uh hi.
LUK 2:21 Nausen sia vunteap tan tu ni liat a cin ciang, a min sia Jesus ci hi, tua min sia a nu in a ngilsung a pai ma in vantungmi i a phuakholsa min a hihi.
LUK 2:22 Mary sia Moses thukham bang in thianthona hun a cin ciang in, Topa kungah ap tu in nausen sia Jerusalem ah paipui hi;
LUK 2:23 Topa thukham sungah, sulhong tapa masabel peuma Topa atu a thiangtho, kici tu hi; ci in ki at hi.
LUK 2:24 Topa thukham sungah a om bangma in, khutun kop khat, a hibale khutheh ni taw biakpiakna piak tu a hihi.
LUK 2:25 Taciang en vun, Jerusalem ah Simeon a kici pasal khat om hi; ama sia mi pha thutang le biakna sangah a ki pumpiak hi a, Israel te henepna a ngak khat zong a hihi: ama tungah Tha Thiangtho om hi.
LUK 2:26 Topa i Messiah na mu mateng na thi buatu hi, ci in Tha Thiangtho in pualak hi.
LUK 2:27 Tha ompui na taw in Simeon sia biakinn sungah hong pai a: thukham ngeina bang in vawtsak tu in nulepa te in nausen Jesus paipui uh hi,
LUK 2:28 Simeon in nausen a kang ah toai a, Pathian pok kawm in,
LUK 2:29 Topa awng, tu in, na thu bang in na sal keima thinnuamtak in hong paisak ta in:
LUK 2:30 Banghangziam cile na ngupna ka mit taw mu zo khi hi,
LUK 2:31 Tua thu sia mi theampo mai ah na vawtsa a hihi;
LUK 2:32 Gentile te tung khuavaksak tu le na minam Israel te minthan natu a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 2:33 Simeon pau nate sia Joseph le Mary te in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
LUK 2:34 Taciang Simeon in amate thupha pia a, a nu Mary kungah, hi nausen sia Israel mitampi te lutu na le mitampi te ki phokkik na hi tu hi; banghangziam cile kam ki nial na musakna hi tu hi;
LUK 2:35 Hi hi, namsau in na nuntakna hong sun tu hi, taciang mitampi te thinsung ngaisutna te kilangsak tu hi.
LUK 2:36 Asher suan, Phanuel tanu Anna a kici kamsang nu khat om a, ama sia huai mama zo hi: ama sia ngaknu thiangtho a hina pan in a pasal taw kum sali sung bek omkhawm hi;
LUK 2:37 Ama sia meingong hi a, kum sawm liat le kum li pha zo hi, biakinn pan pusuak ngawl in sun tawzan taw antang le thungen in Pathian naseam hi.
LUK 2:38 Jesus biakinn ah a thetpui laitak in Anna zong hong theng a, Topa tungah lungdam ko hi, taciang Jerusalem ah ngupna a ngakla te theampo tungah nausen thu son hi.
LUK 2:39 Joseph le Mary te in Topa thukham bang in na theampo a vawt zawk uh ciang in, Galilee ngam Nazareth khua ah ciakik uh hi.
LUK 2:40 Nausen hong khang a, thaa lam ah thahat in, ciimna taw dim a: Pathian hesuakna ama tungah om hi.
LUK 2:41 Jesus i nulepa te kumsim paisanpoai ciang in Jerusalem ah pai bul uh hi.
LUK 2:42 Jesus kum sawm le kum ni a cin ciang in, Jerusalem ah ngeina bang in poai mun ah pai hi.
LUK 2:43 Poai man ciang in a inn ah ciakik uh hi, ahihang nauno Jesus sia Jerusalem ah tanglai hi; Joseph le a nu in tua thu a he bua uh hi.
LUK 2:44 Ahihang, mi honpi sungah hi tu hi, ci ngaisun uh a ni khat sung pai uh hi; taciang amate mealheak te le a ki naipui uh te sungah zong uh hi.
LUK 2:45 Amate in a mu ngawl uh ciang in, Jerusalem ah heakkik in zong uh hi.
LUK 2:46 Nithum zawkciang in amate in biakinn sungah mu hi, doctor te laizang ah to a, thu ngai le thu dong in om hi.
LUK 2:47 A thu heak le a zo kik nate a za theampo in lamdangsa uh hi.
LUK 2:48 Amate in a mu uh ciang in lamdangsa mama uh a: a nu in, ka Tapa awng, banghang hibang in hong vawt ni ziam? en in, na pa taw thinngim mama in hong zong khu hi, ci hi.
LUK 2:49 Jesus in amate tung ah, Banghang in hong zong nu ziam? ka Pa nasep seam hamtang tu khi hi, ci he ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 2:50 Taciang amate in a sonnop na a tel bua uh hi.
LUK 2:51 Taciang amate taw pai a, Nazareth ah ciakik in amate thu ni in om hi: ahihang a nu in Ama kampau te a thinsung ah keamcing hi.
LUK 2:52 Jesus sia a ciimna le a pumpi khang a, Pathian mai le mihing te mai ah maipha nga hi.
LUK 3:1 Tiberius Caesar in ngam a uk zawk kum sawm le kum nga a cin ciang in, Pontius Pilate sia Judah ngam ukpa hi a, Herod sia Galilee ngam ukpa a hihi, taciang Herod nau Philip sia Ituraea le Trachonitis ngam ukpa a hihi, taciang Lysanias sia Abilene ngam ukpa a hihi,
LUK 3:2 Annas le Caiaphas te sia thiampi sangbel hi uh a, tua hun sung in duisung ah a om Zechariah tapa John tungah Pathian thu theng hi.
LUK 3:3 Tua ahikom John sia Jordan ngun dung khuano te theampo ah maw ki sikkik na tuiphumna tungtawn in mawmaina thu hil hi.
LUK 3:4 Kamsangpa Isaiah i kammal te laibu sungah a ki atsa bang in, duisung ah a au aw khat in, Topa i lampi puakhol vun, lampi te na tangsak vun.
LUK 3:5 A kom na theampo dim vun a, mual sang le mualdung te theampo niamsak vun; a kingkoai theampo tangsak vun a, lampi ham theampo nealsak vun;
LUK 3:6 Taciang mi theampo in Pathian i ngupna mu tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 3:7 Ama kungah tui ki phum tu in hongpai mihonpi te kungah, maw, ngul suan te, hong theng tu thin-ukna pan suakta tu in kua in note kidopna hong pia ziam? ci hi.
LUK 3:8 Taciang mawna ki sikkikna taw a kiphu in nga pha te nga tavun, kote in ka pa uh Abraham nei khu hi: ci heak vun, banghangziam cile Pathian in hi suangtum te Abraham suan suaksak thei hi, hong ci khi hi.
LUK 3:9 Tu in thingkung te a bul ah heipui ki koi zo hi: nga pha a nga ngawl thingkung peuma phuk tu a, meisung ah khia hi.
LUK 3:10 Taciang mipi te in, tabang hithongle banglaw tu khu ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
LUK 3:11 Ama in, puansil ni a nei sia in a nei ngawl te pia tahen; an a nei sia in tabangma in vawt tahen, ci in zo hi.
LUK 3:12 Siadong te zong tui ki phum tu in hongpai uh a, Syapa awng, kote bangbang ngamta tu khu ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 3:13 Taciang ama in, a kiciangtan za sang in a tamzaw khon heak vun, ci hi.
