LUK 3:14 Ngalkap te in zong tabangma in, kote e, bangbang ngamta tu khu ziam? ci in dong uh hi. Amate kungah, zawthawk thu taw mite tungah bangma ngamta heak vun, a manngawl pi in mite mawsiat heak vun; na nga uh thaman taw lungkim vun, ci hi.
LUK 3:15 Mite in lametna a nei tek uh bangma in, John sia Christ a hi le hi ngawl, mi theampo in amate thinsung ah ngaisun tek uh hi.
LUK 3:16 Tua ahikom John in amate theampo tung ah, keima in a tatak in tui taw tuiphumna hong pia khi hi; ahihang kei sang in a vanglianzaw khat hongpai tu hi, a peangdap khau sutsak tu nangawn ka kilawm bua hi: Ama in Tha Thiangtho le mei taw baptisma hong pia tu hi:
LUK 3:17 A khut sungah tangkheaplaw toai a, tangzap tu hi, tang pha te beam sungah thun tu a; tangsi te a hi le a mit ngei ngawl meitaw hal tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 3:18 Ama hanthotna sungah thudang tampi te zong mite tungah pualak hi.
LUK 3:19 Ahizong ngam uk Herod sia a naupa Philip i a zi, Herodias thu le a phangawl a vawt nate hang in John in tek hi,
LUK 3:20 Taciang Herod in John sia thongtaksak a, tabang in mawna dang vawt thua belap hi.
LUK 3:21 Ngual theampo tui a ki phum zawk uh ciang in, Jesus zong tui ki phum a, thu a nget laitak in van ki hong hi,
LUK 3:22 Tha Thiangtho sia vakhu bang in a tungah tuaksuk hi, taciang van pan in aw khat hong theng a, Nangma sia ka it mama Ka Tapa ni hi; na tungah ka lungkim mama hi, ci hi.
LUK 3:23 Tua hun in Jesus sia kum sawmthum hong cing hi, Ama sia mihing ngaisut na bang in Joseph tapa hi a, Joseph sia Heli tapa hi,
LUK 3:24 Heli sia Matthat tapa hi, Matthat sia Levi tapa hi, Levi sia Melchi tapa hi, Melchi sia Janna tapa hi, Janna sia Joseph tapa hi,
LUK 3:25 Joseph sia Mattathias tapa hi, Mattathias sia Amos tapa hi, Amos sia Nahum tapa hi, Nahum sia Esli tapa hi, Esli sia Nagge tapa hi,
LUK 3:26 Nagge sia Maath tapa hi, Maath sia Mattathias tapa hi, Mattathias sia Semei tapa hi, Semei sia Joseph tapa hi, Joseph sia Judah tapa hi,
LUK 3:27 Judah sia Joanan tapa hi, Joanan sia Rhesa tapa hi, Rhesa sia Zerubbabel tapa hi, Zerubbabel sia Shealtiel tapa hi, Shealtiel sia Neri tapa hi,
LUK 3:28 Neri sia Melchi tapa hi, Melchi sia Addi tapa hi, Addi sia Cosam tapa hi, Cosam sia Elmodam tapa hi, Elmodam sia Er tapa hi,
LUK 3:29 Er sia Jose tapa hi, Jose sia Eliezer tapa hi, Eliezer sia Jorim tapa hi, Jorim sia Matthat tapa hi, Matthat sia Levi tapa hi,
LUK 3:30 Levi sia Simeon tapa hi, Simeon sia Judah tapa hi, Judah sia Joseph tapa hi, Joseph sia Jonan tapa hi, Jonan sia Eliakim tapa hi,
LUK 3:31 Eliakim sia Melea tapa hi, Melea sia Menan tapa hi, Menan sia Mattatha tapa hi, Mattatha sia Nathan tapa hi, Nathan sia David tapa hi,
LUK 3:32 David sia Jesse tapa hi, Jesse sia Obed tapa hi, Obed sia Boaz tapa si. Boaz sia Salmon tapa hi, Salmon sia Nahshon tapa hi,
LUK 3:33 Nahshon sia Amminadab tapa hi, Amminadab sia Aram tapa hi, Aram sia Hezron tapa hi, Hezron sia Pharez tapa hi, Pharez sia Judah tapa hi,
LUK 3:34 Judah sia Jacob tapa hi, Jacob sia Isaac tapa hi, Isaac sia Abraham tapa hi, Abraham sia Terah tapa hi, Terah sia Nahor tapa hi,
LUK 3:35 Nahor sia Serug tapa hi, Serug sia Reu tapa hi, Reu sia Peleg tapa hi, Peleg sia Heber tapa hi, Heber sia Shelah tapa hi,
LUK 3:36 Shelah sia Cainan tapa hi, Cainan sia Arphaxad tapa hi, Arphaxad sia Shem tapa hi, Shem sia Noah tapa hi, Noah sia Lamek tapa hi,
LUK 3:37 Lamek sia Methuselah tapa hi, Methuselah sia Enok tapa hi, Enok sia Jared tapa hi, Jared sia Mahalalel tapa hi, Mahalalel sia Kenan tapa hi,
LUK 3:38 Kenan sia Enosh tapa hi, Enosh sia Seth tapa hi, Seth sia Adam tapa hi, Adam sia Pathian tapa a hihi.
LUK 4:1 Jesus sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim in Jordan pan ciakik a, Thaa in duisung ah paipui hi,
LUK 4:2 Ni sawmli sung doaimangpa in ze-et hi. Tua hunsung theampo bangma ne ngawl hi: taciang tua ni te a bo zawkciang in a ngilkial hi.
LUK 4:3 Doaimangpa in ama tuung ah, Pathian Tapa na hile, hi suangtum te anluum suak tu in thupia in, ci hi.
LUK 4:4 Taciang Jesus in hibang in zo hi, Mihing te sia anluum bek hi ngawl in, Pathian thu taw nungta zaw tu hi, ci ki at hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:5 Doaimangpa in mualsang dawn ah paipui a, leitung kumpingam theampo tawmvei sung in lak hi.
LUK 4:6 Taciang doaimangpa in, hi thuneina theampo le minthanna teng kong pia tu hi: banghangziam cile hite sia keima hong ki pia zo a; ka piaknop po pia khi hi.
LUK 4:7 Tua ahikom keima nong bia le, a vekpi in nangma neisa hi tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:8 Jesus in, Satan, ka nung ah om in: banghangziam cile, Topa na Pathian bia in a, Ama na bek seam in, ci in ki at hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 4:9 Taciang doaimangpa in Jerusalem ah paipui a, biakinn khuhum ah koi hi, taciang, Pathian Tapa na hile, hi mun pan in leangsuk in:
LUK 4:10 Banghangziam cile, nangma a keam tu in Pathian in ama vantungmi te sawl tu hi:
LUK 4:11 Na peang suang taw a khet ngawl natu in amate in a khut taw hong dom tu hi, ci in ki at hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:12 Taciang Jesus in, Topa na Pathian ze-et heak in, ci zong om hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 4:13 Doaimangpa in ze-et na theampo a man ciang in, a kung pan tawlkhat sung kiheam hi.
LUK 4:14 Jesus sia Tha Thiangtho vangletna taw Galilee ah heakkik a: tua ngamsung theampo ah a minthang hi.
LUK 4:15 Ama in synagogue sungah thuhil a, mi theampo in pok tek uh hi.
LUK 4:16 Jesus a khan na mun Nazareth khua ah pai a, ama ngeina bang in, sabbath ni synagogue sungah pai hi, taciang laithiangtho sim tu in ding hi.
LUK 4:17 Kamsang Isaiah laibu ama pia uh hi. Taciang tua laibu a hon ciang in, hi lai ki at na mun mu hi.
LUK 4:18 Topa Thaa sia ka tungah om hi, banghangziam cile mizawng te tungah lungdamna thu pualak tu in sathau hong buak zo hi; thinsung tamtham te damsak tu in ahizong, saltang mite tungah suatakna thu pualak tu in ahizong, mittaw te khuamu kik natu in ahizong, vawtsiatna thuak te suatakna pia tu le,
LUK 4:19 Topa i santhei kum pualak tu in hong sawl hi.
LUK 4:20 Jesus in a sim laibu khupkik a, naseam pa tungah a ap zawkciang to hi. Synagogue sung a omte theampo in sal tinten uh hi.
LUK 4:21 Taciang Ama in, Hi laithiangtho sia tu ni in na bilsung uh ah tangtung hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:22 A kamsung pan a pusuak kammal te amate in lamdangsa mama uh a, a vekpi in tettipang uh hi. Taciang, ama sia Joseph tapi hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 4:23 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi paunak sia kei tung ah, syavuan pa, nangma le nangma ki damsak in: Capernaum ah na vawt ka zak uh theampo hina khua ah zong vawt in, hong ci tu nu hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:24 Taciang Jesus in, A tatak kong ci hi, kamsang sia ama khua ah ki sang ngei ngawl hi.
LUK 4:25 Ahihang a mantak kong ci hi, Elijah hun lai, kumthum le tha luk sung ngua zu ngawl hi, ngamsung theampo ah kialpi a tun lai in, Israel ngamsung ah meingong tam mama om hi;
LUK 4:26 Ahihang tua meingong te kungah Elijah paisak ngawl in, Sidon ngam Zarephath khua meingong nu kungah paisak hi.
LUK 4:27 Taciang in kamsang Elisha hun ciang in, Israel ngamsung ah miphak tampi om napi, Syria minam Naaman simngawl midang kuama a ki thiangsak om ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 4:28 Synagogue sung a omte theampo in hi thu te a zak uh ciang in, thin-ukna taw kidim uh a,
LUK 4:29 A vekpi ding in, Jesus sia khuasung pan hawlkhia uh a, khualu mualtung liangdawn pan lusuknuailam khiasuk tu in paipui uh hi.
LUK 4:30 Ahihang Jesus in amate laizang pan kantan in paisuak hi.
LUK 4:31 Taciang Galilee ngam Capernaum khuapi ah pai a, sabbath ni in thuhil hi.
LUK 4:32 A hilna te amate in lamdangsa mama uh hi: banghangziam cile Ama thu sia vanglian hi.
LUK 4:33 Taciang synagogue sungah doai ngilo a vei pa khat om a, aw nging mama taw,
LUK 4:34 Nang Nazareth khuami Jesus, koma nguak hong omsak po tan; nang taw bang kisai hi ziam? A kua ci hong he khi hi; Pathian i mithiangtho pa na hihi, ci in au hi.
LUK 4:35 Taciang Jesus in tei a, Thim in, ama sung pan pusuak in, ci hi. Doai ngilo in mipi te mai ah ama puksak a, ama vawtsia ngawl in a sungpan pusuak hi.
LUK 4:36 Amate theampo in lamdangsa mama uh a, amate sungah, hisia in bangthu ziam! banghangziam cile thuneina le vangletna taw doai ngilo te thupia a, amate pusuak siat hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 4:37 Jesus thu sia tua ngam kiim mun theampo ah ki zel hi.
LUK 4:38 Jesus sia synagogue sung pan pusuak a, Simon inn ah pai hi. Simon zi i nu sia cisa nasia mama in na a; Jesus kungah amate in hesuak ngetsak uh hi.
LUK 4:39 Jesus a hui ah ding in, a cisa natna tei hi; taciang a natna in nusia a: tasia pociang tho in, amate leangna do hi.
LUK 4:40 Nitum ciang in, natna namcin taw cina te Jesus kungah hong paipui uh hi: khatsim tungah a khut nga a, damsak siat hi.
LUK 4:41 Mitampi sung pan doai te pusuak a, Nangma sia Pathian Tapa Christ na hihi, ci in au uh hi. Taciang Jesus in amate tei in, pausak ngawl hi: banghangziam cile doai te in Ama sia Christ hi, ci he uh hi.
LUK 4:42 Khua hong vak ciang in, Jesus khuasung pan in senneal ngam sangah pai a, mite in zong uh hi, a kungah hongpai uh a, amate paisan ngawl tu in thum uh hi.
LUK 4:43 Ahihang, amate tung ah, Pathian kumpingam sia khuadang tatuam ah zong ka pualak kul hamtang hi: banghangziam cile tua thu a pualak tu in hong ki sawl ka hihi, ci hi.
LUK 4:44 Taciang Galilee ngamsung synagogue te sungah thuhil hi.
LUK 5:1 Ni khat Jesus Gennesaret tuihui ah a din laitak in, Pathian thu a hil ngai nuam in mite in ama phul ngawp uh hi.
LUK 5:2 Taciang Jesus in tuihui ah ngunkuang ni a tawlnga mu hi: ahihang ngasa man te ngunkuang sung pan tuak a, a ngen te sawp uh hi.
LUK 5:3 Jesus ngunkuang khatsung ah tum a, ta sia Simon ngunkuang a hihi, tuihui pan in a khuala zawhiat na ah khin tu in ngen hi. Tua ngunkuang sungah Jesus to in, mipi te thuhil hi.
LUK 5:4 Thuhil a man ciang in, Simon kungah, Tui thukna mun sangah na ngunkuang khin in a, na ngen uh pai vun, ci hi.
LUK 5:5 Simon in, Topa awng, zan khuateak hanciam zo ka hi uh hang, bangma nga ngawl khu hi, ahizong na thu bang in ngen pai tu khi hi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 5:6 Ngen a pai uh ciang in, ngasa tam mama awk a, a ngen uh ek hi.
LUK 5:7 Tasiaciang in ngunkuang dang ah a om a lawmte pai in a hu natu in khutphet uh hi. Amate hongpai uh a, ngunkuang ni sungah ngasa dim ahikom, ngunkuang tuisung tum dektak hi.
LUK 5:8 Tua thu Simon Peter in a mu ciang in, Jesus khup nuai ah bok a, Topa, ka kung pan kiheam in; banghangziam cile keima in mawnei ka hihi, ci hi.
LUK 5:9 Banghangziam cile Ama le a kung a, a omte in, ngasa tam mama a mat uh hu in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
LUK 5:10 Tasia bangma in ama taw ngasa a man Zebedee tapa James le John zong in lamdangsa mama uh hi. Jesus in Simon tung ah, Lau heak in; tu pan kipan in mihing man tu ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 5:11 A ngunkuang te tuihui ah a koi zawk uh ciang in, na theampo nusia in Jesus zui uh hi.
LUK 5:12 Khatvei Jesus miphak khat omna khuapi khat ah theng hi, tua pa in Jesus a mu ciang in a mai ah bok a, Topa awng, uk po le te hong thiangsak thei ni hi, ci in thum hi.
LUK 5:13 Jesus in a khut zan a, a tham zawkciang, Uk khi hi, dam in, ci hi. Tasia pociang a phak natna in ama taisan hi.
LUK 5:14 Jesus in kuama son heak in ci vaitha hi: Ahihang pai tan a, nangma le nangma thiampi te kungah ki lak in, taciang Moses thupiak bang in thianthona biakpiakna pia in, banghangziam cile amate tungah na thiantho na tetti hi tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 5:15 Ahihang Jesus thu sia muntheampo ah kizel a: mihon tampi te a thu ngai tu le natna dam nuam in hongpai hon uh hi.
LUK 5:16 Taciang mipi te kung pan in duisung ah pai a, ama nguak thungen hi.
LUK 5:17 Ni khat, Jesus in thu a hil laitak in, Jerusalem, Judah le Galilee ngamsung khua tatuam pan hongpai Pharisee le thukhamhil te zong to uh hi: cina damsak thei na vangletna sia Topa tungah om hi.
LUK 5:18 En vun, pumzaw khat a lupna taw hong zawng uh a, Jesus mai ah sial tu in, innsung ah tumpui sawm hi.
LUK 5:19 Ahihang mihonpi te hang in a tum natu lampi a mu zawk ngawl uh ciang, inntung ah kato uh a, a khuhum hawk in mipi te laizang Jesus mai ah a lupna taw cinapa khiasuk uh hi.
LUK 5:20 Jesus in amate upna a mu ciang in, Pasal pa, na mawna te ki maisak zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 5:21 Thukhamhil te le Pharisee te in, Pathian mindaisak in a pau sia a kua ziam? A kua in mawna te maisak thei ziam, Pathian bek hi ngawl ziam? ci in ngaisun uh hi.
LUK 5:22 Ahihang Jesus in amate ngaisutna a heak ciang in, amate tung ah, Na thinsung uh ah bang ngaisun nu ziam?
LUK 5:23 Na mawna te ki maisak zo hi; ci le, ding in a, lampai in, ci koisia ol zaw ziam?
LUK 5:24 Ahihang mihing Tapa in leitung ah mawna te maisak tu in vangletna nei hi, ci na heak natu uh in, (cina pa tungah ci hi) Keima in kong ci hi, tho in a, na lupna la in, na inn ah cia in, ci hi.
LUK 5:25 Thakhatthu in pumzaw pa amate mai ah ding to a, a lupna la in, Pathian pok kawm, a inn ah cia hi.
LUK 5:26 Amate theampo in lamdangsa uh a, Pathian pok uh hi, taciang patau na taw dim uh a, tuni na lamdang mama i mu zo hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 5:27 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus pusuak a, Levi a kici siadong khat, a zumsung ah a to mu hi: taciang Jesus in ama kungah, Hong zui tan, ci hi.
LUK 5:28 Levi hong ding a, na theampo nusia in Jesus zui hi.
LUK 5:29 Taciang Levi in a inn ah Jesus atu in poai lian mama khat vawtsak a: siadong te le midang tampi taw tokhawm tek uh hi.
LUK 5:30 Ahihang amate i thukhamhil te le Pharisee te in a nungzui te tungah phun uh a, banghang in siadong te le mawnei te taw ne khawm dawn khawm nu ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 5:31 Jesus in amate zo kik a, Cidam te in syavuan kul ngawl a; cina te bek in kul hi.
LUK 5:32 Mi pha te sam tu in hongpai ngawl khi hi, ahihang mawnei te a mawna ki sikkik natu in hongpai khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 5:33 Amate in, John nungzui te le Pharisee te nungzui te antang in thungen tawntung uh hi; ahihang banghang in na nungzui te ne le dawn in om uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 5:34 Jesus in amate tung ah, Mopoai vawt te in mopa amate te taw a om laiteng antangsak thei tu ni ziam?
LUK 5:35 Ahihang mopa sia amate kung pan in mundang ah a paipui hun hong theng tu hi, tasiaciang amate zong antang kik tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 5:36 Jesus in amate tungah sontena khat son a; Puan lui sia puan thak taw kuama in phaw ngei ngawl hi; tabang hile puanthak in puan lui sia kaikin tu a, puan lui tungah a bel ciang in puan thak taw kizawp thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 5:37 Savun um lui sungah kuama in sapittui thak thun ngei ngawl hi; a thun le sapittui thak in savun um puakthamsak tu a, sapittui bua siat in, savun um zong laltham tu hi.
LUK 5:38 Ahihang sapittui thak sia savun um a thak sungah thun kul hamtang hi; taciang a ni in pha khawm tu hi.
LUK 5:39 Kuama in sapittui lui a dawn zawk uh ciang, sapittui thak dawn kik pai nuam ngawl uh hi: banghangziam cile a lui sia phazaw hi, ci hi.
LUK 6:1 Sabbath ni a masa bo in, sabbath ni ni na hong thet ciang in, Jesus zungtang losung kantan in pai a; a nungzui te in zungtang vui te hiat in amate khutsung ah nuai in ne uh hi.
LUK 6:2 Pharisee te in amate tung ah, banghang in sabbath ni ngeina a hi ngawl te vawt nu ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 6:3 Jesus in, David le a lawm te a ngilkial uh ciang in, bang vawt ci simngei ngawl nu ziam?
LUK 6:4 David sia Pathian innsung ah tum a, Pathian mai ah a ki lui anluum la in ne hi, taciang a lawm te zong pia hi; tua anluum sia thiampi te bek i neak thei hi ngawl ziam? ci in amate zo kik hi.
LUK 6:5 Jesus in amate tung ah, Mihing Tapa sia sabbath ni i Topa a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 6:6 Sabbath ni dang khat, Jesus synagogue sungah tum a, thuhil hi: kut ziatsang zaw khat om hi.
LUK 6:7 Thukhamhil te le Pharisee te in Jesus maw na zong nuam a hi uhkom, sabbath ni in a damsak ziam, a damsak bua ziam, ci encik uh hi.
LUK 6:8 Ahihang Jesus in amate ngaisutna he a, a khutzaw pa kungah, Ding in a, a laizang ah ding in, ci hi. Taciang ama zong tho in ding hi.
LUK 6:9 Jesus in amate tung ah, Thu khat kong dong tu hi; sabbath ni in na pha sep tu ngeina a om ziam, a hibale, na phangawl sep tu ziam? nuntakna hun tu maw, that tu? ci hi.
LUK 6:10 Taciang a kiim a pam en a, tua pa kungah, na khut phal in, ci hi. A khut a phal ciang a langkhat bangma in dam kik hi.
LUK 6:11 Amate thin-uk na taw dim uh a; Jesus banglaw thei tu hi ziam ci kikum uh hi.
LUK 6:12 Tasiaciang in Jesus thungen tu in mualtung ah kato a, Pathian kungah zan khuateak thungen hi.
LUK 6:13 Khuavak ciang in, a nungzui te a kungah sam a: sawmleni pha uh hi, tuate sia sawltakte, kici a;
LUK 6:14 Peter a kici Simon le a suapui pa Andrew, James le John, Philip le Bartholomew,
LUK 6:15 Matthew le Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James le Zelotes a kici Simon,
LUK 6:16 James i suapui pa Judah le Jesus leheak pa Judah Iscariot te a hi uh hi.
LUK 6:17 Jesus a nungzui te taw tuaksuk a, amtam na mun ah ding hi, mihon tampi te sia Judah le Jerusalem, tuipi hui Tyre le Sidon pan in thu ngai tu le amate natna pan a dam nuam in hongpai uh hi;
LUK 6:18 Doai ngilo te i vawtsiat te damsak hi.
LUK 6:19 A sung pan in vangletna pusuak a, a vekpi in damsak ahikom mihonpi te theampo in Ama tham tu in zong uh hi.
LUK 6:20 Jesus in a zungzui te en a, Mizawng te thuphatoai te na hi uh hi: banghangziam cile Pathian kumpingam sia note a, a hihi.
LUK 6:21 Tu in a ngilkial te thuphatoai na hi uh hi: banghangziam cile na ngil uh va kik tu hi. Tu in a kap te thuphatoai na hi uh hi: banghangziam cile na nui kik tu uh hi.
LUK 6:22 Mihing Tapa hang in ngual in hong ensan, amate sung pan hong hawlkhia, hong vawtsia, na min uh hong siatsak ciang in, thuphatoai te na hi uh hi.
LUK 6:23 Tua ni ciang in, angtang vun a, lungdam in tawn vun: en vun, banghangziam cile vantung ah na thaman uh lian mama hi: banghangziam cile amate pu le pa te in kamsang te tungah tabangma in vawt zo uh hi.
LUK 6:24 A hizong no mihau te na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile nuntak nuam na nga zo uh hi.
LUK 6:25 A ngilva te na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile na ngil uh kialkik tu hi. Tu in a nuite na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile kap in na taukik tu uh hi.
LUK 6:26 Ngual theampo in hong pok ciang in na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile amate pu le pa te in leilot kamsang te tabangma in vawt zo uh hi.
LUK 6:27 Ahizong ka thu a za note hibang in kong ci hi, na ngal te it vun a, hong ensan te tungah thupha vawt vun,
LUK 6:28 Note hong hamsiat te thupha pia vun a, hong vawtsia te atu in thungetsak vun.
LUK 6:29 Na biang langkhat hong beang sia a langkhat ngat vet in; na laktong hong laksak sia na puanlum a lak tu zong khak heak in.
LUK 6:30 Na tungah hong ngen peuma pia in; taciang na van a la sia zong ngenkik heak in.
LUK 6:31 Na tungah ngualdang i vawttu na dei bang in, amate tungah vawt vun.
LUK 6:32 Banghangziam cile no hong it te bek na it uh le, bang lungdam kotak na nei tu uh ziam? banghangziam cile mawnei te zong amate a itte it uh hi.
LUK 6:33 No tungah thupha vawt te tung ah, thupha na vawt uh le, bang lungdam kotak na nei tu uh ziam? banghangziam cile mawnei te zong in tabangma in vawt uh hi.
LUK 6:34 Hong lo kik tu hi, ci na lamet uh te tung bek ah na puk uh le, bang lungdam kotak na nei uh ziam? banghangziam cile mawnei te zong in a puk uh za nga kik tu a hile, a dang mawnei te tungah puk uh hi.
LUK 6:35 Ahihang note in, na ngal te it vun a, amate tungah phatna vawt vun, pukthak vun a, nga kik tu in lamen heak vun; taciang na thaman uh lian mama tu a, a Sangbel i tate hi tu nu hi: banghangziam cile Ama sia lungdam ko thei ngawl te le miphangawl te tungah pha hi.
LUK 6:36 Tua ahikom na Pa uh sia ngual hesuak thei a hibangma in, note zong hesuakna nei tavun.
LUK 6:37 Ngual dang thukhen heak vun, taciang note zong thukhenna na thuak batu uh hi: ngualdang mawsak heak vun, taciang note zong mawsiatna na thuak buatu uh hi: ngual dang maisak vun, taciang note zong hong ki maisak tu hi:
LUK 6:38 Ngual dang te pia vun, note zong piak na hi tu uh hi; phatak a ki te, a ki hen ih-eh, a ki lok cinten, a dimlet in ngual in note kang sungah hong pia tu uh hi. Banghangziam cile ngualdang na tesak uh bangma in note zong hong tesak kik tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 6:39 Jesus in amate tungah sontena khat son a, Mittaw in mittaw lamlak thei tu ziam? a ni in dum sungah tak tu hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 6:40 Nungzui in a syapa sang in sangzaw ngawl hi: ahihang a cialcing in a sin khat sia a syapa bang hi tu hi.
LUK 6:41 Na mitsung ah thing tawnpui zong phawk ngawl in, na suapui pa mit sungah nin themno sia banghang en ni ziam?
LUK 6:42 Na mitsung a om thing tawnpui om nginge nangma le nangma ki en ngawl in, bangbang in na suapui pa kungah, na mit sungah nin themno sia hong laksak tu khi hi, ci thei tu ni ziam? A ki hitheamsak pa, na mit sung a om thing tawnpui sia vawk masa in a, tua zawkciang in na suapuipa mit sung a om nin themno sia a thiangtak in na mu thei tu a, khelsak thei tu ni hi.
LUK 6:43 Banghangziam cile thingkung pha in a phangawl nga ngei ngawl hi; thingkung phangawl zong nga pha nga ngei tuan ngawl hi.
LUK 6:44 Banghangziam cile thingkung peuma a nga pan in ki tel thei hi. Lingkung tung pan in thei min ki lo ngei ngawl a, theimiling kung pan in sapit nga ki lo ngei ngawl hi.
LUK 6:45 Mi pha in a thinsung a om na pha te pusuaksak hi; mi phangawl in a thinsung a om na phangawl te ma pusuaksak hi: banghangziam cile a thinsung pan a dimlet te a kam uh pan pau uh hi.
LUK 6:46 Ka son te nangawn seam nuam ngawl in, banghang in Topa, Topa awng, ci hong sam nu ziam?
LUK 6:47 A kuamapo in ka kungah hongpai in ka son thu te za a a seam te sia bang taw kibang ziam, ci kong lak tu hi:
LUK 6:48 Ama sia, dum thuk mama to in, suangpi tungah innbul a phut pa taw kibang hi: tui hong khang in, hawktui in tua inn sia nasiatak in nawk napi ngawk zo ngawl hi: banghangziam cile suangpi tungah innbul a phu hang a hihi.
LUK 6:49 A hizong ka son te za napi, a zui ngawl te sia innbul kip nei ngawl in leinen tungah innsa pa taw kibang hi; hawktui in nasiatak in a nawk ciang in, thakhatthu in puk a; tua inn siatna sia na sia mama hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:1 Jesus in mipi te tungah hi thu te theampo a hil zawkciang in, Capernaum khua sungah tum hi.
LUK 7:2 Tua mun ah zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa khat i a it mama a naseam pa thi dektak in na hi.
LUK 7:3 Jesus thu a zak ciang in, Judah upa te sawl a, Jesus pai in a naseam pa damsak tu in ngen hi.
LUK 7:4 Amate Jesus kung a thet uh ciang in, hanciam in thum uh a, ama atu vawtsak tak mama hi:
LUK 7:5 Banghangziam cile ama in ka minam uh it a, synagogue zong hong saksak hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 7:6 Jesus amate taw hongpai hi. Tua inn a thet dektak uh ciang in, zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in a lawmte Jesus kungah sawl a, Topa, nangma tatak ngim ki pia heak in: banghangziam cile, Nangma vateak ka innsung dong nong pai tu sia kei kiphu ngawl khi hi:
LUK 7:7 Tua ahikom na kungah keima kong pai tu zong ka ki phu bua hi, ci ngaisun khi hi: ahihang kamkhat pau po le te, ka naseam pa dam tu hi.
LUK 7:8 Banghangziam cile keima zong thuneina nuai ah ka om hi, ka nuai ah ngalkap te nei khi hi, taciang khat kungah pai in, ka cile pai hi; taciang a dang khat kungah, hongpai tan, ka cile hongpai hi; taciang ka naseam khat kungah zong, hisia seam in, ka cile seam hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:9 Jesus in hi thu a zak ciang in, lamdangsa hi, Ama hong kihei in, a zui te kungah, Note tungah kong son hi, Israel mite sungah zong hibangza a lian upna mu ngei ngawl lai khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:10 A paisak te inn ah hong heakkik a, a dam ngawl a naseam pa a dam sa in mu hi.
LUK 7:11 A zingciang in, Nain a kici khua ah Jesus pai a; a nungzui tampi te le mi tampi te zong pai uh hi.
LUK 7:12 Khuapi tumna kongpi a thet uh ciang, mithi khat hong pua uh a, ama sia a nu i tapa neisun a hihi: taciang khuasung ah mi tampi te sia meingong nu kungah om hi.
LUK 7:13 Topa in tua nu a mu ciang in, a tungah hesuakna nei a, Kap heak in, ci hi.
LUK 7:14 Jesus hongpai a, mithikuang tham hi: taciang a pua te tawlnga hi. Taciang Jesus in, Tangvalpa, tho in, hong ci khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:15 Mithi hong tho to a, hong pau hi. Jesus in a nu kungah ap kik hi.
LUK 7:16 A vekpi tungah launa hong theng a, eite sungah kamsang lian hong piang hi; Pathian in a mite hong ve hi, ci in Pathian pok uh hi.
LUK 7:17 Jesus thu sia Judah ngamsung theampo le a kiim a pam ah thang hi.
LUK 7:18 John i nungzui te in hi thu teng ama tungah son uh hi.
LUK 7:19 Tasiaciang John in a zungzui te ni sam a, Jesus kungah paisak in, Nangma sia hongpai tu pa ni ziam? a hibale a dang ngak lai tu khu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 7:20 Amate Jesus kung a thet uh ciang in, tuiphumpa John in, na kungah hongpaisak hi, Nangma sia hongpai tu pa na hi ziam? a hibale a dang ngak lai tu khu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 7:21 Tuahun laitak in Jesus in mi tampi te natna a tatuam, nat sia tatuam le doai ngilo vei te damsak a, mittaw tampi te zong khuamusak hi.
LUK 7:22 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pai tavun a, na mu uh le na zak uh te John kung son vun; bangbang in mittaw te in khuamu thei, peangbai te lampai thei, miphak te thiang, nangong te khuaza thei, mithi te thokik a, mizawng te tungah lungdamna thu ki pualak zo hi.
LUK 7:23 A kuamapo Keima hang in uplakna a nei ngawl te thuphatoai a hihi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 7:24 John i kamtaite a pai zawk uh ciang in, Jesus in mite tungah John thu son kipan a, Duisung ah bang en tu in pai nu ziam? Hui i seam phaikung ngawk ziam?
LUK 7:25 Bang en tu in pai nu ziam? Puan neam hoi nano sil mu nuam nu ziam? en vun, puan neam nano sil in nuntak nuam mamate kumpi innsung ah a omte hi.
LUK 7:26 Bang en tu in pai nu ziam? Kamsang ziam? hi hi, a man tatak kong ci ciang, kamsang bek domngawl hi.
LUK 7:27 Banghangziam cile, en vun, ka kamtai pa na mai ah ka sawl hi, ama in na mai pan in na lampi hong puakholsak tu hi, ci ama thu sonkhol hi.
LUK 7:28 Banghangziam cile keima in kong ci hi, numei sungsuak theampo sungpan tuiphumpa John sang in a lianzaw kuama om ngawl hi: ahihang vantung kumpingam sungah a nobel sia nangawn John sang in lianzaw lai hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:29 Tua thu a za te theampo le siadong te in, Pathian sia thuman hi, ci in pualak uh hi, amate sia John i tuiphumna a piak te a hi uh hi.
LUK 7:30 Ahihang Pharisee te le thukhamhil te in amate langpan in Pathian i ngaisut nate nial uh hi, amate sia John i tuiphumna a piak te hi ngawl hi.
LUK 7:31 Topa in, Tu hun mihing te bang taw sonte tu khi ziam? taciang amate bang taw kibang uh ziam?
LUK 7:32 Amate sia sumbuk ah a to patang te taw kibang hi, amate khat le khat ki biakpui uh a, tamngai kong tum uh hang lam nuam ngawl nu hi, katap kong law uh hang, kap nuam tuan ngawl nu hi,
LUK 7:33 Banghangziam cile, tuiphumpa John sia anluum ne ngawl sapittui dawn ngawl in hongpai ciang, note in doai vei hi, na ci uh hi.
LUK 7:34 Mihing Tapa sia ne le dawn in hongpai ciang; note in, en vun, an tuang pa, sapittui tuang pa, siadong te le mawnei te i lawmpa, na ci uh hi.
LUK 7:35 Ahihang ciimna in a tate mawsiatna pan suatak hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:36 Pharisee khat in Jesus taw an ne khawm nuam hi. Taciang Jesus sia Pharisee te inn ah pai in, anne tu in to hi.
LUK 7:37 Taciang, en vun, tua khua ah mawnei numei khat om a, Jesus sia Pharisee pa inn ah anne tu in to hi, ci a heak ciang in, alabaster sathau namtui thawl khat keng hi,
LUK 7:38 Jesus i nung, a peang kungah kap a, Jesus i peang a thitui taw silsak hi, taciang a sam taw nawlsak a, a nap zawkciang in sathau namtui buak hi.
LUK 7:39 Tabang a vawt Jesus a sam Pharisee pa in amu ciang, a thinsung pan in, hisia pa kamsang a hile, ama a tham sia bangbang numei ziam, ci he tu hi: banghangziam cile tua numei nu sia mawnei hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:40 Jesus in ama zo kik a, Simon awng, kong son nop khat om hi, ci hi. Taciang ama in, syapa awng, hong son tan, ci hi.
LUK 7:41 Jesus in, Dangka pukthak khat om a, leiba nei ni om hi: khat in dangka za nga ba a, a dang khat sia in sawm nga ba hi.
LUK 7:42 Amate in a lokik zawk ngawl uh hu in, a ni ma in maisak hi. Tua ahikom tua te ni sungah kua in dangka pukthak pa itzaw tu ziam, hong son tan? ci hi.
LUK 7:43 Simon in, dangka tamzaw a maisak pa in itzaw tu in ngaisun khi hi, ci in zo kik hi. Taciang Jesus in, A man in thukhen ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:44 Numeinu sangah kiheikik a, Simon kungah, Hi numei nu na mu ziam? Na innsung ah hong tum ka hihang, ka peang sil natu tui nong pia bua hi; ahihang hi numei nu in ka peang a thitui taw hong silsak a, a sam taw hong nawlsak hi.
LUK 7:45 Nang in hong nam ngawl ni hi, ahihang hi numei nu a hile kong tum pan kipan ka peang tawlnga ngawl in nam hi.
LUK 7:46 Nang ka lu zong sathau hong buak ngawl ni hi: ahihang hi numei nu in ka peang sathau namtui hong buak hi.
LUK 7:47 Tua ahikom hong son khi hi, a mawna tam mamate ki maisak zo ahikom a itna zong tam hi: ahihang tawmbek a ki maisak te in tawm bek it hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:48 Jesus in numei nu tung ah, Na mawna te ki maisak zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 7:49 Anneak na mun ah a tote in, mawna a maisak sia kua ziam? ci in amate thinsung pan in ci uh hi.
LUK 7:50 Jesus in numei nu tung ah, na upna in hong ngum zo hi; thinnuam in pai in, ci hi.
LUK 8:1 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus sia Pathian kumpingam lungdamna thupha son tu in khuapi le khua no sangah nungzui sawmleni te taw pai hi,
LUK 8:2 Taciang natna a tatuam le doai ngilo vei na pan a damsak numei te, tua numei te sungah, a sung pan doai sali a hawlkhiatsak Mary magdalene,
LUK 8:3 Herod i neisa keam Chuza i zi Joanna, Susanna le a dang tampi te in amate neisa te taw Jesus ou uh hi.
LUK 8:4 Khua tatuam pan in mi tampi te Jesus kungah hong ki kaikhop ciang in, thu sontena son a:
LUK 8:5 Thaici poai khat thaici poai tu in pai hi: a poai ciang in, pawlkhat te lamlai ah tak hi; tate sia ki sikcil lel a, van a leang vacim te in ne siat hi.
LUK 8:6 Pawlkhat te suang tungah tak a; a po zawkpociang ngawtak pai hi, banghangziam cile lei hing ngawl hang a hihi.
LUK 8:7 Thaici pawlkhat te lingphung sungah tak hi; ling te taw khangkhawm a, ling te in deapcip hi.
LUK 8:8 A dang te leipha na mun ah tak a, po in a se zakhat in khang hi. Taciang hi thu te a son zawkciang in, Zak natu bil nei theampo in za ta uh hen, ci au hi.
LUK 8:9 Taciang a nungzui te in, hi sontena a khiakna bang ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 8:10 Jesus in, Pathian kumpingam thuku te heak thei na note tungah hong ki pia zo hi: ahihang ngualdang te tungah sontena te bek taw ki son tu hi; en napi mu ngawl tu uh hi, ngai na pi tel tuan ngawl tu uh hi.
LUK 8:11 Hi sontena sia hibang a hihi: thaici sia Pathian kammal a hihi.
LUK 8:12 Lampi ah a tak thaici sia Pathian kammal za napi, um in ngupna a nga thei ngawl natu in, doaimangpa hongpai a amate thinsung pan in Pathian kammal te laksak siat hi.
LUK 8:13 Suang tungah a tak thaici te sia, Pathian kammal za a, lungdam in sang napi, zung a nei ngawl hang in tawmvei sung um a, ze-etna hun ciang pukkik pai hi.
LUK 8:14 Lingphung sung a tak thaici te sia, Pathian kammal za napi, leitung thinngimna, hauna le lungkimna te in deap cip a, nga pha nga zo ngawl hi.
LUK 8:15 Ahihang leipha na a tak thaici te sia, Pathian kammal a zak uh ciang in, thinsung pha le thuman taw Pathian kammal za a, keamcing ahikom thuakna taw nga pha a nga te a hihi.
LUK 8:16 Kuama in khuaimei a det uh ciang in khum taw sin ngei ngawl a, lupna nuai ah zong koi ngei ngawl hi; ahihang innsung a tum te in a vaangtang a mu thei natu in meidet na munsang ah koi hi.
LUK 8:17 Banghangziam cile a kilang ngawl tu in sealcip thei om ngawl a; heak ngawl tu le ki thethang ngawl tu in phual thei na zong om ngawl hi.
LUK 8:18 Tua ahikom na thu zak uh te kidawm vun, banghangziam cile a kuamapo a nei te ki pia tu a; a nei ngawl khatpo zong a nei bang in a ngaisut te ki laksak vet lai tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 8:19 Jesus a nu le a suapui te hongpai uh ahihang, mi tamlei ahikom a kungah pai thei ngawl hi.
LUK 8:20 Mi khat in Jesus kungah, na nu le na suapui te nangma taw ki mu nuam in a puasang ah ding hi, ci in son hi.
LUK 8:21 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian thu ngai in, a seam te sia ka nu le ka suapui te a hi uh hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 8:22 Nikhat Jesus a nungzui te taw ngunkuang sungah to uh a: amate tung ah, Tuili ngalkhat ah pai tawng, ci hi. Taciang ngunkuang taw pai tek uh hi.
LUK 8:23 Ahihang ngunkuang taw a pai uh laitak in Jesus mu hi: tuili tungah huipi suangval hong va hi; taciang ngunkuang sungah tuidim in, a lauhuai mama dinmun hong theng hi.
LUK 8:24 Nungzui te Jesus kung pai in phong a, Topa, Topa, bo cip khu hi, ci uh hi. Jesus hong tho a, huipi le tuihual te tei hi: taciang amate thim uh a, dai dide hi.
LUK 8:25 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na upna uh koisung ziam? ci hi. Taciang amate lau le lamdangsa in, hisia pa sia bangbang mihing ziam! banghangziam cile ama in huipi le tui te thupia a, a thu ni uh hi, ci in khat le khat kikum uh hi.
LUK 8:26 Taciang amate Galilee ngalkhat, Gadarenes ngam ah hong theng uh hi.
LUK 8:27 Jesus tuihui ah hong kato ciang in, doai a vei zawk a ngei mama zo khat taw ki si uh hi, ama sia puansil ngawl in, inn zong om ngei ngawl a, than sung bebek ah om hi.
LUK 8:28 Jesus a mu ciang in, au a, a mai ah bok in, taciang aw ngingtak taw, Jesus, nang a sangbel Pathian Tapa, nang taw bang kisaina nei hi ziam? hong vawtsia heak in, hesuak kong ngen hi, ci hi.
LUK 8:29 Banghangziam cile Jesus in tha-nin sia mihing sung pan pusuak tu in thu pia zo hi. Tamvei mama doai ngilo in ama man hi: taciang ama sia saikhau le thikkhau taw hen uh ahihang; a hen nate bottan in, doai ngilo in duisung ah paisak hi.
LUK 8:30 Jesus in, Na min kua ziam? ci in dong hi, ama in ka min sia Legion, hi ci hi: banghangziam cile doai ngilo tam mama a sungah tum hi.
LUK 8:31 Doai ngilo te in Jesus kungah, dum thukpi sungah a hawlkhiat ngawl natu in ngen hi.
LUK 8:32 Mualtung ah vokhon tam mama anne in om hi: taciang doai ngilo te in Jesus tungah vokhon sungah tumsak natu in ngen uh a, Jesus in tumsak hi.
LUK 8:33 Tua pa sung pan in doai ngilo te pusuak a, vokhon sungah tum hi: vokhon te liang pan ki nuntaw suk in tuili sungah tuita in thi siat hi.
LUK 8:34 Vokcing te in thupiang teng a mu uh ciang, tai uh a, tua thu khuasung le khuano tatuam te ah son hi.
LUK 8:35 Tua thupiang en tu in mi tampi pusuak uh a; Jesus kungah hongpai uh hi, taciang a sung pan doai ngilo a pusuak pa nik le puan sil in, thinsung man in Jesus peang kungah a to a mu uh ciang in, lau tek mama uh hi.
LUK 8:36 Tua pa a mu uh ciang in doai ngilo vei in a thin-am pa a damkik na thu ngualdang te son uh hi.
LUK 8:37 Tasiaciang Gadarenes ngam le a kiimkot a om mihonpi theampo in amate kung pan pusuak tu in ngen uh hi; banghangziam cile amate lau mama uh hi: taciang Jesus sia ngunkuang sungah to a, cia kik hi.
LUK 8:38 A sung pan doai ngilo tampi a pusuak pa in Jesus zui tu in ngen hi: ahihang Jesus in ama paisak a,
LUK 8:39 Na inn ah cia tan a, Pathian in nangma atu in na lianpi hong vawtsak te son in, ci hi. Tua pa zong pai a, Jesus in ama atu a vawtsak na lianpi te khuapisung theampo ah tangko hi.
LUK 8:40 Jesus a heakkik ciang in, mite in lungdamtak in sang uh hi: banghangziam cile a vekpi in ama ngak tek uh hi.
LUK 8:41 Taciang, en vun Jairus a kici, synagogue lampui khat hongpai hi: taciang a inn ah pai tu in a peang ah bok in thum hi.
LUK 8:42 Banghangziam cile a tanu neisun sia kum sawm le kum ni kiim hi a, thi dektak in zau hi. Ahihang Jesus a pai ciang in ngual in phul kheukho hi.
LUK 8:43 Tuate sungah numei khat kum sawm le kum ni sung thisuak in a nei theampo syavuan te tungah zangsiat napi, kuama in damsak thei ngawl hi.
LUK 8:44 Jesus nung pan pai in, a puan mong dawn a tham pociang, a thisuak tawlnga hi.
LUK 8:45 Taciang Jesus in, Kua na hong tham nu ziam? ci hi. Mi theampo in nial uh a, Peter le a kungah a omte in, Topa awng, mihonpi in hong phul kheukho in hong neng cip hi, banghang in, kua in hong tham nu ziam ci ni ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 8:46 Jesus in, Khat in hong tham hi: banghangziam cile ka sung pan in vangletna a pusuak hunlam he khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 8:47 Numeinu in ki im thei ngawl tu hi, ci a tel ciang, huang vadil kawm in hongpai a, Jesus mai ah bok hi, mi theampo mai ah, banghang in Jesus tham ci le, thakhatthu in a dam na thu pualak hi.
LUK 8:48 Jesus in, Ka tanu awng, patau heak in: na upna in hong damsak zo hi; thinnuamtak in cia in, ci hi.
LUK 8:49 Taciang Jesus a pau laitak in, synagogue lampui pa inn pan khat hongpai a, na tanu thi zo hi; Syapa nawngkaisak nawn heak in, ci hi.
LUK 8:50 Ahihang Jesus in, tua thu za a, Lau heak in: um bek um in, taciang ama dam tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 8:51 Jesus tua inn a thet ciang in, Peter, James, John le patangno i nu le pa simngawl kuama innsung ah tumsak ngawl hi.
LUK 8:52 Mi theampo kap uh a, tua nu sia nasia tak in ka tek uh hi: ahihang Jesus in, Kap heak vun; ama thi ngawl hi, a mu hi, ci hi.
LUK 8:53 Numei no sia thi hi, ci he tek zo a hi uh man in Jesus selno in nuisan uh hi.
LUK 8:54 Jesus in a vekpi in pusuaksak siat hi, taciang numeino khut pan len in sam a, Tanu no, tho in, ci hi.
LUK 8:55 Tasiaciang a thaa hong heakkik a, thakhatthu in thokik hi: taciang Jesus in, an pia tu in thupia hi.
LUK 8:56 Taciang a nu le a pa te in lamdangsa mama hi: ahihang Jesus in a sep thu kuama tung son ngawl tu in vaitha hi.
LUK 9:1 Jesus in a nungzui sawmleni te munkhat ah sam a, doai ngilo theampo tungah ahizong, natna te damsak tu in ahizong, a vanglian thuneina pia hi.
LUK 9:2 Tabang in Pathian kumpingam thuhil tu le cina te damsak tu in paisak hi.
LUK 9:3 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na khualhaw natu uh in bangma keng heak vun, ciangkhut ahizong, thung a hizing, anluum ahizong, dangka ahizong; puansil ni ahizong in keng heak vun.
LUK 9:4 Koibang innsung ah na tum uh zong in, mundang na pai kik uh mateng tua inn ah tam nginge vun.
LUK 9:5 Khat po note hong sang ngawl te sia, tua khua pan na pusua uh ciang in, na peang uh tungah leivui te thin vun a, tate sia amate langpang in tetti te hi tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:6 A nungzui te pai uh a, khuapi khat zawkciang khat pai in lungdamna thupha tangko uh hi, taciang mun theampo ah cina te damsak hi.
LUK 9:7 Ngam uk Herod in Jesus na vawt te a zak ciang in, thin ngim mama in om uh hi, banghangziam cile pawlkhat te in John hong thokik hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 9:8 Mi pawlkhat te in, Elijah hong kilang zo hi; ci uh a, taciang ngualdang te in nidanglai kamsang te khat papo thokik hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 9:9 Herod in John i ngawng ka tan sa hi: ahihang hibang thu ka zak sia a kua ziam? ci a, mu nuam mama hi.
LUK 9:10 Sawltakte hong cia kik uh ciang in, amate vawt theampo Jesus tungah son uh hi. Jesus in amate sia senneal om na mun Bethsaida ngamsung ah a tuam in paipui hi.
LUK 9:11 Taciang mipi te in a heak uh ciang in, zui uh a, Jesus in amate sang uh hi, taciang Pathian kumpingam thuhil uh a, damna a kisam te damsak uh hi.
LUK 9:12 Ni tum tu kuan ciang in, nungzui sawmleni te Jesus kungah hongpai uh a, mihonpi te khuapi sung le a kiimkot ngam tatuam ah pai in, ngia natu mun le an zong tu in paisak in: banghangziam cile eite senneal ngam ah i om hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 9:13 Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Note in amate neak tu pia vun, ci hi. Amate in, hi mihing theampo atu pai in an lei ngawl in hileang, anluum nga le ngasa ni simngawl bangma i nei bua hi; ci uh hi.
LUK 9:14 Banghangziam cile amate sia pasal bebek tul nga kiim pha uh hi. Jesus in nungzui te tung ah, Amate sawm nga, sawm nga pawl in tosak vun, ci hi.
LUK 9:15 Tabang in a nungzui te in a sonbang in vawt uh a, a vekpi in tosak uh hi.
LUK 9:16 Taciang Jesus in anluum nga le ngasa ni la a, vanlam en in thupha a piak zawkciang, phel a, mihonpi hawm tu in nungzui te kungah pia hi.
LUK 9:17 A vekpi khamtak in a neak tek zawk uh ciang in, a neakmong a val teng tawm uh a, bawm sawm le bawm ni dim hi.
LUK 9:18 Jesus ama nguak thu a nget laitak in, a nungzui te a kungah om uh hi: taciang amate tung ah, Ngual in keima kua hong ci uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 9:19 Amate in, tuiphumpa John ci uh hi; ahihang pawlkhat te in Elijah; hong ci uh hi, a dang pawlkhat te in, nidang lai kamsang khatpo hong thokik hi, hong ci uh hi, ci in zo uh hi.
LUK 9:20 Jesus in amate tung ah, Ahizong note in kua nong ci uh ziam? ci in a dok ciang in, Peter in, Pathian i Christ na hihi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 9:21 Taciang Jesus in tua thu kuama tung son ngawl tu in thupia a, a khotak in amate vaitha hi;
LUK 9:22 Mihing Tapa in tam mama thuak hamtang tu hi, taciang upa te, thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in nial tu uh a, that tu uh hi, taciang nithum a cin ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:23 Jesus in a vekpi tung ah, A kuamapo ka nung hong zui nuam le, ama le ama ki nial hen a, ama thinglamte nisim pua in, hong zui tahen.
LUK 9:24 Banghangziam cile a kuamapo in, ama nuntakna a ngum nuam peuma sum tu a: ahihang keima atu in, a nuntakna a sum peuma nungta tu hi.
LUK 9:25 Mihing khat in leitung buppi a nei hial zong, ama nuntakna sum in bo hile, bang phattuamna om tu ziam?
LUK 9:26 Banghangziam cile, khatpo in keima le ka thu atu in a maizum le, mihing Tapa sia Ama, Pa le a thiangtho vantungmi te minthanna taw hongpai ciang in, mihing Tapa in zong ama atu maizum pui tu hi.
LUK 9:27 Ahihang, a mantak in kong ci ciang, hisung mun ah a ding pawlkhat te, Pathian kumpingam a mu uh mateng, thina tep tha ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:28 Hi thu te a son zawk ni liat ni ciang in, Peter, John le James te sam a, thungen tu in mualtung ah kato tek uh hi.
LUK 9:29 Thu a nget laitak in, Jesus a maitang meal kikheal a a puan te taang in te liang hi.
LUK 9:30 Taciang, en vun, mi ni in paupui hi, tuate sia Moses le Elijah te a hi uh hi:
LUK 9:31 Amate vangletna taw kilang a, Jerusalem ah a thinatu le a nasep a khuangkhim natu thu son uh hi.
LUK 9:32 Ahihang Peter le a kung a omte sia mutnuam mama uh a: a khuaphaw kik uhciang in, Jesus vangletna le a dinpui mi ni te mu uh hi.
LUK 9:33 Amate Jesus kung pan a pai zawk uh ciang in, Peter in Jesus kungah, Topa, hi mun ah om leang pha hi: buk thum sa tawng; khat nangma atu, khat Moses atu, khat Elijah atu, ci hi: Peter in bang son ci zong tel ngawl hi.
LUK 9:34 Tabang a pau laitak in, meingo in amate tuam a: meingo sung a tum ciang in amate lau mama uh hi.
LUK 9:35 Taciang meingo sung pan in aw khat in, hisia in ka it mama ka Tapa hi: a thu ni vun, ci hi.
LUK 9:36 Tua aw nging a bo ciang in, Jesus ama nguak bek mu uh hi. Taciang amate in hithu phualseal uh a, a mu uh thu te kuama tung a son bua uh hi.
LUK 9:37 A zingciang, amate mualtung pan a tuaksuk uh ciang in, mi tam mama in Jesus muak uh hi.
LUK 9:38 Taciang, en vun, mipi sung pan in mikhat au a, Syapa awng, ka tapa hong etsak kapo in: banghangziam cile ama sia ka neisun ka tapa hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:39 Taciang, en in, doai in man a, upmawk ngawlbul in au hi; taciang puksak a, a kam pan cilphuan te pusuak za dong in, vawtsia a, pusuak kik vacit nuam ngawl hi.
LUK 9:40 Na nungzui te i hawlkhiatsak tu in ka nget hang; hawlkhia zo ngawl uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:41 Jesus in, Maw! upna nei ngawl le lamkhial te, banghun dong note taw hong om khawm tu khi ziam? banghun dong hong maisak lai tu khi ziam? Na tapa ka kung paipui tan, ci in zo hi.
LUK 9:42 Tabang in Jesus kungah patangno hong paipui ciang, doai ngilo in puksak a, a thangui ki kaikinsak hi. Jesus in doai ngilo tei a, patang pa damsak hi, taciang a pa kungah ap kik hi.
LUK 9:43 Amate a vekpi in Pathian i vangletna lian lamdangsa tek mama uh hi. Ahihang amate in Jesus vawt te theampo te lamdang asak mama uh laitak in, Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah,
LUK 9:44 Hi ka thuhil te na bilsung uh ah tum tahen: banghangziam cile mihing Tapa sia mihing te khutsung ah ap tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:45 Ahizong a nungzui te in Jesus thuhil te a tel bua uh hi, amate kung pan in ki phualseal ahikom a tel bua uh hi: taciang a sonte zong a dong ngam bua uh hi.
LUK 9:46 Tuazawkciang in, a nungzui te amate laklaw ah, a kua lianbel tu, ci ngaisun tek uh hi.
LUK 9:47 Jesus in amate thinsung ngaisutna a heak ciang in, patang khat la a, a kungah koi hi,
LUK 9:48 Amate tung ah, Khatpo in, ka min taw hi patangno a sang peuma keima hong sang a hihi: keima hong sang peuma in keima hong sawlpa a sang a hihi: banghangziam cile note sungah, a nobel sia a lian hi tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:49 John in, Topa awng, na min taw doai ngilo te a hawlkhia khat ka mu uh a; tho khu hi, banghangziam cile kote taw hong kithawl ngawl hang hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:50 Jesus in, Tho heak vun: banghangziam cile hong langpan ngawl peuma hong hu a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 9:51 Jesus sia van a ka tu hun hong nai ciang in, Jerusalem pai tu in a maitang khosak mama hi.
LUK 9:52 A mai ah kamtai paisak khol a, amate pai hi, taciang Ama atu kinging tu in Samaria khua khat ah tum hi.
LUK 9:53 Ahihang tua khuasung mite in a sang bua uh hi, banghangziam cile a mai sia Jerusalem ah pai tu bang in a om hang a hihi.
LUK 9:54 Hi thu a nungzui te James le John in a mu uh ciang in, Topa, Elijah in a vawt bang in, van pan in mei tak suk a, amate kangsiatsak tu in thu ka piak tu uh nong oai ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 9:55 Ahihang Jesus ki hei in, amate tei hi, Bangbang thaa nei nu ziam ci zong he ngawl nu hi.
LUK 9:56 Banghangziam cile mihing Tapa sia mihing te nuntakna lalsak tu in hongpai ngawl hi, ahihang ngum tu in hongpai hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:57 Amate lampi ah a pai uh laitak in, mi khat in, Topa, na pai na mun theampo ah hong zui tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:58 Taciang Jesus in ama tung ah, Ngia te in kua nei a, van a vacim te in bu nei hi; ahihang mihing Tapa in a lu ngakna tu zong nei ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:59 Taciang a dang khat tungah Jesus in, Hong zui tan, ci hi. Ahihang ama in, Topa awng, pai in ka pa hong vuisak phot tan, ci hi.
LUK 9:60 Jesus in ama tung ah, Mithi te sia mithi te in vui tahen: ahihang nang na hile pai in a, Pathian kumpingam thuhil in, ci hi.
LUK 9:61 Midang khat in, Topa awng, hong zui tu khi hi; ahihang ka inn ah pai in, innkuanpui te nukset in vaitha masa phot tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 9:62 Jesus in ama tung ah, A kuamapo nungsang en in lo a tho peuma, Pathian kumpingam atu in man na om ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 10:1 Hiteng zawkciang in Topa in a dang sawm sali teal a, ama pai na mun tu khua le mun tatuam ah ni veu ni veu kop in paikholsak hi.
LUK 10:2 Taciang Topa in amate tung ah, Tang at tu tampi om napi, naseam tu tawm hi: tua ahikom, tang at tu Topa in naseam tu te tang at na mun ah sawl tu in thungen vun.
LUK 10:3 Pai tavun: en vun, ngia hon sungah tuuno bang in hong tha khi hi.
LUK 10:4 Dangka bawm, thung le peangdap te keng heak vun: lamkal ah ngual dang paupui heak vun.
LUK 10:5 Inn khatpo ah na tum uh ciang in, a masabel in, hi innsung ah thinnopna om tahen, ci vun.
LUK 10:6 Tua inn ah thinnopna tapa a om le, na thinnop na uh a tungah om tu hi: a om bua a hile, note tungah hong heakkik tu hi.
LUK 10:7 Tua inn ah tam nginge vun a, hongpiak po ne in, dawn vun: banghangziam cile naseam te thaman nga tu kilawm hi. Inn khat pan a dang inn khat ah kikhin heak vun.
LUK 10:8 Khua khatpo ah na tum uh ciang in, hong sang uh a hile, na mai uh ah hong lui te ne vun:
LUK 10:9 Tua khua sung a om cina te damsak vun a, amate tung ah, Pathian kumpingam hong nai zo hi, ci in hil vun.
LUK 10:10 Ahihang khuapi khatpo ah na tum uh ciang in, hong sang bua a hile, na tum na uh lampi pan ma in pusuakkik vun a,
LUK 10:11 Ka peang tung uh ah a bang leivui te cikteak sia, note langpan tu in nawl khu hi: ahihang Pathian kumpingam hong nai zo hi, ci tel thiang tavun, ci tavun.
LUK 10:12 Ahihang kong son tu hi, tua ni ciang in Sodom thuak na sia tua khuapi sang in thuak nop zaw tu hi.
LUK 10:13 Maw Chorazin! na mailam bing hi, maw Bethsaida! na mailam bing hi, banghangziam cile na sungah a ki vawt vanglian nasep te Tyre le Sidon khua ah ki vawt hile, khau-ip puan le vut sungah to in a mawna uh a ki sikkik zawk ngei zo tu hi.
LUK 10:14 Ahihang thukhenna ni ciang Tyre le Sidon sia nang sang in a thuakna uh ol zaw tu hi.
LUK 10:15 Taciang nang, Capernaum, van dong hong ki lamsang zo napi, hell sung dong in khiaksuk kik na hi tu hi.
LUK 10:16 Na thu hong ni te sia ka thu hong ni te a hi uh hi; note hong zawngsak te keima hong zawngsak a hihi; keima hong zawngsak te keima hong sawl pa zawngsak a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 10:17 Sawm sali te lungdamna taw hong heakkik uh a, Topa awng, doai ngilo te nangawn in na min hang in ka thu uh hong ni hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 10:18 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Khualeng bang in van pan Satan a taksuk ka mu hi.
LUK 10:19 En vun, ngul te le ai-kam te sikcil tu in vangletna kong pia hi, taciang ngal te vangletna theampo tungah zong vangletna kong pia hi: taciang bangma peuma in hong susia thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 10:20 Ahihang thaa te in na thu uh hong nit hu in lungdam heak vun; tua sang in na min uh vantung ah ki at zo ahikom in lungdam zaw vun, ci hi.
LUK 10:21 Tua hun laitak in Jesus sia Thaa sungah lungdam a, Maw ka Pa, lei le van Topa, mipil le mi thiam te tungah na phualseal te, patangno te tungah na pualak hu in lungdam kong ko hi: hi tahen, maw ka Pa awng; banghangziam cile na mu na ah hisia in pha hi.
LUK 10:22 Ka pa in na theampo kei hong pia zo hi: Tapa a kua ziam, ci Pa simngawl kuama in a he bua hi; taciang, Pa sia a kua ziam, ci Tapa le, ama Tapa i a pualak te bek in a he uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 10:23 Jesus a nungzui te sangah kihei a, Na mu uh thu te a mu mitte thuphatoai a hihi:
LUK 10:24 Kei kong cina pan, kamsang le kumpi tampi te in na mu uh thu te mu nuam napi, mu tha ngawl hi; na zak uh thu te za nuam napi za tha ngawl uh hi, ci a tuam in son hi.
LUK 10:25 Taciang, en vun, thukhamhil khat hong ding a, Syapa awng, tawntung nuntakna ka lua natu bang vawt tu khi ziam? ci in ze-et hi.
LUK 10:26 Jesus in ama tung ah, Thukham laibu sungah bang ki at ziam? bangbang sim ni ziam? ci hi.
LUK 10:27 Tua pa in, Topa na Pathian sia na thinsung theampo, na nuntakna theampo, na hatna theampo le na ngaisutna theampo taw it in; nangma le nangma na ki it bang in na innpam te it in, ci in zo hi.
LUK 10:28 Jesus in, Na zo na man hi: hi te vawt in a, na nungta tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 10:29 Ahihang thukhamhil pa in ama le ama ki thutangsak nuam ahikom, Jesus tung ah, ka innpam te a kua ziam? ci hi.
LUK 10:30 Tasiaciang Jesus in, Khatvei mikhat Jerusalem pan Jericho ah pai hi, phalak te taw ki si a, a nikten puansil teng sutsak in velcip hi, nasia mama in liam a, a thi dektak in nusia hi.
LUK 10:31 Thiampi khat tua lampi tawn luilam a; tua pa a mu ciang in, a langkhat pan pial in paisan hi.
LUK 10:32 Tabangma in Levi khat zong tua mun ah hongpai a, a et zawkciang in, a langkhat pan pial in paisan hi.
LUK 10:33 Ahihang Samaria mi khat, tua lampi ah khualhaw in hongpai a, tua cina pa a mu ciang in, a tungah hesuakna nei hi,
LUK 10:34 Taciang a kungah pai in, a meima te sathau le sapittui buaksak in tuamsak hi, taciang ama nganno tungah suan a, zintun inn ah paipui in khoi hi.
LUK 10:35 A zingciang a paikik tu ciang in, dangka tang ni sua a, zintun inn keampa pia hi, taciang hi sia pa na khoi in a; na bo thua na teng theampo sia, kong paikik ciang in hong pia tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 10:36 Hi te thum sung pan, phalak te taw a ki si pa i innpam sia a kua hi tu ngaisun ni ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 10:37 Thukhamhil pa in, cina pa tungah hesuakna a nei pa, ci in zo hi. Taciang Jesus in ama tung ah, Pai tan a, nang zong tabang in ngamta in, ci hi.
LUK 10:38 Jesus le a nungzui te pai uh a, khua khat ah theng uh hi; taciang Martha a kici numei khat in Jesus sia a inn ah sang hi.
LUK 10:39 Martha in Mary a kici naunu khat nei a, ama sia Jesus peang kungah to in, thu ngai hi.
LUK 10:40 Ahihang Martha sia nasep tam hu in a thintoi a, Jesus kungah pai in, Topa, ka naunu in nasep theampo keima nguak i sep tu in hong awn hi, phamaw sa ngawl ni ziam? tua ahikom keima nasep hu tu in sawl in, ci hi.
LUK 10:41 Taciang Jesus in, Martha, Martha, nang sia na tam mama thintoi le buaipui ni hi:
LUK 10:42 Ahihang a kisam tatak khat bek om hi: tasia Mary in teal zo a, kuama in ama tung pan in laksak kik thei nawn ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:1 Jesus munkhat ah thungen a, a man ciang in, a nungzui te sung pan khat in, Topa awng, John in a nungzui te a hil bang in, thunget hong hil tan, ci hi.
LUK 11:2 Jesus in amate tung ah, Thu na nget uh ciang in, hibang in ci vun, vantung a om kote pa awng, na min thiangtho ki upat tahen. Na kumpingam hong theng tahen. Vantung ah na deina a kicin bang in, leitung ah zong kicing tahen.
LUK 11:3 Ka nisim an uh, ni khat zawk ni khat hong pia tan.
LUK 11:4 Ngual mawna te ka maisak uh bangma in; kote mawna te zong hong maisak ta in. Ze-etna sungah hong paipui heak in; siatna sung pan hong hun ta in, ci hi.
LUK 11:5 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Note sungah khatpo in lawmtam nei tu a, zanlai tak a inn ah pai in, ka lawm awng, anluum thum hong puk hi tan;
LUK 11:6 Banghangziam cile ka lawmte a khualkhaw na mun pan in ka kungah hongtheng a, bangma piak tu nei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:7 Taciang a lawmpa in innsung pan in, hong nawngkaisak heak in: innkha zong ka khak zo a, ka tate zong ka kung lupna tungah om hi; tho in hong pia thei ngawl tu khi hi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 11:8 Hong ci khi hi, lawmtam a hi hang in tho in pia tuan ngawl hi, ahihang maizum ngawl in a nget hamtang hang in, tho tu a, a kisap theampo pia tu hi.
LUK 11:9 Keima in kong ci hi, ngen vun, hong ki pia tu hi; zong vun, na mu tu uh hi; king vun, note atu in hong ki hon tu hi.
LUK 11:10 Banghangziam cile a ngen peuma in nga tu a; a zong peuma in mu tu hi; taciang a king te atu ki hon tu hi.
LUK 11:11 Note sungah pa khatpo, a tapa in anluum ngen le, suangtum a pia tu ziam? a hibale ngasa ngen le, tua ngasa tang in ngul a pia tu ziam?
LUK 11:12 A hibale, aktui ngen le, ai-kam a pia tu ziam?
LUK 11:13 Note mi phangawl te hi napi, na tate uh tungah letsong pha te bangbang in pia tu, ci na he uh le: vantung a om na Pa uh in a ngente tungah Tha Thiangtho bangzata in hong pia zawkan tu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 11:14 Jesus in a pau thei ngawl pa sung pan doai ngilo khat hawlkhia hi. Doai ngilo a pusua ciang in, tua a pau thei ngawl pa hong pau hi; taciang midang te in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
LUK 11:15 Ahihang pawlkhat te in, doai ngilo te i topa Beelzabub vang taw in Ama in doai ngilo te hawlkhia hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 11:16 A dang te in Jesus ze-et uh a, van pan musakna te ngen hi.
LUK 11:17 Ahihang Jesus in amate ngaisutna te he a, Ngam khat sia ki khen in a ki langpan uh le, siatna sung theng tu hi; taciang inn khatpo zong ki khen in a ki langpan uh le puk tu hi.
LUK 11:18 Satan sia ama le ama ki khen in a ki langpan le, bangbang in a kumpingam kho thei tu ziam? banghangziam cile note in Beelzebub vang taw doai ngilo te hawlkhia hi, hong ci nu hi.
LUK 11:19 Taciang Beelzebub vang taw in doai ngilo te hawlkhia ka hile, na tate uh in a kua vang taw in hawlkhia uh ziam? tua ahikom amate sia note i thukhen te a hi uh hi.
LUK 11:20 Ahihang Pathian khutma taw doai ngilo te hawlkhia ka hile, note tungah Pathian kumpingam hong theng a hihi, ci thu uplak natu om ngawl hi.
LUK 11:21 A thahat mama pa khat in a innpi huang sia ngalhiam taw a cin ciang in, a neisa te bit tu hi:
LUK 11:22 Ahihang ama sang a hat zaw khat hongpai in, a zo le, a muan mama a ngalhiam theampo laksak siat in, a sutol van te khen in hawm siat tu hi.
LUK 11:23 Keima taw a om ngawl te sia ka ngal hi a, kei taw a kaikhawm ngawl peuma a thethang te a hihi.
LUK 11:24 Tha-nin khat sia mi khat sung pan a pusua ciang in, tawlngak natu zong in kongaw ngam tatuam ah vak a; a mu ngawl ciang in, ka pusua na mun ka inn ah heakkik tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:25 A thet ciang in, a inn sia mun ki phiat sa le a ki pua sa in mu hi.
LUK 11:26 Tuazawkciang in paikik a, ama sang a sia zaw a dang thaa sali kaizawn thua hi; taciang tua mun ah tum in om khawm uh hi: taciang tua pa i om dan sia a masa sang in law mawk zaw hi.
LUK 11:27 Jesus in hi thu te a hil laitak in, mipi te sung pan numei khat in, au kawm in Jesus kungah, nangma hongpai ngil le na tawp noaimuk sia thuphatoai a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 11:28 Ahizong Jesus in, Hi hi, tasia sang in Pathian thu za a, a zuite thuphatoai zaw lai hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:29 Mitampi te a hon a hon in hong ki kaikhop uh ciang in, Jesus in, Hi mi phangawl suan te in musakna zong uh ahihang; kamsang Jonah musakna simngawl a dang ki pia ngawl tu hi.
LUK 11:30 Banghangziam cile Jonah sia Nineveh mite atu in, musakna a hibangma in, mihing Tapa sia hi suan le pal te atu in musakna hi tu hi.
LUK 11:31 Thukhenna ni ciang in, thangsang kumpinu hong ding tu a, amate mawsak tu hi: banghangzima cile kumpipa Solomon ciimna ngai tu in leitung mong vateak pan in hongpai hi; en vun, hi mun ah Solomon sang a lian zaw om hi.
LUK 11:32 Thukhenna ni ciang in Nineveh mite hi suan le pal te taw ding tu uh a, mawsak tu uh hi: banghangziam cile amate in Jonah thuhilna a zak uh ciang in maw ki sikkik uh hi; en vun, ziak ah Jonah sang a lianzaw om hi.
LUK 11:33 Kuama in khuaimei a det uh ciang in a bulia na ah koi ngei ngawl hi, khum nuai ah zong koi ngei ngawl hi, a sungtang te in khuavak a mu thei natu in meidetna munsang tungah koi hi.
LUK 11:34 Mit sia pumpi atu in khuavak a hihi: tua ahikom na mit a ciim le, na pumpi theampo taang siat tu hi; ahihang na mit a pha bua le, na pumpi mial siat tu hi.
LUK 11:35 Tua ahikom na sung uh ah khuavak sia a mial ngawl natu in kidawm vun.
LUK 11:36 Tua ahikom na pumpi theampo sia khuavak taw kidim in, a mial na mun a om bua a hile, a tang khuaimei in nangma khuavak hongpiak bang in, na pumpi theampo in khuavak taw dim tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:37 Jesus thu a hil zawkciang, Pharisee khat in annekhawm tu in ngen hi: taciang tum uh a, anne tu in to uh hi.
LUK 11:38 Jesus nitak an a neak uh ma khut sil masa ngawl ci Pharisee pa in a mu ciang in lamdangsa hi.
LUK 11:39 Taciang Topa in ama tung ah, Tu in no Pharisee te, na hai uh le na kuang uh te a puasang bek sil nu hi; ahihang na sungsang uh sia ngual van suttol nopna le ngitlo na taw kidim hi.
LUK 11:40 No a mawmaw te, a puasang a vawt pa in a sungsang zong vawt hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 11:41 Ahihang na nei uh taw kizui in mizawng te huna pia zaw vun; taciang, en vun, na theampo sia note atu in thiang hi.
LUK 11:42 Ahihang Pharisee te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile lenmui le ante tatuam te, se sawm sua se khat pia na hi uh hang, Pathian i itna le thukhenna te kalvol siat nu hi: tabang te na vawt tu uh te hi zaw a, vawt ngawl in na nusiat thong tu uh hi ngawl hi.
LUK 11:43 Pharisee te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile synagogue sungah a sangbel tokhum te le sumbuk ah paupui tu na dei uh hi.
LUK 11:44 Thukhamhil le Pharisee te, a ki hitheamsak te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile note sia a ki lang ngawl than taw na kibang uh hi, taciang than tungah a vak te in a om hunlam zong a he bua uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:45 Tasiaciang thukhamhil te sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, hibang na pau sia koma nong zawnsak na hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:46 Jesus in, Thukhamhil te zong, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile puakzawk ngawl vanngit ngual tungah suan nu hi, taciang note in na khutme dawn taw zong, tua vanngit thutha nuam ngawl nu hi.
LUK 11:47 Na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile na pu le pa te i thalup kamsang te i than note in na sa uh hi.
LUK 11:48 A mantak in na pu le pa te i sep teng na lung uh kim hi, ci kilangsak nu hi: banghangziam cile na pu na pa te in kamsang te that takpi uh a, note in a than na sa uh hi.
LUK 11:49 Tua ahikom Pathian ciimna in amate tung ah, kamsang te le sawltakte ka sawl tu hi, pawlkhat te amate in that in vawtsia tu uh hi:
LUK 11:50 Tua kamsang theampo te i thisan, leitung ki bitphua pan kipan a luang theampo, hi minam te tungah ka siik tu hi;
LUK 11:51 Abel thisan pan kipan biaktau le biakinn kikal a a bo Zacharias i thisan dong in: a mantak kong ci ciang, hi minam tungah ki ngen tu hi.
LUK 11:52 Thukhamhil te, na mailam uh bing hi! banghangziam cile heakna tawtang na la zo uh a: note zong tum ngawl in, a tum tu te zong khak nu hi, ci hi.
LUK 11:53 Jesus in hi thu te amate tungah a hil ciang in, thukhamhil te le Pharisee te a thin uh uk mama uh a, thu tampi hil tu in dong uh hi:
LUK 11:54 A kam pau na pan, Ama mawsiat thei natu in a paukhial tu encik uh hi.
LUK 12:1 Tua laitak in simzawk ngawl za dong in mihonpi hong ki kaikhawm kheukho uh a, khat le khat a ki phul ngawp liang uh laitak in, Jesus in a nungzui te kungah amasabel in, Pharisee te tol a kici ki hitheamsak nate kidawm vun.
LUK 12:2 Banghangziam cile a kilang ngawl tu in a ki sincip thei a om ngawl bangma in; heak ngawl tu in a ki phualcip thei zong om ngawl hi.
LUK 12:3 Tua ahikom khuazing sungah na son theampo uh khuavak sungah ki za tu hi; inndoi sung bil kung vacin pan na son uh te innkhum tung pan ki tangko tu hi.
LUK 12:4 Ka lawmte awng hong son khi hi, pumpi that in, tua zawkciang bangma a law thei nawn ngawl te lau heak vun.
LUK 12:5 Ahihang na lau tu uh te kidop na kong pia khol tu hi: a thalup zawkciang hell sungah a khia thei sia na lau vun; hi hi, keima in kong son hi, lau vun.
LUK 12:6 Tonbawm nga ciang dangkasan pia ni taw ki zuak hi, tua te khat zong Pathian in mangil ngawl hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 12:7 Ahihang na lu tung uh a samzam te nangawn simsiat sa a hihi. Tua ahikom lau heak vun: note sia tonbawm tam mama sang in manphazaw nu hi.
LUK 12:8 Keima in kong ci hi, a kuamapo mipi mai ah hong pualak sia, mihing Tapa in Pathian i vantungmi te mai ah ama zong pualak tu hi:
LUK 12:9 Ahihang mipi mai ah kei hong nial te Pathian i vantungmi te mai ah ka nial tu hi.
LUK 12:10 A kuamapo in mihing Tapa langpan in a pau sia, ki maisak tu hi: ahihang a kuamapo Tha Thiangtho a sonsia peuma, ki maisak ngawl tu hi.
LUK 12:11 Synagogue sungah ahizong, ngam uk te le thunei te mai ah hong ki paipui ciang in, bangbang in, a hibale, bangbang zo kik tu, a hibale bang pau tu, ci in ngaisun heak vun:
LUK 12:12 Banghangziam cile Tha Thiangtho in hong hil tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:13 Mipi sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, ka suapuipa in ngamh hong khen natu in hong sonsak tan, ci hi.
LUK 12:14 Taciang Jesus in, Pasal pa awng, note tungah a kua in thukhen tu le ngamh khensak tu in hong vawt ziam? ci hi.
LUK 12:15 Tasiaciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Duhopna kidawm vum: banghangziam cile mihing khat i nuntakna sia a dimlet a nei le a lam sungah ki hel ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:16 Jesus in amate tungah sontena khat son a, Mihau pa khat om a, a lo sung pan in an tam mama piang hi.
LUK 12:17 Tasiaciang a thinsung pan in, an khol natu inndoi nei ngawl ka hikom, bangbang hi tu khi ziam? ci in ngaisun hi.
LUK 12:18 Tua ahikom, hibangin ka vawt tu hi: ka ansal ka phel siat tu a, a lianzaw in ka sa tu hi; tua mun ah ka an le van te theampo khol tu khi hi.
LUK 12:19 Taciang ka thaa tung ah, Maw ka thaa awng, kum tampi atu kholsa van le na tam mama nei ni hi; suaktatak in, ne in a, dawn in, a nuam mama in om in, ka ci tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:20 Ahihang Pathian in ama tung ah, nang a mawmaw pa, tuzan mama in na thaa la tu khi hi: taciang na khol sa van theampo sia akua in lua tu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 12:21 Tasia bangma in ama atu neisa khol a, Pathian sungah a hau ngawl peuma, hi mihau pa taw kibang hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:22 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Tua ahikom kong ci hi, na nuntakna atu in na kisap uh an le tui; na pumpi atu sil le ten atu in thintoi heak vun.
LUK 12:23 An sang in nuntakna, puansil sang in pumpi thupi zaw hi.
LUK 12:24 Va-ak te nuntak na en vun: banghangziam cile amate thaici ciing ngawl a, tang zong at ngawl hi; ansal zong nei ngawl hi; ahihang Pathian in vak hi: note sia vacimno te sang in bangza in thupi zaw nu ziam?
LUK 12:25 Note sungah a kua in thintoi na taw a khan tongkhat belap thei tu ziam?
LUK 12:26 Hi a nobel nangawn vawt thei ngawl na hi uh le, banghang a dang te thintoi nu ziam?
LUK 12:27 Duisung ah unok pak te bangbang in khang, ci ngaisun pak vun, naseam ngawl hi, khauzong hual ngawl hi; Keima in kong ci hi, Solomon in a minthanna theampo taw a kipua ciang in, hi pak khat zong ban zo ngawl lai hi.
LUK 12:28 Tuni po a, zingciang vawk in a ki hal tu lolai ah lopa te nangawn Pathian in zeam a hile, tuate sang in note hong zeam zaw mama tu hi ngawl ziam, no upna no te?
LUK 12:29 Na neak tu uh le na dawn tu uh te zong heak vun, uplakna thinsung zong nei heak vun.
LUK 12:30 Banghangziam cile hibang te leitung minam theampo te in zong peu uh hi; hibang nate kisam nu hi, ci na Pa uh in hong he hi.
LUK 12:31 Ahihang note Pathian kumpingam zong zaw vun; tua hile hibang na theampo hong pia thua tu hi.
LUK 12:32 Lau heak vun, tuuhon tawm no te awng; banghangziam cile note kumpingam piak tu sia na Pa uh i deina a hihi.
LUK 12:33 Na neisa uh te zuak vun a, mizawng te hu na pia vun; a nget le a lui thei ngawl te note atu in khol vun, na neisa te uh a bo thei ngawl na mun, nguta te a thet thei ngawl na mun le nget i neak thei ngawl na mun vantung ah khol vun.
LUK 12:34 Banghangziam cile na neisa uh om na mun ah na thinsung uh zong om tu hi.
LUK 12:35 Na kawng uh kawngkhau thua vun, na meivak uh tangsak vun;
LUK 12:36 Note mopoai pan in a topa hong theng a; kongkha hong kik pociang, hon pai tu in a ngak nginge te bang hi tavun.
LUK 12:37 A topa a thet ciang in ama ngak nginge in a mu naseam te thuphatoai a hihi: a tatak kong ci ciang, a topa ama vateak in a kawngkhau kil in, a naseam te an ne tu in tosak tu a, amate an lui tu hi.
LUK 12:38 Nai ni ciang ziam, nai thum ciang ziam, a topa hongpai a hile, ama ngak nginge in a mu, a naseam te thuphatoai a hihi.
LUK 12:39 Nguta hongpai tu hun, innteakpa in he hile, a inn cing nginge tu a, nguta i inn phulsak thuak ngawl tu hi.
LUK 12:40 Tua ahikom ki ngingsa in om vun: banghangziam cile mihing Tap na ki ngin ngawl uh laitak in hongpai tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:41 Peter in, Topa awng, hi thu sontena koma atu nong son ni ziam maw, a hibale mi theampo atu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 12:42 Topa in, A topa in ama innkuanpui te a hun a cin ciang in amate i tel tek neak tu a pia thei lampui koi tu a, a muantak le a ciim neisa keampa sia a kua ziam?
LUK 12:43 A topa hongpai ciang in, na a sep laitak a mu, naseam pa thuphatoai a hihi.
LUK 12:44 A tatak ka ciciang, tua naseam pa sia a topa in a nei theampo keam in koi tu hi.
LUK 12:45 Ahizong naseam khat in a thinsung pan in, ka topa hongpai pai ngawllai tu hi, ci ngai sun a; naseam dang numei le pasal ci ngawl in vel tu hi, taciang ne le dawn tu a, zukham in om tu hi;
LUK 12:46 Tua naseam pa in a upmawk ngawl ni le a ki ngin ngawl hun laitak in a topa hongpai tu a, tua naseam pa sia a topa in nasiatak in velcip tu hi, taciang thu um ngawl te taw ama ngatu a tel teng koisak tu hi.
LUK 12:47 Tua naseam in a topa dei na he nginge napi, vawtkhol ngawl in a topa deina bang in seam ngawl hi, tua naseam pa sia nasia mama in a liam dong vatcip tu hi.
LUK 12:48 Ahihang topa deina a heak ngawl hu in, a vawt te nasiatak liamna thuak tak napi, tawmbek liam in vat tu hi. Banghangziam cile khatpo tungah tam mama a pia a hile, ama tungah tam mama ki ngen kik tu hi: taciang mitampi a ap le, tampi ma ki ngen kik tu hi.
LUK 12:49 Leitung ah mei kuangsak tu in kongpai hi; taciang a kuang zo bang hi zen thong le, bangza in uk khi ziam?
LUK 12:50 Ahihang thuak tu baptisma khat nei khi hi; tasia ka vawt ma teng ka thin nuam thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 12:51 Leitung ah kilemna pia tu in hongpai hi, ci hong ngaisun nu ziam? hong ci khi hi, tabang hi ngawl hi; kikhenna tu in hongpai zaw khi hi:
LUK 12:52 Banghangziam cile tu pan kipan in inn khat sungah mihing nga a omte ki khen tu a, thum te a dang ni te in langpan tu hi, taciang ni te a dang thum te in langpan tu hi.
LUK 12:53 A pa in a tapa taw ki khen in ki langpan tu a, a tapa in zong a pa langpan kik tu hi; a nu in a tanu langpan tu a, a tanu in zong a nu langpan tu hi; a nu in a mo langpan tu a, a mo in zong a tonupi langpan tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 12:54 Jesus in mipi te tung ah, Nitum na sang pan mei hong kai ciang in, ngua zu tu hi, na ci thei pai uh a; zu takpi hi.
LUK 12:55 Thangsang pan in hui hong va le, khualum tu hi, na ci uh a; lum takpi hi.
LUK 12:56 No a ki hitheamsak te, van le lei pan in khuahun he thei nu hi; ahihang banghang in, tu hun paizia tel thei ngawl nu ziam?
LUK 12:57 Hi hi, banghang in thu man khat sia thukhen ngawl nu ziam?
LUK 12:58 Mihing khat in zum hong then le, zum na thet uh ma lamkal ah, a kung pan na suatak thei natu hanciam in; tabang na hi bale, thukhen pa kungah hong ap tu a, thukhen pa in palik te kungah hong ap in, palik te in thong hong taksak tu hi.
LUK 12:59 Na liausum na piaksiat mateng, thonginn sung pan in suakta ngawl tu ni hi, ci in kong son hi, ci hi.
LUK 13:1 Taciang Pilate in amate biakpiakna taw Galilee te thisan hel hi, ci in Jesus kungah a son pawlkhat om hi.
LUK 13:2 Jesus in amate tungah hibang in zo hi, Hi Galilee mite sia tabang a thuak uh hu in, a dang Galilee mite theampo sang in mawzaw uh hi, ci in ngaisun nu ziam?
LUK 13:3 Kong ci hi, hi ngawl hi: ahihang noma zong na ki sikkik bua uh le, na vekpi in tabangma in na lalcip tu uh hi.
LUK 13:4 Siloam tausang cim in hukcip a, a thi sawm le liat te, Jerusalem a teang ngualdang te sang in mawzaw uh hi, ci in ngaisun nu ziam?
LUK 13:5 Kong son hi, hi ngawl hi: ahihang note zong na ki sikkik bua uh le, na vekpi in tabangma in na lalcip tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 13:6 Jesus in hi sontena zong son hi; Mi khat in a sapit huan sungah theikung khat suan hi; taciang a nga zong tu in hongpai a, khat zong mu ngawl hi.
LUK 13:7 Taciang in sapit huan cing te tung ah, en in, hi theikung tungah a nga zong tu in ka pai a, kum thum sung khat zong mu ngawl khi hi: phuk lel in; banghang in leitang deap lel in koi tu hi ziam? ci hi.
LUK 13:8 Huan cing pa in, Topa awng, tu kum sung om hi lai po hen, a kiim teng pan lei taw tu khi hi, taciang eaklei pia phot hi lai tu khi hi:
LUK 13:9 Hong nga a hile, pha hi: taciang hong nga bua a hi le tua zawkciang phuk in, ci hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 13:10 Jesus sabbath ni khat synagogue khat sungah thuhil hi.
LUK 13:11 Taciang, en vun, cinasak doai in kum sawm le kum liat sung zawngkhal in a thaneamsak numei khat om hi, taciang ama sia a cing zong bawng a, bangbang po in a om zong ama le ama ki mamsak thei ngawl hi.
LUK 13:12 Tua nu Jesus in a mu ciang in, a kungah sam a, Nu mei awng, na natna pan in na suakta zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 13:13 Jesus in a tungah a khut nga hi: ta sia pociang thakhat thu in ding tang thei a, Pathian pok hi.
LUK 13:14 Jesus in sabbath ni in a damsak hu in, synagogue lampui pa a thin-uk a, ni luk sung nasep tu sia a ngeina hi: tua ahikom tua ni luk sung in hongpai tavun, sabbath ni in hongpai heak vun, ci hi.
LUK 13:15 Tasiaciang in Topa in, Nang a ki hitheamsak pa, note sungah khatpo, sabbath ni in na khui uh a hibale, na laa uh a khau sut in, tui dawn tu in paipui hi ngawl nu ziam?
LUK 13:16 Kum sawm le kum liat sung Satan hencip, Abraham tanu sia tua a ki hencip napan sabbath ni in suatak tu hi ngawl ziam? ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 13:17 Hi teng a son zawkciang in, a ngal te theampo maizum in om uh hi: taciang Jesus in a vawt nalamdang te hang in mi theampo lungdam uh hi.
LUK 13:18 Jesus in, Pathian kumpingam sia bangtaw kibang ziam? bangtaw sonte tu khi ziam?
LUK 13:19 Mi khat in ankamci la a, huansung ah a poai taw kibang hi; tua anci hong khang a, thingkung lianpui hong suak hi; a bak te tungah van a vacim te ngiak hi.
LUK 13:20 Jesus in son thua kik a, Pathian kumpingam sia bangtaw sonte tu khi ziam? ci kik hi.
LUK 13:21 Nupi khat in tol la a, an hui law thum sungah hel hi, tua tol in an hui theampo a thosak taw kibang hi.
LUK 13:22 Jesus Jerusalem sangah pai a, khuapi le khuano tampi ah pai in thuhil hi.
LUK 13:23 Khat hongpai a, Topa awng, ngupna a nga tu mihing tawmbek a hi ziam? ci in dong hi. Tasiaciang Jesus in,
LUK 13:24 Kongkha ciak na pan tum tu in hanciam vun: banghangziam cile mihing tampi te tum tu hanciam napi, a tum thei bua uh hi.
LUK 13:25 Innteakpa topa sia khat vei tho a, kongkha a kha zawkciang in, note a puasang ah ding in kongkha na king uh a, Topa, Topa awng, kong hong hon tan; na ci uh ciang in, Topa in, koisung pan hongpai nu ziam, hong he ngei ngawl khi hi, hong ci tu hi:
LUK 13:26 Tasiaciang in, note in, na mai ah an ne tui dawn in om khu hi, taciang ka lampi uh ah zong thuhil ni hi, ci tu uh hi.
LUK 13:27 Ahihang ama in, hong son khi hi, kong pan hongpai nu ziam, hong he ngawl khi hi; no na phangawl seam te, ka kung pan tai tavun, ci tu hi.
LUK 13:28 Abraham, Isaac, Jacob le kamsang theampo te sia Pathian kumpingam sungah na mu uh ciang in, note a puasang ah hong vawk tu a, tua mun ah kaana le ha ngoaina om tu hi.
LUK 13:29 Amate nisua na sang, nitum na sang, sak le thang pan in hongpai tu uh a, Pathian kumpingam sungah to tek tu uh hi.
LUK 13:30 Taciang, en vun, a khakbel te masabel tu a, a masabel te nungkhakbel tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 13:31 Tua ni in Pharisee pawlkhat te Jesus kungah hongpai uh a, hi mun pan pusuak in a, pai in: banghangziam cile Herod in hong that tu hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 13:32 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Pai tavun a, tua ngia tungah son vun, en in, doai te hawlkhia khi hi, taciang tuni le zingciang cina te damsak khi hi, taciang nithum na ciang in ka cialcing tu hi.
LUK 13:33 Ahihang tu ni, zingciang le thai ciang vak hamtang tu khi hi: banghangziam cile kamsang khat sia Jerusalem puasang ah lalcip thei ngawl hi.
LUK 13:34 Maw Jerusalem, Jerusalem awng, kamsang te na that a, na tungah a ki sawl te suangtum taw na deang hi; akpui in a note a tha nuai ah a uap bang in, tamvei mama hong uap nuam ka hi hang, na uk bua hi!
LUK 13:35 En vun, na inn uh dap khipkhep in ki nusia tu hi: a mantak kong ci ciang, Topa min taw hongpai pa thuphatoai a hihi, na ci uh mateng, note in hong mu nawn ngawl tu nu hi, ci hi.
LUK 14:1 Sabbath ni khat Jesus Pharisee upa te sung pan khat i inn ah anne tu a pai ciang in midang te in encik uh hi.
LUK 14:2 Taciang, en vun, a khut le a peang a tum pasal khat Jesus mai ah om hi.
LUK 14:3 Jesus in thukhamhil te le Pharisee te, Sabbath ni in cina damsak sia ngeina a hi ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 14:4 Tasiaciang in amate pau ngawl in om uh hi. Taciang Jesus in cina pa len in damsak a, ciasak hi;
LUK 14:5 Jesus in amate tung ah, Note sung pan khatpo in a laa a hibale, a khui dumsung tak bang hile, sabbath ni in kai kik tu a, a pusua ngawl tu na om uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 14:6 Amate in hi thu zong bangma a zo kik thei bua uh hi.
LUK 14:7 A ki sam leangna te in to na phabel te teal uh hi, ci a mu ciang in; amate tungah sontena khat son hi,
LUK 14:8 Khat po in mopoai ah hong sap ciang in, a sangbel indoi sungah to heak in; nang sang in a zatak huai zaw a sam a hile;
LUK 14:9 Nang hong sam sia hongpai tu a, ama na to na pial in; hong ci le, a niambel inndoi sung na to suk tu na maizum tu hi.
LUK 14:10 Ahihang ngual in hong sap ciang in, a niambel inndoi ah pai in to in; taciang nang hong sam te hongpai ciang in, lawm awng, a sang zaw ah ka to in, hong ci tu hi: taciang in na an kuang umpui te mai ah zatakna na nga tu hi.
LUK 14:11 Banghangziam cile a kuamapo ama le ama a ki lamsang peuma ki khiasuk tu a; ama le ama a ki niamkhiak peuma ki lamsang tu hi.
LUK 14:12 Jesus in a sam pa tung zong ah, Zing an ahizong, nitak an ahizong, na vawt ciang in, na ngualtam, na suapui, mealheak, mihau innpam te sam heak in; tabang in na sam a hile amate in nangma hong sam thuk kik tu a, hong lo kik tu hi.
LUK 14:13 Ahihang poai na vawt ciang in, mizawng, pumpi cing ngawl, peangbai le mittaw te sam in:
LUK 14:14 Taciang nangma in thupha na sang tu hi; banghangziam cile amate in hong thukkik zo ngawl tu hi: mi thutang te thawkik na ni ciang hong thukkik tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 14:15 Anneak poai ah a ankuang umpui sung pan khat in, hi thu te a zak ciang in, Pathian kumpingam sungah anluum a ne tu te thuphatoai a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 14:16 Jesus in tua pa tungah hibang in son hi, Mi khat in poai lian mama khat vawt a, khual tam mama hil hi:
LUK 14:17 Nitak an neak hun ciang in a naseam te sawl a, a hil sa uh te kungah, Pai tavun; banghangziam cile tu in na theampo ki nginsa hi zo hi, ci in sonsak hi.
LUK 14:18 A sap te theampo ki tuiton tak in kamzong tek uh hi. A masabel khat in lo ciing khat ka lei a, pai in ka et kul tu hi: hong telthiam tan, ci hi.
LUK 14:19 A dang khat in, kuital kap nga ka lei a, pai in tuate ki sinsak nuam khi hi: hong telthiam tan, ci hi.
LUK 14:20 A dang khat in, zi ka nei a, hongpai thei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 14:21 Naseampa a topa kungah pai kik a, thu theampo son hi. Taciang innteakpa a thin-uk a, manlang in khuasung lampi le lamzin teng ah pai tan a, mizawng, pumpi cing ngawl, peangbai le mittaw te hong paipui tan, ci hi.
LUK 14:22 Naseam pa in, Topa awng, na thupiak bang in vawt zo khi hi, ahihang mun awng lai hi, ci hi.
LUK 14:23 Taciang a topa in naseam pa kungah, lamzikpi le daipam teng ah pai tan a, ka inn a dim thei natu, hongpai hamtang natu in sam in, ci hi.
LUK 14:24 Banghangziam cile, keima in hong ci khi hi, kasap te khat zong in ka nitak an tep ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 14:25 Mihon tampi te in a nung pan zui uh hi: taciang Jesus amate sang kihei a,
LUK 14:26 Mi khatpo ka kung hongpai in, a nu le a pa, a zi le a ta te, a suapui, a nau nu te le ama nuntakna zong a ensan bale, ka nungzui hi thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 14:27 A kuamapo in ama thinglamte pua in ka nung pan hong zui ngawl peuma, ka nungzui hi thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 14:28 Banghangziam cile note sung pan khatpo in, tausangsak tu a sawm le, a man dong a cing tu le a cing ngawl tu to masa in aman tuat tu hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 14:29 Tabang tuat masa ngawl in, khuambul a phu zawkciang, a man dong a sa bale, a mu theampo in selno tu a,
LUK 14:30 Hisia pa in tausang sa napi, manzo ngawl hi, ci tu uh hi.
LUK 14:31 A hibale kumpi khat in, a dang kumpi khat taw ki sim tu a hile, ama do tu in ngalkap tul kul taw hongpai sia, ngalkap tul sawm taw do thei tu le do thei ngawl tu, ci sia to in thu ngaisun masa ngawl tu ziam?
LUK 14:32 A do thei bua tu le, kumpi dangkhat kungah, a khuala lai in kilemna vawt tu in, palai paisak tu hi.
LUK 14:33 Tabangma in, note sungah a kuamapo in a neisa theampo a nusia bua a hile, ka nungzui hi thei ngawl tu hi.
LUK 14:34 Ci sia pha hi: ahihang a al na a bo le, bangbang in al kiksak thei tu ziam?
LUK 14:35 Leitang atu le phangawl, eaklei zong kizang thei ngawl hi; ahizong mihing te in a puasang ah vawk hi. Zak natu bil a nei theampo in za tahen, ci hi.
LUK 15:1 Siadong te le mawnei te Jesus thu ngai tu in a kungah hongpai tek uh hi.
LUK 15:2 Taciang, hisia pa in mawnei te sang a, amate taw an ne khawm hi, ci Pharisee te le thukhamhil te phun uh hi.
LUK 15:3 Taciang Jesus in hi sontena amate tungah son hi.
LUK 15:4 Note sungah khatpo in, tuu zakhat nei a, khat bo a hile, sawm kua le kua teng duisung ah nusia in, a bo tuu a mu dong zong tu hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 15:5 A mu ciang in, lungdam in a liangko mual suan hi.
LUK 15:6 Inn a thet ciang in, a lawm te le innpam te samkhawm tek a, hong lungdampui tavun; banghangziam cile a bo ka tuu mukik khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:7 Keima in kong son hi, tasia bangma in, mawna kisikkik ngawl mihing sawm kua le kua te sang in, mawna a ki sikkik khat tung ah, vantung ah lungdamna tamzaw tu hi.
LUK 15:8 A hibale, numei khat in dangka pia sawm nei a, pia khat a bosua le, khuaimei de in, a inn phiat tu a, hanciam in a mu dong zong tu hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 15:9 A mu ciang in, a lawm te le a innpam te samkhawm in, hong lungdam pui tavun; banghangziam cile ka bosua dangka mukik zo khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:10 Tasia bangma in, keima in kong ci hi, a ki sikkik mawnei khat tungah Pathian vantungmi te sungah lungdamna om hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:11 Jesus in hibang in ci hi, Pasal khat in tapa ni nei a:
LUK 15:12 A nozaw in a pakung ah, pa awng, ka lua tu ngamh hong pia tan, ci hi. Taciang a pa in a neisa theampo a tate ni hawmsak hi.
LUK 15:13 Ni tam ngei ngawl in a tapa nozaw in a nga teng theampo kaikhawm a, ngam khuala mama ah khualhaw hi, taciang a neisa theampo a ukbang in pakvawt in zang vapeak hi.
LUK 15:14 A nei theampo a zaksiat zawkciang, tua ngam ah kialpi tung a; ki tangsam mama in om hi.
LUK 15:15 Tua ngam mi khat kungah pai a, tua pa in vok an pia tu in a lo ah paisak hi.
LUK 15:16 Vok i neak be haw nangawn a khamteak in ne nuam napi: kuama in bangma pia ngawl hi.
LUK 15:17 A thin ciim ciang in, ka pa kungah a kicial naseam te bekzong an a kham in nei uh a val lai hi, kei ka hile ngilkial in mangthang tu ka hi zo hi!
LUK 15:18 Tho in, ka pa kungah pai tu khi hi, taciang ama tung ah, pa awng, vantung le na mai ah khial zo khi hi,
LUK 15:19 Na tapa ci tu zong ki phu nawn bong: na cial tawm naseam khat bang in hong koi tan, ka ci tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:20 Taciang ama hong ding a, a pa kungah pai hi. Ahihang a khuala mama kisam lai na pan, a pa in mu hi, taciang khuangaihuai sa in tai a, a ngawng pan koai in nam hi.
