LUK 15:21 Taciang, a tapa in a pa kungah, pa awng, vantung le na mai ah maw zo khi hi, na tapa ci tu zong ki phu nawn ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:22 Ahihang a pa in a naseam te kungah, puan a phabel hong la tavun a, silsak vun; a khut ah khutzungbu bulsak vun, taciang a peang ah peangdap bulsak vun:
LUK 15:23 Taciang khuino thau khat hong la tavun a, ngo vun; taciang i ne khawm tek tu a, thinnuam in i om khawm tek tu hi:
LUK 15:24 Banghangziam cile hi ka tapa sia thi hi, ahizong, nungta kik hi; bo hi kale, ki mu kik hi, ci hi. Tabang in thinnuam in om khawm tek uh hi.
LUK 15:25 Tu in a tapa lianzaw lo ah om hi: lo pan hong cia a, inn nai a thet ciang in lasa le lapna aw nging te za hi.
LUK 15:26 Taciang naseam khat sam a, hi thu te a bangthu ziam, ci dong hi.
LUK 15:27 Tua naseam pa in, na naupa hong cia a; cidam ludam in hong thengkik ahikom, na pa in khuino a thau khat ngaw hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:28 A tapa lianzaw sia a thin-uk ahikom, innsung zong tum nuam ngawl hi: tua ahikom a pa pusuak a, innsung ah tum tu in tho hi.
LUK 15:29 A pa hibang in zo hi, en in, kum tam mama na na seam khi hi, na thupiak bangma hun peal ngei ngawl khi hi: ahihang ka lawm te taw thinnuam khawm tu in, kealno khat zong hong pia ngei ngawl ni hi:
LUK 15:30 Ahihang hina tapa, pumpi kizuak te taw na neisa theampo hong sut pa hong cia pociang in, khuino thau ngaw ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 15:31 Taciang a pa in ama tung ah, ka tapa awng, nang sia keima taw om tawntung ni hi, taciang ka neisa theampo sia nangma' a hihi.
LUK 15:32 Ahihang na naupa sia, thi napi, nungta kik hi; bo napi, tu in mu kik khi hi, tua ahikom thinnop na le lungdamna ka vawt tu ki lawm hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:1 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Mihau khat om a, neisa keam tu khat nei hi; tua pa in na neisa teng bo thongsak siat hi, ci in a topa tungah ki mawsiat hi.
LUK 16:2 Taciang a topa in sam a ama tung ah, na thu ka zak te bangbang ziam? ka van na kep teng sazian hong pia tan; banghangziam cile ka neisa keam hi nawn ngawl tu ni hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:3 Tasiaciang in neisa keam pa in, ka topa in ka nasep pan hong tawlngasak tu a hi ciang in, bang vawt tu khi ziam? lo le ka tho thei bua a; khutdaw ngen tu le ka maizum hi.
LUK 16:4 Neisa keam dinmun pan hong tawlngaksak ciang in, amate inn ah hong san thei natu in ka vawt tu ka he hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:5 Tua ahikom a topa kungah leiba nei te theampo sam a, a masabel pa kungah, ka topa tung bangza ba ni ziam? ci hi.
LUK 16:6 Tua pa in, sathau pheal zakhat, ci hi. Taciang neisa keam pa in, na sazian la tan a, a manlang in to in, taciang pheal sawm nga ci at in, ci hi.
LUK 16:7 A dang khat kungah, nang e, bangza ba ni ziam? ci hi. Ama in, zungtang hui ip zakhat, ci hi. Taciang neisa keam pa in, na sazian la tan a, ip sawm liat ci at in, ci hi.
LUK 16:8 Hi a thuman ngawl neisa keampa in thimtheltak in a vawt nate a topa in pok hi: banghangziam cile, leitung mihing te sia amate hun sung, khuavak tate sang in lupil zaw uh hi.
LUK 16:9 Keima in kong ci hi, note hileitung pan na pusua uh ciang in tawntung omna biakbuk sungah hong sang tu na nei thei natu uh in, leitung sum le pai taw ngualtam vawt vun.
LUK 16:10 A tawmno ah a thuman peuma a tampi ah zong thuman hi: A tawmno ah a thuman ngawl peuma a tampi tungah zong thuman ngawl hi.
LUK 16:11 Tua ahikom a kip ngawl neisa tungah thuman ngawl na hi uh le, a kua in hauna tatak hong ap ngam tu ziam?
LUK 16:12 Ngual dang neisa tung nangawn ah thuman ngawl na hi uh le, noma nei tu in a kua in hong pia ngam tu ziam?
LUK 16:13 Mihing khat in to ni na seam thei ngawl tu hi: banghangziam cile khat ensan tu a, a dang khat it tu hi; khat beal tu a, a dang khat ngaingon tu hi. Note in Pathian le nei le lam naseam hi khawm thei ngawl tu nu hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:14 A duhop Pharisee te in hi thu te theampo a zak uh ciang in, Jesus selno in nui uh hi.
LUK 16:15 Tasiaciang in Jesus in amate tungah hibang in ci hi, Note in mihing te mai ah noma le noma ki thutangsak nu hi; ahihang Pathian in na thinsung uh hong he hi: banghangziam cile mihing te sungah a sang mama in a ki ngaisun te, Pathian mai ah lipkhap huai mama hi.
LUK 16:16 John hong thet dong thukham le kamsang thu te om hi: tua hun pan kipan Pathian kumpingam thu pualak uh a, mi theampo phul in tum uh hi.
LUK 16:17 Thukham sungah a nobel a bawk no khat sang in, van le lei a bo tu ol zaw lai hi.
LUK 16:18 A kuamapo a zi khul a, zi dang a nei sia, palngul mawna vawt a hihi: taciang a pasal in a khul numei a tenpui sia zong palngul mawna vawt ma a hihi.
LUK 16:19 Mi hau khat om a, puan sannum le puan neamno a pha mama sil in, nisim nuamsa in nungta hi:
LUK 16:20 Taciang a pumpi tung theampo meima taw a dim, Lazarus a kici khutdaw ngen khat om a, mi hau pa kongbiang ah ngual in koi hi.
LUK 16:21 Mihaupa sabuai pan a tak anneng te ne nuam in om a, ui hongpai in a meima te liasak hi.
LUK 16:22 Khutdaw ngen pa thi a, vantung mite in Abraham kang sungah paipui hi: taciang, mihaupa zong thi a, phum hi;
LUK 16:23 Taciang a ngim thuak na hell sung pan a tungsang a et ciang in, a khuala mama na ah Abraham mu hi, taciang a kangsung ah Lazarus om hi.
LUK 16:24 Mihaupa au in, ka pa Abraham awng, hong hesuak kapo in, hi meikuang sungah ngim na thuak kahikom Lazarus in a khutzung dawn tuisung ah papsuk in, ka lei hong votsak natu in sawl in, ci hi.
LUK 16:25 Ahihang Abraham in, ka tapa awng, na nuntaksung a pha theampo sang zo ni hi, tabangma in Lazarus sia a phangawl teng sang hi: ahizong tu in ama sia henepna nga zo a, nang na hile ngimna na thuak hi, ci phawk in.
LUK 16:26 Hiteng theampo bek domngawl, kote le nangma ki laklaw ah luam lian mama om hi: tua ahikom hi mun pan in na kungah ki pai thei ngawl a, nangma kung pan zong ko kung ki pai thei ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:27 Tasiaciang in mihaupa in, tua a hi ciang, ka pa Abraham awng, Lazarus sia ka pa inn ah paisak tu in hong ngen khi hi:
LUK 16:28 Banghangziam cile, suapui nga nei lai khi hi; hi ngimna sungah hong thet ngawl natu uh in Lazarus in amate tungah tettipang tahen, ci hi.
LUK 16:29 Abraham in, amate in Moses le kamsang te nei hi; tuate thu ngai tahen, ci hi.
LUK 16:30 Taciang in mihaupa in, hi ngawl hi, ka pa Abraham awng: mithi te sung pan in khat amate kungah pai a hile, amate ki sikkik tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 16:31 Abraham in ama kungah, Moses le kamsang te thu a ngai nuam bua a hile, khatpo thina pan a thokik hial zong in ngai nuam tuan ngawl tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 17:1 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Mawna sungah puk le khial thak ngawl tu sia suak thei ngawl hi: ahihang tabang a thengsak sia a mailam bing hi!
LUK 17:2 Patang no khat khialsak tu sang in, a ngawng ah an ngoaina suang khit in, tuipi sungah ki khiasuk le, ama atu in phazaw hi.
LUK 17:3 Noma le noma kidawm vun: na suapui pa na tungah hong khial le, tei in; a ki sikkik a hile, maisak in.
LUK 17:4 Na tungah ni khat sung sali vei dong hong khial a, na tungah sali vei dong hongpai in, kisik khi hi, hong cile, maisak in, ci hi.
LUK 17:5 Sawltakte in, Topa tung ah, ka upna uh hong khangsak tan, ci uh hi.
LUK 17:6 Taciang Topa in, Note in ankamci cia upna nei le uh te, hi theikung mun ah, na bul pan kilong in, tuipi sungah ki phut in; ci le uh te, na thu hong ni tu hi.
LUK 17:7 Ahihang note sungah khatpo in, lo tho, a hibale tuucing naseam khat nei in, tua naseampa lo pan hong cia pociang, pai in a, anne tu in to in, ci a kua in ci tu nu ziam?
LUK 17:8 Ka an neak tu hong vawtkholsak tan a, an hong thuk tan, ka neak ka dawn man dong hong ngak tan, tua zawkciang in ne in a, dawn kik in; ci tu hi ngawl ziam?
LUK 17:9 Naseam pa in thupiak teng a vawt siat zawkciang a topa in lungdam a ko tu ziam? Ko tu um ngawl khi hi.
LUK 17:10 Tabangma in, note zong thupiak theampo na vawt siat zawk uh ciang, kote sia phattuam na nei ngawl naseam te ka hi uh hi, ka sep tu nasep a seam bekma khu hi, ci tavun, ci hi.
LUK 17:11 Jesus Jerusalem a pai uh a, Samaria le Galilee ngamngi tawn in pai hi.
LUK 17:12 Khua khat sungah a tum uh ciang in, miphak sawm te taw kisi a, a khuala na ah ding in:
LUK 17:13 Jesus, Topa awng, hong hesuak tan, ci in a nging tatak in au uh hi.
LUK 17:14 Jesus in amate a mu ciang in, Pai tavun a, thiampi te kungah noma le noma ki lak tavun, ci hi. Amate a pai uh laitak in, a vekpi in thiangtho siat uh hi.
LUK 17:15 Amate sung pan khat in damzo khi hi, ci a mu ciang in, heakkik a, aw ngingtak taw Pathian pok hi,
LUK 17:16 Taciang Jesus peang ah bok a, lungdam ko hi: ama sia Samaria mi a hihi.
LUK 17:17 Jesus in, Mihing sawm ki thiangsak hi ngawl ziam? Ahihang a dang kua te, koisung ah om ziam?
LUK 17:18 Hi ngamdang mi simngawl Pathian pok tu in a heakkik mu ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 17:19 Taciang in Jesus in, Tho in a, pai in: na upna in hong damsak zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 17:20 Pharisee te in, Pathian kumpingam sia banghun ciang hong theng tu ziam? ci in Jesus dong uh hi, Jesus in, Pathian kumpingam sia mit taw mu thei in hong theng ngawl tu hi:
LUK 17:21 Hi mun ah en vun! a hibale, zesung ah en vun! ci in kuama in hong ci ngawl tu hi, banghangziam cile, en vun, Pathian kumpingam sia note sungah om hi, ci hi.
LUK 17:22 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Mihing Tapa ni sia, nikhat sung bek zong na mu nop mama uh hun hong theng tu hi, ahihang mu tha ngawl tu nu hi.
LUK 17:23 Note tung ah, hi mun ah en vun; a hibale, zesung ah en vun, hong ci tu uh hi: tabang te nung pan zui tha heak vun.
LUK 17:24 Banghangziam cile, khualeng sia, van mong khat pan mong khat dong a tang bang in, mihing Tapa ni zong tabangma hi tu hi.
LUK 17:25 Ahizong a masabel in ama in nasiatak thuak tu a, tu hun mihing te in nial tu uh hi.
LUK 17:26 Noah hunlai bangma in mihing Tapa hun ciang zong tabangma hi tu hi.
LUK 17:27 Noah tembaw sung tum a, tuiliim in mi theampo a bocip siat dong, amate ne le dawn, mopui motha in om tek uh hi.
LUK 17:28 Tasia bangma in Lot hun lai zong amate ne le dawn, van zuak, thingkung cing le inn sa in om tek uh hi;
LUK 17:29 Ahihang Lot sia Sodom khua pan a pusua ni ciang in, van pan mei le kat sia ngua bang in zu a, a vekpi in susia siat hi.
LUK 17:30 Mihing Tapa hong ki pualak ni ciang zong tabangma hi tu hi.
LUK 17:31 Tua ni ciang in, innkhum tung a om te, innsung ah van la tu in tuaksuk nawn heak hen: lo ah a omte zong inn ah ciakik nawn heak hen.
LUK 17:32 Lot i zi na phawk tavun.
LUK 17:33 A kuamapo ama nuntakna a hung nuam peuma a nuntakna sum tu hi; a kuamapo a ma nuntakna a sum peuma nuntakna nga tu hi.
LUK 17:34 Keima in kong ci hi, tua ni zan ciang lupna khat tungah mi ni lumkhawm tu hi; khat ki la tu a, khat ki nusia tu hi.
LUK 17:35 Numei ni an ngoai khawm tu hi; khat ki la tu a, khat ki nusia tu hi.
LUK 17:36 Pasal ni lo sungah na seam khawm tu hi; khat kila tu a, khat ki nusia tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 17:37 Ama te in, Topa, koisung hi tu ziam? ci in dong uh hi, Jesus in amate tung ah, Mithi luang om na mun theampo ah vaciik te ki kaikhawm tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 18:1 Tuazawkciang Jesus in a nungzui te tungah thinkiam ngawl a, a thunget tawntung natu a hilna in thusontena te son hi;
LUK 18:2 Khuapi khat sungah Pathian a lau ngawl, kuama zong a khual ngawl, thukhenpa khat om hi:
LUK 18:3 Tua khuapi sungah meingong khat om hi; thukhen pa kungah pai a, ka ngal pa phu hong lamsak tan, ci hi.
LUK 18:4 Thukhenpa in hun saupi sung thukhensak ngawl in om hi: ahihang a khakbel ciang ama in, keima sia Pathian kita ngawl in mihing zong kuama khual tuan ngawl ka hi hang;
LUK 18:5 Hi meingong nu in hong nawngkaisak ahikom, phu lamsak tu khi hi, tabang hibale hongpai tawntung tu a, hong nawngkaisak tawntung tu hi, ci ngaisun hi.
LUK 18:6 Topa in, A man ngawl thukhenpa son na ngai vun.
LUK 18:7 Ama sia haisang napi, Pathian in a tealsa te, sun le zan in Ama kungah a au te phu lamsak ngawl in om tu ziam?
LUK 18:8 Keima in kong ci hi, a manlangtak in phulamsak tu hi. Ahihang mihing Tapa hongpai ciang in, hi leitung ah upna a mu tu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 18:9 Jesus in, mipha khi hi, ci amate le amate ki muang mama a, ngualdang a thusimngawl te kungah hi sontena son hi:
LUK 18:10 Mihing ni thungen tu in biakinn ah pai uh hi; khat sia Pharisee hi a, a dang khat sia siadong a hihi.
LUK 18:11 Pharisee pa hong ding to a, Pathian awng, keima sia phalak te, thuman ngawl te, palngul mawna vawt te, a hibale siadong pa bang ka hi ngawl man in ka lungdam hi.
LUK 18:12 Nipi khat sung ni vei antang khi hi, ka neisa theampo sung pan se sawm sua se khat pia khi hi, ci in thungen hi.
LUK 18:13 Taciang siadongpa sia, a khuala na ah ding a, van lam zong en ngam ngawl in, a awm tum in, maw Pathian awng kei mawneipa tungah hesuakna hong nei po tan, ci hi.
LUK 18:14 Keima in kong ci hi, hisia pa sia a dang khat sia sang in thutang suana nga zaw a, a inn ah cia hi: banghangziam cile ama le ama a ki lamsang peuma khiaksuk na thuak tu a, ama le ama a ki niamkhiak peuma ki lamsang tu hi.
LUK 18:15 Amate in patang te a thamsak tu a dei uh hu in, Jesus kungah paipui uh hi: tua thu a nungzui te in a mu uh ciang in amate tei uh hi.
LUK 18:16 Ahihang Jesus in, patang te ama kungah sam a, Patangte ka kungah hongpai tahen, khak heak vun: banghangziam cile Pathian kumpingam sia hibang te atu a hihi.
LUK 18:17 A man tatak kong ci ciang, a kuamapo in Pathian kumpingam sia patangno te bang in a sang thei ngawl peuma tua kumpingam sungah tum thei ngawl tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:18 Lampui khat in Jesus kungah, Sya pha awng, tawntung nuntakna ka nga thei natu in bang vawt tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
LUK 18:19 Jesus in, Banghang in pha hong ci ni ziam? Pathian khatbek simngawl mipha dang kuama om ngawl hi.
LUK 18:20 Thupiakte na he hi, palngul mawna vawt heak in, tualthat heak in, nguta heak in, a man ngawl tetti son heak in, na pa le na nu zakta in, ci hi.
LUK 18:21 Tua tangval pa in, hite theampo sia ka nolai pan ma in ka zui sa hi zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:22 Hi thu te Jesus in a zak ciang in, a kungah, Na khat na kisam lai hi: na neisa theampo zuak in a, mizawng te hawmsak in, tua hile vantung ngam ah nei le lam na nei tu hi: taciang hongpai tan a, hong zui tan, ci hi.
LUK 18:23 Hi thu a zak ciang in khuangai mama hi: banghangziam cile ama sia mihau mama a hihi.
LUK 18:24 Jesus in a khuangai mama a mu ciang in, Mihau te Pathian kumpingam sung a tum tu bangza in haksa ziam!
LUK 18:25 Banghangziam cile mihau khat Pathian kumpingam sung a tum tu sang in, kala-uk khat phin bilvang sung a tum tu ol zaw hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:26 Tua thu a zate in, kua peuma ngupna nga thei tu ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 18:27 Jesus in, Mihing te taw a piang thei ngawl te sia, Pathian taw piang thei siat hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:28 Tuazawkciang in Peter in, en in, ka neisa uh theampo nusia in hong zui khu hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:29 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, A man tatak kong ci ciang, Pathian kumpingam atu in, a inn, a nu le a pa, a suapui, a zi, a hibale a tate a nusia peuma,
LUK 18:30 Tu hun sung in a se tampi le hongpai lai tu hun sungah tawntung nuntakna a nga ngawl tu om ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:31 Jesus in a nungzui sawmleni te ama kungah sam a, amate tung ah, En vun, Jerusalem ah i pai hi, kamsang te in mihing Tapa thu a atkholsa thu theampo tangtung tu hi.
LUK 18:32 Gentile te khutsung ah ap tu a, selno na zong thuak tu hi, vawtsiatna zong thuak tu a, cil zong phi tu uh hi:
LUK 18:33 Amate in vel tu a, that tu uh hi: taciang ni thum ni ciang tho kik tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:34 Amate in hi thu khat zong a tel bua uh hi: hi a son te sia amate kung pan ki phualseal hi, tua ahikom Jesus i son thu te khat zong a tel bua uh hi.
LUK 18:35 Jesus Jericho nai na hong thet ciang in, mittaw khat lamhui ah khutdaw ngen in to hi:
LUK 18:36 Mihonpi in a kantan thu a zak ciang in, bang thu ziam, ci in dong hi.
LUK 18:37 Amate in, Nazareth mi Jesus in hong kantan hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 18:38 Taciang ama in, Jesus, nang David Tapa awng, hong hesuak ka po in, ci au hi.
LUK 18:39 A mai a pai te in a om khipkhep natu in tei hi: ahihang, nang David Tapa awng, hong hesuak ka po in, ci a nasia seseam in au hi.
LUK 18:40 Taciang Jesus ding a, a kungah paipui tu in thupia hi: a nai ah hongpai ciang in,
LUK 18:41 Bang vawtsak tu dei ni ziam? ci in dong hi. Ama in, topa awng, khua ka mu nuam hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:42 Taciang Jesus in a kungah, Khua mu in: na upna in hong ngum zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 18:43 Thakhat thu in khuamu a, Jesus zui in Pathian min pok hi: taciang a mu te theampo in Pathian minthang pok uh hi.
LUK 19:1 Jesus Jericho khua sungah tum in kantan hi.
LUK 19:2 Taciang en vun, siadong te lampui Zacchaeus a kici khat om a, ama sia hau mama hi.
LUK 19:3 Jesus sia a kua ziam, ci mu nuam in zong napi; mihing tamlei bek domngawl ama sia a tuntom ahikom mu thei ngawl hi.
LUK 19:4 Taciang mipi te mai ah tai a, Jesus mu thei tu in theikung tungah ka to hi: banghangziam cile tua lampi ah Jesus hongpai hi.
LUK 19:5 Tua mun ah Jesus a thet ciang in, a tung ento a, Zacchaeus mu hi, taciang ama tung ah, Zacchaeus, manlangtak in tuaksuk in; banghangziam cile tuni na inn ah hong tam tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:6 Zacchaeus manlangtak in hong tuaksuk a, lungdamtak in Jesus a sang hi.
LUK 19:7 Tua thu amate in a heak uh ciang in, a vekpi in phun uh a, hisia pa sia mawnei pa inn ah leangna hi tu in pai hi, ci tek uh hi.
LUK 19:8 Tasiaciang Zacchaeus ding a, Topa kungah, en in, Topa awng, ka neisa a lang sia mizawng te pia khi hi; taciang khatpo tung pan in na khatpo a man ngawl in mawsiatna taw ka laksak a hile, a se li in lokik khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:9 Jesus in ama tung ah, Tuni hi inn sungah ngupna theng hi, banghangziam cile ama zong Abraham tapa a hihi.
LUK 19:10 Banghangziam cile mihing Tapa sia a bo te zong tu le ngum tu in hongpai hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:11 Amate in hi thu te a zak ciang in, sontena khat son thua hi, banghangziam cile ama sia Jerusalem nai zo a, mite in Pathian kumpingam sia thakhatthu in hong ki lang tu hi zo hi, ci ngaisun uh hi.
LUK 19:12 Tua ahikom hibang in ci hi, Ulian khat sia kumpipa ukna ngam a san zawkciang in hong ciakik tu in, ngam khuala mama ah khualhaw hi.
LUK 19:13 A vai din ma in a naseam te sawm sam a, dangka mina khattek ap hi, taciang, hisia taw kong thetkik mateng summet vawt tavun, ci hi.
LUK 19:14 Ahihang a ngamsung mihing tein tua ulian pa ensan uh ahikom, hisia pa sia kote hong uk tu in dei ngawl khu hi, ci in a nung pan thu vaitha uh hi.
LUK 19:15 Tuapa in kumpi ukna za a nga zawkciang hong ciakik a, sum a piak a naseam te khatsim in a summet vawt na uh pan a met bangza nga, ci he nuam in a kungah sam tu in thupia hi.
LUK 19:16 A masabel in khat hongpai a, Topa awng, dangka mina khat pan in sawm a met nga khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:17 Topa in ama tung ah, pha hi, nang, naseam pha: a no mama na tungah muantak nahikom in khuapi sawm tungah thuneina nei tan, ci hi.
LUK 19:18 A nina pa hongpai a, Topa, dangka mina khat pan in nga a met nga khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:19 Taciang Topa in ama tung ah, nang zong khuapi nga tungah thuneina nei tan, ci hi.
LUK 19:20 A dang khat hongpai a, en in, ziaksung ah na dangka mina, dial no taw tun in koi khi hi:
LUK 19:21 Banghangziam cile nangma sia a sonhak mama mihing na hi man in hong lau khi hi: na koi ngawl pi na la a, na poai ngawl pi zong na at hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:22 Taciang in a Topa in, nang naseam phangawl, nangma kampau pan in thu hong khen tu khi hi. Mihing sonhak ka hina he a, ka koi ngawl na pan la in, ka poai ngawlpi zong at, ci nong he le:
LUK 19:23 Banghang in ka sum dangka inn ah koi ngawl ni ziam, koi a hile te kong thet ciang a sum teng a met taw nga tu hi ngawl khi ziam? ci hi.
LUK 19:24 Taciang a hui ah a ding te kungah, a tung pan in dangka mina sia la vun a, dangka mina sawm a neipa pia vun, ci hi.
LUK 19:25 Ahihang amate in Topa awng, ama in dangka mina sawm nei zo hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 19:26 Note tungah kong ci hi, a neite ki pia thua tu a, a nei ngawl te a neisun po zong ki laksak belap lai tu hi.
LUK 19:27 Ahihang ka ukna a dei ngawl hibang ka ngalte ka kungah hong paipui tavun a, ka mai ah that vun, ci in Topa in ci hi.
LUK 19:28 Hi thu te a son zawkciang in, Jesus sia a nungzui te mai pan in Jerusalem ah pai hi.
LUK 19:29 Olive mual ah a om Bethphage le Bethany khua nai a thet ciang in, a nungzui ni sawl a,
LUK 19:30 Na mai ah a om khua ah pai tavun a; kuama to ngei ngawl lai laa no khat a ki khit mu tu nu hi: sut vun a, hi mun ah hong paipui tavun.
LUK 19:31 Khat po in, banghang sut nu ziam? ci hong dong le, Topa in tulmaw hi, ci vun, ci hi.
LUK 19:32 A sawl te pai uh a, Jesus in amate tungah a sonkhol bang in mu uh hi.
LUK 19:33 Laano a sut uh laitak in, a neite in amate tung ah, banghang laano sut nu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 19:34 Amate in, Topa in tulmaw hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 19:35 Taciang Jesus kungah hong paipui uh a: laano tungah puan pha in, Jesus suanto uh hi.
LUK 19:36 Jesus a pai kawm in, lampi ah puan te pha uh hi.
LUK 19:37 Olive mualtung pan tuaksuk natu a nai ciang in, nungzui mihonpi theampo in a vanglian nasep te mu uh ahikom, aw ngingtak taw lungdamtak in Pathian pok uh a;
LUK 19:38 Topa min taw hongpai Kumpipa thuphatoai tahen: vantung ah nopna om tahen a, a sangbel na mun ah vangletna om tahen, ci in au tek uh hi.
LUK 19:39 Mihonpi sung a om Pharisee te in Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, na nungzui te tei in, ci uh hi.
LUK 19:40 Jesus in, Keima in kong ci hi, hi te om khipkhep a hile suangtum te thakhatthu in au tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 19:41 Jerusalem nai na hong thet ciang in, tua khuapi en in, kap a,
LUK 19:42 Thinnuam in na om thei natu, tuni in bang kisam ziam ci in he thei thong le te maw! Ahizong tua thu mu thei ngawl ni hi!
LUK 19:43 Banghangziam cile na ngal te in na kimkot pan in phunglecian bang in hong kimum uh a, kingli pan in hong pang uh hi,
LUK 19:44 Taciang nangma le na tate sia leizul in hong mon siat tu hi; taciang suangtum khat le khat a ki thuap in khe ngawl tu hi; banghangziam cile nangma hong ve tu hun na heak ngawl hang a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 19:45 Jesus biakinn sungah tum a, vanzuak te le van lei te nawtkeak siat hi;
LUK 19:46 Amate tung ah, Ka inn sia thungetna mun kici tu hi: ci ki at hi, ahihang note in nguta phalak te kua na suaksak uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 19:47 Taciang Jesus in biakinn sungah nisim in thuhil hi. Ahihang thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le upa te in Jesus that tu in zong uh hi,
LUK 19:48 Ahihang thalup thei natu lampi a mu bua uh hi: banghangziam cile mi theampo in a thuhilna phatak in ngai tek uh hi.
LUK 20:1 Ni khat Jesus biakinn sungah mipi te thuhil in lungdamna thu a son laitak, thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te upa te taw hongpai uh a,
LUK 20:2 Jesus kungah, hong son tan, hibang te bang thuneina taw vawt ni ziam? a hibale hi thuneina kua in hong pia ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 20:3 Jesus in zo kik a, Kei zong thu khat hong dong tu khi hi; hong zo tavun:
LUK 20:4 Tuiphumpa John sia, van pan ziam maw, mihing te kung pan ziam? ci hi.
LUK 20:5 Amate ngaisun khawm tek uh a, van pan hi; ci leang, ama in, banghang um ngawl nu ziam? hong ci tu.
LUK 20:6 A hi tazong, mihing te kung pan hi; ci leang zong, mihing te in suangtum taw hong sep tu hi: banghangziam cile amate in John sia kamsang hi, ci um uh hi.
LUK 20:7 Taciang amate in, koisung pan, ci hong son thei ngawl khu hi, ci in zo uh hi.
LUK 20:8 Jesus in amate tung ah, Kei zong hi te bang thuneina taw vawt, ci sia hong son ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 20:9 Tuazawkciang Jesus in mipi te hi sontena son hi; Mi khat in sapit huan sungah sapit suan a, huan naseam te thosak hi, taciang ama sia a ngei mama om tu in khual khuala ah haw hi.
LUK 20:10 A hun a cin ciang in, huan naseam te in sapit huan sungah a nga te a piak tu in, a naseam khat sawl hi: ahihang huan naseam te in a naseam pa vel uh a, a khut hawm taw tha kik hi.
LUK 20:11 Taciang naseam dang khat sawl kik leleau a, tua pa zong vel leleau hi, taciang maizumhuai tak in koi uh a, khut hawm nguak ma tha kik uh hi.
LUK 20:12 A thum na sawl kik leleau hi: taciang amate in liamsak uh a, doi pua sangah nawt uh hi.
LUK 20:13 Tuazawkciang in sapit huan nei pa in, bangbang hi tu khi ziam? Ka it ka tapa sawl a hileng, amate in a mu uh ciang zakta tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 20:14 Ahihang huan naseam te in a mu uh ciang in, kikum uh a, hi sia pa sia a ngamhlua tu pa hi: pai tavun, that tawng, taciang a ngamh teng i lua tu hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 20:15 Taciang amate in sapit huan puasang ah pusuapui in that uh hi. Tua ahikom huan neipa in amate tungah bang vawt tu ziam?
LUK 20:16 Ama hongpai tu a hi teng that in a sapit huan sia ngual dang pia tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 20:17 Jesus in amate en a, Innsa te i a nil uh suangtum sia innkhuambul hong suak hi, ci a ki atkhol thu sia bang ziam?
LUK 20:18 A kuamapo hi suang tungah a tak peuma tal tu hi, ahizong hi suang a takna te sia a vui in ki ngoai siat tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 20:19 Tua hun laitak in thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in Jesus mat tu in zong hi; banghangziam cile hi thu sontena sia amate langpan in kampau hi, ci he uh hi, taciang amate in mipi te lau hi.
LUK 20:20 Amate in Jesus pang uh a, thukan te paisak uh hi, tua thukan te sia mipha bang in ki hitheamsak a, ama kammal pan in mat tu le ngam uk za nei ulian te ap tu in sawm uh hi.
LUK 20:21 Thukan te in, Syapa awng, a man tatak in hil le kampau ci kong he uh hi, kuama doidan zong nei ngawl ni hi, Pathian i lampi sia a mantak in na hil hi:
LUK 20:22 Caesar shia pia tu khu ziam maw, pia ngawl tu khu ziam? ci in dong uh.
LUK 20:23 Ahihang Jesus in amate thin kukal na he a, Banghang hong ze-et nu ziam?
LUK 20:24 Sum tang hong lak tavun. A kua i lim le ceptena ziam? ci hi. Amate in Caesar lim le ceptena hi, ci in zo uh hi.
LUK 20:25 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Caesar neisa te Caesar pia vun a, Pathian neisa te Pathian pia vun, ci hi.
LUK 20:26 Mipi te mai ah a kammal te pan in a man thei bua uh hi: a zo kik nate lamdangsa uh a, huthe ngawl in om tek uh hi.
LUK 20:27 Thawkikna a nial Sadducee pawlkhat te Jesus kungah hongpai uh a,
LUK 20:28 Sya awng, mi khatpo sia ta nei ngawl in a thi le, a ci mit ngawl natu in a nau in a mo tenpui tahen, ci Moses in at hi.
LUK 20:29 Tua ahikom u nau sali om uh hi: a lianbel sia in zi nei a, ta nei ngawl in thi hi.
LUK 20:30 A ni na pa in tua nu tenpui a, ta nei ngawl ma in thi hi.
LUK 20:31 A thum na pa zong in tua nu tenpui hi; tabangma in a sali in tenpui uh a, ta nei ngawl in thi siat uh hi.
LUK 20:32 A khakbel ciang tua nu zong thi hi.
LUK 20:33 Tua ahikom thawkik na ni ciang tua nu sia a kua bel i zi hi tu ziam? banghangziam cile a sali in tenpui hi, ci in dong uh hi.
LUK 20:34 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi leitung mite kipui uh a, nupa tu in ki pia uh hi:
LUK 20:35 Ahihang tua leitang lua tu kilawm ci in ngaisut te le thina pan a thokik te sia kipui le nupa tu in ki piak om nawn ngawl tu hi.
LUK 20:36 Amate sia thi thei nawn ngawl tu uh hi: banghangziam cile amate sia vantungmi te bang hi tu uh a, thawkikna i tate a hi uh man in Pathian i tate a hihi.
LUK 20:37 Tu in mithi te thokik hi, ci Moses zong in lophung sungah topa, Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian le Jacob Pathian, a sap ciang in mu hi.
LUK 20:38 Banghangziam cile Pathian sia mithi te Pathian hi ngawl hi, ahihang a nungta te i Pathian a hihi: banghangziam cile mi theampo ama sungah a nungta te vive a hihi, ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 20:39 Thukhamhil pawlkhat te in, Syapa awng, na pau na pha mama hi, ci tek uh hi.
LUK 20:40 Tuazawkciang amate in thudong ngam nawn ngawl hi.
LUK 20:41 Jesus in amate tung ah, Bangbang in mihing te in Christ sia David tapa hi, ci thei uh ziam?
LUK 20:42 David ama mama in Psalm labu sungah, Topa in ka Topa tung ah,
LUK 20:43 Na ngalte na peang koi na in na vawt mateng, ka ziatsang ah to in.
LUK 20:44 Tua ahikom David in Topa, ci in sam hi, bangbang in a tapa hi thei tu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 20:45 Tuazawkciang in thu ngai te theampo i zak in a nungzui te tung ah,
LUK 20:46 Thuakhamhil te kidawm vun, amate sia puan tualpi sil in vak nuam uh a, sumbuk te ah paupuina, synagogue sungah tokhum sangbel te le poai mun ah a inndoi lianbel te dei uh hi;
LUK 20:47 Amate in meingong te inn suttol uh a, ngual mu tu in thu sau tatak ngen uh hi: tabang te in a lianzaw danpiak na thuak tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 21:1 Jesus khuadak a, sumkholna sungah mihaute i sumpi khiak mu hi.
LUK 21:2 Taciang a zawng meingong nu khat i dangka san pia ni a khiak zong mu hi.
LUK 21:3 Jesus in, A tatak kong ci ciang, hi a zawng meingong nu in ngualdang theampo sang in a tamzaw khia hi:
LUK 21:4 Banghangziam cile midang te in a dimlet a nei uh sung pan in Pathian atu a piak uh teng khia hi: ahihang hi meingong nu a hile zawng napi, a nuntak natu in a nei theampo khia hi, ci hi.
LUK 21:5 Mi pawlkhat te in biakinn sia suangtum hoi mama te le a kipia van te taw a kizep nathu a son uh ciang in,
LUK 21:6 Hi na mu uh nate, kuama in vawk ngawl napi, suangtum khat le khat a ki thuap nawn ngawl hun hong theng tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 21:7 Amate in Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, hibang te banghun ciang piang tu ziam? hibang te hong pian tu ciang in bangbang musakna om tu ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
LUK 21:8 Jesus in, Ngual i theam na hi ngawl natu uh in kidawm vun: banghangziam cile mi tampi te keima min taw hongpai tu uh a, keima in Christ ka hihi; a hun hong nai zo hi, ci tu uh hi: hi kamale amate zui heak vun.
LUK 21:9 Ahihang ngal ki do na le tualngal thu te na zak uh ciang in lau heak vun: banghangziam cile hibang te hong piang masa hamtang tu hi; ahizong a tawpna hong theng pai ngawl lai tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 21:10 Tuazawkciang amate tung ah, Minam khat le namkhat, kumpi ngam khat le khat ki langpan tu hi:
LUK 21:11 Mun tatuam te ah a nasia mama zinling tu a, kial le pul te hong tung tu hi; vantung ah a kimu thei a lauhuai te le musakna tatuam te hong om tu hi.
LUK 21:12 Ahizong hite theampo a pian ma in, amate in hong man tu uh a, hong vawtsia in synagogue le thonginn ah hong ap tu uh hi, keima min hang in kumpi te le ngam uk te mai ah hong then tu uh hi.
LUK 21:13 Tasia sia note atu tettipanna hong suak tu hi.
LUK 21:14 Tua ahikom note i thin sungah, bangbang in zo tu, ci ngaisun khol heak vun:
LUK 21:15 Banghangziam cile na ngalte theampo i hong nial zawk ngawl tu le hong nal zawk ngawl tu in pau thiam nale ciimna kong pia tu hi.
LUK 21:16 Na nu le na pa, na suapui, na mealheak le na lawmte in hong zuak tu uh hi; pawlkhat te thi tu ciangdong in hong then tu uh hi.
LUK 21:17 Keima min hang in mi theampo in hong ensan tu uh hi.
LUK 21:18 Ahihang na lutung samzam khat zong sumsi ngawl tu hi.
LUK 21:19 Na thuakzawkna uh sungah nuntakna na nei tu uh hi.
LUK 21:20 Jerusalem sia ngalkap te in a kimum na mu uh ciang in, siatsuana hong nai zo hi, ci na tel tu uh hi.
LUK 21:21 Tua hun ciang in Judah ngam a omte mual tungah tai tahen; khuasung ah a omte khuapua ah pusuak tahen; duisung ah a omte khuasung ah tum heak tahen.
LUK 21:22 Banghangziam cile tua hun sia phu lak ni hi tu hi, ci a ki atkhol theampo tangtun natu a hihi.
LUK 21:23 Ahihang tua hun laitak in naupai te le nausen noailuai lai nei te mailam bing tu hi! banghangziam cile Judah ngam ah haksatna lianpi theng tu a, Judah minam te tungah Pathian thin-ukna theng tu hi.
LUK 21:24 Amate namsau taw puk tu uh a, ngam theampo ah sal in ki kai tu hi: Jerusalem sia Gentile te hun a bo dong Gentile te in sik tu uh hi.
LUK 21:25 Ni le tha le aksite tungah musakna te hong om tu a; leitung minam theampo tungah thinngimna le dipkuatna hong theng tu hi; tuipi le tuihual te hawk tu hi;
LUK 21:26 Leitung ah a theng tu te en in mihing te thin sia lau na hang in but thi in puk tu uh hi: banghangziam cile vantung vangletna te ki thiing tu hi.
LUK 21:27 Tuazawkciang in mihing Tapa sia mei tung pan in vangletna le minthanna lianpi taw hongpai amate in mu tu uh hi.
LUK 21:28 Hibang te hong thet kipat ciang in, dak in na lu tung vun; banghangziam cile note i ngupkhiatna ni hong nai zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 21:29 Jesus in amate tungah sontena khat son hi; Theikung le thingkung theampo en vun;
LUK 21:30 A te no meang hong sua ciang in khuakhal hun hong nai zo hi, ci mu in na he uh hi.
LUK 21:31 Tasia bangma in, hibang te hong thet na mu uh ciang in, Pathian kumpingam hong nai zo hi, ci he tavun.
LUK 21:32 A man tatak kong ci ciang, hi thu te theampo a tangtut mateng, hi minam bothong ngawl tu hi.
LUK 21:33 Van le lei bo tu hi: ahihang ka kammal te bo ngawl tu hi.
LUK 21:34 Note ki nging in om vun, a valkai neak le dawn hu in thinngimna le zu kham buaina, leitung nuntakna atu thintoi in na om uh le, tua ni sia muanmawkngawl het laitak in note tungah hong theng tu hi.
LUK 21:35 Banghangziam cile leitung mi theampo tungah thaang bang in hong theng tu hi.
LUK 21:36 Tua ahikom note in ngak nginge vun, hong theng tu na theampo pan a suakta tu a kilawm tu le mihing Tapa mai ah ding tu in thungen tawntung vun, ci hi.
LUK 21:37 Jesus sia sun hun sung in biakinn sungah thuhil hi; zan ciang in a puasang pusuak a, Olive mual tungah ngiak hi.
LUK 21:38 Mi theampo zingtung in a thuhilna ngai nuam in biakinn sung ama kungah hongpai uh hi.
LUK 22:1 Paisanpoai a kici, tol saw ngawl anluum poai hong nai zo hi.
LUK 22:2 Thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in Jesus bangbang in that thei tu ci in zong uh hi; banghangziam cile amate in mipi te lau uh hi.
LUK 22:3 Tuazawkciang in nungzui sawmleni sung a ki hel Iscariot a kici Judas sungah Satan tum hi.
LUK 22:4 Taciang Judah paikhia a, thiampi lian te le biakinn cing upa te taw Jesus bangbang in amate tungah zuak thei tu, ci kikum uh hi.
LUK 22:5 Amate lungdam mama uh a, dangka piak tu in lungkim uh hi.
LUK 22:6 Taciang Judas in hunpha zong a, mipi te om ngawl laitak in amate tungah zuak tu in kiciam hi.
LUK 22:7 Tol saw ngawl anluum poai ni in paisanpoai atu tuu no ngaw tu hun hong theng hi.
LUK 22:8 Taciang Jesus in Peter le John te sawl a, Pai tavun a, paisanpoai an neak khop natu vawtkhol tavun, ci hi.
LUK 22:9 Amate in koisung ah vawtkhol tu in dei ni ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 22:10 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, En vun, khuasung na tum uh ciang in tuibeal pua pasal khat taw ki si tu nu hi; a tum na mun innsung ah zui tavun.
LUK 22:11 Taciang inn nei pa kungah, Syapa in nangma kungah, ka nungzui te taw paisanpoai an ka neak natu uh inndoi koi sungah om ziam? hong ci hi, na ci tavun.
LUK 22:12 Taciang ama in inn tungah innsung van a cing in a ki koi inndoi lian mama hong lak tu a, tuaksung mun ah vawtkhol tavun, ci hi.
LUK 22:13 Amate pai uh a, Jesus in a sonkhol bang in mu uh hi: taciang paisanpoai atu vawtkhol uh hi.
LUK 22:14 A hun hong cin ciang in, Jesus sia a Sawltak sawmleni te taw to khawm tek uh hi.
LUK 22:15 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi paisanpoai sia haksatna ka thuak ma in, note taw neakkhop tu ka uk mama hi:
LUK 22:16 Banghangziam cile keima in kong ci hi, Pathian kumpingam sungah hi thu a khuangkhim mateng, hi sia ne nawn ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:17 Taciang Jesus in hai la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang, Hi sia la vun a hawmtek vun:
LUK 22:18 Banghangziam cile keima in kong ci hi, Pathian kumpingam hong thet mateng, hi sapittui dawn kik nawn ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:19 Taciang Jesus in anluum la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang, phel in amate pia hi, Hisia in note atu in kong piak ka pumpi a hihi: keima nong phaw na in vawt tavun, ci hi.
LUK 22:20 Tasia bangma in nitak an a neak zawk uh ciang hai zong la a, Hi hai sia note atu in a luang ka thisan sungah thuciam thak a hihi.
LUK 22:21 A hizong en vun, keima hong leheakpa khut sia keima taw sabuai tungah om hi.
LUK 22:22 Ciangtan sa ombang in mihing Tapa sia pai hamtang tu hi: ahizong mihing Tapa a leheak sia a mailam bing hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:23 Taciang in hibang a ngamta tu sia kua hitu ziam ci amate sungah ki dong uh hi.
LUK 22:24 A nungzui te sungah, a lianbel tu in kua kilawm tu ziam, ci ki nial na hong om hi.
LUK 22:25 Jesus in amate tung ah, Gentile kumpi te in mipi te sia to hina taw uk uh a, amate tungah thuneina a zang te sia, ngual huna pia te, kici hi.
LUK 22:26 Ahihang note tabang na hi heak vun: note sungah a lianbel sia a no zaw bang hi tahen a; a thupi bel sia in, naseam khat bang in om tahen.
LUK 22:27 A kua lian zaw ziam, An ne tu in a to sia pa lianzaw ziam maw ankuang a lui pa lianzaw ziam? A to sia pa lianzaw hi. Ahizong in note sungah kei sia ankuang luipa bangin kong om hi.
LUK 22:28 Note in ze-etna ka thuak sung theampo ah nong ompui uh hi.
LUK 22:29 Ka pa in kumpingam nasep hongpiak bangma in keima in note kong pia hi;
LUK 22:30 Ka kumpingam sungah ka sabuai pan dawn in na ne tu uh a, kumpi tokhum tungah to in Israel mi nam sawmleni te thu na khen tu uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:31 Taciang Topa in, Simon, Simon, en in, Satan in nangma hong nei nuam mama a, tang kheap bang in hong kheap nuam hi:
LUK 22:32 Ahihang na upna a puk ngawl natu in, thu hong ngetsak zo khi hi: taciang kei sang nong ki hei kik ciang in, na suapui te tha na khohsak in, ci hi.
LUK 22:33 Peter in ama kungah, Topa, nangma taw thonginn sungahizong, thi khawm tu ahizong ka ki nging zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:34 Jesus in, Peter awng, hong ci khi hi, tu ni in, he ngawl khi hi, ci thum vei dong nong nial mateng akkhuang ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:35 Jesus in a nungzui te tung ah, Dangka bawm, thung le peangdap keng ngawl in kong paisak lai, na kisapna uh a om ziam? ci hi. Amate in bangma ka kisam bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 22:36 Jesus in amate tung ah, Ahizong tu in, dangka bawm a nei te in keng tahen a, tasia bangma in thung zong keng tahen: namsau a nei ngawl te in, a puan tungsil zuak tahen a, khat lei tahen,
LUK 22:37 Banghangziam cile ama sia thukham paltan te sungah ki hel hi, ci a ki atkhol sia keima tungah tangtung hamtang tu hi: banghangziam cile keima taw kisai thu te a tawpna hong theng zo hi, ci in kong son hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:38 A nungzui te in, Topa, en in, ziak ah namsau ni om hi, ci uh hi. Ama in, Hisia pha zo hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:39 Jesus pusuak a, a ngeina bang in Olive mual ah pai hi; taciang a nungzui te in zong zui uh hi.
LUK 22:40 Tua mun a thet uh ciang in, amate tung ah, Ze-etna sungah na tum thak ngawl natu uh in thungen vun, ci hi.
LUK 22:41 A nungzui te taw muiden khat za a ki khuala na mun ah pai a, khupdin in thungen hi.
LUK 22:42 Pa awng, na deina a hile hi hai sia kei kung pan in hong khinsak tan: ahihang keima deina bang hi ngawl in nangma deina bang hizaw tahen, ci hi.
LUK 22:43 Taciang tua mun ah vantung pan in vantungmi khat hong kilang a, Jesus tha dimsak hi.
LUK 22:44 Thin ngimna lianpi taw nasia seseam in thungen hi: taciang a khua ulsa sia thisan bang in lei ah tak hi.
LUK 22:45 A thungetna mun pan ding in a nungzui te kungah a pai ciang, amate khua ngai in a mutthip uh mu a,
LUK 22:46 Taciang amate tung ah, Banghang in mu nu ziam? ze-etna sungah na thet ngawl natu uh in, tho vun a, thungen vun, ci hi.
LUK 22:47 Jesus a pau laitak in, en vun, mi honpi te mai ah Judas a kici, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat in Jesus nam tu in hong neak hi.
LUK 22:48 Ahihang Jesus in ama kungah, Judas, mihing Tapa sia nap na taw leheak ni ziam? ci hi.
LUK 22:49 Jesus kungah a omte in bang piang tu, ci a mu uh ciang in, Topa, namsau taw ka vat tu uh ziam? ci uh hi.
LUK 22:50 Amate sung pan khat in thiampi sang i naseam pa ziatsang bil sattansak hi.
LUK 22:51 Jesus in, Tu za pha zo hi, ci a, a bil thamsak in damsak hi.
LUK 22:52 Taciang Jesus in a kung hongpai thiampi lian te, biakinn cing ulian te le, upa te tung ah, Note in nguta man tu bang in, namsau le moltum te taw hongpai nu ziam?
LUK 22:53 Nizim in biakinn sungah note taw ka om lai in, hong man ngawl nu hi: ahihang hi thu sia note i hun le khuamial i vangletna hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:54 Amate in Jesus man uh a, thiampi sang pa inn ah paipui uh hi. Peter in a khuala pan in zui hi.
LUK 22:55 Leitual laizang ah meiphual sep a, to tek uh hi, amate ki laklaw ah Peter to hi.
LUK 22:56 Ahihang naseam numei khat in Peter mei hui ah a to a mu ciang in, sal tinten a, hi sia pa zong Jesus taw om hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:57 Taciang Peter in nial a, numei awng, Ama he ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:58 Tawmvei zawkciang a dang khat in Peter a mu ciang, nangma zong amate sungah kihel ni hi, ci hi. Taciang Peter in, pasal pa awng, kei hi ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:59 Nai khat bang zawkciang in, a dang khat in, a tatak in hi sia pa zong Jesus taw om hi: banghangziam cile ama sia Galilee mi hi, ci in teltak in son hi.
LUK 22:60 Taciang Peter in, pasal pa awng, bang son ni ziam, ci he ngawl khi hi, ci hi. Tua hun lian Peter a pau laitak in ak khuang hi.
LUK 22:61 Taciang Topa hong ki hei a, Peter en hi. Taciang Peter in Topa i ama tungah a son sa, Ak khuan ma in thum vei hong nial tu ni hi, ci kammal phawk kik hi.
LUK 22:62 Peter pusuak a, nasiatak in kap hi.
LUK 22:63 Jesus a man te in ama nu-nau in vel uh hi.
LUK 22:64 Taciang a mit puan taw tuamsak a, a mai pan vel uh hi, taciang kua in hong vel ziam? kamsang bang in hong son sin tan, ci uh hi.
LUK 22:65 Taciang ama selno na kam te pau uh hi.
LUK 22:66 Khuavak pociang in, upa te, thiampi sang te le thukhamhil te ki kaikhawm uh hi, taciang Jesus sia amate thu kikup na mun ah paipui uh a,
LUK 22:67 Nangma in Christ na hi ziam? hong son tan, ci uh hi. Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Kong son hang hong um ngawl tu nu hi:
LUK 22:68 Taciang note thu kong dong zong, hong zo ngawl tu nu hi, taciang zong hong tha ngawl tu nu hi.
LUK 22:69 Tu zawkciang in mihing Tapa sia Pathian vangletna ziatsang ah to tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 22:70 Tuazawkciang amate theampo in, nangma sia Pathian Tapa ni ziam? ci uh hi. Jesus in amate tung ah, Na son uh bang in ka hihi, ci hi.
LUK 22:71 Taciang amate in, bang tetti dang kul lai ziam? banghangziam cile eima vateak in ama kam pan i za zo hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 23:1 Taciang mihonpi te hong ding uh a, Jesus sia Pilate kungah paipui uh hi.
LUK 23:2 Amate in Jesus mawsiat kipan uh a, hi sia pa in i ngamsung i mipui te lampialsak hi, ci mu khu hi, Ama le Ama sia Christ Kumpipa khi hi, ci a, Caesar tungah shia piak tu zong kham hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 23:3 Pilate in Judah Kumpipa na hi ziam? ci in dong hi. Jesus in, Nangma in ci ni hi, ci in zo hi.
LUK 23:4 Tasiaciang in Pilate in thiampi lian te le mipi te tung ah, hisia pa a maw na mu ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 23:5 Taciang amate in a nasia zaw in, hisia pa in Galilee pan kipan hi mun dong, Judah ngam sung theampo mipi te thuhil in hanthawn hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 23:6 Pilate in Galilee thu a zak ciang in, hisia pa sia Galilee mi a hi ziam, ci in dong hi.
LUK 23:7 Pilate in Jesus sia Herod thuneina nuai ah om hi, ci a heak pociang, Herod kungah puak hi, tua hun laitak in Herod sia Jerusalem ah a om laitak a hihi.
LUK 23:8 Herod in Jesus a mu ciang in angtang mama hi: banghangziam cile Ama thu tampitak za zo a, a mu nop zawk ngei mama zo hi; taciang nalamdang a vawt te mu tu in ki lamen hi.
LUK 23:9 Tuazawkciang in Herod in Jesus sia thu tam mama dong hi; ahihang Jesus in bangma a zo kik bua hi.
LUK 23:10 Thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te hong ding uh a, Jesus nasiatak in mawsiat uh hi.
LUK 23:11 Herod le a ngalkap te in Jesus sia bangma thusimngawl in nu-nau uh a, puan pha mama khat a silsak zawk uh ciang, Pilate kungah puakkik uh hi.
LUK 23:12 Tua ni tatak ma in Pilate le Herod te lawmtam suak uh hi: banghangziam cile tua masia amate ni a kilem bua uh hi.
LUK 23:13 Pilate in thiampi lian te, ngam uk te le mihon te sam khawm in,
LUK 23:14 Amate tung ah, hisia pa sia mipi te lampialsak hi, ci in ka kungah hong paipui nu hi: en vun, note i mai ah ka sittel zo a, na mawsiatna uh mawna khat zong mu ngawl khi hi:
LUK 23:15 Herod in zong a mawna a mu ngawl hang in keikung ah hong puakkik hi: thi natu a kilawm mawna bangma om ngawl hi.
LUK 23:16 Tua ahikom thu ka hil tu a, tha kik tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 23:17 Banghangziam cile paisanpoai ciang in ama in mihing khat papo suatak hamtang hi.
LUK 23:18 Taciang amate theampo sia thakhat thu in au uh a, hisia pa that in a, Barabbas suaktasak in, ci uh hi:
LUK 23:19 Barabbas sia khuapi sungah buaina le tual tha na hang in thongtak a hihi.
LUK 23:20 Pilate in Jesus a suatak nop hang in, amate tungah thu son kik hi.
LUK 23:21 Ahihang amate au uh a, Ama thinglamte tungah khai in, Ama thinglamte tungah khai in, ci uh hi.
LUK 23:22 Pilate in a thumvei na amate tung ah, banghang ziam, bang phatngawlna vawt ziam? thina tu za dong a vawt bangma mu ngawl khi hi: tua ahikom sat in thakik tu khi hi, ci hi.
LUK 23:23 Amate aw ngingtak in, thinglamte tungah khai tu in ngen uh hi. Taciang amate le thiampi lian te aw in zo hi.
LUK 23:24 Tua ahikom amate nget bang in Pilate in thukhen hi.
LUK 23:25 Taciang in Pilate in buaina le tualthat hang in thongtak pa sia amate deina bang in suaktasak hi, ahihang amate deina bang in Jesus ap hi.
LUK 23:26 Amate in Jesus a paipui uh ciang in, khuano sang pan hongpai Cyrene khua mi Simon sia man uh a, thinglamte puasak in Jesus nung pan zuisak hi.
LUK 23:27 Jesus nung pan in mihonpi te in zui uh a, Jesus kaa kawm in a zui numei te zong om hi.
LUK 23:28 Ahihang Jesus in, amate sang kihei a, Jerusalem tanu te awng, keima atu in kap heak vun, ahizong note le na tate atu in kap zaw vun.
LUK 23:29 Banghangziam cile, en vun, a ciing te, nau a nei ngei ngawl sul le nau i tawp ngei ngawl noai te, thuphatoai a hihi, a kici tu nite hong theng tu hi.
LUK 23:30 Mual te tung ah, ko tungah hong cim tavun; mualdung te tungah kote hong huk tavun, ci tu uh hi.
LUK 23:31 Banghangziam cile, thingkung hing te tung nangawn ah hibang vawt a hile, thing ko te tungah bang a vawt tu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 23:32 Taciang thi dan a thuak tak mi ngilo ni zong Jesus taw that khawm tu in paipui uh hi.
LUK 23:33 Calvary a kici na mun a thet uh ciang in, Jesus taw tua thi dan a piak tak mi ngilo ni te sia a ziatsang ah khat, a veisang ah khat, thinglamte tungah khai uh hi.
LUK 23:34 Jesus in, Pa awng, amate maisak in; banghangziam cile, amate in bang ka vawt uh ci zong a he bua uh hi, ci hi. Taciang amate in a puan zong ai-san in hawm uh hi.
LUK 23:35 Mipi te in dinkhawl in en uh hi. Ngam uk te in, midang te ngum hi; Pathian i teal Christ a hile, ama le ama ki ngum tahen, ci in selno uh hi.
LUK 23:36 Ngalkap te zong in, a kungah hongpai in, sapittui hau pia hi.
LUK 23:37 Taciang Judah kumpipa na hile, nangma le nangma ki ngum in, ci uh hi.
LUK 23:38 Ama i tung ah, hisia in judah te kumpipa a hihi, ci in Greek, Latin le Hebrew lai taw in at uh hi.
LUK 23:39 Ama taw a ki khaikhawm thi dan piaktak khat in selno a, nangma sia Christ na hile, nangma le nangma ki ngum in a, kote zong hong ngum tan, ci hi.
LUK 23:40 Ahihang a dang khat sia in, nangma sia ama taw mawsiatna a kibang ci na musa hi napi, Pathian kita ngawl ni ziam?
LUK 23:41 Eite i hile i thuak tuma hi; banghangziam cile i ngamtatna bang in thaman a sang i hihi: ahihang hisia pa sia bangma khialna nei ngawl hi, ci in tei hi.
LUK 23:42 Taciang ama in Jesus kungah, Topa awng, na kumpingam sungah na tum ciang in hong phawk tan, ci hi.
LUK 23:43 Jesus in ama kungah, A tatak in kong ci hi, tuni in keima taw paradise ah i om tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 23:44 Tua hun sia sun nai sawmleni pawl hi a, nitak nai thum ciang dong leitung theampo ah khuazing hi.
LUK 23:45 Taciang in ni zong mial a, biakinn sung ki doi na puan sia a laizang pan ki zen hi.
LUK 23:46 Taciang in Jesus aw ngingtak in au a, Pa awng, ka tha na kutsung ah kong ap hi: ci hi, tabang a ci zawkciang thi hi.
LUK 23:47 Tua thu ngalkap mangpa in a mu ciang in, Pathian pok a, hisia pa sia mi thutang khat hi takpi hi, ci hi.
LUK 23:48 Tua thu piang en tu in hongpai mihing theampo in tua thu piang te a mu uh ciang in, a awm uh tum in heakkik uh hi.
LUK 23:49 Jesus a he theampo le Galilee pan in a zui numei te sia a khuala na ah ding in, thu piang teng en khawm uh hi.
LUK 23:50 Taciang, en vun, Joseph a kici ngaisutna pia khat om a, ama sia mipha le mi thutang a hihi:
LUK 23:51 Ama sia makai khat hi napi, makai dang te i ngaisutna le a sep dan a lungkim ngawl hi; ama sia Judah minam te khuapi Arimathaea khua pan hi a, Pathian kumpingam a ngak khat a hihi.
LUK 23:52 Hi pasal pa sia Pilate kungah pai in, Jesus luanghawm ngen hi.
LUK 23:53 Taciang thinglamte tung pan in khiasuk uh a, puanneam taw a tuam zawk uh ciang in, kuama a ki sial ngei ngawl lai na mun, a ki khuak tawm suang hawng than thak sungah sial hi.
LUK 23:54 Tua ni sia ki ngin ni hi a, sabbath ni theng dektak zo hi.
LUK 23:55 Galilee pan in Jesus taw hongpai numei te in Joseph zui uh a, Topa Jesus luang bangbang in sial ziam, ci in than en tek uh hi.
LUK 23:56 Amate heakkik uh a, paknamtui te le sathau namtui a tatuam te ki nging khol uh hi; taciang thupiak bang in sabbath ni in tawlnga uh hi.
LUK 24:1 Nipi kal khat sung ni masabel ni zingsang tung in numei te a vawtkhol sa ngimnamtui te keng in, a dang numei te taw than ah pai khawm uh hi.
LUK 24:2 Amate in than pan in suangtum a ki lik sa in mu uh hi.
LUK 24:3 Amate than sungah tum uh a, Topa Jesus luang a mu bua uh hi.
LUK 24:4 Tasia ciang amate a lungmang tek mama uh a, en vun, mihing ni puan pak sitset sil in amate hui ah ding hi:
LUK 24:5 Amate in lau kawm in, lei ah boksuk uh a, tua mihing te in amate tung ah, banghang in mihing sia mithi te sungah zong nu ziam?
LUK 24:6 Ama ziak ah om ngawl hi, tho zo hi: Galilee ah a om lai in note tungah bangbang in hong son ziam, ci phawk tavun,
LUK 24:7 Mihing Tapa sia mi ngilo te khut sungah ap tu uh a, thinglamte tungah khai tu uh hi, taciang nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
LUK 24:8 Taciang amate in Jesus kammal te phawkkik uh hi,
LUK 24:9 Taciang than pan heakkik uh a, Sawltak sawm le khat te le midang te kungah hi thu te theampo son uh hi.
LUK 24:10 Hi thu te Sawltakte kungah a son te sia, Mary Magdalene, Joana le James nu Mary te a hi uh hi.
LUK 24:11 Sawltakte in numei te kammal te sia phuatawm tangthu banglel in ngaisun uh a, a um bua uh hi.
LUK 24:12 Tuazawkciang in Peter ding a, than sangah tai hi; taciang kun in puanneam no a ki koi bek mu hi, taciang thu piang te lamdangsa mama in heakkik hi.
LUK 24:13 Taciang, en vun, tua ni in amate sungpan mi ni te sia, Jerusalem pan tai sali kiim a khuala na mun Emmaus a kici khua ah pai khawm uh hi.
LUK 24:14 Amate in hi thu piang te theampo kikum uh hi.
LUK 24:15 Tabang a kikup le a ngaisut khop uh laitak in Jesus Ama mama hong nai a, amate taw tonkhawm hi.
LUK 24:16 Ahihang amate in Jesus a hi hunlam a tel ngawl tu in a mit uh ki humsak hi.
LUK 24:17 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na paikawm in bang thu kikum nu ziam, banghang in maikhing nu ziam? ci hi.
LUK 24:18 Amate sung pan khat ahi, Cleopas a kici pa in, tulai thu piang te he ngawl in Jerusalem ah khual a haw nangmabek ni ziam? ci in zo kik hi.
LUK 24:19 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Bang thu te ziam? ci hi. Amate in, Pathian le mi theampo mai ah sep na le kammal taw a vanglian mama kamsang khat, Nazareth mi Jesus thu a hihi:
LUK 24:20 Thiampi lian te le ka ngam uk te in, thidan thuak tu in mawsiat uh a, thinglamte tungah khai hi.
LUK 24:21 Ahihang Ama sia Israel te ngumpa tu in, ka lam-et mama uh a hihi: bek domngawl in, tu ni hi thu te a pian zawk ni thum na hi zo hi.
LUK 24:22 Kote sungah numei te in hong lungmangsak belap lai hi, amate zingtung in than ah pai tek uh a;
LUK 24:23 A luang a mu ngawl uh ciang in, heakkik uh a, amate in vantungmi te hong kilang mu uh hi, tua vantungmi in, Ama nungta hi, ci hi.
LUK 24:24 Taciang kote sung pan mi pawlkhat te than ah pai uh a, numei te sonbang in mu uh hi: ahihang Ama a mu bua uh hi, ci hi.
LUK 24:25 Taciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Aw mi mamaw te, kamsang te sonkholsa um tu in na lungtang uh hai lei hi:
LUK 24:26 Christ in hi thu te theampo a thuak zawkciang in Ama minthanna sungah tum tu hi ngawl ziam? ci hi.
LUK 24:27 Moses laibu pan kipan kamsang laibu theampo le, laithiangtho theampo sungah Ama thu a ki at te amate tungah hilthiang hi.
LUK 24:28 A pai natu khua a thet dektak uh ciang: Jesus sia paisuak lai tu bang in om hi.
LUK 24:29 Ahihang amate in, koma kungah hong tam tan: banghangziam cile nitak sang hi zo a, khua niam mama zo hi, ci in tho hamtang uh hi. Taciang amate taw tam tu in pai hi.
LUK 24:30 Tuazawkciang in, amate taw an ne tu in to khawm tek uh hi, taciang anluum la a thupha pia hi, taciang phel a, amate pia hi.
LUK 24:31 Amate mitte te honsak a, amate in Jesus he uh hi; taciang amate mitmu pan in na bo zo hi.
LUK 24:32 Amate khat le khat kungah, lamkal ah hong paupui a, laithiangtho hong hilthiang laitak in, i thinsung ah mei bang in hong kang hi ngawl kana ziam? kici khawm uh hi.
LUK 24:33 Amate tua laitak ma in ding uh a, Jerusalem ah heakkik uh hi, taciang Sawltak sawm le khat te le a dang te munkhat ah a ki kaikhawm tek mu uh a,
LUK 24:34 Topa sia tho takpi hi, taciang Simon kungah kilang zo hi, ci uh hi.
LUK 24:35 Amate in lamkal lak ah thu piang te le anluum a bal ciang in Topa hi, ci a heak thu te son uh hi.
LUK 24:36 Amate a kikup uh laitak in, Jesus sia amate laizang ah hong ding a, Note tungah thinnopna om tahen, ci hi.
LUK 24:37 Ahihang amate in thitha mu ki sa uh a, lau mama uh hi.
LUK 24:38 Jesus in amate tung ah, Banghang in patau nu ziam? banghang in na thinsung uh ah a tatuam ngaisun nu ziam?
LUK 24:39 En vun, ka khut le ka peang te, keima tatak ma khi hi: hong tham tavun a hong en tavun; ngu le tang te ka nei na mu uh bang in, thitha in ngu le tang nei ngawl hi, ci hi.
LUK 24:40 Jesus in a son zawkciang in, amate a khut le a peang te lak hi.
LUK 24:41 Amate lungdam le lamdang asak uh hu in a up ngawl uh ciang, Jesus in amate tung ah, Ziak sungah neak thei khatpo na nei uh ziam? ci hi.
LUK 24:42 Amate in ngasa em bakkhat le khuai phang khat pia uh hi.
LUK 24:43 Jesus in la a, amate mai ah ne hi.
LUK 24:44 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi kammal te sia note taw ka om lai in kong son te a hihi, Moses thukham, kamsang laibu te le Psalms labu sungah keima thu a ki atkhol theampo te a tangtut hamtang na a hihi, ci hi.
LUK 24:45 Taciang laithiangtho a tel thei natu in amate heaktheina honsak a,
LUK 24:46 Amate tung ah, Hibang in ki atkhol hi, Christ sia a thuak kul hamtang a, thina pan nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi:
LUK 24:47 Jerusalem pan kipan in minam theampo tung ah, Ama min taw mawna ki sikkik na le mawmaisak na thu pualak tu hi.
LUK 24:48 Taciang note sia hi thu te i tetti te na hi uh hi.
LUK 24:49 Taciang, en vun, ka Pa kamciam sia note tungah hong puak khi hi: ahihang tungsang pan vangletna taw hong tuam mateng, Jerusalem ah om nginge vun, ci hi.
LUK 24:50 Taciang Jesus in amate Bethany dong paipui a, a khut lamto in, amate thupha pia hi.
LUK 24:51 Thupha a piak laitak in, amate kung pan kikhen a, vantung ah ki lato hi.
LUK 24:52 Amate in Jesus a biak zawk uh ciang in, Jerusalem ah lungdamna lianpi taw heakkik tek uh hi:
LUK 24:53 Amate tatsat ngawl in biakinn sungah om uh a, Pathian pok in thupha pia tek uh hi. Amen.
JOH 1:1 A kipatcil in Thu om hi, tua thu sia Pathian taw omkhawm a, tua Thu in Pathian a hihi.
JOH 1:2 Tua thu sia a kipatcil in Pathian taw omkhawm hi.
JOH 1:3 Na theampo Ama vawt a hihi; a kivawt theampo sungah Ama kihel ngawl in a kivawt khatzong a om bua hi.
JOH 1:4 Ama sungah nuntakna om a; tua nuntakna sia mihing te i khuavak a hihi.
JOH 1:5 Taciang khuavak sia khuazing sungah tang a; khuazing in Ama a he bua hi.
JOH 1:6 Pathian kungpan hong ki sawl mi khat om a, ama min sia John a hihi.
JOH 1:7 John sia tetti tu in hongpai a, mi theampo in ama tungtawn in a up thei natu, khuavak tettipang tu in hongpai hi.
JOH 1:8 Ama sia tua Khuavak hi ngawl hi, ahihang tua Khuavak tettipang tu in a ki sawl a hihi.
JOH 1:9 Tasia sia Khuavak tatak hi a, mi theampo taan tu in hi leitung ah hongpai hi.
JOH 1:10 Ama sia leitung ah om a, leitung sia Ama vawtsa a hihi, taciang leitung in Ama a he bua hi.
JOH 1:11 Ama minam te kungah hongpai napi, a minam te in Ama a sang bua hi.
JOH 1:12 Ahihang a sang te theampo tung ah, Pathian tapa sua na vangletna pia hi, tua te sia Ama min a umte a hihi:
JOH 1:13 Ama te sia thisan, ci le sa deina, le mihing deina tungtawn in a piang a hi bua uh hi, ahihang Pathian deina tungtawn in a piang a hihi.
JOH 1:14 Tua thu sia ci le sa in ki vawt a, taciang thuthiamna le thutak taw kidim in eite sungah hong om a, Pa i Tapa a neisun minthanna bang in a minthanna i mu hi.
JOH 1:15 John in Ama thu tettipang in a au na aw sia, ka nung pan hongpai pa sia kei sang in thupi zaw hi: banghangziam cile Ama sia kei pian ma in om zo hi: A thu ka sason sia Ama a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 1:16 Ama kicinna pan in i vekpi in hesuakna khat zawkciang khat i sang tato hi.
JOH 1:17 Banghangziam cile thukham sia Moses tungtawn in hong kipia hi, ahihang thuthiamna le thutak ahile Jesus Christ tungtawn in hongpai hi.
JOH 1:18 Kuama in bangmahun in Pathian mu ngei ngawl hi; Pa kangsung ah a om khatbek a nei a Tapa in, Pa thu hong tangko zo hi.
JOH 1:19 Hi thu sia, nang sia a kua ni ziam? ci dong tu in Judah te in thiampi te le Levite te Jerusalem pan a sawl uh ciang in, John i a cepte thu a hihi.
JOH 1:20 John in nial peuma ngawl in, keima sia Christ hi ngawl khi hi; ci in pualak hi.
JOH 1:21 Amate in, tua a hile a kua ni ziam? Elijah ni ziam? ci in dong uh hi. Taciang John in, hi ngawl khi hi, ci hi. Amate in, kamsang tasia ni ziam? ci in a dok leleau uh ciang in, hi ngawl khi hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 1:22 Amate in, nang a kua ni ziam? tua hile hong sawl te kungah son thei tu khu hi. Nangma le nangma kua ka hi ci ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 1:23 John in, kamsang Isaiah sonkholsa bang in, Topa i lampi tangsak vun, ci in ngamsung pan a au Aw ka hihi, ci hi.
JOH 1:24 Amate sia Pharisee te in sawl in a paisak te a hi uh hi.
JOH 1:25 Amate in, Christ na hi bua a, Elijah le hi ngawl, kamsang le hi tuan ngawl napi, banghang in tuiphumna pia ni ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
JOH 1:26 John in, keima in tui taw tuiphumna kong pia hi: ahihang na heak ngawl uh mi khat note sungah ding nginge hi;
JOH 1:27 Ama sia, ka nung pan hongpai a, kei sang in thupi zaw hi, kei sia a peangdap khau sutsak tu zong ka kilawm bua hi, ci hi.
JOH 1:28 Hi thu te sia John in tuiphumna a piak na mun, Jordan ngun ngal Bethabara ah a sep thu a hihi.
JOH 1:29 A zingciang in John in Jesus a kungah hongpai mu a, en vun, leitung mawna a pua Pathian Tuuno.
JOH 1:30 Hi sia pa sia, ka nung pan hongpai a, kei sang in thupi zaw hi: banghangziam cile kei pian ma in om zo hi, ci ka son sia Ama a hihi.
JOH 1:31 Ama ka he bua hi: ahihang Ama sia Israel te tungah kilangsak tu hi, tua ahikom keima hongpai in tui taw tuiphumna pia khi hi.
JOH 1:32 Taciang John in ceptena tettipang a, Thaa sia vantung pan vakhu bang in tuaksuk a, Ama tungah a tu ka mu hi.
JOH 1:33 Ama ka he bua hi: ahihang tui taw tuiphumna pia tu in, hong sawl sia in, Ama tungah Thaa hong tuaksuk tu a, tua na mu uh sia sia, Tha Thiangtho taw tuiphumna pia tu pa hi, ci in hong son hi.
JOH 1:34 Ama ka mu zo a, hisia pa sia Pathian Tapa a hihi, ci in ceptena tettipang khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 1:35 A zingciang in John le a nungzui ni te hong dingkik uh a;
JOH 1:36 Jesus hongpai a mu ciang in, en vun Pathian Tuuno! ci hi.
JOH 1:37 Taciang nungzui nite in tua thu a zak uh ciang, Jesus nung zui uh hi.
JOH 1:38 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in a nungsang le-et a, amate i zui a mu ciang, amate tung ah, Bang zong nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, Rabbi awng koisung ah om ni ziam? ci uh hi. Rabbi a khiakna sia syapa awng, a cinopna a hihi.
JOH 1:39 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hongpai tavun a hong en tavun, ci hi. Amate hongpai uh a, a omna mun mu uh hi, taciang tua ni Ama taw omkhawm uh hi: banghangziam cile a hun sia nitak sang nai li pawl a hihi.
JOH 1:40 John i son thu a za mihing ni te sungah khat sia Simon Peter suapui pa, Andrew a hihi.
JOH 1:41 A masaphit in a u Simon taw ki si uh a, ko Messiah taw ki mu zo khu hi, ci son hi. Messiah a khiakna sia Christ a ci nopna hi.
JOH 1:42 Ama in Jesus kungah paipui hi. Jesus in ama a et ciang in, Nangma sia Jonah i tapa Simon na hihi: nang sia Cephas hong kici tu hi, ci hi, Cephas a khiakna sia suangpi a cinopna a hihi.
JOH 1:43 A zingciang in Jesus sia Galilee ah pai nuam hi, taciang Philip taw ki si a, ama kungah, Hong zui tan, ci hi.
JOH 1:44 Philip sia Bethsaida khua mi hi a, Andrew le Peter te i khua a hihi.
JOH 1:45 Philip in Nathanael mu a, ama kungah, Moses i thukham sung le kamsang te in a atkholsa, Joseph tapa Nazareth mi Jesus mu zo khu hi, ci hi.
JOH 1:46 Taciang Nathanael in, Nazareth khua pan na pha piang thei na ziam? ci hi. Philip in, hongpai tan a, en in, ci hi.
JOH 1:47 Jesus in Nathanael hongpai a mu ciang in, En vun, Israel mi tatak a hihi, a sungah theamna om ngawl hi! ci hi.
JOH 1:48 Nathanael in, bangbang in hong he thei ni ziam? ci hi. Jesus in, Philip in nang hong sap ma theikung nuai ah na to laitak in, kong mu zo hi, ci hi.
JOH 1:49 Nathanael in, Rabbi, nangma sia Pathian Tapa na hihi; nangma sia Israel Kumpi na hihi, ci hi.
JOH 1:50 Jesus in, Theikung nuai ah na to laitak kong mu hi, ka ci hang in hong um ni ziam? Hi te sang in a lianzaw nate na mu lai tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
JOH 1:51 Jesus in ama kungah, Amantak in kong ci hi, a ngei ngawl in van a ki hong na mu tu a, mihing Tapa tungah Pathian i vantungmi te a tuaksuk le a kato na mu tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 2:1 Ni thum ni ciang in Galilee huam Kana khua ah mopoai om a; tua mun ah Jesus i nu zong om hi:
JOH 2:2 Taciang Jesus le a nungzui te zong mopoai ah ki sam hi.
JOH 2:3 Amate sapittui a ki sap uh ciang in, a nu in Jesus kungah, amate in sapittui nei nawn ngawl hi, ci hi.
JOH 2:4 Jesus in, Numei awng, nang taw bang kisai hi ziam? ka hun cing ngawl lai hi, ci hi.
JOH 2:5 A nu in naseam te kungah, hong son theampo seam vun, ci hi.
JOH 2:6 Tua mun ah Judah te ngeina bang in, thiansuana tu in suang tuibeal luk koi uh hi, beal khat sungah tui gallon kul pan sawmthum kiim ta hi.
JOH 2:7 Jesus in amate tung ah, Tuibeal te tui dim vun, ci hi. Taciang amate in a dim in tui dim uh hi.
JOH 2:8 Jesus in amate tung ah, Tu in tui suak vun a, poai ukpa kungah paipui vun, ci hi. Taciang amate in paipui uh hi.
JOH 2:9 Poai uk pa in tua sapittui a ki suaksak tui a tep zawkciang in, koisung pan ci a he bua hi: ahihang naseam tuitoai te in he uh hi; poai uk pa in mopa sam a,
JOH 2:10 Ama kungah, midang te in sapittui a pha te koi masa hi; amate in a khomkhat tek a dawn zawk uh ciang in, a phangawl zawhiat te koi hi: ahihang nang na hile sapittui a pha te tu dong ciang in na khealsia lai hi, ci hi.
JOH 2:11 Jesus in hi amasabel nalamdang sia Galilee huam Cana khua ah vawt a, a minthanna kilangsak hi; taciang nungzui te in Ama um uh hi.
JOH 2:12 Hite zawkciang in, Jesus le a nu, a suapui te le a nungzui te Capernaum ah pai uh a: tua mun ah ni tampi sung taam ngawl hi.
JOH 2:13 Judah te paisanpoai hong naizo a himan in, Jesus sia Jerusalem ah pai hi.
JOH 2:14 Biakinn sungah khuital, tuu le vakhu zuak te le sumtheak te a to hon uh laitak mu hi:
JOH 2:15 Ciangduai tang in khauhual vawt a, tuu le khuital te biakinn sung pan in bengkeak hi; taciang sumtheak te i sum te sung keak a, sabuai te zong lotthalsak hi;
JOH 2:16 Taciang vakhu zuak te tung ah, Hi van te hi mun pan in lasiat vun; ka Pa inn sia sumzuakna mun suaksak heak vun, ci hi.
JOH 2:17 A nungzui te in, na inn i lawpna in hong ne siat hi, ci a ki atkhol sia phawk uh hi.
JOH 2:18 Judah mite in zo kik a, hibang te vawt na hikom in bang musakna hong lak tu ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 2:19 Jesus in zo kik a, Hi biakinn pheltham vun, nithum sung sakik tu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 2:20 Judah mite in, hi biakinn sia kum sawmli le kum luk sung a kisa a hihi, nithum sung tung kik zo tu ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 2:21 Ahihang Jesus in Ama pumpi biakinn a son na a hihi.
JOH 2:22 Tua ahikom Jesus sia thina pan a thawkik ciang in, a nungzui te in hi thu te son a hi hunlam phawkkik uh hi; taciang amate in laithiangtho le Jesus i son thu te um uh hi.
JOH 2:23 Tu in Jesus sia Jerusalem ah paisanpoai ni in, nalamdang tampi a vawt te a mu uh hu in, mi tampi in Ama min um uh hi.
JOH 2:24 Ahihang Jesus in amate tungah Ama le Ama ki ap ngawl hi, banghangziam cile mi theampo a heak hang a hihi,
JOH 2:25 Kuama in mihing te thu tettipan kul ngawl hi: banghangziam cile mihing sungah bang om ziam, ci Ama in he hi.
JOH 3:1 Judah mite i lampui, a min Nicodemus a kici Pharisee khat om hi:
JOH 3:2 Ama sia Jesus kungah zan ciang in hongpai a, Rabbi, nang sia Pathian kung pan in hongpai syapa ni hi, ci hong he khi hi: banghangziam cile na vawt nalamdang te Pathian in ompui ngawl hile, kuama in vawt thei ngawl hi, ci hi.
JOH 3:3 Jesus in ama kungah, Aman tatak in kong ci hi, mihing khat sia a suakkik bua ahile Pathian kumpingam a mu bua tu hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 3:4 Nicodemus in, mihing khat a huai zawkciang bangbang in suakkik thei tu ziam? A nu ngil sungah a ni vei na tum in suakkik tu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 3:5 Jesus in, Aman tak in kong son hi, mihing khat sia tui le Thaa taw a suak bua a hile, Pathian kumpingam sungah tum thei ngawl tu hi.
JOH 3:6 Ci le sa taw a suak sia ci le sa hi; taciang Thaa taw a suak sia thaa a hihi.
JOH 3:7 Na sua kik kul tu hi kong ci hu in, lamdang na sa heak in.
JOH 3:8 Vui sia a uknapo pan in hongpai hi, taciang a nging za ni hi, ahihang kongpan hongpai a, koisang ah pai ziam, ci son thei ngawl ni hi: tasia bangma in Thaa taw a suak te zong tabangma a hihi, ci ni.
JOH 3:9 Nicodemus in, bangbang in hi thu te piang thei tu ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 3:10 Jesus in zo a, Nangma sia Israel te sya khat hi napi, hi thu te he ngawl ni ziam?
JOH 3:11 Aman tatak kong ci hi, kote ka hi uh le ka heak thu uh son khu hi, taciang ka mu uh thu te tettipang khu hi; taciang note in ka tetti pan uh hong sang ngawl nu hi.
JOH 3:12 Leitung thu te kong son a, um ngawl na hile, bangbang in vantung thu te kong son ciang in um thei tu ni ziam?
JOH 3:13 Van om a, van pan hong tuaksuk, mihing Tapa simngawl kuama van ah kato ngawl hi.
JOH 3:14 Moses in senneal ngam ah ngul a khai bang in, mihing Tapa zong ki khai tu hi:
JOH 3:15 A kuamapo Ama a um peuma, ki siacip ngawl tu a, tawntung nuntakna nei hi.
JOH 3:16 Banghangziam cile Pathian in leitung mite it mama ahikom a Tapa neisun pia hi, akuamapo Ama a um peuma kisia ngawl tu a, nuntak tawntungna nei hi.
JOH 3:17 Banghangziam cile Pathian in leitung mite mawsiat tu in a Tapa leitung ah hong paisak ngawl hi; ahihang Ama hang in leitung mite ngupna a nga natu in hongpaisak hi.
JOH 3:18 Ama a um peuma mawsiat nataw kipeal hi: ahihang a um ngawl peuma sia mawsiatna thuak zo hi, banghangziam cile Pathian i a neisun a Tapa i min a up ngawl uh hang a hihi.
JOH 3:19 Taciang hi thu sia mawsiatna hi, khuavak sia leitung ah hongpai a, mihing te in khuavak sang in khuazing dei zaw uh hi, banghangziam cile amate sep nate a phat ngawl hang a hihi.
JOH 3:20 Banghangziam cile na phangawl a vawt peuma in khuavak ensan uh hi, tabang hi bale a vawtna te tungah kitekna thuak tu uh hi.
JOH 3:21 Ahihang thuman a seam peuma in, a sep uh po Pathian deina taw seam hi, ci kilangsak tu in khuavak sungah hongpai uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 3:22 Hiteng zawkciang in Jesus le a nungzui te Judah ngamsung ah pai uh hi; tua mun ah amate taw omkhawm uh a, tuiphumna pia hi.
JOH 3:23 John zong Salim pan a nai na mun Aenon ah tuiphumna pia hi, banghangziam cile tua mun ah tui tam mama om hi: taciang amate hongpai uh a tui kiphum uh hi.
JOH 3:24 Banghangziam cile John sia thong a tak laitak a hihi.
JOH 3:25 Tuazawkciang in John i nungzui te le Judah mite kilaklaw ah ki thiansua na taw kisai thu dok na hong piang hi.
JOH 3:26 Amate John kungah hongpai uh a, Rabbi, Jordan ngunngal ah nangma taw om a, Ama thu tetti na pansak pa, en in, tua pa in tuiphumna pia a, mi theampo a kungah pai uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 3:27 John in, vantung pan a ki pia simngawl mihing in bangma peuma sang thei ngawl hi.
JOH 3:28 Keima sia Christ hi ngawl khi hi, ahihang Ama mai ah a ki sawlpa ka hihi, ka ci thu taw kisai note ka tetti na hi uh hi.
JOH 3:29 Mo nei sia mopa a hihi: ahihang mopa a dinpui pa le, a aw a za a lawmpa sia, mopa i aw hang in nasiatak in lungdam hi: tua ahikom ka lungdamna pawlcing hi.
JOH 3:30 Ama puicing va-ial tu hi, ahihang kei ka hile ka kiam va-ial tu hi.
JOH 3:31 Tungsang pan hongpai pa sia na theampo i tungah om hi: leitung pan hongpai pa sia leitung mi hi a, leitung thu son hi: vantung pan hongpai pa sia na theampo i tungah a hihi.
JOH 3:32 Ama in a mu le a zak sa thu te son a, ama tettipanna kuama in sang ngawl hi.
JOH 3:33 Ama tettipanna a sang peuma in Pathian sia thuman hi, ci ama ceptena khen hi.
JOH 3:34 Banghangziam cile Pathian i sawl pa in Pathian thu te son hi: banghangziam cile Pathian in ama tungah Thaa khaikhin in hong pia ngawl hi.
JOH 3:35 Pa in Tapa it a, na theampo a khutsung ah pia zo hi.
JOH 3:36 Tapa a um peuma tawntung nuntakna nei hi: Tapa a um ngawl peuma in nuntakna mu ngawl tu hi; ahihang Pathian thin-ukna a tungah om tu hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 4:1 Tua ahikom Jesus in John sang in nungzui tam koi zaw a, tuiphumna pia hi, ci thu Pharisee te in zazo uh hi, ci Topa in a heak ciang in,
JOH 4:2 Jesus Ama vateak in tuiphumna pia ngawl hi, ahihang a nungzui te bek in pia hi,
JOH 4:3 Judah ngam nusia in Galilee ngam sungah paikik uh hi.
JOH 4:4 Taciang Jesus sia Samaria ngamsung a kantan ngawl phamaw hi.
JOH 4:5 Sychar a kici, Samaria ngam khuapi khat, Jacob in a tapa Joseph a piak lo ngam nai na ah Jesus theng hi.
JOH 4:6 Tua mun ah Jacob tuikhuk om hi. Jesus sia a khualhaw na toi ahikom in, tuikhuk hui ah to hi: tua hun sia sun nai sawm le nai ni pawl a hihi.
JOH 4:7 Samaria numei khat tuitoai tu in hongpai a: Jesus in a kungah, Ka dawn tu hong pia tan, ci hi.
JOH 4:8 Banghangziam cile a nungzui te khuapi sungah an lei tu in pai uh hi.
JOH 4:9 Taciang in Samaria numei nu in, nang sia Judah mi na hi a, kei sia Samaria numei ka hihi, bangbang in tui dawn tu hong ngen ni ziam? ci hi. Banghangziam cile Judah te in Samaria te taw ki pawlkhawm ngei ngawl uh hi.
JOH 4:10 Jesus in a kungah hibang in ci hi, Pathian i letsong le nangma hong paupui sia kua ci he le te, Ama kungah, tui dawn tu hongpia tan, ci in ngen zawsap tu ni hi; taciang Ama in nuntakna tui hongpia tu hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 4:11 Numei nu in, Topa awng, tuitoai natu le bangma na nei bua a, tuikhuk zong thuk mama si hi: koisungpan tua nuntakna tui nei tu ni ziam?
JOH 4:12 Nangma in ka pa uh Jacob sang in lianzaw ni ziam? ama in tuikhuk hong pia a, ama tatak ma, a tate le nganno te zong in dawn hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:13 Jesus in a kungah, A kuamapo hi tui a dawn peuma dangtak kik tu hi:
JOH 4:14 Ahihang keima i ka piak tu tui a dawn peuma a dangtak kik nawn ngawl tu hi; ahihang ka piak tu tui sia ama sungah tawntung nuntakna a piangsak ciktui hi tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:15 Numei nu in, Topa awng, dangtak ngawl tu le hi mun ah tuitoai pai kul ngawl tu in, hi tui hong pia tan, ci hi.
JOH 4:16 Jesus in, Pai in, na pasal sam tan a hi mun ah hongpai tan, ci hi.
JOH 4:17 Numei nu in, pasal ka nei bua hi, ci in zo hi. Jesus in, Pasal nei ngawl khi hina ci sia pha hi:
JOH 4:18 Banghangziam cile pasal nga na nei zo hi; taciang tu in na nei sia zong na pasal hi ngawl hi: tua thu ah a mantak in na son hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:19 Numei nu in, Topa awng, nangma sia kamsang ni hi, ci hong he khi hi.
JOH 4:20 Ka pa te uh in hi mual tungah biakpia uh hi; taciang note in Jerusalem ah na biak tu uh a hihi, na ci uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:21 Jesus in ama tung ah, Numei awng, hong um tan, Pa sia hi mualtung ah ahizong, Jerusalem ah ahizong, na biak ngawl uh hun hong theng tu hi.
JOH 4:22 Na biak uh sia bang ziam, ci na he bua uh hi: kote in bang bia khu ziam, ci ka he uh hi: banghangziam cile ngupna sia Judah mite kung pan in hongpai hi.
JOH 4:23 Ahihang a mantak in a bia te in, Pa sia thaa le thutak taw a biak tu uh hun hong theng tu hi, tu in tua hun hong theng zo hi: banghangziam cile Pa in tabang in Ama a bia te zong hi.
JOH 4:24 Pathian sia Thaa a hihi: taciang a bia peuma in thaa le thutak taw a biak tu uh a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 4:25 Numei nu in a kungah, Christ a kici Messiah sia hongpai tu a: hongpai ciang in, Ama in na theampo hong son tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:26 Jesus in, Na kungah nang hong paupui sia, tua pa ka hihi, ci hi.
JOH 4:27 Taciang in a nungzui te hongpai uh a, numei nu taw a ki paupui uh lamdangsa mama uh ahihang: kuama in bang zong ni ziam? a hibale, banghang in numei nu taw ki paupui ni ziam? a ci bua uh hi.
JOH 4:28 Tua numei nu in a tuibeal nusia in, khuasung ah pai a, mite tung ah,
JOH 4:29 Ka sep theampo hong son pa sia pai vun a, en vun: hi sia in Christ hi ngawl ziam? ci hi.
JOH 4:30 Tabang in khuasung pan pusuak uh a, Jesus kungah hongpai hon uh hi.
JOH 4:31 Tua laitak in a nungzui te in, Syapa awng, an ne in, ci uh hi.
JOH 4:32 Ahihang ama in, Note i heak ngawl an neak tu ka nei hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:33 Tua ahikom khatpo in neak tu puak a hi tam? ci in a nungzui te khat le khat ki dong uh hi.
JOH 4:34 Jesus in amate kungah, Keima hong sawlpa deina bang sep tu le Ama nasep ka zaw tu sia keima an a hihi.
JOH 4:35 Tu zo tha li ciang in anlak hun hong theng tu hi, ci hi ngawl nu ziam? dak vun a, lo te en vun; amate ang zo a, anlak hun zo hi, kong ci hi.
JOH 4:36 Taciang anla peuma in sep thaman nga tu a, tawntung nuntakna atu in thing nga te kaikhawm tu hi: taciang thaici a poai te le anla te lungdam khawm tu uh hi.
JOH 4:37 Khat in thaici poai a, a dang khat in anla hi, a ci sia a thuman a hihi.
JOH 4:38 Na sep ngawl na uh lo sungah anla tu in kong sawl hi: midang te in seam uh a, taciang midang te sepnasa sungah note na tum uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:39 Numei nu in, ka sep theampo Ama in hong son hi, ci in son ahikom, Samaria khua sung mi tampi te in Jesus um uh hi.
JOH 4:40 A kungah Samaria mite hongpai ciang in, amate taw om tu in kun uh a: tua mun ah ni ni sung taam hi.
JOH 4:41 Jesus Ama kammal vateak hang in a um mihing hong tam seseam hi;
JOH 4:42 Taciang numei nu kungah, tu in nangma son bek taw hi ngawl in, koma vateak in ka zak uh hu in um khu hi, taciang Ama sia leitung ngum tu Christ a hihi, ci ka he uh hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 4:43 Ni ni zawkciang in, Jesus tua mun pan in pusuak a, Galilee ah pai hi.
JOH 4:44 Banghangziam cile Jesus ama vateak in, kamsang sia ama ngam ah ki zakta ngawl hi, ci in tettipang hi.
JOH 4:45 Galilee ah hongpai ciang in, Galilee mite in Ama sang uh hi, banghangziam cile Jerusalem poai ah amate pai uh a: a sep theampo mu uh hi.
JOH 4:46 Tua ahikom Jesus in tui pan sapittui a suasak na mun, Galilee huam Cana khua ah paikik hi. Tua khua ah ulian khat om a, a tapa Capernaum khua ah a cina hi.
JOH 4:47 Jesus sia Judah ngam pan in pusuak a, Galilee ah om hi, ci a zak ciang in, a kungah pai hi, Capernaum khua ah pai in, a tapa damsak tu in ngen hi: banghangziam cile a tapa thi dektak hi.
JOH 4:48 Jesus in ama kungah, Musakna te le nalamdang te na mu bua uh le, na um bua uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 4:49 Tua ulian pa in, Topa awng, ka tapa a thi ma hongpai tan, ci hi.
JOH 4:50 Jesus in ama kungah, Va pai tan, na tapa nungta hi, ci hi. Tua pa in Jesus kammal um in pai hi.
JOH 4:51 A pai laitak in, a naseam te in dawntua a, na tapa nungta hi, ci son hi.
JOH 4:52 Ama in a tapa bang hun laitak in damzaw ziam, ci dong hi. A naseam te in sun nai khat pawl in a cisa dam hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 4:53 Tua hun sia Jesus in, Na tapa nungta hi, a ci lian laitak hi, ci a pa in he hi: taciang ama vateak le a innkuan bup in um uh hi.
JOH 4:54 Hi thu sia Judah ngam pan in Galilee huam ah Jesus a paizawk nalamdang a vawt ni vei na a hihi.
JOH 5:1 Tuazawkciang in Judah mite i poai om a; Jesus sia Jerusalem ah pai hi.
JOH 5:2 Jerusalem tuu kongpi hui, Hebrew kam in Bethesda a kici tuili khat om a, buk nga zong om hi.
JOH 5:3 Hi buk nga sungah natna namcin a thuak cina tampi, mittaw, peangbai le langngaw te tui kilok tu ngak in lum uh hi.
JOH 5:4 Banghangziam cile hun khakhat ciang in tuili sungah vantungmi hong tuaksuk a, tuili sau hi: tua tui a sau zawkciang in tuisung ah a tuaksuk masabel sia bang natna po ahizong dam hi.
JOH 5:5 Tua mun ah, kum sawmthum le kum liat sung a dam ngawl khat om hi.
JOH 5:6 Jesus in tua pa a lum a mu ciang in, kum tam mama sung om zo hi ci he a, Na dam nuam ziam? ci hi.
JOH 5:7 Tua cina pa in, Topa awng, tui a ki lok ciang in tuili sungah hong koi tu mihing nei ngawl khi hi: taciang, ka pai laitak in ka mai ah ngualdang tuaksuk masa hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 5:8 Jesus in, Tho in, na luppha la in a, lampai in, ci hi.
JOH 5:9 Thakhat thu in tua pa dam a, a luppha la in lampai hi: tua ni sia sabbath ni a hihi.
JOH 5:10 Tua ahikom Judah mite in damna a nga pa kungah, tu ni sia sabbath ni hi: na luppha na puak sia ngeina om ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 5:11 Ama in, keima hong damsak pa in, na luppha la in a, lampai in, hong ci hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 5:12 Taciang amate in, na luppha la in a, lampai in, hong ci sia bang mihing ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
JOH 5:13 Damna a nga pa in, a kua ci zong he ngawl hi: banghangziam cile tua mun ah mihonpi te om a, Jesus sia ama le ama na ki heam zo hi.
JOH 5:14 Tuazawkciang Jesus in tua pa biakinn sungah mu a, En in, na dam zo hi: mawna vawt nawn heak in, tabang a hibale na tungah a nasia zaw hong theng tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 5:15 Tua pa pai in, keima hong damsak pa sia Jesus hi, ci Judah mite son hi.
JOH 5:16 Tua ahikom Judah te in Jesus vawtsia in, thatlum tu in zong uh hi, banghangziam cile sabbath ni in hibang te a sep hang a hihi.
JOH 5:17 Ahihang Jesus in, Ka Pa sia tu dong in na seam a, keima zong seam khi hi, ci in amate zo hi.
JOH 5:18 Tua ahikom Judah te in Ama that tu in nasia seseam in zong uh hi, banghangziam cile sabbath ni paltan bek domngawl in, Pathian zong Ama Pa ci a, Ama le Ama sia Pathian taw kikimsak hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 5:19 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in, A mantak in kong ci hi, Tapa in ama thu in bangma seam thei ngawl hi, ahihang Pa i sep bang in seam hi: banghangziam cile Pa i a sep theampo sia Tapa in zong seam hi.
JOH 5:20 Banghangziam cile Pa in Tapa it a, a sep theampo te lak siat hi: taciang hi te sang in a lianzaw nasep te zong lak tu a, lamdang na sa tu uh hi.
JOH 5:21 Banghangziam cile Pa in mithi te thokiksak a, nungtasak hi; tasia bangma in Tapa in zong a nuntaksak nop te nungtasak hi.
JOH 5:22 Banghangziam cile Pa in kuama thukhen ngawl hi, ahihang thukhenna theampo Tapa tungah ap siat hi:
JOH 5:23 Tua ahikom Pa a zakta peuma in Tapa zong a zatak tu uh a hihi. Tapa a zakta ngawl peuma in Ama a sawl Pa a zakta bua hi.
JOH 5:24 A tatak in kong ci hi, ka kammal za a, kei hong sawl pa a um peuma in, tawntung nuntakna nei hi, taciang mawsiatna sungah theng ngawl tu hi; ahihang thina pan in nuntakna ah kantan zo hi.
JOH 5:25 A tatak in kong ci hi, mithi te in Pathian Tapa kammal a zak uh hun hong theng tu a, tu mama zong hi zo hi: taciang a za peuma a nungta tu uh hi.
JOH 5:26 Banghangziam cile Pa in ama sung mama ah nuntakna nei hi; tua ahikom Tapa in zong ama sung mama ah nuntakna nei tu in, pia zo hi;
JOH 5:27 Tapa i tungah thukhen theina thuneina pia hi, banghangziam cile ama sia mihing Tapa a hihi.
JOH 5:28 Hi thu te lamdangsa heak vun: banghangziam cile than sung a omte theampo in Ama aw a zak tu uh hun hong theng tu a,
JOH 5:29 Amate Thankuul sung panin hong pusuak tu hi; na pha a seam ngei te tho in nungta tu a, siatna vawt te tho in mawna thukhenna thuak tu hi.
JOH 5:30 Keima aituam bangma seam thei ngawl khi hi: ka zakna bang in thukhen khi hi: taciang ka thukhenna sia thutang hi; banghangziam cile keima deina ka zong bua hi, ahihang keima hong sawl Pa deina ka zong hi.
JOH 5:31 Keima le Keima tetti ka kipang le, ka tettipanna man ngawl hi.
JOH 5:32 Keima atu in tetti a pang tu ngual dang khat om hi; taciang keima thu tetti a pan na sia man hi, ci ka he hi.
JOH 5:33 Note in John kungah na sawl uh a, taciang ama in thutak atu in tettipang hi.
JOH 5:34 Ahihang mihing kung pan in tetti panna sang ngawl khi hi: ahihang hi thu te note ngupna na nga thei natu uh in ka son a hihi.
JOH 5:35 John sia a kuang le a tang khuavak a hihi: taciang note ama i khuavak sungah hunkhat sung nuam na sa uh hi.
JOH 5:36 Ahihang John sang in a lianzaw tetti nei khi hi: banghangziam cile Pa in zaw tu in hongpiak nasep te ka seam hi, tua nasep te in keima sia Pa i hong sawl hi, ci tettipang hi.
JOH 5:37 Taciang kei hongsawl Pa ama vateak in ka thu tettipang hi. Note in Ama aw sia bangma hun in na za ngei bua uh hi, a meal zong na mu ngei bua uh hi.
JOH 5:38 A thu note sungah na kipsak bua uh hi: banghangziam cile ama i a sawl pa na um bua uh hi.
JOH 5:39 Tawntung nuntakna om hi, ci na ngaisut uh hu in, laithiangtho sungah na zong uh hi; ahihang laithiangtho in keima thu tettipang hi.
JOH 5:40 Ahihang nuntakna nga tu in ka kungah nong pai nuam bua uh hi.
JOH 5:41 Mihing te kung pan in upatna ka sang bua hi.
JOH 5:42 Ahihang note sungah Pathian itna nei ngawl nu hi, ci kong he hi.
