JOH 5:43 Ka Pa min taw kong pai hi, ahihang note in hong sang ngawl nu hi: ngualdang khat ama min taw hongpai le, note in na sang tu uh hi.
JOH 5:44 Khat le khat kung pan in zatakna sang a, Pathian kung pan bek in zatakna a zong ngawl peuma, bangbang in um thei tu nu ziam?
JOH 5:45 Keima in Pa kungah kong mawsiat tu hi, ci ngaisun heak vun: note hong mawsiat tu khat om a, tasia in note i na muan mama uh Moses a hihi.
JOH 5:46 Banghangziam cile Moses um hile uhte, keima zong hong um tu nu hi: banghangziam cile Moses in keima thu at hi.
JOH 5:47 Ahihang ama i at te na um bua uh a hile, ka kammal te bangbang in um thei tu nu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 6:1 Hi teng zawkciang in, Jesus sia Galilee tuili ah pai hi, tua mun sia Tiberias tuili a hihi.
JOH 6:2 Taciang mihon tampi in Ama zui uh hi, banghangziam cile cina te tungah a vawt nalamdang te a mu uh hang a hihi.
JOH 6:3 Jesus mual tungah kato a, tua mun ah nungzui te taw to khawm uh hi.
JOH 6:4 Taciang Judah te paisanpoai hong nai zo hi.
JOH 6:5 Jesus khua a dak ciang in mihon tampi Ama kungah hongpai mu a, Philip kungah, Hi te i neak tu anluum koisung pan lei tu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 6:6 Hibang in a ci sia Philip a ze-et nop hang a hihi: banghangziam cile Ama in bang ka seam tu ci hekhol zo hi.
JOH 6:7 Philip in, mi khatsim in tawm tek ne tu ahizong, dangka za ni man anluum zong kicing zo ngawl tu hi, ci zo hi.
JOH 6:8 A nungzui te sung pan khat, Simon Peter suapui pa Andrew in,
JOH 6:9 Hiak ah patang khat om a, ama in bali anluum nga le ngasa no ni nei hi: ahihang mihing tam mama sungah, bang son thamman tu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 6:10 Jesus in, Mipi te tosak vun, ci hi. Tua mun ah lopa tam mama om hi. Tua ahikom mipite to uh a, tul nga bang pha uh hi.
JOH 6:11 Jesus in anluum te la a; lungdam a ko zawkciang in, a nungzui te kungah hawmsak hi, taciang a nungzui te in a to te hawmsak hi; tasia bangma in ngasa te zong amate dei za in hawmsak hi.
JOH 6:12 Amate a kham zawk uh ciang, Jesus in a nungzui te kungah, Bangma bo thong ngawl tu in a omlai teng kaikhawm tavun, ci hi.
JOH 6:13 Tua ahikom bali anluum nga a neak zawk uh ciang in a neak mong uh teng amate in tawm uh a, a kaikhop uh ciang in, bawm sawm le bawm ni dim hi.
JOH 6:14 Amate in Jesus i sep nalamdang te a mu uh ciang in, leitung ah hongpai tu hi, a kici kamsang sia Ama tatak hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 6:15 Tua ahikom Jesus in, amate hongpai in zawthawk thu taw kumpi hong seamsak tu hi, ci a heak ciang in, mualtung ah ama nguak pai hi.
JOH 6:16 Nitak sang ciang in, Jesus a nungzui te tuili sangah tuaksuk uh hi,
JOH 6:17 Ngunkuang sungah to uh a, tuili ngalkhat Capernaum sangah pai uh hi. Taciang khua hong zing hikale Jesus sia amate kungah hongpai ngawl lai hi.
JOH 6:18 Hui nasiatak in hong va ahikom, tuihual te kilok ngawp hi.
JOH 6:19 Tua ahikom amate in ngunkuang sia tai thum tai li bang a hot zawk uh ciang, Jesus tuitung ah lampai in, ngunkuang sangah hong nai va-ial a mu uh ciang in amate lau mama uh hi.
JOH 6:20 Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Keima khi hi; lau heak vun, ci hi.
JOH 6:21 Tuazawkciang in amate in Jesus lungdamtak in ngunkuang sungah tosak uh hi: taciang ngunkuang zong amate pai natu ngam ah tawmvei sung in theng hi.
JOH 6:22 A zingciang in, tuili ngalkhat sangah a ding te in Jesus nungzui te i to na simngawl, ngunkuang dang om ngawl hi, ci mu uh hi, taciang Jesus a nungzui te taw ngunkuang sungah tum ngawl hi, ahihang a nungzui te amate bek pai uh hi;
JOH 6:23 Ahihang Topa in lungdam a ko zawkciang in, anluum a neak tekna uh Tiberias nai pan in ngunkuang dangte hongpai hi.
JOH 6:24 Tua ahikom, mite in Jesus le a nungzui te tua mun ah om ngawl hi, ci a mu uh ciang in, amate zong ngunkuang to uh a, Jesus zong tu in Capernaum ah pai tek uh hi.
JOH 6:25 Amate in tuili ngalkhat ah, Jesus a mu uh ciang in, Rabbi, hiak ah bang hun in pai ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 6:26 Jesus in, A tatak in kong ci hi, nalamdang na mu uh hang bek in hong zong na hi bua uh a, anluum khamteak in na neak uh hang in hong zong nu hi.
JOH 6:27 A kisia thei an atu in naseam heak vun, ahihang tawntung nuntakna ciangdong a kho tu, mihing Tapa in note tungah hongpiak tu an atu in seam zaw vun: banghangziam cile Pa Pathian in ceptena khen zo hi, ci hi.
JOH 6:28 Tuazawkciang in amate in, Pathian nasep te ka sep thei natu uh in bang seam tu khu ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 6:29 Jesus in amate tung ah, A ki sawl pa na um uh le Pathian naseam na hi uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 6:30 Amate in, mu in ka up thei natu uh in, bang musakna hong lak tu ni ziam? a bang vawt tu ni ziam?
JOH 6:31 Laithiangtho sungah a ki atsa bang in, ka pa te uh in senneal ngam ah mana ne ngei uh hi; ama in neak tu in vanpan in anluum pia hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 6:32 Jesus in, A tatak in kong ci hi, Moses in van pan in anluum hong pia ngawl hi; ahihang ka Pa in van pan in anluum tatak note hong pia hi.
JOH 6:33 Banghangziam cile Pathian i hongpiak anluum sia vantung pan in tuaksuk a, leitung nuntakna pia tu pa a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 6:34 Amate in, Topa awng, hi anluum sia a tawntung in hong pia tan, ci uh hi.
JOH 6:35 Jesus in amate tung ah, Keima sia nuntakna anluum ka hihi: ka kung hongpai peuma a ngilkial kik nawn ngawl tu hi; keima hong um peuma a dangtak kik nawn ngawl tu hi.
JOH 6:36 Ahihang ka sonsa bang in, note in hong mu zo napi, hong um ngawl nu hi.
JOH 6:37 Pa in hongpiak theampo ka kungah hongpai tu hi; taciang ka kung hongpai peuma ka hawlkhia ngei batu hi.
JOH 6:38 Banghangziam cile keima deina bang seam tu in vantung pan kong tuaksuk bua hi, ahihang hong sawlpa deina seam tu in hong tuaksuk ka hihi.
JOH 6:39 Keima hongpiak theampo khatzong bosua ngawl tu in, ni tawpkhak ni ciang, thawkiksak tu sia keima hong sawlpa i deina a hihi.
JOH 6:40 Tapa a mu peuma in ama um a, tawntung nuntakna nei tu le ni tawpkhak ni ciang in keima in ka thawkiksak tu sia keima hong sawlpa i deina a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 6:41 Keima sia vantung pan hong tuaksuk anluum ka hihi, a ci hu in Judah mite phun uh hi.
JOH 6:42 Taciang amate in, hi Jesus sia Joseph i tapa hi ngawl ziam, a pa le a nu te zong i heak hi ngawl ziam? bangbang in van pan in hong tuaksuk khi hi, ci thei ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 6:43 Tua ahikom Jesus in, Note sungah phun teaptup heak vun,
JOH 6:44 Keima hong sawlpa in hong kai bale, kuama ka kungah hongpai thei ngawl hi: taciang keima in ni tawpkhak ni ciang in ka thokiksak tu hi.
JOH 6:45 Kamsang te laibu sungah, amate a vekpi in Pathian i hil te hi tu uh hi. Tua ahikom a za peuma le Pa kung pan a sin te ka kungah hongpai hi, ci in atkhol hi.
JOH 6:46 Hibang ka ci ciang in, khatpo in Pa mu zo hi, cinopna hi ngawl hi, Pathian kung pan in hongpaipa bekma in Pa a mu hi.
JOH 6:47 A tatak in kong ci hi, keima hong um peuma in tawntung nuntakna nei hi.
JOH 6:48 Keima sia tua nuntakna anluum ka hihi.
JOH 6:49 Na pa te uh in senneal ngamsung ah mana ne napi uh a, thi siat veve hi.
JOH 6:50 Hisia in vantung pan hong tuaksuk anluum a hihi, tua anluum a ne peuma a thi bua tu hi.
JOH 6:51 Keima in vantung pan hongpai a nungta anluum ka hihi. Khat po in hi anluum a ne le nungta tawntung tu hi, taciang ka piak tu anluum zong ka taksa hi a, tua in leitung mite nuntakna atu ka piak a hihi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 6:52 Tua ahikom Judah mite in, hisia pa in bangbang in a taksa sia neak tu in hong pia thei tu ziam? ci in amate le amate ki nial uh hi.
JOH 6:53 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci hi, mihing Tapa i taksa na ne bua uh a, a thisan na dawn bua uh le, na sung uh ah nuntakna na nei bua uh hi.
JOH 6:54 A kuamapo in ka taksa ne a, ka thisan a dawn peuma in, tawntung nuntakna nei hi; taciang ni tawpkhak ni ciang in ka thokiksak tu hi.
JOH 6:55 Banghangziam cile ka taksa sia an tatak hi a, ka thisan sia dawn tu tatak a hihi.
JOH 6:56 Ka taksa ne a, ka thisan a dawn peuma, keima sungah om hi, taciang keima zong ama sungah ka om hi.
JOH 6:57 A nungta Pa in kei hong sawl a, taciang Pa hang in ka nungta hi: tua ahikom ka taksa a ne peuma, keima hang in nungta tu hi.
JOH 6:58 Hi thu sia vantung pan hong tuaksuk anluum a hihi: na pate uh mana ne a, a thi uh bang hi ngawl hi: hi anluum a ne peuma a tawntung in nungta tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 6:59 Hi thu te Capernaum khua synagogue sungah thu a hil lai in, ahil thu a hihi.
JOH 6:60 Tua ahikom a nungzui tampi te in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, hi thu haksa lei hi; a kua in ngai zo tu ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 6:61 Jesus in a nungzui te phun uh hi, ci a heak ciang in, amate tung ah, Hi thu in hong puksak ziam?
JOH 6:62 Mihing Tapa ama omna ah a kato mu le uhte, bang na ci tu uh ziam?
JOH 6:63 Nuntakna a pia sia Pathian i Thaa a hihi; cilesa sia bangma phattuamna nei ngawl hi: note tungah kong son kammal te sia, thaa le nuntakna a hihi.
JOH 6:64 Ahihang note sungah mi pawlkhat te in na um bua uh hi, ci hi. Banghangziam cile Jesus in a kipatcil pan kipan in a um ngawl te le, ama a leheak tu sia a heakkholsa hi zo hi.
JOH 6:65 Tua ahikom kong ci hi, Pa in hongpiak te simngawl kuama ka kungah hongpai thei ngawl hi, ci hi.
JOH 6:66 Tua hun pan kipan in nungzui tampi te heakkik uh a, Ama taw ki thawl nawn ngawl uh hi.
JOH 6:67 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in a nungzui sawmleni te kungah, Note zong nong paisan nuam uh ziam? ci hi.
JOH 6:68 Simon Peter in, Topa awng, a kua kungah pai tu khu ziam? nangma in tawntung nuntakna kammal te na nei hi.
JOH 6:69 Nangma sia a nungta Pathian Tapa Christ na hihi, ci um in ka he uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 6:70 Jesus in, Sawmle ni hong teal hi ngawl khi ziam? taciang note sungah khat sia doai a hihi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 6:71 Ama in Simon tapa Judah Iscariot thu a son a hihi: banghangziam cile nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat hi napi, Ama a leheak pa a hihi.
JOH 7:1 Hibang teng zawkciang in, Jesus Galilee huam sungah pai hi: banghangziam cile Judah mite in that nuam ahikom Judah ngam sungah pai ngawl hi.
JOH 7:2 Tu in Judah te i biakbuk poai hong nai zo hi.
JOH 7:3 Tua ahikom a suapui te in Jesus kungah, na vawt nasep te na nungzui te zong in a mu thei natu in, hi mun pan Judah ngam sungah pai tan.
JOH 7:4 Banghangziam cile a kilang in ngual heak tu a dei te kuama in a thimtham in seam ngawl hi. Hibang te na vawt ahile leitung mite kungah nangma le nangma ki pualak in, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:5 Banghangziam cile a suapui te in zong Ama a um bua uh hi.
JOH 7:6 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Ka hun hong theng ngawl lai hi: ahihang note atu a tawntung in hunpha a hihi.
JOH 7:7 Leitung in note hong ensan thei ngawl hi; ahihang kei hong ensan hi, banghangziam cile amate nasep phangawl hi, ci tetti ka pang hi.
JOH 7:8 Hi poai ah pai tavun: kei hile ka hun cing ngawl lai ahikom pai ngawl lai tu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 7:9 Hi thu te a son laitak in, Ama sia Galilee ah om nginge lai hi.
JOH 7:10 Ahihang a suapui te a pai zawkciang in, Jesus zong poai ah hongpai a, a kilang ngawl in pai ku hi.
JOH 7:11 Tuazawkciang in poai mun ah Judah te in Ama zong uh a, koisung ah om ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 7:12 Taciang mipi te sungah Jesus thu taw kisai in phun teaptup uh hi: banghangziam cile mi pawlkhat te in, Ama sia mipha hi, ci uh a: a dang te in, hi ngawl hi; Ama in ngual theam hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:13 Ahihang Judah mite a lau uh hu in kuama in a kilang in a pau ngam bua uh hi.
JOH 7:14 Tu in poai a lang bang a man ciang Jesus biakinn sungah pai a, thuhil hi.
JOH 7:15 Judah mite in lamdangsa in, hi sia pa sia sin le sin ngei ngawl napi, bangbang in lai he thei ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 7:16 Jesus in, Kong hil thu sia keima a hi ngawl hi, ahihang keima hong sawlpa i hilna a hihi.
JOH 7:17 Mihing khatpo in Pathian deina a seam tu ahile, ka hilna sia Pathian kung pan maw, a hibale keima thinsung suak hi zaw, ci he tu hi.
JOH 7:18 Ama thinsung suak a hil peuma in ama minthanna tu zong hi: ahihang ama a sawlpa atu in minthanna a zong sia mipha a hihi, taciang ama sungah thuman ngawl na om ngawl hi.
JOH 7:19 Moses in note thukham hong pia hi ngawl ziam? ahihang kuama in thukham na zui bua uh hi, Banghang in hong that nuam nu ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 7:20 Mipi te in, doai vei ni hi: kua in hong that nuam na ziam? ci zo uh hi.
JOH 7:21 Jesus in amate tung ah, Nasep khat ka seam a, na vekpi in lamdang na sa uh hi.
JOH 7:22 Tua ahikom Moses in vunteap atna thu hong pia hi; (hi sia in Moses hang hi ngawl in, pu le pa te hang a hihi;) taciang note in sabbath ni in vunteap at nu hi.
JOH 7:23 Moses thukham paltan ngawl tu in khatpo in sabbath ni in vunteap ki at a hile, banghang in sabbath ni in mihing khat ka damsak hang in ka tungah thin-uk nu ziam?
JOH 7:24 Maitang en in thukhen heak vun, ahihang a man thukhenna taw thukhen vun, ci hi.
JOH 7:25 Tuazawkciang in Jerusalem pan mi pawlkhat te in, ngual i thatlum nuam in a zon uh sia hi sia pa hi ngawl ziam?
JOH 7:26 Ahihang, en vun, hangsantak in thuhil a, amate in bangma ci thei ngawl hi. Ngam uk te in hisia pa sia Christ tatak hi, ci a he takpi uh ziam?
JOH 7:27 Ahihang hisia pa sia a kua ziam, ci i he bua hi: ahihang Christ hongpai ciang in, koisung pan hongpai, ci sia kuama in he ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:28 Jesus sia biakinn sungah thu a hil kawm in au a, Note in hong he nu hi, taciang koisung pan hongpai, ci zong hong he nu hi: ahihang kei hong sawlpa sia thuman hi a, note in Ama na he bua uh hi.
JOH 7:29 Ahihang keima in Ama ka he hi: banghangziam cile keima sia Ama kung pan ka hi a, Ama in hong sawl hi, ci hi.
JOH 7:30 Tuazawkciang in amate in Jesus mat sawm uh hi: ahihang kuama in man ngam ngawl hi, banghangziam cile a hun cing ngawl lai hi.
JOH 7:31 Taciang mi tampi te in Ama um uh a, Christ hongpai ciang in, hi sia pa i vawt sang in a tamzaw nalamdang te vawt tu hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:32 Pharisee te in Jesus thu taw kisai in mite a phunna thu za uh hi; taciang Pharisee te le thiampi lian te in Jesuh man tu in palik te paisak hi.
JOH 7:33 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Tawmvei sung note taw kong omkhawm tu hi, taciang kei hong sawlpa kungah pai tu khi hi.
JOH 7:34 Note in nong zong tu uh a, ahihang nong mu bua tu uh hi: ka omna mun ah note nong pai thei bua tu uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 7:35 Tuazawkciang in Judah te in amate sungah, ei i mu ngawl tu in koisung pai tu ziam? Gentile mite sungah a ki thethang te kung pai in, Gentile mite hil tu a hi tu ziam?
JOH 7:36 Note in nong zong tu uh a, ahihang hong mu ngawl tu nu hi: ka omna mun ah note nong pai thei bua tu uh hi, a ci sia bang a cinopna hi tu ziam? ci tek uh hi.
JOH 7:37 Poai ni a khakbel, ni thupi ni in, Jesus hong ding a, Khatpo a dang a tak le, ka kungah hongpai tahen a, dawn tahen.
JOH 7:38 Keima hong um peuma laithiangtho in a ci bang in, a pumpi sung pan in a nungta nguntui luang tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 7:39 Ahihang hithu sia Jesus in Ama a umte in a san tu Thaa thu a sonna a hihi: banghangziam cile Jesus vang ki liansak ngawl lai ahikom in Tha Thiangtho ki pia ngawl hi.
JOH 7:40 Tua ahikom in mi tampi in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, hisia pa sia kamsang tatak hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:41 Midang te in, hisia Christ hi, ci uh hi. Ahihang pawlkhat te in, Galilee pan Christ hongpai tu ziam?
JOH 7:42 Laithiangtho in, Christ sia David suan sung pan hongpai tu hi, taciang David omna Bethlehem khuapi pan hongpai tu hi, ci hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 7:43 Tua ahikom, Jesus hang in mite sungah ki khenna hong om hi.
JOH 7:44 Pawlkhat te in man nuam uh hi napi; ahihang kuama in khut a nga ngam bua uh hi.
JOH 7:45 Tuazawkciang in, palik te thiampi lian le Pharisee te kungah hongpai uh a; amate in, banghang in Jesus hong paipui ngawl nu ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 7:46 Palik te in, hisia pa bang in kuama in thuhil ngei ngawl hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 7:47 Tuazawkciang in Pharisee te in, note zong hong theam tha zo ziam?
JOH 7:48 Ngam uk te le Pharisee te sungah Ama a um om zo ziam?
JOH 7:49 Ahihang thukham a he ngawl hi mite sia hamsiat thuak te a hi uh hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 7:50 Pharisee te sung pan mi khat a hi, zan lai in Jesus kungah a pai Nicodemus in, amate tung ah,
JOH 7:51 Ih thukham in mi khat sia a thu ngai masa ngawl in le a vawtna he masa ngawl in thukhen ziam? ci hi.
JOH 7:52 Amate in zo kik a, nangma zong Galilee mi ni ziam? kan in a, en in: banghangziam cile Galilee pan in kamsang piang ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 7:53 Taciang amate inn tek ah cia siat uh hi.
JOH 8:1 Jesus Olive mualtung ah pai hi.
JOH 8:2 Taciang zingtung in biakinn sungah paikik a, mi theampo a kungah hongpai uh hi; taciang to in, amate thuhil hi.
JOH 8:3 Taciang thukhamhil te le Pharisee te in palngul mawna a vawt laitak a mat numei khat hong paipui uh a; a laizang ah a koi zawk uh ciang,
JOH 8:4 Jesus kungah, Syapa awng, hi numei nu sia palngul mawna a vawt laitak in a kiman a hihi.
JOH 8:5 Tu in Moses in thukham sungah hibang te suangtum taw den tu in thu hong pia hi: ahihang nang bangbang ci tu ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 8:6 Amate in hibang in a ci uh sia, Jesus a mawsiat thei natu uh in aita a hi uh hi. Ahihang Jesus in a za ngawl bang in kun a, lei ah a khutzung taw lai at hi.
JOH 8:7 Amate in a ki zom in thu a dok uh ciang in, Jesus vandakto a amate tung ah, Note sungah mawna a nei ngawl sia in deang masa tahen, ci hi.
JOH 8:8 Taciang kun kik a, lei ah lai atkik leleau hi.
JOH 8:9 Tua thu amate in za uh a, sia le pha heakna in amate mawna kiphawksak ahi man in u hambel pan khat zawkciang khat a khakbel dong in nusia uh hi: Jesus bek nusia uh a, numei nu sia a lai ah ding nginge hi.
JOH 8:10 Jesus a dakto kik ciang in, numei nu simngawl kuama mu ngawl hi, Jesus in numei nu kungah, Nangma hong mawsiat te koisung ziam? kuama in hong mawsak ngawl ahi ziam? ci hi.
JOH 8:11 Numei nu in, Topa awng, kuama in hong mawsak ngawl hi, ci hi. Jesus in ama kungah, Kei zong hong mawsak ngawl khi hi: pai tan a, mawna vawt nawn heak in, ci hi.
JOH 8:12 Jesus in amate paupui kik a, Keima sia leitung khuavak ka hihi: ka nung hong zui peuma khuazing sungah vak ngawl tu hi, ahihang nuntakna i khuavak nei tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:13 Tua ahikom Pharisee te in Jesus kungah, nangma thu sia nangma ma in tetti na pang hi, na tetti pan na man ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 8:14 Jesus in amate zo kik a, Keima thu keima ma in tettipang hi ka leng, ka tettipanna sia man veve hi: banghangziam cile koisungpan kong pai, ci le koisung ah pai tu, ci ka he hi, ahihang kongpan kong pai cile koisung ah pai tu ci note in nong son thei bua uh hi.
JOH 8:15 Note in ci le sa zui in thu na khen uh hi; kei ka hile kuama thu ka khen bua hi.
JOH 8:16 Taciang thu ka khen hial zong, ka thukhenna man hi: banghangziam cile keima bek hi ngawl khi hi, ahihang keima le hong sawlpa taw ka hi uh hi.
JOH 8:17 Na thukham uh sungah zong, mihing ni i tettipanna sia man hi, ci ki at hi.
JOH 8:18 Keima thu sia keima in tetti ka pang hi, taciang hongsawl Pa in keima thu tettipang hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:19 Tuazawkciang in amate in Jesus kungah, na Pa koisung ziam? ci uh hi. Jesus in, Note in nong he bua uh hi, taciang ka Pa zong na he bua uh hi: keima hong he le uhte, ka Pa zong na he tu uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 8:20 Hi thu te sia Jesus in biakinn sungah thu a hil kawm in, sumpi kuang koina mun ah a son thu a hihi: taciang kuama in Ama a man ngam bua uh hi; banghangziam cile a hun a cing balai hi.
JOH 8:21 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Ka pai natu lampi ah ka pai tu a, note in nong zong tu uh hi, taciang na mawna uh sungah na thi tu uh hi: ka pai na mun ah note nong pai thei bua tu uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:22 Tuazawkciang in Judah mite in, ka pai na mun ah note nong pai thei bua tu uh hi, ci ahikom, Ama le Ama ki that tu a hi tu ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 8:23 Jesus in amate tung ah, Note sia nuailam mi na hi uh hi; kei sia tunglam mi ka hihi: note hileitung mi na hi uh hi; keima sia leitung mi ka hi bua hi.
JOH 8:24 Tua ahikom, na mawna uh sungah na thi tu uh hi, ci note tungah kong ci hi: banghangziam cile keima sia Ama khi hi, ci na up ngawl uh hu in na mawna uh sungah na thi tu uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:25 Tuazawkciang in amate in, Nang a kua ni ziam? ci uh hi. Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, A kipatcil pan kipan in kong son sa bangma ka hihi.
JOH 8:26 Note tungah kong son tu le thu ka khen tu tampi om hi: ahihang kei hong sawlpa sia a thuman hi; taciang Ama tung pan ka zak thu te leitung mite tungah ka son hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:27 Jesus in Pa thu a son na amate in a tel bua uh hi.
JOH 8:28 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Mihing Tapa na khai uh ciang in keima sia Ama khi hi, ci le, keima thu taw bangma vawt ngawl khi hi; ahihang Pa in hong hilna bang in, hi thu te kong son hi, ci na he tu uh hi.
JOH 8:29 Taciang kei hong sawlpa sia keima taw om hi: Pa in keima bek hong nusia ngawl hi; banghangziam cile Ama lungkim na te ka seam tawntung hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:30 Hi thu te a son zawkciang in, mi tampi in Ama um uh hi.
JOH 8:31 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in Ama a um Judah te tung ah, Ka thu sungah na kip uh a hile, ka nungzui tatak na hi uh hi;
JOH 8:32 Taciang thutak na he tu uh a, tua thutak in hong suaktasak tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:33 Amate in, kote sia Abraham suan te ka hi uh hi, taciang kuama kungah saltang ngei ngawl khu hi: bangbang in nang in, na suakta tu uh hi, hong ci ni ziam? ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 8:34 Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci hi, a kuamapo mawna a vawt peuma mawna i sila a hihi.
JOH 8:35 Taciang sila sia a tawntung in innsung ah om tawntung ngawl hi: ahihang Tapa ahile om tawntung hi.
JOH 8:36 Tua ahikom Tapa in hong suaktasak a hile, na suakta takpi tu uh hi.
JOH 8:37 Note sia Abraham suan te na hi uh hi, ci ka he hi; ahihang keima that tu in hong zong nu hi, banghangziam cile ka thu in note sungah mun nei ngawl hi.
JOH 8:38 Ka Pa taw ka mu thu te ka son hi: taciang na pa uh taw na mu uh te na vawt uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:39 Amate in, Abraham sia ka pa uh hi, ci in zo uh hi. Jesus in amate tung ah, Abraham i tate na hi uh le, Abraham i nasep te seam tu nu hi.
JOH 8:40 Ahihang tu in, Pathian tung pan ka zak thutak a son keima hong that nuam in hong zong nu hi: Abraham in hibang te vawt ngawl hi.
JOH 8:41 Note in na pa uh i septe na seam uh hi, ci hi. Tuazawkciang in amate in, kote paktat na pan a piang lamlakta hi ngawl khu hi; Pa khat ka nei uh a, tasia in Pathian a hihi, ci uh hi.
JOH 8:42 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian sia na Pa uh hile, keima hong it tu nu hi: banghangziam cile keima sia Pathian kungpan piang in hongpai ka hihi; keima thu in kongpai bua hi, ahihang Ama in hong sawl hi.
JOH 8:43 Ka thuson te bang hang in um thei ngawl nu ziam? ka thu na zak thei ngawl uh hang a hihi.
JOH 8:44 Note sia na pa uh doaimangpa i tate na hi uh hi, taciang na pa uh i deina bek na seam uh hi. Ama sia a kipatcil pan kipan in tualthat pa a hihi, taciang thutak sungah om ngawl hi, banghangziam cile ama sungah thutak om ngawl hi. Leilotthu a son ciang in, ama i nei te bek son hi: banghangziam cile ama sia leilotthu son pa hi a, leilotthu i pa a hihi.
JOH 8:45 Taciang note in thutak ka son hu in, nong um bua uh hi.
JOH 8:46 Note sungah a kua in ka maw hunlam hong lak thei tu nu ziam? Taciang thutak ka son a hile, banghang in hong um ngawl nu ziam?
JOH 8:47 Pathian mite in Pathian thu ngai uh hi: tua ahikom, note Pathian mi na hi ngawl uh hu in Pathian thu na ngai bua uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:48 Judah mite in zo kik uh a, Nangma sia Samaria mi na hihi, taciang nangma doai vei ni hi, kong ci uh sia man hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 8:49 Jesus in, Doai vei ngawl khi hi; note in hong zakta ngawl nu hi, ahihang keima in ka Pa ka zakta hi.
JOH 8:50 Taciang keima minthanna tu zong ngawl khi hi: ama minthan natu zong in thu a khen khat om hi.
JOH 8:51 A tatak in kong ci hi, khatpo in ka kammal a zui le bangmahun in thina mu ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:52 Tuazawkciang in Judah te in, tu in doai vei ni hi, ci ka he uh hi. Abraham le kamsang te thi siat zo hi; ahihang nangma in, khatpo in ka thu a zui le bangmahun in thina tep ngawl tu hi, na ci hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 8:53 Nangma sia ka pu uh Abraham sang in thupi zaw ni ziam? Abraham thi zo hi, taciang kamsang te zong thi siat zo hi: nangma le nangma kua ki sa ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 8:54 Jesus in, Keima le keima ka ki thupisak le, tua ka ki thupisak na sia bangma hi ngawl hi: keima hong thuphisak sia ka Pa hi a; note i Pathian na ci uh sia a hihi.
JOH 8:55 Note in Ama na he bua lai uh hi; ahihang keima in ka he hi: taciang keima in ka he bua hi ka ci le, note bangma in leilot thuson ka hi tu hi: ahihang keima in Ama ka he a, a thu zong ka ni hi.
JOH 8:56 Na pa uh Abraham in keima ni mu tu lawp mama hi: taciang mu zo a, angtang mama hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:57 Tuazawkciang in Judah te in a kungah, Nangma sia kum sawm nga zong phangawl lai napi, Abraham mu zo ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 8:58 Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci hi, Abraham pian ma in kei ka om hi, ci hi.
JOH 8:59 Tuazawkciang in amate in suangtum te tawm uh a, den sawm uh hi: ahihang Jesus bu a, biakinn sung pan pusuak hi, taciang amate zanglai pan in kantan hi.
JOH 9:1 Jesus lampi ah a pai laitak in, a pian pan kipan mittaw khat mu hi.
JOH 9:2 A nungzui te in Syapa awng, hisia pa mittaw in a pian sia ama in mawna a vawt hang ziam maw, a hibale a nu le a pa te in mawna a vawt uh hang ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
JOH 9:3 Jesus in, Ama mawna hang hi ngawl hi, taciang a nu le a pa mawna hang zong hi ngawl hi: ahihang Pathian i nasep te ama tung pan a kilang thei natu a hihi.
JOH 9:4 Sun hun ahi lai in keima hong sawlpa i nasep te ka sep hamtang tu a hihi: kuama na a sep thei ngawl hun, zan hong theng tu hi.
JOH 9:5 Leitung ah ka om sung theampo, keima sia leitung i khuavak ka hihi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:6 Jesus in hibang a ci zawkciang in, leitung ah cilsia suk a, a cil taw buannoai vawt hi, taciang mittaw pa i mitte buan noisak hi,
JOH 9:7 Taciang ama tung ah, Pai tan a, Siloam tuili ah sil tan, ci hi. Siloam a khiakna sia, sawl, a cinopna a hihi. Tua ahikom ama zong pai a, a sil zawkciang in, khuamu in cia hi.
JOH 9:8 Tua ahikom a innpam te le, nidang mittaw a hi a mu ngei te in, hisia pa sia, to a khutdaw ngen pa hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 9:9 Pawlkhat te in, hisia ama hi, ci uh a: midang te in, ama tua pa taw kibang hi, ci uh hi: ahihang ama in, keima khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 9:10 Tua ahikom amate in, bangbang in na mit khuamu ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 9:11 Ama in, Jesus a kici khat in buan vawt a, ka mit te hong noisak hi, taciang Siloam tuili ah pai tan a, sil in, hong ci hi: taciang ka pai a ka sil zawkciang in, khuamu khi hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:12 Tuazawkciang in amate in, tua pa koisung ziam? ci uh hi. Ama in, kei he ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 9:13 Tuazawkciang amate in a mittaw ngeipa sia, Pharisee te kungah paipui uh hi.
JOH 9:14 Jesus in leibuan vawt a, a mitte khua a musak sia sabbath ni a hihi.
JOH 9:15 Tuazawkciang in Pharisee te in zong, bangbang in khua mu ni ziam, ci in dongkik uh hi. Ama in ka mit ah leibuan hongkoisak a, ka sil zawkciang in, khuamu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 9:16 Tua ahikom Pharisee pawlkhat te in, hisia pa sia Pathian mi hi ngawl hi, banghangziam cile sabbath ni tang ngawl hi, ci uh hi. Midang te in, mimaw khat in hibang nalamdang te bangbang in vawt thei tu ziam? ci uh hi. Taciang amate sungah kikhen na hong om hi.
JOH 9:17 Amate in mittaw pa kungah, na mit khua hong musak pa bangba na ngaisun ziam? ci kik uh hi. Mittaw pa in, Ama sia kamsang hi, ci hi.
JOH 9:18 Ahihang Judah te in, ama a mittaw ngei a, khuamu kik hi, ci thu a up ngawl uh hu in, a nu le a pa te sam uh hi.
JOH 9:19 Taciang amate in, hisia na tapa uh a pian pan in mittaw na ci uh sia ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
JOH 9:20 A pa le a nu in, hisia ka tapa uh hi, taciang mittaw in piang hi, ci ka he uh hi:
JOH 9:21 Ahihang bangbang in tu in khuamu kik, ci le kua in a mit khuamusak, ci he ngawl khu hi: ama puicing zo hi; ama dong vun: ama in ama atu hong son tu hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 9:22 A nu le a pa in Judah te a lau uh hu in hibang in a ci uh a hihi: banghangziam cile mi khatpo in ama sia Christ hi, ci in a pualak a hile synagogue sung pan hawlkhiat tu in lungkimna nei zo uh hi.
JOH 9:23 Tua ahikom a nu le a pa in, ama sia puicing zo hi; ama dong vun, a ci a hihi.
JOH 9:24 Tuazawkciang in amate in mittaw pa samkik leleau uh a, Pathian pokna pia in: hisia pa sia mawnei hi ci ka he uh hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 9:25 Tua pa in, kei ka hile Ama mawnei a hile a hi ngawl ka he bua hi: ka heak thu khat sia, mittaw ka hi ngei a, tu in khuamu khi hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:26 Tuazawkciang in amate in, na tungah bang hong law ziam? na mitte bangbang in khuamusak ziam? ci in dong leleau uh hi.
JOH 9:27 Ama in, hong son zo khi hi, na za bua uh hi: zakik nuam nu ziam? noma zong Ama nungzui nuam nu ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:28 Tuazawkciang in amate in tua pa sia selno in, nangma sia Ama nungzui na hihi; ahihang kote ka hi uh le Moses nungzui ka hi uh hi.
JOH 9:29 Pathian in Moses paupui hi, ci ka he uh hi: hisia pa sia koisungpan hongpai ci ka he bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 9:30 Tua pa in amate tung ah, koisungpan hongpai ci na heak ngawl uh sia lamdang mama hi, ahihang Ama in ka mit khua hong musak hi.
JOH 9:31 Tu in Pathian in mawnei te kammal ngai ngawl hi, ci ka he uh hi: ahihang mi khatpo in Pathian bia in, a deina a seam le, tua pa i kammal te ngai hi.
JOH 9:32 Leitung kipat pan mittaw in a piang kuama a mit khuamusak, ci i za ngei bua hi.
JOH 9:33 Hisia pa sia Pathian mi ahi buale, bangma vawt thei ngawl tu hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:34 Amate in, Nang sia mawna namcin sung pan piang na hi a, hong hil sawm zaw ni ziam? ci in zo uh a, pua sangah nawt uh hi.
JOH 9:35 Jesus in a puasang ah nawt uh hi ci thu a zak ciang in; tua pa taw ki mu a, Pathian Tapa na um ziam? ci hi.
JOH 9:36 Tua pa in, Topa awng, Ama ka up thei natu in Ama sia a kua ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 9:37 Jesus in ama tung ah, Ama na mu zo hi, taciang nangma taw a kipau sia Ama a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 9:38 Taciang ama in, Topa awng, um khi hi, ci in, Jesus bia hi.
JOH 9:39 Jesus in, Hi leitung ah thukhen tu in kong pai hi, tua thukhenna sia mittaw te in khuamu tu a; khua a mu te mittawsak tu in hongpai ka hihi, ci hi.
JOH 9:40 Jesus kungah a om Pharisee pawlkhat te in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, kote zong ka mit uh taw ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 9:41 Jesus in amate tung ah, Mittaw hile uhte, maw nei ngawl zawsap tu nu hi: ahihang tu in, note in khua ka mu uh hi, na ci uh hu in, a maw lai na hi uh hi.
JOH 10:1 A tatak in kong ci hi, tuukhawk sungah kongkha pan tum ngawl in, mundang pan a kato peuma, nguta le phalak te a hihi.
JOH 10:2 Ahihang kongkha pan a tum sia a hile tuu te i tuucing a hihi.
JOH 10:3 Kongkha cingpa in ama kong hon a; tuu te in ama aw a za uh hi: taciang ama in tuu te a min taw sam in, pusua pui hi.
JOH 10:4 Taciang a tuu te a pusua zawkciang, ama sia tuu te mai ah pai a, tuu te in zui hi: banghangziam cile tuu te in ama aw a he uh hi.
JOH 10:5 Amate in ngualdang nung zui ngawl tu uh hi, a kung pan tai zaw tu uh hi: banghangziam cile amate in ngualdang te aw a he bua uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 10:6 Jesus in hi sontena amate tungah son hi: ahihang amate in bangson ci a he bua uh hi.
JOH 10:7 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci hi, keima in tuu kongpi ka hihi.
JOH 10:8 Ka mai ah hongpai sa theampo sia nguta le phalak te a hi uh hi: ahihang tuu te in amate aw a ngai bua hi.
JOH 10:9 Keima in kongkha ka hihi: mi khatpo keima tawn in a tum a hile, ki ngum tu hi, taciang in sungtang le pusuak tu a, lono hing a mu tu hi.
JOH 10:10 Nguta in ngu tu, that tu le susia tu bek in hongpai hi: kei ka hile amate in nuntakna a nei thei natu le a dimlet nuntakna a nei thei natu in kongpai hi.
JOH 10:11 Keima in tuucing pha ka hihi: tuucing pha in a tuu te atu in a nuntakna pia hi.
JOH 10:12 Ahihang tuucing a hi ngawl, tuu nei pa zong hi ngawl, a kicial tawm tuucing pa in, ngia hongpai a mu ciang, tuu te nusia in, taisan hi: taciang ngia in tuu te man a, ki thethang siat hi.
JOH 10:13 A kicial tawm tuucing pa sia tai hi, banghangziam cile ama sia sum thalaw hi a, tuu te awlmawk ngawl hi.
JOH 10:14 Keima in tuucing pha ka hihi, keima in ka tuu te ka he hi, taciang ka tuu te in zong hong he uh hi.
JOH 10:15 Pa in keima hong heak bang in, keima in zong Pa ka he hi: taciang ka tuu te atu in ka nuntakna ka pia hi.
JOH 10:16 Taciang hi tuukhawk sungah a theng ngawl lai tuu dang te ka nei lai hi: amate zong ka paipui tu hi, taciang amate in ka aw ngai tu uh a; tuukhawk khat le tuucing khat suak tu uh hi.
JOH 10:17 Tua ahikom ka Pa in keima hong it hi, banghangziam cile ka nuntakna ka lak kik thei tu in ka pia hi.
JOH 10:18 Ka nuntakna sia kuama in kei tung pan in la ngawl hi, ahihang keima thu in ka piak a hihi. Piak thei natu vangletna ka nei a, lakkik thei natu vangletna zong ka nei hi. Hi thupiak sia ka Pa tung pan in ka nga a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 10:19 Hi thu te hang in Judah mite sungah ki khenna omkik hi.
JOH 10:20 Mitampi in, Ama in doai vei a, a thin-am hi; banghang in a thu ngai nu ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 10:21 Ngual dang te in, hibang te sia doai vei te i kammal te hi ngawl hi. Doai in mittaw te khua musak thei ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 10:22 Taciang Jerusalem ah apna poai om a, tua hun sia phalbi hun a hihi.
JOH 10:23 Jesus biakinn sung, Solomon talaap sungah pai hi.
JOH 10:24 Tuazawkciang in Judah mite hongpai uh a, Jesus kim um uh hi, taciang banghun ciangdong hong lungmangsak lai tu ni ziam? Nangma sia Christ na hile, a thiang in hong son tan, ci uh hi.
JOH 10:25 Jesus in, Kong son zo hi, taciang note in um ngawl nu hi: ka Pa min taw ka vawt nasep te in, keima atu in tettipang hi.
JOH 10:26 Ahihang kong son sa bang in, ka tuu te na hi ngawl uh hu in, um ngawl na hi uh hi.
JOH 10:27 Ka tuu te in ka aw hong ngai hi, taciang keima in amate ka he hi, taciang amate in hong zui uh hi.
JOH 10:28 Taciang amate tung ah, tawntung nuntakna ka pia a; bangmahun in kisia ngei nawn ngawl tu hi, kuama in zong ka khutsung pan hong sut thei ngawl tu hi.
JOH 10:29 Ka tungah hong pia ka Pa sia na theampo sang in lianzaw hi; taciang amate kuama in ka Pa khut sung pan hong sut thei ngwl tu hi.
JOH 10:30 Ka pa le keima sia khat ka hi uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 10:31 Tuazawkciang in Judah mite in Ama sep tu in suangtum tawm leleau uh hi.
JOH 10:32 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pa kung pan in nasep pha tampi kong lak zo hi; tua nasep te atu in suangtum taw hong sep na hi uh ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 10:33 Judah mite in zo kik uh a, nasep pha atu in suangtum taw kong sep bua uh hi; ahihang Pathian min na daisak hang a hihi; taciang mihing hi napi, nangma le nangma Pathian in na ki vawt hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 10:34 Jesus in amate zo kik a, Na thukham uh sungah, note sia pathian te na hi uh hi, ci in ki at hi ngawl ziam?
JOH 10:35 Amate tung pan Pathian kammal hongpai a hikom in, pathian te, kici a hile, laithiangtho ki paltan thei ngawl hi.
JOH 10:36 Keima sia Pa in hong thiangthosak a, leitung ah hong sawl hi, keima sia Pathian Tapa ka hihi, ka ci hu in Pathian mindaisak ni hi, hong ci na hi uh ziam?
JOH 10:37 Ka Pa i nasep te ka seam bua a hile, hong um heak vun.
JOH 10:38 Ahihang ka seam a hile, keima nong um bua uh zong, ka nasep te um vun: tabang in Pa sia ka sungah om a, keima sia Pa sungah ka om hi, ci na he tu uh a, hong um tu nu hi, ci hi.
JOH 10:39 Tua ahikom amate in Jesus sia mat sawm leleau uh hi: ahihang amate khut pan in Jesus suakta hi,
JOH 10:40 Taciang Jesus sia Jordan ngun ngal, John in amasabel tuiphumna a piak na mun ah paikik a; tua mun ah taam hi.
JOH 10:41 Taciang mi tampi a kungah hongpai uh a, John in nalamdang bangma vawt ngawl hi: ahihang hisia pa thu John i son theampo man hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 10:42 Tua mun ah mitampi in Ama um uh hi.
JOH 11:1 Bethany ah a teang Lazarus a kici khat sia a cina hi, tua Bethany sia Mary le a suapui nu Martha te i khuapi a hihi.
JOH 11:2 Hi Mary sia Topa sathau namtui buak in, taciang a sam taw a peang a nawlsak nu hi a, a suapuipa Lazarus sia a cina hi.
JOH 11:3 Tua ahikom a suapui nu in ngual paisak a, Topa, en in, na it bel pa a cina hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:4 Tua thu Jesus in a zakciang in, Hi natna sia thi natu natna hi ngawl hi, ahihang Pathian minthanna tu hi a, tua tungtawn in Pathian Tapa in minthanna nga tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:5 Jesus in Martha, a suapui nu le Lazarus te it hi.
JOH 11:6 Lazarus a cina, ci thu za hi kale, a omna ah ni ni sung taam lai hi.
JOH 11:7 Tuazawkciang a nungzui te kungah, Judah ngam sungah paikik tawng, ci hi.
JOH 11:8 A nungzui te in, Syapa awng, Judah mite in tu nung hiat ma in, suangtum taw den tu in hong zong uh a; tua mun ah paikik tu ni ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 11:9 Jesus in, Nikhat sungah nai sawm le nai ni om hi ngawl ziam? Khatpo sia sun hun in a vakle lutu ngawl hi, banghangziam cile ama in hi leitung khuavak mu hi.
JOH 11:10 Ahihang khatpo in zan in a vak le, lutu tu hi, banghangziam cile ama sungah khuavak om ngawl hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 11:11 Hi thu te a son zawkciang in, Jesus in amate tung ah, I lawmpa Lazarus mu hi; ahihang keima ka pai tu a, a mut na pan in ka phong tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:12 A nungzui te in, Topa awng, mu a hile, dam tu hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 11:13 Ahihang Jesus in a thina thu a son a hihi: hi kamale amate in tawlnga in mu hi ci bang in ngaisun uh hi.
JOH 11:14 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tungah son thiang a, Lazarus thi hi.
JOH 11:15 Taciang, na up thei natu uh in tua mun ah ka om ngawl sia note atu in ka angtang hi; hi kale a kungah pai tek tawng, ci hi.
JOH 11:16 Tuazawkciang in, Didymus a kici Thomas in, a nungzui pui te kungah, Ama taw thi khawm tu in eite zong pai tek tawng, ci hi.
JOH 11:17 Jesus a thet ciang in, Lazarus sia than ah a phum zawk ni li hi zo ci he hi.
JOH 11:18 Bethany sia Jerusalem nai na ah om a, tai ni dektak pha hi:
JOH 11:19 Martha le Mary te sia a suapuipa taw kisai, amate a heneam tu in Judah mi tampi te hongpai uh hi.
JOH 11:20 Tuazawkciang in, Martha in Jesus hongpai hi, ci a zak po ciang, pai in muak hi: ahihang Mary sia innsung ah to nginge hi.
JOH 11:21 Martha in Jesus kungah, Topa awng, himun ah om hile te, ka suapui pa thi ngawl tu hi.
JOH 11:22 Ahihang, tu zong in Pathian tungah na nget theampo Pathian in hong pia tu hi, ci ka he hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:23 Jesus in Martha kungah, Na suapuipa thokik tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:24 Martha in Jesus kungah, thawkikna ni tawpkhak ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci ka he hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:25 Jesus in ama kungah, Keima in thawkikna le nuntakna ka hihi: keima hong um peuma, a thi zong in nungta tu hi:
JOH 11:26 Taciang in a kuamapo nungta a, keima hong um peuma bangmahun in thi nawn ngawl tu uh hi. Hi thu na um ziam? ci hi.
JOH 11:27 Martha in, Hi hi, Topa awng: nangma in leitung ah hongpai tu Pathian Tapa, Christ na hihi, ci ka um hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:28 Martha sia tateng a pau zawkciang pai hi, taciang a nau Mary samku a, Syapa hongpai hi, taciang nangma hong sam hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:29 Tua thu Mary in a zak pociang manlangtak in ding a, Jesus kungah pai hi.
JOH 11:30 Tu in Jesus sia khuapi sungah tum ngawllai a, Martha i a mu na mun ah omlai hi.
JOH 11:31 Mary inn ah a om Judah mite le ama a heneam te in, Mary manlangtak in ding a, a pusua a mu uh ciang, zui kheukho uh a, than ah a kap tu in pai hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 11:32 Jesus kungah Mary a thet ciang in, Jesus mu a, a peang ah bok in, Topa awng, nangma himun ah om le te, ka suapuipa thi ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:33 Tua ahikom Jesus in Mary kakap in le, ama taw hongpai Judah mite zong a kakap a mu ciang in, a thaa in thuak hak sa in, tau a,
JOH 11:34 Koisung ah phum nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, Topa awng, hongpai tan a, en in, ci uh hi.
JOH 11:35 Jesus kap hi.
JOH 11:36 Tuazawkciang in Judah mite in, en vun, Lazarus bangza in it ziam! ci uh hi.
JOH 11:37 Taciang pawlkhat te in, mittaw te khua a musak hisia pa in, Lazarus thi ngawl tu in vawt thei ngawl a hi tam? ci uh hi.
JOH 11:38 Tua ahikom Jesus a thinsung pan tau kawm in than ah pai hi. Hi than sia suanghawng hi a, a tungah suangtum khat taw huk hi.
JOH 11:39 Jesus in, A suangtum khin vun, ci hi. Mithi pa suapui nu Martha in, Topa awng, tu in ui zo tu hi: banghangziam cile a thi zawk ni li hi zo hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:40 Jesus in ama tung ah, Na umle, Pathian vangletna na mu tu hi, hong ci zo hi ngawl khi ziam? ci hi.
JOH 11:41 Tuazawkciang in amate in suangtum sia mithi ki sial na pan in khin uh hi. Taciang Jesus in a tungsang ento a, Pa awng, nangma in hong za zo na hikom in lungdam kong ko hi.
JOH 11:42 Taciang a tawntung in nong za hi, ci ka he hi: ahihang ka kiim ah a ding mihing te in, nangma in keima nong sawl hi, ci a up thei natu uh in kong ci a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 11:43 Tabang in a ci zawkciang, Jesus in aw ngingtak taw, Lazarus, pusuak tan, ci hi.
JOH 11:44 Taciang Lazarus hong pusuak a, a khut le a peang te mithi tunna puan taw ki tuam hi: taciang a mai zong dial no taw kituam hi. Jesus in amate tung ah, Sut vun a, paisak vun, ci hi.
JOH 11:45 Tuazawkciang in Mary kungah hongpai Judah mi tampi te in, Jesus i vawt te a mu uh ciang in, Ama um uh hi.
JOH 11:46 Ahihang pawlkhat sia Pharisee te kungah pai uh a, Jesus i sep teng son uh hi.
JOH 11:47 Tuazawkciang in thiampi lian te le Pharisee te thu kikum tu in ki kaikhawm uh a, bangba hi tu hi ziam? banghangziam cile hisia pa in nalamdang tampi vawt hi.
JOH 11:48 Hibang in i en thong a hile, mi theampo in Ama um tu uh a: Rome mite in i mun le i ngam teng hong sut siat tu hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 11:49 Taciang amate sung pan khat, Caiaphas a kici pa, ama sia tua kum ciang in thiampi sang hi a, note bangma he ngawl nu hi,
JOH 11:50 Minam bup i lalcip ngawl natu in, mi khat mipi atu in thi le, eite atu in phazaw tu hi, ci zong ngaisun ngawl nu hi, ci hi.
JOH 11:51 Taciang hi thu sia ama thu in a pau hi ngawl hi: ahihang tua kum atu in thiampi sang ahikom in, Jesus sia tua minam atu in a thi natu mailamthu sonkhol a hihi:
JOH 11:52 Taciang hi minam atu bek hi ngawl in, ngam theampo ah a ki thethang Pathian tate a ki kaikhop natu thu zong a son a hihi.
JOH 11:53 Tua ni pan kipan in Ama bangbang in thatlum thei tu ci ngaisun uh hi.
JOH 11:54 Tua ahikom Jesus sia Judah mite sungah a kilang in vak nawn ngawl a; senneal ngam nai khuano sang, Ephraim a kici khua sangah a nungzui te taw om uh hi.
JOH 11:55 Judah mite paisanpoai hong nai zo hi: taciang mi tampi te khuano sang pan in Jerusalem ah paisanpoai ma, amate le amate ki thiansua tu in pai tek uh hi.
JOH 11:56 Tuazawkciang in amate in Jesus zong uh a, biakinn sungah a dinkawm in kikum uh a, Jesus sia poai ah hongpai ngawl tu hi, bang na ngaisun uh ziam? ci uh hi.
JOH 11:57 Tu in, mihing khatpo in Jesus sia koisung a om ziam, ci a he le a omna mun lak tu a, man tu in thiampi lian te le Pharisee te in thupia uh hi.
JOH 12:1 Tuazawkciang in Jesus sia paisanpoai tu ni luk a kisap ciang in thina pan a thawkiksak Lazarus omna Bathany ah pai hi.
JOH 12:2 Tua mun ah amate in nitak an vak uh a; Martha in an huan hi: ahihang Lazarus sia Jesus taw sabuai kim ah a tote sungah kihel hi.
JOH 12:3 Tuazawkciang Mary in a manham mama sathau namtui thawlkhat la a, Jesus peang buak hi, taciang a sam taw Jesus peang nawlsak a: a innsung theampo sia tua sathau namtui ngim taw kidim hi.
JOH 12:4 Tuazawkciang in a nungzui te sung pan khat a hi, Ama a leheak tu pa, Simon tapa, Judas Iscariot in,
JOH 12:5 Banghang in sathau namtui sia dangka zathum taw zuak in, mizawng te pia ngawl ziam? ci hi.
JOH 12:6 Hibang a pau na sia, mizawng te a awlmawk hang hi ngawl hi; ahihang ama sia nguta hi a, dangka bawm keam ahikom in, dangka bawm sung a kikoi dangka te dawk tawntung hi.
JOH 12:7 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in, Ama omsak po vun: keima ki vui ni atu kingingkhol in hi sathau namtui a keam a hihi.
JOH 12:8 Banghangziam cile mizawng te note taw om tawntung tu uh hi; ahihang kei sia note taw om tawngtung ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 12:9 Tua ahikom Judah mi tampi te in Jesus sia tua mun ah om hi, ci he uh hi: taciang Jesus a mu nop uh hang bek hi ngawl in, thina pan a thawkiksak Lazarus zong mu nuam uh ahikom hongpai uh hi.
JOH 12:10 Ahihang thiampi lian te in Lazarus zong that nuam in thu vaihawm uh hi;
JOH 12:11 Banghangziam cile Judah mi tampi te Lazarus hang in pai uh a, Jesus um uh hi.
JOH 12:12 A zingciang in mi tampi te a poai ah hongpai uh a, Jesus Jerusalem ah hongpai hi, ci a zak uh ciang in,
JOH 12:13 Nuktu bak te la uh a, Jesus muak tu in pai uh hi, taciang in Hosanna: Topa min taw hongpai Israel kumpipa thuphatoai a hihi, ci in au kheukho uh hi.
JOH 12:14 Taciang Jesus in laa no khat a mu ciang in a tungah to a;
JOH 12:15 Tua thu sia, lau heak in, Zion tanu awng: en in, na kumpipa sia laa no tungah to in hongpai hi, ci in laithiangtho sungah ki atkhol hi.
JOH 12:16 A nungzui te in hi thu te a tel pai bua uh hi: ahihang Jesus min a than zawkciang in, hi thu te Ama thu a ki atkhol le Ama tungah a piang thu te hi, ci phawkkik uh hi.
JOH 12:17 Tua ahikom Jesus in Lazarus sia thansung pan sam a, thina pan a thawkiksak ciang in Ama taw a omte in, tua thu tettipang uh hi.
JOH 12:18 Hi thu hang in mite in Jesus muak uh hi, banghangziam cile amate in hi nalamdang a vawt thu za uh hi.
JOH 12:19 Tua ahikom Pharisee te in, amate sungah, bangma zozo ngawl nu hi ci na he uh ziam? en vun, leitung bup in a nung zui siat zo hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 12:20 Tua poai sungah Pathian bia tu in hongpai te sungah Greek mite zong om hi:
JOH 12:21 Tua ahikom amate Galilee ngam Bethsaida khua mi Philip kungah hongpai uh a, Topa awng, Jesus ka mu nuam uh hi, ci in ngen uh hi.
JOH 12:22 Philip sia Andrew kungah pai in, son a: taciang Andrew le Philip in Jesus kungah son uh hi.
JOH 12:23 Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, A Tapa a minthansak tu hun hong theng hi.
JOH 12:24 A tatak in kong ci hi, zungtang sia leisung ah tak a a thi buale, ama bek hi top hi: ahihang a thi le, a tang tam mama hong piang hi.
JOH 12:25 A nuntakna a it peuma sum tu hi; taciang hi leitung ah a nuntakna a ensan peuma tawntung nuntakna dong in keamcing tu hi.
JOH 12:26 Mi khatpo in keima na a seam nuam le hongzui tahen; taciang keima omna mun ah ka naseam peuma om tu hi: mi khatpo in keima na a seam a hile, Pa in ama patoai tu hi.
JOH 12:27 Tu in ka thinngim hi; a bang son tu khi ziam? Pa awng, hi hun pan hong ngum tan: ahihang hisia atu in tu hun in hongpai ka hihi.
JOH 12:28 Pa awng, na minthangsak in, ci hi. Tuazawkciang in, keima in minthangsak zo khi hi, ci in van pan in aw khat hong theng hi.
JOH 12:29 Tua ahikom Jesus kiim ah a ding mihing te in, za uh a, vanto hi, ci uh hi: a dang te in, vantungmi in Ama paupui hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 12:30 Jesus in zo kik a, Hi aw sia keima hang hi ngawl hi, ahihang note atu hi zaw hi.
JOH 12:31 Tu in hi leitung thukhenna hun a hihi: tu in leitung a ukpa sia puasang ah ki hawlkhia tu hi.
JOH 12:32 Leitung pan in ka ki khai ciang in, mi theampo ka kungah ka kai tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 12:33 Hibang a ci ciang in, bangbang thina taw thi tu, ci a pualak a hihi.
JOH 12:34 Mihonte in, Christ sia a tawntung in hong teang tu hi, ci thukham tungtawn in ka za uh hi: taciang nangsia bangbang in, mihing Tapa sia khai tu uh hi, ci ni ziam? hi mihing Tapa sia akua ziam? ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 12:35 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Note taw khuavak tawmvei sung omlai hi. Khuavak na nei uh lai in, tabang a hibale note tungah khuazing hong theng tu hi: banghangziam cile khuazing sungah a vak peuma in a paina mun a he bua uh hi.
JOH 12:36 Khuavak na nei uh lai in, khuavak sungah om vun, tabang in khuavak i tate na hi tu uh hi, ci hi. Jesus in hi thu te a son zawkciang in pusuak a, amate kung pan in kiheam hi.
JOH 12:37 Jesus in amate mai ah nalamdang tampi vawt zo napi, amate in Jesus a um bua lai uh hi:
JOH 12:38 Tua thu kamsang Isaiah in, Topa awng, ka thuson uh te a kua in um ziam? taciang a kua tungah Topa ban kilangsak ziam? a ci sia a tangtun natu a hihi.
JOH 12:39 Tua ahikom amate in a um thei bua uh hi, banghangziam cile Isaiah in,
JOH 12:40 Pathian in amate i mitte tawsak a, a thinsung uh zong khauhsak hi; tabang in amate mitte taw mu ngawl tu uh a, a thinsung taw zong a he bua tu uh hi, tabang hibua thong le amate ki kheal tu uh a, ka damsak tu hi, ci in sonkik hi.
JOH 12:41 Hi thu te sia Isaiah in, Pathian a minthanna a mu ciang in a son a hihi.
JOH 12:42 Hi kamale ngam uk ulian te sungah mi tampi in Jesus um uh a; ahihang Pharisee te hang in a pualak bua uh hi, pualak uh hile synagogue sung pan in hawlkhia tu hi:
JOH 12:43 Banghangziam cile amate in Pathian i pokna sang in mihing te i pokna dei zaw uh hi.
JOH 12:44 Jesus hong au a, Keima hong um peuma in keima hong um hi ngawl in, hong sawlpa um uh hi.
JOH 12:45 Taciang keima hong mu peuma in hong sawlpa a mu hi.
JOH 12:46 A kuamapo keima hong um peuma, khuazing sungah om ngawl tu uh a, hi leitung ah keima sia khuavak in hongpai ka hihi.
JOH 12:47 Khat po in ka thu te za a, a um bua ahile, ama sia thukhen ngawl khi hi: banghangziam cile leitung thukhen tu in hongpai ngawl khi hi, ahihang leitung ngum tu in hongpai ka hihi.
JOH 12:48 Kei hong nial a, ka thu a sang ngawl te, thukhen tu nei uh hi: ka son thu in ni tawpkhak ni ciang ama thukhen tu hi.
JOH 12:49 Banghangziam cile keima thu in pau ngawl khi hi; ahihang keima hong sawl Pa in ka pau tu le ka son tu thu hong pia hi.
JOH 12:50 Taciang a thupiak te sia tawntung nuntakna hi, ci ka he hi: tua ahikom bangpo ka pau hial zong in, Pa i hong son bang in ka pau hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:1 Tu in paisanpoai mahiat, Jesus leitung pan pusuak a, Pa kung a pai tu hun hong theng zo hi, ci a heak ciang in, leitung ah a om a mite it a, a tawpdong in it hi.
JOH 13:2 Nitak an a neak zawk uh ciang in, Simon tapa Judah Iscariot thinsung ah doaimangpa in Jesus leheak tu thu koi hi;
JOH 13:3 Pa in a khutsung ah na theampo pia siat zo hi, ci le Ama sia Pathian kung pan hongpai a, Pathian kungah paikik tu hi, ci Jesus in he ahikom;
JOH 13:4 Nitak an a neakna mun pan ding a, a puan te a sut zawkciang in; dial khat la a, a kawng ah vet hi.
JOH 13:5 Tuazawkciang in kuangdal sungah tui sung a, a nungzui te peang silsak hi, taciang, a kawng ah a ve dial taw nawlsak hi.
JOH 13:6 Simon Peter kung a thet ciang in, Peter in, Topa awng, nangma in ka peang hong silsak tu ni ziam? ci hi.
JOH 13:7 Jesus in zo kik a, Ka vawt nate tu in na he bua hi; ahihang nungsang ciang in na he kik tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:8 Peter in, bangmahun in nangma in ka peang hong silsak ngei ngawl tu ni hi, ci hi. Jesus in, Na peang ka sil bua ahile, kei taw ki zopna na nei bua hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 13:9 Simon Peter in, Topa awng, ka peang bek hi ngawl in, ka khut te le ka lu zong hong sil tan, ci hi.
JOH 13:10 Jesus in, A kibual sa khat sia a peang sil tu simngawl a dang kul nawn ngawl hi, banghangziam cile a pum bup thiangtho zo hi: taciang note na thiangtho uh hi, ahihang na vekpi in na thiangtho bua uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:11 Banghangziam cile Jesus in Ama a leheak tu sia hekhol hi; tua ahikom na vekpi in na thiang bua uh hi, a ci a hihi.
JOH 13:12 Tua ahikom Jesus in amate peang te a silsak zawkciang, a puan te silkik a, to kik hi, taciang amate tung ah, Note tungah ka vawt thu na he uh ziam?
JOH 13:13 Note in, Syapa le Topa awng, ci in nong sam uh hi: nong ci uh sia pha hi; banghangziam cile nong sap uh bang in hi tatak khi hi.
JOH 13:14 Na Topa le Syapa, keima in na peang uh hong silsak ka hile; note zong khat le khat na peang uh na ki silsak tu uh a hihi.
JOH 13:15 Banghangziam cile keima in note tungah ka vawt bang in, note in zong vawt tu in ette tu kong pia zo hi.
JOH 13:16 A tatak in kong ci hi, sal sia a topa sang in lianzaw ngawl hi; a ki sawl khat zong a sawlpa sang in lianzaw ngawl hi.
JOH 13:17 Hi thu te na he uh a na vawt uh a hile, mi thuphatoai te na hi uh hi.
JOH 13:18 Na vekpi i thu hong son ka hi bua hi: ka tealsa te ka he hi: ahihang laithiangtho in, keima taw anluum a nekhawm pa in keima langpan in a siakmit lam zo hi, a ci thu a tangtun natu a hihi.
JOH 13:19 Tu in kong sonkhol hi, hi thu a pian ciang in, note in keima sia Ama hi, ci na um tu uh hi.
JOH 13:20 A tatak in kong ci hi, ka sawlpa a sang peuma in, keima hong sang hi; taciang keima hong sang peuma in keima hong sawlpa a sang a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 13:21 Jesus thu a son zawkciang in, a thinngim in om a, tettipang hi, taciang, A tatak in kong ci hi, note sung pan khat in hong leheak tu nu hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:22 Tuazawkciang in nungzui te in kua thu son ziam? ci in khat le khat ki muangmaw in ki en uh hi.
JOH 13:23 Tu in nungzui te sung pan khat, Jesus i a it pa in, Jesus kang neal hi.
JOH 13:24 Tua ahikom Simon Peter in tua pa khoiku a, a kua thu son ziam, ci dongsak hi.
JOH 13:25 Tuazawkciang in Jesus kang a neal pa in, Topa awng, a kua ziam? ci hi.
JOH 13:26 Jesus in, Anluum ka bal sa sia ka dia zawkciang in ka piakpa sia hi, ci in zo hi. Taciang anluum a bal sa sia a dia zawkciang, Simon tapa Judah Iscariot pia hi.
JOH 13:27 Anluum a piak zawkciang in, Judah Iscariot sungah Satan tum hi. Tuazawkciang in Jesus in Judah Iscariot tung ah, Na vawt tuteng manlang in vawt in, ci hi.
JOH 13:28 Tu in Jesus in bang sawm in Judah Iscariot tungah thuson ziam, ci sia sabuai kim a to te kuama in a he bua uh hi.
JOH 13:29 Banghangziam cile Judah sia dangka bawm keampa ahikom in, nungzui pawlkhat te in, Jesus in poai atu in a kisam te leisak hi tu hi; a hibale, mizawng te bang khatpo piasak hi tu hi, ci in ngaisun uh hi.
JOH 13:30 Judah in Jesus i piak anluum la a thakhat thu in pusuak hi: tua hun sia zan a hihi.
JOH 13:31 Tua ahikom, Judah a pusua zawkciang in, Jesus in, Tu in mihing Tapa sia ki minthangsak zo hi, taciang Pathian vangletna sia Ama sungah kilang tu hi.
JOH 13:32 Ama sungah Pathian minthanna a kilang le, Pathian in zong mihing Tapa minthanna sia Ama sung mama pan in kilangsak tu hi
JOH 13:33 Tano te awng, note taw hun tomno sung om lai tu khi hi. Judah mite tungah ka son bang in, note in nong zong tu uh hi, ka paina mun ah note hongpai thei ngawl nu hi; tua ahikom tu in kong son hi.
JOH 13:34 Thupiak a thak kong pia hi, keima in note kong it bang in, note zong khat le khat ki it tavun.
JOH 13:35 Khat le khat na ki it uh le, ngual in keima nungzui te na hi uh mi theampo in hong he tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:36 Simon Peter in, Topa awng, koisung pai tu ni ziam? ci hi. Jesus in, Ka pai na mun ah tu in hong zui thei ngawl lai ni hi; ahihang nungsang ciang in hong zui tu ni hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 13:37 Peter in, Topa awng, banghang in tu in hong zui thei ngawl lai khi ziam? Nangma atu in ka nuntakna dong pia tu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 13:38 Jesus in, Keima atu in na nuntakna pia tu ni ziam? A tatak in kong ci hi, thumvei nong nial mateng akkhuang ngawl tu hi.
JOH 14:1 Na thin uh ngimsak heak vun: Pathian um vun a, keima zong hong um tavun.
JOH 14:2 Ka Pa innsung ah inndoi tam mama om hi: om ngawl hile, hong son zo tu khi hi. Note atu in mun puakhol tu in ka pai tu hi.
JOH 14:3 Taciang pai in note atu mun ka puakhol le, hongpai kik tu khi hi, taciang ka kungah kong sang tu hi; tabang in ka omna mun ah, note zong na om tu uh hi.
JOH 14:4 Ka pai natu mun le lampi sia na he uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 14:5 Thomas in, Topa awng, koisung pai tu ni ziam? ci ka he bua uh hi; taciang bangbang in lampi he thei tu khu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 14:6 Jesus in, Keima in lampi, thutak le nuntakna ka hihi: keima taw ngawl in kuama Pa kung pai thei ngawl tu hi.
JOH 14:7 Keima nong he uh le, ka Pa zong na heak tu uh a hihi: taciang tu pan kipan in Ama na he uh hi, taciang na mu zo uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 14:8 Philip in, Topa awng, Pa hong lak tan, tua in ka lung uh kimsak tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 14:9 Jesus in, Note taw ngei mama hong omkhawm zo napi, hong he ngawl lai nu ziam, Philip awng? kei hong mu peuma in Pa a mu zo hi; banghang in Pa hong lak tan, hong ci ni ziam?
JOH 14:10 Pa sungah keima ka om hi, ci hong um ngawl ni ziam? nang tungah kong son te keima thu in kong son hi ngawl hi: ahihang ka sungah a om Pa i nasep a hihi.
JOH 14:11 Keima sia Pa sungah ka om a, Pa sia keima sungah om hi ci sia hong um tavun: a hibale ka nasep te mama pan in hong um tavun.
JOH 14:12 A tatak in kong ci hi, keima hong um peuma in keima vawt te ma vawt tu uh hi; taciang hi te sang in a lianzaw te zong vawt tu uh hi; banghangziam cile kei sia ka Pa kungah pai tu khi hi.
JOH 14:13 Pa sia Tapa sungah a minthan thei natu in, ka min taw na nget uh theampo seam tu khi hi.
JOH 14:14 Ka min taw khatpo na ngen uh le, keima in ka seam tu hi.
JOH 14:15 Nong it uh le ka thupiakte na zui vun,
JOH 14:16 Taciang Pa kungah ka ngen tu a, Ama in a dang Hupa note hong pia tu hi, taciang note kungah a tawntung in hong om tu hi;
JOH 14:17 Ama sia thuman Thaa hi a; leitung mite in sang thei ngawl hi, banghangziam cile a mu ngawl uh hang a hihi, taciang he zong a he bua uh hi: ahihang note in Ama na he uh hi; banghangziam cile note kungah om a, note sungah hong om hi.
JOH 14:18 Hupa nei ngawl in hong nu sia ngawl tu khi hi: note kungah kongpai tu hi.
JOH 14:19 Hai ngawl in leitung mite in hong mu nawn ngawl tu hi; ahihang note in nong mu tu uh hi: banghangziam cile keima ka nungta a, note zong na nungta tu uh hi.
JOH 14:20 Tua ni ciang keima sia Pa sungah om khi hi, taciang note sia ka sungah na om uh hi, ci le note sungah keima ka om hi, ci sia na he tu uh hi.
JOH 14:21 Ka thupiak te a nei le a zui peuma keima hong it a hihi: taciang keima hong it peuma ka Pa in zong it tu hi, taciang keima in zong ka it tu hi, taciang a kungah keima tatak ma ka kilak tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 14:22 Iscariot hi ngawl Judas in, Topa awng, leitung mite kungah kilak ngawl in kote tungah nong kilak tu sia bangbang ziam? ci hi.
JOH 14:23 Jesus in, Mi khatpo in keima hong it a hile ka kammal te zui tu hi: taciang ka Pa in ama it tu hi, taciang kote ama kungah ka pai tu uh a, ama taw ka omkhawm tu uh hi.
JOH 14:24 Kei hong it ngawl peuma ka son thu te a zui bua hi: taciang na zak uh thu sia keima thu hi ngawl hi, ahihang keima hong sawl Pa i son a hihi.
JOH 14:25 Note taw ka omkhop lai in hi thu te hong son zo khi hi.
JOH 14:26 Ahihang Pa in keima min taw hong sawl tu Hupa Tha Thiangtho in, na theampo hong hil tu a, note kungah ka son theampo a vekpi in hong phawksak tu hi.
JOH 14:27 Note taw thinnopna kong nusia hi, keima thinnopna kong pia hi: leitung i piak thinnopna bang in kong pia bua hi. Na thin uh ngimsak heak vun a, lau zong lau heak vun.
JOH 14:28 Ka pai tu a, note kungah kong paikik tu hi, kong ci na za zo uh hi. Nong it uh le, Pa kungah pai tu khi hi, ka ci thu na lung uh dam tu hi: banghangziam cile Pa sia kei sang in lianzaw hi.
JOH 14:29 A pian tatak ciang na up thei natu uh in, tu in hi thu teng hong sonkhol zo khi hi.
JOH 14:30 Note tungah thu tampi kong son nawn bua tu hi: banghangziam cile hi leitung a ukpa hongpai in, ka sungah bangma nei ngawl hi.
JOH 14:31 Ahihang keima in Pa ka it hi, ci leitung in a heak thei natu in, Pa i thupiak bang in ka vawt hi. Ding vun, hi mun pan pai tawng.
JOH 15:1 Keima in sapit ngui tatak ka hihi, taciang ka Pa sia huan neipa a hihi.
JOH 15:2 Keima sungah a nga ngawl a bak peuma sat siat hi, taciang nga a nga bak peuma tam seseam a nga thei natu in heu hi.
JOH 15:3 Tu in note tungah ka son thu tungtawn in note na thiang uh hi.
JOH 15:4 Keima sungah hong om tavun, taciang keima zong note sungah ka om tu hi. Sapit bak sia sapit ngui taw a kizom buale, ama thu in a nga thei ngawl bangma in; note zong keima sungah na om bua uh le, bangma na nga thei bua tu uh hi.
JOH 15:5 Keima sia sapit ngui ka hihi, note a bak te na hi uh hi: keima sungah om in, a sungah keima ka om a hile, nga tampi nga tu hi: banghangziam cile keima ngawl taw note bangma na seam thei bua uh hi.
JOH 15:6 Khat po in keima sungah a om bua ahile, a bak bangin ki vawk in, vuai tu hi; taciang mihing te in khawmtua in, meisung ah khia hi, taciang kang siat hi.
JOH 15:7 Keima sungah na om uh a, ka thu te note sungah a omle, na deina uh na ngen tu uh a, taciang na nget uh bang in hong vawtsak tu hi.
JOH 15:8 Nga tampi na nga uh ciang in ka Pa minthanna kilang a; tabang in ka nungzui te na hi tu uh hi.
JOH 15:9 Pa in keima hong it bangma in, kong it hi: ka itna sungah om tawntung vun.
JOH 15:10 Keima in ka Pa thupiak te ka zui a, Ama itna sungah ka om bangma in, ka thupiak te na zui uh le, keima itna sungah na om tu uh hi.
JOH 15:11 Keima i lungdamna sia note sungah om a, note i lungdamna a dim thei natu in hi thu te kong son hi.
JOH 15:12 Hisia in ka thupiak a hihi, keima in note kong it bang in, note khat le khat ki it tavun.
JOH 15:13 Mi khat in a lawmte atu a nuntakna a piak sang in, a lianzaw itna mihing in nei thei ngawl hi.
JOH 15:14 Ka thupiak theampo na vawt uh a hile ka lawmte na hi tu uh hi.
JOH 15:15 Tu pan kipan, sal te, kong ci nawn bua hi; banghangziam cile sal te in a topa bangvawt ci a he bua uh hi: ahihang keima in, lawm te, kong ci zo hi; banghangziam cile Pa kung pan in ka zak theampo kong hesak siat zo hi.
JOH 15:16 Note in nong teal bua uh hi, ahihang keima in kong teal zo hi, taciang note pai in, nga na nga thei natu uh in nasep kong pia zo hi, taciang a ki khomsuan in na nga tu uh a: ka min taw Pa kungah na nget uh theampo Ama in hong pia tu hi.
JOH 15:17 Note khat le khat na ki it natu uh in hi thu te kong pia hi.
JOH 15:18 Leitung in note hong ensan a hile, note mai ah keima hong ensan zo hi, ci he tavun.
JOH 15:19 Leitung neisa hile uhte, leitung in ama neisa te it tu hi: ahihang note leitung i neisa na hi bua uh hi, ahihang leitung i neisa te sungpan in keima in kong teal zo hi, tua ahikom leitung in hong ensan hi.
JOH 15:20 Sal sia a topa sang in lianzaw ngawl hi, ci kong son sia phawk tawntung vun. Ama te in keima hong vawtsia a hile, note zong hong vawtsia tu hi; ka son te hong zui le, note i son te zong hong zui tu hi.
JOH 15:21 Ahihang hite theampo sia keima min hang in note tungah hong vawt tu uh hi, banghangziam cile amate in keima hong sawlpa a he bua uh hi.
JOH 15:22 Amate tungah hongpai ngawl in thu son bua leng, amate mawna nei ngawl zaw tu hi: ahihang tu in amate mawna atu in paulap a nei bua uh hi.
JOH 15:23 Kei hong ensan sia in ka Pa zong ensan a hihi.
JOH 15:24 Amate sungah kuama i vawt ngei ngawl nate vawt ngawl in om kana leng, amate mawnei ngawl zaw tu uh hi: ahihang tu in amate in mu zo uh a, keima le ka Pa hong ensan uh hi.
JOH 15:25 Ahihang hi thu teng a pian thei na sia, amate thukham sungah a ki atkhol, bangma thu om ngawl in hong ensan hi, ci thu a tangtunna a hihi.
JOH 15:26 Ahihang Pa kung pan in note kungah ka sawl tu Hupa, Pa kungpan hongpai thutak Thaa hong thet ciang in, Ama in keima thu tettipang tu hi:
JOH 15:27 Taciang note zong tetti na pang tu uh hi, banghangziam cile a kipat pan kipan keima taw na om zo uh hi.
JOH 16:1 Note na thinkiam ngawl natu in hi thu te kong son hi.
JOH 16:2 Amate in synagogue sung pan hong nawt tu uh hi: a kuamapo in note thalup sia Pathian nasep in a ngaisut uh hun hong theng tu hi.
JOH 16:3 Hi thu te sia amate in note tungah vawt tu uh hi, banghangziam cile amate in Pa a he bua uh a, keima zong hong he bua uh hi.
JOH 16:4 Ahihang hi thu te kong son zo hi, tabang in a hun a cin ciang in, note in kong sonsa te na phawkkik tu uh hi. Taciang hi thu te sia a kipatcil in hong son ngawl khi hi, banghangziam cile keima sia note taw ka omkhop hang a hihi.
JOH 16:5 Ahihang tu in hong sawlpa kungah pai tu khi hi; taciang, koisung ah paitu ni ziam? ci in kuama in nong dong bua uh hi.
JOH 16:6 Ahihang hi thu te hong son zo ka hikom in, na thinsung uh hena taw kidim hi.
JOH 16:7 Ahihang thutak hong son khi hi; kei pai leng note atu in phazaw hi: banghangziam cile ka pai bua ahile, Hupa sia note kungah hongpai ngawl tu hi; ahihang ka pai ahile, Ama sia note kungah kong paisak tu hi.
JOH 16:8 Ama hongpai ciang in leitung mite mawna, thuman ngawlna le thukhenna te hong tek tu hi:
JOH 16:9 Mawna thu sia, amate in keima hong up ngawl uh hang a hihi.
JOH 16:10 Thuman sia, Pa kung ka pai tu a, nong mu nawn ngawl tu uh hang a hihi;
JOH 16:11 Thukhenna thu sia, leitung ukpa sia thukhenna a thuak hang a hihi.
JOH 16:12 Note tungah sonnop tampi nei lai khi hi, ahihang tu in na ngai zo nawn bua uh hi.
JOH 16:13 Ahizong thuman Thaa hongpai ciang in, Ama in thutak sungah note hong paipui tu hi: banghangziam cile Ama thu hong son ngawl tu a; a zak theampo hong son tu hi: taciang hongpai lai tu thu te hong son tu hi.
JOH 16:14 Ama in hong minthangsak tu hi: banghangziam cile Ama in ka kung pan a sansa thu te hong lak tu hi.
JOH 16:15 Pa i neisa theampo sia keima neisa a hihi: tua ahikom, keima neisa hong laksak tu te, note hong lak tu hi, kong ci hi.
JOH 16:16 Tawmvei sung hong mu ngawl tu nu ni: taciang tawmvei sung in nong mukik tu uh hi, banghangziam cile Pa kungah ka pai tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 16:17 Tuazawkciang in a nungzui pawlkhat te, amate sungah, tawmvei sung nong mu bua tu uh hi: taciang tawmvei sung in nong mukik tu uh hi, banghangziam cile Pa kungah ka pai tu hi, hong ci sia bang hi thong tu ziam? ci tek uh hi.
JOH 16:18 Tua ahikom amate in, tawmvei sung, a ci sia bang hi tu ziam? bang hong son ziam ci i son thei bua hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 16:19 Tu in Jesus in amate in thu hong dong nuam hi, ci he a, Tawmvei sung nong mu bua tu uh hi: taciang tawmvei sung in nong mukik tu uh hi, ci ka son sia note sungah ki kan na hi uh ziam?
JOH 16:20 A tatak in kong ci hi, note kap in na tau tu uh hi, ahihang leitung mite lungdam tu uh hi: note na khuangai tu uh hi, ahihang na khuangaina uh sia lungdamna hong suak tu hi.
JOH 16:21 Nupi khat nau a tut ciang in khuangai hi, banghangziam cile a hun hong cing zo hi: ahihang nau a nei zawkpo ciang, leitung ah mihing khat pianna i lungdamna hang in a haksatna a phawk nawn bua hi.
JOH 16:22 Tua ahikom note tu in na khuangai uh hi: ahihang hong mu kik tu khi hi, taciang note na lung uh dam tu hi, taciang na lungdamna uh sia mihing in hong laksak ngawl tu hi.
JOH 16:23 Tua ni ciang in note bangma nong ngen bua tu uh hi. A tatak in kong ci hi, ka min taw Pa kungah na nget uh theampo Ama in hong pia tu hi.
JOH 16:24 Tuciang dong ka min taw bangma na ngen bua lai uh hi: ngen vun, na nga tu uh hi, tabang in na lungdamna uh hong dim tu hi.
JOH 16:25 Hi thu te sontena taw note tungah kong son hi: ahihang sontena te taw kong son ngawl hun hong theng zo hi, ahihang Pa sia a thiangtak in kong lak tu hi.
JOH 16:26 Tua ni ciang in note in ka min taw nong ngen tu uh hi: taciang, Pa kungah kong ngetsak tu hi, kong ci bua hi:
JOH 16:27 Banghangziam cile Pa ama vateak ma in hong it hi, Pathian kung pan hongpai khi hi, ci na um zo uh hi, banghangziam cile nong it uh hang a hihi.
JOH 16:28 Pa kung pan kongpai a, leitung ah hong theng khi hi: leitung ka nusia tu a, Pa kungah ka paikik tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 16:29 A nungzui te in ama kungah, en in, tu in sontena zang ngawl in a thiangtak in nong son hi.
JOH 16:30 Tu in nangma in na theampo na he hi, taciang kuama in thu hong dok kul ngawl hi, ci ka he uh hi: hi thu hang in nangma sia Pathian kung pan hongpai na hihi, ci ka um uh hi, ci uh hi.
JOH 16:31 Jesus in amate tung ah, Tu in na um uh ziam?
JOH 16:32 En vun, a hun hong theng tu hi, tu in hong theng zo hi, tabang in na vekpi in noma omna mun tek ah na ki thethang siat tu uh hi, taciang keima bek nong nusia tu uh hi: ahihang keima bek hi ngawl khi hi, banghangziam cile Pa sia keima taw hong om hi.
JOH 16:33 Keima sungah thinnopna na nei thei natu uh in, hi thu te kong son hi. Hi leitung ah haksatna nei tu nu hi: ahihang thinnuam in om vun, keima in leitung ka zo zo hi, ci hi.
JOH 17:1 Jesus in hi thu teng a son zawkciang in, vantung ento a, Pa awng, a hun cing zo hi; na Tapa minthangsak in, tabang in na Tapa in zong nangma min hong thangsak tu hi:
JOH 17:2 Tapa tungah na piak theampo, Ama in tawntung nuntakna pia tu in mihing theampo tungah thuneina na pia zo hi.
JOH 17:3 Amate in nangma bek a thuman Pathian hi, ci le na sawlkhiat Jesus Christ heak sia tawntung nuntakna hi.
JOH 17:4 Leitung ah na min ka thangsak zo hi: vawt tu in nong piak nasep ka seam zo hi.
JOH 17:5 Pa awng, tu in, leitung om ma in nangma taw ka neisa minthanna taw hong minthangsak tan.
JOH 17:6 Leitung mite sung pan nong piak mihing te tungah na min kilangsak zo khi hi: amate sia nangma a, a hi uh a, keima nong piak te a hi uh hi; taciang amate in na thu zui uh hi.
JOH 17:7 Tu in, nangma in nong piak theampo te sia nangma tung pan hi, ci amate in he zo uh hi.
JOH 17:8 Banghangziam cile nangma in nong piak thu te amate ka pia zo hi; taciang amate in hong sang zo uh hi, taciang na kung pan in ka pusuak hi, ci le nangma in nong sawl hi, ci amate in um zo uh hi.
JOH 17:9 Amate atu in thu kong ngen hi: leitung mite atu in kong ngen bua hi, ahihang nangma i nong piak te atu thu kong ngen hi; banghangziam cile amate sia nangma a, a hihi.
JOH 17:10 Ka nei theampo nangma a, hi a, na nei theampo keima a, a hihi; taciang amate sungah keima min a thang hi.
JOH 17:11 Tu in keima sia leitung ah om nawn ngawl tu khi hi, ahihang hi te leitung ah om lai tu uh hi, taciang keima na kungah hongpai tu khi hi. A Thiangtho ka Pa awng, kei tungah nong piak sate, eite bang in pumkhat a hi thei natu in, na min suang in na keamcing in.
JOH 17:12 Amate kung leitung ah ka omlai in, amate na min taw ka keamcing hi: nangma i nong piak te, laithiangtho tangtungsak siatna i tapa simngawl; khatzong bosua ngawl in ka keamcing zo hi.
JOH 17:13 Tu in na kungah kongpai tu hi; ka lungdamna mate sungah a kicin thei natu in, hi thu te leitung ah ka son hi.
JOH 17:14 Amate na thu ka pia zo hi; taciang leitung mite in amate ensan uh hi, banghangziam cile keima sia leitung mi ka hi ngawl bangma in amate zong a hi bua uh hi.
JOH 17:15 Amate leitung pan lato tu in kong ngen bua hi, ahihang mihing phangawl pa kung pan keamcing tu in kong ngen hi.
JOH 17:16 Keima sia leitung mi ka hi ngawl bangma in, amate zong leitung mi a hi bua uh hi.
JOH 17:17 Amate na thutak taw in thiangthosak in: na kammal sia thutak a hihi.
JOH 17:18 Keima leitung ah nong sawl bang in, amate zong keima in leitung ah ka sawl hi.
JOH 17:19 Amate thutak taw in thianthosak ahi thei natu in, amate hang in keima le keima ka ki thiangthosak hi.
JOH 17:20 Amate atu bek thu kong ngen bua hi, ahihang amate thuhilna taw in keima hong umte atu zong thu kong ngen hi;
JOH 17:21 Nangma in nong sawl hi, ci leitung mite in a up thei natu uh ahizong, amate theampo pumkhat hi tu in, ka Pa awng, nangma sia keima sungah na om a, keima zong nangma sungah ka om bangma in, amate zong i sungah pumkhat a hi tu in, thu kong ngen hi.
JOH 17:22 Nangma le keima sia pumkhat i hi bangma in amate zong pumkhat a sua thei natu in, nangma i nong piak minthanna amate ka pia zo hi:
JOH 17:23 Amate pumkhat sungah a cialcing thei natu in, keima sia amate sungah ka om a, taciang nangma ka sungah na om hi; taciang nangma in nong sawl a, keima nong it bangma in amate zong na it hi, ci leitung mite in he tu uh hi.
JOH 17:24 Pa awng, nangma in nong piaksa te ka omna mun ah om tu in le; nangma in nong piak ka minthanna amate in zong a mu thei natu ka dei hi: banghangziam cile nangma in leitung a ki bitphua ma in nong it zo hi.
JOH 17:25 Maw a thuman ka Pa, leitung mite in hong he ngawl hi: ahihang keima in kong he zo hi, taciang hite in zong nangma in nong sawl hi, ci a he zo uh hi.
JOH 17:26 Amate tungah na min ka tangko zo a, taciang tangko lai tu khi hi: tabang in nangma in keima nong itna amate sungah om tu a, taciang keima zong amate sungah ka om tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 18:1 Hi thu te a son zawkciang in, Jesus a nungzui te taw Kidron lui ngalkhat ah pai uh hi, tua mun ah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah nungzui te taw tum khawm uh hi.
JOH 18:2 Jesus a leheakpa Judas zong in tua mun he hi: banghangziam cile Jesus a nungzui te taw tua mun ah pai bul uh hi.
JOH 18:3 Judas in thiampi lian te le Pharisee te kung pan in, mi pawlkhat le palik te taw tua mun ah mei-inn, meisip te le ngal van te taw hongpai uh hi.
JOH 18:4 Jesus in a tungah a theng tu thu theampo hekhol zo ahikom, a mai ah pai in amate tung ah, Kua zong nu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:5 Amate in, Nazareth khua mi Jesus, ci uh hi. Jesus in, Keima khi hi, ci hi. Ama a leheakpa Judas zong amate taw ding hi.
JOH 18:6 Jesus in amate tung ah, keima khi hi, a ci po ciang, a nungsang uh ah thalpu siat uh hi.
JOH 18:7 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Kua zong nu ziam? ci in dong kik hi. Amate in, Nazareth mi Jesus, ci uh hi.
JOH 18:8 Jesus in, Keima khi hi, kong ci zo hi: tua ahikom keima nong zong uh ahile, hi teng paisak in, ci in zo hi:
JOH 18:9 Tabang in, nangma i nong piak te khat zong kisiasak ngawl khi hi, a ci sia a tangtun na a hihi.
JOH 18:10 Tuazawkciang in Simon Peter in, a namsau dok a, thiampi lian i naseampa sat hi, taciang a ziatsang bil tawng pai hi. Tua naseampa min sia Malchus a hihi.
JOH 18:11 Jesus in Peter kungah, Na namsau a paisung ah thunkik in: ka Pa i hongpiak hai sia dawn ngawl tu khi ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:12 Tuazawkciang in mihon, ngalkapmang le palik te in Jesus man in, hencip uh a,
JOH 18:13 Amasabel in Annas kungah paipui uh hi; banghangziam cile ama sia Caiaphas zi i pa a hihi, tua kum in thiampi sang sia Caiaphas a hihi.
JOH 18:14 Tu in Caiaphas sia, mipi atu in mi khat thi le phazaw hi, ci in Judah mite tungah ngaisutna a pia pa a hihi.
JOH 18:15 Simon Peter le a dang nungzui khat in, Jesus zui uh hi: tua a dang nungzui pa sia thiampi sang in he hi, taciang Jesus taw thiampi sang pa leitual ah tum hi.
JOH 18:16 Ahihang Peter sia kongkha hui a puasang ah ding hi. Tuazawkciang in thiampi sang pa i heak adang nungzui pa in, kongkha cing nu paupui a, Peter sia a sungah tumpui hi.
JOH 18:17 Kongkha cing naseam numei nu in, Peter kungah, nangma zong hisia pa i nungzui te sungah khat hi ngawl ni ziam? ci hi. Peter in, hi ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 18:18 Khuasik ahikom, naseam te le palik te in meihol thut uh a; ding kawm in mei oai tek uh hi: taciang Peter zong amate taw ding a, mei oai khawm hi.
JOH 18:19 Thiampi sang in Jesus sia a nungzui te thu le a thuhil nate dong hi.
JOH 18:20 Jesus in, Leitung mite tungah a kilang in thu ka hil hi; Judah mite i pai tawntung na mun, synagogue le biakinn sungah zong thuhil khi hi; taciang a thimtham in bangma son ngawl khi hi.
JOH 18:21 Banghang in keima hong dong ni ziam? amate tungah ka thuhil a zate dong in: en in, amate in ka thuhil te he uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:22 Jesus in hibang in a son zawkciang in, a kungah a ding palik te sung pan khat in Jesus a khut zapheak taw beang a, thiampi sang tabang in zo ni ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:23 Jesus in A phangawl ka pau a hile, a phatngawlna tetti hong lak tan: ahihang ka pau na a pha a hile, banghang in hong vua ni ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:24 Tu in Annas in Jesus sia a ki hencip sa ma in Caiaphas kungah puak hi.
JOH 18:25 Taciang Simon Peter ding in mei oai hi. Tua ahikom amate in a kungah, nangma zong a nungzui te sungah khat hi ngawl ni ziam? ci hi. Peter in hi ngawl khi hi, ci nial hi.
JOH 18:26 Thiampi sang i naseam te sung pan khat, Peter in a bil a satsak pa i mealheak khat in, Jesus taw huan sungah hong mu hi ngawl khi ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:27 Peter in nial kik leleau hi: tasia pociang akkhuang hi.
JOH 18:28 Zingtung in Jesus sia Caiaphas kung pan in Pilate inn ah paipui uh hi: amate a thiangtho in paisanpoai an a neak nop uh hu in, Pilate innsung ah a tum bua uh hi.
JOH 18:29 Pilate sia amate kungah hong pusuak a, hisia pa mawsakna thu bang keng nu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:30 Amate in, ama naphangawl seam hi bale, na kungah hong ap ngawl tu khu hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 18:31 Tuazawkciang in Pilate in amate tung ah, Ama paipui vun a, noma ngeina bang in thukhen vun, ci hi. Tua ahikom Judah mite in a kungah, kote atu in mi khatpo thalup tu ngeina om ngawl hi, ci uh hi:
JOH 18:32 Jesus in bangbang thina taw thi tu, ci a sonkholsa a tangtun na a hihi.
JOH 18:33 Pilate a innsung ah tumkik hi, taciang Jesus sam a, nangma sia Judah te kumpi na hi ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:34 Jesus in, Hi thu sia nangma thu in na pau ziam, a hibale keima thu ngualdang in hong son ziam?, ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:35 Pilate in zo kik a, keima sia Judah mi khi ziam? Nangma minam le thiampi lian te in nangma ka kungah hong ap uh hi: bang sep nei ni ziam? ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:36 Jesus in, Keima kumpingam sia hi leitung ah hi ngawl hi: ka kumpingam sia hileitung hile, Judah te khut ah hong ap ngawl natu in na naseam te in do tu uh hi: ahihang ka kumpingam sia himun hi ngawl hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:37 Tua ahikom Pilate in, tabang ahile Nangma sia kumpi na hi ziam? ci hi. Jesus in, Keima sia kumpi ka hihi, nangma in hong ci ni hi. Thuman tettipang tu in ka piang a, hi leitung ah kongpai hi. Thuman taw a kizom peuma in ka aw a za uh hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 18:38 Pilate in, thuman sia bang ziam? ci a, a pau zawkciang in, Judah mite kungah paikik hi, taciang amate tung ah, a mawna mu ngawl khi hi.
JOH 18:39 Ahihang na ngeina uh bang in, paisanpoai ah mi khat note atu ka suatak kul hi: tua ahikom Judah te Kumpipa note atu ka suatak tu ziam? ci hi.
JOH 18:40 Amate in, hisia pa suatak heak in, Barabbas suatak zaw in, ci in a vekpi in au kik uh hi. Barabbas sia ngual suam pa a hihi.
JOH 19:1 Tua ahikom Pilate in Jesus paipui a, sat hi.
JOH 19:2 Ngalkap te in ling taw kumpi lukhut khat pheak in, a lu tungah khusak uh a, puan sannum silsak uh hi,
JOH 19:3 Taciang Judah te Kumpi! na khan sau tahen, ci uh a, amate in a khut uh taw beang uh hi.
JOH 19:4 Tua ahikom, Pilate pusuak kik a, amate tung ah, en vun, a mawna mu ngawl khi hi, ci na heak natu uh in, note kungah hong pusua khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 19:5 Tuazawkciang in, Jesus ling lukhu khu a, puan sannum sil in hong pusuak hi. Taciang Pilate in amate tung ah, Ama en vun! ci hi.
JOH 19:6 Thiampi lian te le palik te in a mu uh ciang in, thinglamte tungah khai in, thinglamte tungah khai in, ci au uh hi. Pilate in amate tung ah, paipui tavun a, thinglamte tungah khai vun: banghangziam cile a mawna bangma ka mu bua hi, ci hi.
JOH 19:7 Judah mite in, ngeina nei khu hi, ka ngeina bang hile a thi tu in kilawm hi, banghangziam cile ama le ama Pathian Tapa in ki vawt hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 19:8 Tua ahikom Pilate in tua thu a zak ciang in, lau seseam hi;
JOH 19:9 Taciang a innsung ah tum kik a, Jesus kungah, koisung pan ni ziam? ci hi. Ahihang Jesus in zo ngawl hi.
JOH 19:10 Tuazawkciang in Pilate in ama kungah, hong paupui ngawl tu ni ziam? nangma thinglamte tungah khai tu le suatak natu thuneina nei khi hi, ci he ngawl ni ziam? ci hi.
JOH 19:11 Jesus in, Tungsang pan a ki pia thu simngawl, keima langpan in thuneina na nei thei bua tu hi: tua ahikom na kungah keima hong ap sia in a lianzaw mawna nei hi, ci in zo hi.
JOH 19:12 Tasia pan kipan in Pilate in Jesus suatak thei natu zong hi: ahihang Judah mite in, hisia pa na suatak le, Caesar i lawm hi thei ngawl tu ni hi: a kuama po in ama le ama kumpi in a kivawt peuma Caesar langpan in kampau a hihi, ci au kheukho uh hi.
JOH 19:13 Tua ahikom Pilate in tua a kampau a zak ciang in, Jesus pusua a, suangpheak kipha a kici na, thukhen tokhum tungah to hi, tasia sia Hebrew kam in, Gabbatha, kici hi.
JOH 19:14 Tua hun sia paisanpoai atu in kingin ni hi a, nai sawm le nai ni kiim a hihi: taciang ama in Judah mite tung ah, en vun, na Kumpipa uh! ci hi.
JOH 19:15 Ahihang amate in, ama khai in, ama khai in, thinglamte tungah that in, ci in au lialua uh hi. Pilate in amate tung ah, na Kumpipa uh thinglamte tungah khai tu khi ziam? ci hi. Thiampi lian te in, kote in Caesar simngawl kumpi dang nei ngawl khu hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 19:16 Tuazawkciang in Pilate in Jesus sia thinglamte tungah khai tu in amate tungah ap hi. Taciang amate in Jesus la uh a, paipui uh hi.
JOH 19:17 Taciang a thinglamte pua in lungu mun, a kici na mun ah paipui uh hi, tua mun sia Hebrew kam in Golgotha kici hi:
JOH 19:18 Tua mun ah amate in Jesus sia thinglamte tungah khai uh hi, taciang midang ni te zong a ziat le vei ah khai uh a, Jesus sia a lai ah khai uh hi.
JOH 19:19 Pilate in lai at a, thinglamte tungah tak hi, Tua a lai at sia, nazareth khuami jesus, judah te kumpi, ci hi.
JOH 19:20 Hi lai ki at sia Judah mi tampi in sim uh hi: banghangziam cile Jesus thinglamte tung a khai na mun sia khuapi nai na a hihi: taciang tua lai sia Hebrew, Greek le Latin taw in ki at hi.
JOH 19:21 Judah mite thiampi lian te in Pilate tung ah, Judah mite Kumpipa, ci in at heak in; ahihang, keima sia Judah mite i Kumpipa ka hihi, ci hi, ci in at zaw in, ci uh hi.
JOH 19:22 Pilate in, ka at sa sia, ka at sa hi tahen, ci in zo hi.
JOH 19:23 Ngalkap te in Jesus sia thinglamte tungah a khai zawk uh ciang in, a puan sil sia khen li in khen uh a, ngalkap khat in khen khat tek la uh hi; taciang a laktong zong laksak uh hi: tua a laktong sia a zung ki khui ngawl hi a, a tung pan a nuai dong a ki tak a hihi.
