JOH 19:24 Tua ahikom amate sungah, hisia eau tham bua tawng, ahihang kua in i nga ziam, aisan tawng, ci uh hi: hi thu sia, amate in ka puan te hawm uh a, ka laktong atu in aisan uh hi, ci laithiangtho sungah a ki atkholsa a tangtun natu a hihi. Tua ahikom hi thu te ngalkap te in seam uh hi.
JOH 19:25 Tu in Jesus thinglamte kungah a nu le a nu i nau nu, Cleopas i zi Mary le Mary Magdalene te ding uh hi.
JOH 19:26 Tua ahikom Jesus in a nu le a it mama a nungzui pa a ding a mu ciang, a nu kungah, Numei awng, na tapa en in! ci hi.
JOH 19:27 Tuazawkciang in a nungzui pa kungah, Na nu en in! ci hi. Tua hun pan kipan tua nungzuipa in a nu sia ama inn ah ciapui hi.
JOH 19:28 Hi teng zawkciang in Jesus in, tu in na theampo khuagkhim zo hi, ci he a, laithiangtho a tangtun natu in, Ka dangtak hi, ci hi.
JOH 19:29 Tua mun ah sapittui thuk taw a dim beal khat om hi: taciang tuihup puan khat sapittui thuk sungah pap suk a, hyssop baak dawn ah a koi zawkciang, Jesus kam ah taa hi.
JOH 19:30 Tua ahikom Jesus in sapittui thuk sia a san zawkciang in, A zo zo hi, ci a: taciang a lu kun in thi hi.
JOH 19:31 Tua ni sia kingin ni hi a, zingciang sabbath ni zong ni thupi ahikom in, thiluang te thinglamte tungah om ngawl tu in, a peang te thiaktan tu a, thiluang te la siat tu in, Judah mite in Pilate kungah ngen uh hi.
JOH 19:32 Tua ahikom ngalkap te hongpai uh a, Jesus taw thinglamte tungah a ki khai khat sia i peang thiaktan a, taciang a dang khat sia i peang zong thiaktan uh hi.
JOH 19:33 Ahihang Jesus kungah hongpai ciang in, thi zo hi, ci a mu uh ciang a peang thiatansak ngawl uh hi:
JOH 19:34 Ahizong ngalkap te sungpan khat in Jesus pang pan in teipi taw sun a, thakhatthu in thi le tui hong pusuak hi.
JOH 19:35 Hi thu a mu pa in tettipang hi, taciang tettipanna sia a man hi: na up thei natu uh in, a son thu man hi, ci a he uh hi.
JOH 19:36 Hibang thu te a vawt na sia, a ngu khat zong ki thiaktan ngawl hi, ci laithiangtho a tangtun na a hihi.
JOH 19:37 A dang laithiangtho in a son kikna ah, amate in a sut pa en tu uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 19:38 Hisia zawkciang in, Judah mite a lau uh hu in a thimtham in Jesus nung a zui, Arithmathaea khua mi Joseph in Pilate kungah Jesus luanghawm la tu in ngen a: Pilate in pia hi. Tua ahikom Joseph in Jesus luang la hi.
JOH 19:39 Jesus kungah zan lai in a pai ngei Nicodemus sia myrrh le aloe a kihel, pong zakhat keng in hongpai hi.
JOH 19:40 Amate in Jesus luang la a, Judah te mithi vui ngeina bang in, ngim namtui le puan neamno taw tun uh hi.
JOH 19:41 Jesus thinglamte tung a khai na mun ah huan khat om a; tua huan sungah kuama a ki vui ngei ngawl lai na mun than thak khat om hi.
JOH 19:42 Judah mite kingin ni ahikom in Jesus sia tua than ah vui uh hi; banghangziam cile tua than sia a nai na ah om hi.
JOH 20:1 Nipi kalkhat sung ni masabel ni zingtung khuavak ma, Mary Magdalene sia than ah pai a, suangtum sia than pan a ki khin sa in mu hi.
JOH 20:2 Tuazawkciang in Mary Magdalene tai a, Simon Peter le Jesus i it mama a dang nungzui pa kungah pai hi, taciang amate tung ah, Topa sia mite in than pan in la zo uh hi, taciang a koina mun ka he bua hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:3 Tua ahikom Peter le a dang nungzui pa sia, than ah pai uh hi.
JOH 20:4 A ni in tai khawm uh hi: taciang a dang nungzui pa in Peter suangkhial a, than theng masa hi.
JOH 20:5 Taciang kun a, a sung a et ciang in, puan neamno mu napi, a sungah tum ngawl hi.
JOH 20:6 A nung pan in Simon Peter in zui a, than sungah tum hi, taciang puan neamno sia mu hi,
JOH 20:7 Jesus lu tuam na dial zong mu a, puan neamno taw munkhat a omkhawm ngawl hi, ahihang a tuam veve in a kizial sa in om hi.
JOH 20:8 Tuazawkciang in than a theng masa a dang nungzui khat sia zong a sungah tum hi, taciang mu a, um hi.
JOH 20:9 Banghangziam cile, thina pan thokik tu hi, ci laithiangtho sia amate in a heak ngawl lai uh hang a hihi.
JOH 20:10 Tuazawkciang in nungzui te amate inn tek ah ciakik uh hi.
JOH 20:11 Ahihang Mary sia than puasang ah ding in kap hi: taciang a kap kawm in kun a, than sung en hi,
JOH 20:12 Taciang vantungmi ni puanpak sil a, Jesus luang kisial na mun a luthung ah khat, a khawdop ah khat, a to mu hi.
JOH 20:13 Vantungmi te in, numei awng, banghang in kap ni ziam? ci hi. Mary in, ka Topa hong laksak zo uh a, a koi na mun he ngawl ka hikom kap khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:14 Tabang a pau zawkciang in, Mary in a nungsang le-et a, Jesus a ding mu hi, taciang Jesus ahi hunlam a he bua hi.
JOH 20:15 Jesus in ama tung ah, Numei awng, banghang in kap ni ziam? kua zong ni ziam? ci hi. Mary in huancing pa sa a, ama tung ah, Topa awng, nangma in la na hile na koina hong son tan, taciang keima in ka la tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:16 Jesus in ama tung ah, Mary, ci hi. Mary zong Jesus sangah kihei a, Rabboni, ci hi; Rabboni a ci sia, Syapa awng, a ci na a hihi.
JOH 20:17 Jesus in Mary kungah, Hong tham heak in; banghangziam cile ka Pa kungah kato ngawl lai khi hi: ahihang ka suapui te kungah pai tan a, na Pa uh le ka Pa kungah kato tu khi hi; keima i Pathian le note i Pathian zong a hihi, ci in son in, ci hi.
JOH 20:18 Mary Magdalene pai in, Topa mu zo khi hi, taciang hi thu te zong hong son hi, ci in a nungzui te kungah son hi.
JOH 20:19 Nipi khat sung ni masabel ni, nitak sang in, nungzui te Judah mite a lau uh hu in, innkha te khak siat in, a kikhop uh laitak, Jesus hongpai a, amate laizang ah hong ding hi, taciangNote tungah thinnopna om tahen, ci hi.
JOH 20:20 Tabang in a paupui zawkciang, Jesus in a khut te le a pang amate lak hi. Tuazawkciang in a nungzui te in Topa a mu uh ciang in angtang mama uh hi.
JOH 20:21 Tuazawkciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Note tungah thinnopna om tahen: ka Pa in keima hong sawl bang in, keima in note kong sawl hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:22 Hi thu a son zawkciang in, amate tungah mut a, Tha Thiangtho sang tavun.
JOH 20:23 Ngual dang mawna te na maisak uh le, mai tu a, na maisak bua uh le, mai ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:24 Ahihang nungzui sawm le ni te sung pan khat, Didymus a kici Thomas sia, Jesus hongpai laitak in amate taw om ngawl hi.
JOH 20:25 Tua ahikom nungzui dang te in, Topa ka mu zo uh hi, ci uh hi. Ahihang Thomas in amate tung ah, a khut te thikpim taw a kikhet na mapawn mu ngawl in, thikpim mapawn ah ka khutme ka tham bua a hile, taciang a pang sungah ka khut ka thun bua a hile, um ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
JOH 20:26 Ni liat zawkciang in nungzui te innsung ah om tek uh a, Thomas zong amate taw om hi: taciang innkha te a kha siat uh hi napi, Jesus hongpai a, amate laizang ah ding in, Note tungah thinnopna om tahen, ci hi.
JOH 20:27 Tuazawkciang in Thomas kungah, Na khutme taw tham in a, ka khut te en in; na khut ka pang sungah thun in: taciang um ngawl om heak in, um in, ci hi.
JOH 20:28 Taciang Thomas in, ka Topa le ka Pathian, ci in zo hi.
JOH 20:29 Jesus in ama kungah, Thomas awng, nang in nong mu hang in, hong um ni hi: mu ngawl napi a, a umte thuphatoai a hihi, ci hi.
JOH 20:30 Hi laibu sungah a ki at ngawl, musakna a dang tam mama, Jesus in a nungzui te mai ah vawt hi:
JOH 20:31 Ahihang note in Jesus sia Pathian Tapa, Christ hi, ci na um uh a; tua na upna uh hang in a min tungtawn in nuntakna na nga thei natu uh in, hi thu te a ki at a hihi.
JOH 21:1 Hiteng zawkciang in Jesus sia a nungzui te kung Taiberias tuili hui ah kilaakkik hi; taciang a kilaak dan sia hibang a hihi.
JOH 21:2 Simon Peter le Didymus kici Thomas, Galilee ngam Cana khuami Nathanael, Zebedee tapa te le a dang nungzui ni te zong om uh hi.
JOH 21:3 Simon Peter in amate tung ah, kei ngasa man ka pai tu hi, ci hi. Amate in ko zong nangma taw pai tu khu hi, ci uh hi. Amate pai vingveng in ngunkuang sungah tuak uh hi; taciang tua zan in bangma a man bua uh hi.
JOH 21:4 Zingsang ciang in Jesus sia tui hui ah ding hi: ahihang a nungzui te in Jesus a hi hunlam a he bua uh hi.
JOH 21:5 Jesus in, Tano te awng, neakpha khatpo nei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, nei ngawl khu hi, ci in zo uh hi.
JOH 21:6 Jesus in amate tung ah, Na ngunkuang ziatsang ah na ngen pai vun a, mu tu nu hi, ci hi. Tua ahikom amate zong paai uh a, ngasa tampitak awk ahikom in a ngen uh zong kai zo ngawl liang uh hi.
JOH 21:7 Tua ahikom Jesus i a it mama nungzui pa in, Peter kungah, Topa hi, ci hi. Simon Peter in Topa hi, ci a zak ciang in, ngasa matna laktong sia vet in, tuisung ah leangsuk hi, banghangziam cile ama a pumnguak a hihi.
JOH 21:8 Adang nungzui te ngunkuang no taw hongpai uh a; ngasa taw a dim ngen kai uh hi. Banghangziam cile amate sia tui hui pan in khuala ngawl hi, tong za ni kiim khawng bekma khuala hi.
JOH 21:9 Amate tui hui ah a thet po uh ciang, meihol a ki seam meitung ah, ngasa le anluum a ki em mu uh hi.
JOH 21:10 Jesus in amate tung ah, Tu in na mat uh ngasa hiak ah hong paipui tavun, ci hi.
JOH 21:11 Simon Peter hong kato a, ngasa lian mama za le sawm nga le thum taw a dim ngen tui hui ah kai uh hi: tabang in ngasa tam mama hi napi, a ngen uh tat ngawl hi.
JOH 21:12 Jesus in amate tung ah, Hongpai tavun a, ne vun, ci hi. Nungzui te in, Topa hi, ci he napi, kuama in, Kua ni ziam? ci a dong ngam bua uh hi.
JOH 21:13 Jesus hongpai a, anluum la in amate pia hi, tabangma in ngasa zong la a amate pia hi.
JOH 21:14 Hi thu sia Jesus thina pan a thawkik zawk, nungzui te kungah a thum veina a kilaakna a hihi.
JOH 21:15 Amate an a neak zawk uh ciang in Jesus in, Simon Peter kungah, Jonah tapa, Simon awng, hi te sang in nong it zaw ziam? ci hi. Simon Peter in, hi hi, Topa awng; hong it khi hi, ci nangma in na he hi, ci hi. Jesus in, Ka tuuno te an vak in, ci hi.
JOH 21:16 Jesus in, Jonah tapa, Simon awng, nong it ziam? ci in a ni vei na ci kik hi. Simon Peter in, hi hi, Topa awng; kong it hi, ci nangma in na he hi, ci hi. Jesus in ama kungah, Ka tuu te an vak in, ci hi.
JOH 21:17 Jesus in, Jonah tapa, Simon awng, nong it ziam? ci in a thum vei na ci hi. Tabang thum vei dong Jesus in, nong it ziam? a ci hu in Peter khuangai a, Jesus kungah, Topa awng, Nangma in na theampo na he hi; hong it khi hi, ci na he hi, ci hi. Jesus in ama kungah, Ka tuu te an vak in.
JOH 21:18 A tatak in kong ci hi, na khangmoi lai in nangma thu in kawngkhau kil tawm a, na uk na po ah na pai hi: ahihang na huai zawkciang in na ban te na phal tu a, ngual in hong kilsak tu hi, taciang na uk ngawl na mun ah hong pua tu uh hi, ci hi.
JOH 21:19 Hi thu a son ciang, bangbang thina taw Pathian minthangsak tu ci kilangsak hi. Taciang hi thu a son zawkciang, Jesus in Peter kungah, Hong zui tan, ci hi.
JOH 21:20 Peter hong kihei a, Jesus i a it mama a nungzui pa in a zui mu si; tua mun sia nitak an a neakkhop na uh mun ah Jesus kang neal in, Topa awng, nangma hong leheak sia a kua ziam? ci hi.
JOH 21:21 Peter in tua pa a mu ciang in, Topa, hisia pa bangbang hitu ziam? ci in Jesus kungah ci hi.
JOH 21:22 Jesus in, Ka thet dong om tu in ka dei le, nang atu in bang poimaw ni ziam? nang hong zui po tan, ci hi.
JOH 21:23 Tuazawkciang in, tua a nungzui pa sia thi ngawl tu hi, ci thu suapui te sungah hong kizel hi: ahihang Jesus in, ama sia thi ngawl tu hi, ci ngawl hi; ahihang, ka thet dong om tu in ka dei le, nang atu bang poimaw ziam? a ci hi zaw hi.
JOH 21:24 Hi a nungzui pa sia, hi thu te tetti pan nate a at pa a hihi: taciang hi tettipanna sia a man a hihi, ci ka he hi.
JOH 21:25 Jesus i sep na dang tampi om lai hi, ta te sia khatsim at siat leang, leitung ah tua thu at natu laibu te ta zo ngawl tu hi, ci ka ngaisun hi. Amen.
ACT 1:1 Theophilus awng, amasa laibu ka atna sungah, Jesus i sep le a hilna theampo a kipat pan in,
ACT 1:2 Ama a ki lakto ni dong, tuazawk Tha Thiangtho tungtawn in a tealsa sawltak te tungah thupia hi:
ACT 1:3 A thuak zawkciang in sawltak te in ni sawm li sung Ama mu uh a, Pathian kumpingam taw kisai thu te son hi, Ama nungta tatak hi, ci tetti kho tampi taw lak hi:
ACT 1:4 Munkhat ah amate taw a ki kaikhop laitak in, Jerusalem pan koima pai ngawl tu in, Keima tung pan na zaksa uh bangma in, Pa i kamciam na ngak vun.
ACT 1:5 Banghangziam cile John in tui taw tuiphumna hong pia takpi hi; ahihang ni tampi ma in Tha Thiangtho i tuiphumna na sang tu uh ci, ci in amate thupia hi.
ACT 1:6 Tua ahikom amate munkhat a ki kaikhop tek uh ciang in, sawltak te in Jesus kungah, Topa awng, tu in Israel te tungah kumpingam na piakik tu ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
ACT 1:7 Jesus in amate tung ah, Pa in Ama vangletna sungah a koisa hun le ni te sia, note i heak tu kisam ngawl hi.
ACT 1:8 Ahihang note tungah Tha Thiangtho hong thet zawkciang in, vangletna na nga tu uh hi: taciang in Jerusalem le Judah ngamsung theampo, taciang Samaria ngamsung le lei mong a tawp dong in, keima tetti te na hi tu uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 1:9 Taciang hi thu te a son zawkciang, amate in a et uh laitak in, Jesus sia a tungsang ah ki lato a; amate mutang in mei in lia hi.
ACT 1:10 Tabang in vantung ah a kato sia mate in a et tek uh laitak in, en vun, amate hui ah puanpak sil in mi ni hong ding hi;
ACT 1:11 Tua te in, no Galilee mite, banghang in vantung en in ding top lai nu ziam? note kung pan in van ah a ki lato na mu uh bangma in, hongpai kik tu hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 1:12 Tuazawkciang in amate Olive mual pan in Jerusalem ah heakkik uh hi, Olive mual sia Jerusalem pan in sabbath ni pai thei na tan khawng khuala hi.
ACT 1:13 Jerusalem a thet uh ciang in, inn tung doituam ah kato tek uh a, tua mun ah, Peter, James le John, taciang Andrew, Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Matthew, Alphaeus tapa James, Simon Zealot, James naupa Judas te om uh hi.
ACT 1:14 Hiteng a vekpi lungkim in nupi te, Jesus nu Mary le a suapui te taw tatsat ngawl in thungen khawm tek uh hi.
ACT 1:15 Taciang in Peter sia a nungzui te, mihing za le kul kiim i laizang ah ding a,
ACT 1:16 U le nau te awng, Tha Thiangtho in David i kam zangin a sonkholsa, Jesus man tute a makai Judas thu taw kisai in hi laithiangtho sia a tangtun hamtang kul hi.
ACT 1:17 Banghangziam cile ama sia eite taw a kisim khawm hi a, hi Pathian nasepna sungah panmun nga hi.
ACT 1:18 Hisia pa in phatngawlna a vawt man taw lo ciing khat lei hi; taciang a lusuk nuailam in tak in, a pumpi kisantham a, a ngil zong ke keak hi.
ACT 1:19 Hi thu sia Jerusalem ah a om theampo in he uh a; tua lo sia amate kam in, Akeldama, ci uh hi, a khiakna sia, thisan lo, a cinopna a hihi.
ACT 1:20 Banghangziam cile, Psalm labu sungah, ama omna mun sia awngthong tahen a, a sungah kuama om heak tahen: taciang a nasep sia midang in la tahen, ci in ki atkhol hi.
ACT 1:21 Tua ahikom Topa Jesus eite sungah sungtum le pusuak in a om hunsung theampo,
ACT 1:22 John in tuiphumna a piakpan kipan, eite kung panvan ah a ki lakto ni dong, eite taw a omkhawm te sung pan khatpo sia thawkikna thu eite taw tetti a hi tu in, nasep piak hamtang tu a hihi, ci hi.
ACT 1:23 Taciang amate in, Barsabas kici a, Justus zong a kici Joseph le Matthias te ni teal uh hi.
ACT 1:24 Amate in, Topa awng, nangma in mi theampo i thinsung na he hi, hi te ni sung pan kua na teal ziam, ci hong lak tan,
ACT 1:25 Tabang in ama in, thunit ngawlna hang in puk a, ama omna mun ah a pai Judas atu in, hi Pathian nasepna le sawltak te sungah kihel tu hi, ci in thungen khawm uh hi.
ACT 1:26 Taciang amate in aisan uh a; aitang sia Matthias tungah tak hi; taciang ama sia sawltak sawm le khat te taw kisim khawm hi.
ACT 2:1 Pentecost ni hong thet ciang in, amate a vekpi thukimtak in munkhat ah ki kaikhawm uh hi.
ACT 2:2 Thakhatthu in van pan hui theau vapum bang aw nging hong theng a, amate to na inn hong dim hi.
ACT 2:3 Taciang leii taw a kibang meikuang hong kilang a, amate khatsim tungah hong om hi.
ACT 2:4 Amate a vekpi in Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh a, Thaa in pau thei na a piak bang in, kam dang tek taw pau uh hi,
ACT 2:5 Van nuai ngam tatuam pan in biakna sang a ki pumpiak Judah mite Jerusalem ah om uh hi.
ACT 2:6 Tua aw a zak uh ciang in, mihonpi te hongpai ngawp uh a, amate i pauna sia amate kam tek taw za uh ahikom buai tek mama uh hi.
ACT 2:7 Taciang amate a vekpi in lungmang in lamdangsatek mama uh a, en vun, amate a vekpi uh in Galilee mite hi ngawl ziam?
ACT 2:8 Bangbang in i pianpui kam tek taw za hi ziam?
ACT 2:9 Eite sia Parthia ngam, Media ngam, Elam ngam, Mesopotamia ngam, Judah ngam, Cappadocia ngam, Pontus ngam, Asia ngam,
ACT 2:10 Phrygia ngam, Pamphylia ngam, Egypt ngam le Libya ngam Syrene khua pan i hi a, Rome sung leangna te, Judah mite le Judah biakna a bia Gentile te,
ACT 2:11 Cretes le Arabia ngam pan i hi a, amate i eima kam in a pau i zak sia Pathian i a lamdang nasep na hi, ci in khat le khat ki sason uh hi.
ACT 2:12 Amate a vekpi in lamdangsa mama uh a, lungmang mama in, hi thu sia a bang khiakna peuma ziam? ci in khat le khat ki dong uh hi.
ACT 2:13 A dang te in selno in, hite sia sapittui thak kham hon uh, ci uh hi.
ACT 2:14 Ahihang Peter sia a dang sawm le khat te taw ding uh a, aw ngingtak in amate tung ah, no Judah mite le Jerusalem ah a omte, hi thu he tavun a, ka pau te ngai vun:
ACT 2:15 Banghangziam cile hite sia no i ngaisut bang in kham ngawl hi, zingsang nai kua hi pheang hi.
ACT 2:16 Ahihang hi thu sia kamsang Joel i sonkholsa;
ACT 2:17 Pathian in ni tawpkhak ni ciang in, mi theampo tungah ka Thaa ka buak tu hi: taciang na tapa te le na tanu te in maisang thu pualak tu uh hi, taciang na tangval te in mangmu tu uh hi, taciang na puhuai te uh in mangman tu uh hi:
ACT 2:18 Tua ni ciang in, ka salpa le salnu te tungah ka Thaa ka buak tu a; amate in mailam thu pualak tu hi:
ACT 2:19 Taciang vantung ah nalamdang te ahizong, lei nuai ah thisan, mei le meikhu musakna te ahizong, ka lak tu hi:
ACT 2:20 A thupi le a cepte tak Topa ni hong thet ma in, ni hong mial tu a, tha zong thisan suak tu hi:
ACT 2:21 Tua hun ciang in a kuamapo Topa min a sam theampo in ngupna nga tu hi.
ACT 2:22 No Israel mite, hi thu te ngai vun; Nazareth mi Jesus sia, Pathian in note sungah a tumdang nate, nalamdang te le musakna te taw tettipang in a kipsak mihing a hihi, note mama in zong na heak uh bangma in:
ACT 2:23 Ama sia, Pathian i khensat sa ngaisutna le heakkholsa bang in ki ap hi, taciang note in na man uh a, a seksol khut taw thinglamte tungah khai in na that uh hi:
ACT 2:24 Ama sia thina in a letcip tu suakthei ngawl ahikom, Pathian in thokiksak a, thina ngimthuak na pan in suaktasak hi.
ACT 2:25 Banghangziam cile David in Ama taw kisai in a son na ah, Topa sia a tawntung in ka mai ah ka mukhol hi, banghangziam cile Ama sia ka ziatsang ah om a, bangma in hong linglawngsak zo batu hi:
ACT 2:26 Tua ahikom ka thinsung ah nopna om a, ka lei a lungdam hi; tuabek domngawl ka taksa zong lametna sungah tawlnga tu hi:
ACT 2:27 Banghangziam cile nangma in ka tha sia hell sungah na nusia bua hi, na Mi Thiangtho sia a muatcip tu na oai bua hi.
ACT 2:28 Nangma in nuntakna lampi te nong hesak zo a; na maitang taw lungdamna dim in nong vawt tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 2:29 Ka suapui te awng, minam te i pa David thu hangsan tak in kong son tu hi, ama sia thi a kivui zo hi, taciang tuni dong eite taw a than om nginge hi.
ACT 2:30 Ama in cilesa lam a suanlepal te sung pan, Pathian in Christ sia thokiksak tu a, kumpi tokhum tungah tosak tu hi, ci in kiciamna taw a kamciam na sia kamsang a hi nataw in he hi;
ACT 2:31 Hi Christ thawkikna a mukhol hu in, a tha sia hell ah nusia ngawl hi, a taksa zong muat ngawl hi, ci son hi.
ACT 2:32 Hi Jesus sia Pathian in thokiksak zo a, kote sia a tetti te ka hi uh hi.
ACT 2:33 Tua ahikom Pathian i ziatsang ah ki lamsang a, Pa i kamciam Tha Thiangtho a san hu in, tu in na mu uh le na zak uh te sia Ama i hong buak a hihi.
ACT 2:34 Banghangziam cile David sia van ah kato ngawl hi: ahihang ama vateak in, Topa in ka Topa kungah, ka ziatsang ah to in,
ACT 2:35 Na ngalte ka peang koina in ka vawt mateng, ci hi.
ACT 2:36 Tua ahikom Israel minam theampo in thiangtak in tel tavun, thinglamte tungah na khai uh Jesus sia Pathian in Topa le Christ in vawt zo hi.
ACT 2:37 Tu in amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, amate i thinsung hol a, Peter le adang sawltak te kungah, U le nau te awng, banglaw tu khu ziam? ci uh hi.
ACT 2:38 Taciang in Peter in amate tung ah, na mawna uh kisik vun a, na mawna uh hang in na vekpi Jesus Christ min taw tui ki phum vun, taciang Tha Thiangtho letsong na nga tu uh hi.
ACT 2:39 Banghangziam cile kamciam sia noma, na tate, taciang a khuala mi theampo le Topa i Pathian in a sap tu theampo atu hi, ci hi.
ACT 2:40 Peter in a dang kammal tampi taw tettipang in hanthawn a, hi minam seksol te kung pan in noma le noma ki ngum vun, ci hi.
ACT 2:41 Tuazawkciang in Peter thuhilna sia lungdamtak in a sang te tui ki phum uh hi: taciang tua ni ma in mihing tul thum kiim amate kungah ki belap hi.
ACT 2:42 Amate sia sawltak te hilna le ki pawlkhopna, anluum bal na le thungetna ah tatsat ngawl in kiptak in om uh hi.
ACT 2:43 Sawltak te in nalamdang tampi le musakna tampi vawt uh a, mi theampo tungah launa hong theng hi.
ACT 2:44 Taciang a umte theampo ki kaikhawm uh a, a neisa theampo zong neikhawm uh hi;
ACT 2:45 Amate neisa le van te zuak uh a, mi khatsim i a kisapna bang in, mi theampo tungah hawm uh hi.
ACT 2:46 Amate sia nisim tatsat ngawl in biakinn sungah thukim in om tek uh hi, taciang inn khat zawk inn khat ah anluum te bal uh a, lungdamtak le thin ki si lung kisi in an ne khawm tek uh hi.
ACT 2:47 Pathian pok khawm tek uh a, mi theampo taw maipha nga uh hi. Ngupna nga mi Topa in nisim in pawlpi sungah belap hi.
ACT 3:1 Tu in Peter le John te thunget hun nitak sang nai thum ciang in biakinn ah pai uh hi.
ACT 3:2 A nu ngil sung pan ma in a peangbai khat sia midang te in toai a, biakinn sung a tum te tung pan huna ngen tu in, Hoi, a kici biakinn kongpi ah nisim in koi uh hi.
ACT 3:3 Ama in Peter le John te biakinn sung a tum tu a mu ciang in huna ngen hi.
ACT 3:4 Taciang Peter in, John taw phatak in en a, hong en tan, ci hi.
ACT 3:5 Amate tung pan in khatpo nga tu lamen in phatak in en hi.
ACT 3:6 Peter in, dangka le kham bangma nei ngawl khi hi; ahihang ka neisun kong pia hi: Nazareth mi Jesus Christ min taw ding in a, lampai in, ci hi.
ACT 3:7 Taciang Peter in tua pa ziatsang khut pan len a, kaito hi: tasia pociang tua pa i peang le a ngumit te thakho kik hi.
ACT 3:8 Ama sia tawnkawm in ding hi, taciang lampai a, biakinn sungah amate taw tum hi, taciang lampai kawm tawnkawm in Pathian pok hi.
ACT 3:9 Taciang lampai in Pathian a pok mi theampo in mu uh hi:
ACT 3:10 Ama sia biakinn ah, Hoi, a kici kongpi ah to in hu na a ngen pa hi, ci a he uh hi: taciang hisia pa tungah thupiang te lamdangsa in lungman na taw dim uh hi.
ACT 3:11 A peangbai na pan a dam pa in Peter le John te beal a, mi theampo in lamdangsa in amate kung, Solomon buk sangah tai lialua uh hi.
ACT 3:12 Tua thu Peter in a mu ciang in amate tung ah, no Israel mite awng, banghang in hi thu lamdangsa nu ziam? a hibale banghang in hisia pa sia koma vang le thianthona hang in lampai bang in, hong en cinten nu ziam?
ACT 3:13 Abraham, Isaac le Jacob te Pathian, i pu le pa te Pathian in, a Tapa Jesus sia vangliansak zo hi; Ama na ap uh a, Pilate in thakik nuam napi, note in Pilate mai ah na nial uh hi.
ACT 3:14 Note in Mi Thiangtho le Mi Thutang pa na nial uh a, tualthat pa note tungah piak tu in na dei uh hi;
ACT 3:15 Taciang nuntakna Topa na that uh hi, Ama sia Pathian in thina pan in thokiksak a; kote sia a tetti te ka hi uh hi.
ACT 3:16 Jesus min upna tungtawn in hisia pa na mu uh le na heak uh bang in, Ama min taw hatsak hi: hi hi, a upna hang in hi damna kicing sia note theampo mai ah pia hi.
ACT 3:17 Tu in ka suapui te awng, noma le na makai te in Jesus tungah na vawt uh te, na heak ngawl uh hu in a vawt na hi uh hi, ci ka he hi.
ACT 3:18 Ahihang tua thu te sia, Pathian in kamsang te kam tungtawn in hong lakkholsa, Christ sia thuak tu hi, ci thu a tangtun natu a hihi.
ACT 3:19 Tua ahikom note na mawna uh ki sikkik vun a, na thinsung uh ki kheal vun, tabang in na mawna uh te hong phiatsak tu a, Topa mai pan in tha thak na nga uh hun hong thengkik tu hi.
ACT 3:20 Taciang note tungah a ki pualaksa Jesus Christ hongpaisak tu hi:
ACT 3:21 Leitung pian pan kipan Pathian in Ama kamsang thiangtho te kam tungtawn in a sonkholsa bang in, na theampo thaksua na hun dong Jesus Christ sia vantung ah om suak tu hi.
ACT 3:22 Banghangziam cile Moses in a tatak in, pu le pa te tung ah, Topa na Pathian in keima bang kamsang khat, na suapui te sung pan ka piangsak tu a; note tungah a sonsa theampo sia na theampo sungah na ngai tu uh hi.
ACT 3:23 Taciang in kamsang thu a ngai nuam ngawl peuma, mipi sung pan in susia tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 3:24 Samuel pan kipan in a nungsang pan kamsang thu a son te theampo in, hi ni thu te sonkhol zo uh hi.
ACT 3:25 Note sia kamsang te i tate na hi uh hi, Pathian in i pu le pa te taw Abraham kungah a vawt kamciam, na suanlepal tungtawn in leitung minam theampo in thupha sang tu hi, ci thu na sang tu uh hi.
ACT 3:26 Note sungah phat ngawlna pan in, a heakkik peuma thupha pia tu in, Pathian in a Tapa Jesus thokiksak a, a masabel in note kungah hong sawl hi, ci hi.
ACT 4:1 Amate in mipite tungah thu a hil uh laitak in, thiampi te, biakinn lampui te le Sadducee te amate kungah hongpai uh hi,
ACT 4:2 Sawltak te in mipi te thuhil a, Jesus tungtawn in thina pan thawkikna thu a pualak uh hu in, amate thinna in om tek uh hi.
ACT 4:3 Taciang amate in sawltak te man uh a, a zingciang dong thongtaksak uh hi: banghangziam cile tu in khua niam zo hi.
ACT 4:4 Ahihang a thuhilna a zate in um uh hi; a umte a mimal in tul nga kiim pha uh hi.
ACT 4:5 A zingciang in amate i lampui te, upa te le thukhamhil te,
ACT 4:6 Taciang thiampi sang Annas le Caiaphas, John le Alexander, taciang thiampi sang i mealheak te theampo taw Jerusalem ah ki kaikhawm tek uh hi.
ACT 4:7 Amate a laizang ah dingsak uh a, bang thuneina, a hibale akua min taw in hibang te vawt nu ziam? ci dong hi.
ACT 4:8 Tuazawkciang in Peter sia Thaa Thiangtho taw kidim a, amate tung ah, no mipi lampui te le Israel upa te,
ACT 4:9 Tuni in hi cina pa tungah napha a ki vawtna le banghang in dam, ci thu taw kisai in thu hong dong nahi uh le;
ACT 4:10 Note theampo le Israel mi theampo in he tavun, thinglamte tungah na khai uh a, Pathian in thina pan a thawkiksak Nazareth mi Jesus Christ min taw, note mai ah a ding pa sia dam hi.
ACT 4:11 Noma inn sate in na nil uh hi suangtum sia inn khuampi suak hi.
ACT 4:12 Ngupna sia mundang ah om ngawl hi; banghangziam cile ngupna i nga thei natu in vantung leinuai ah mindang a kipia om ngawl hi, ci hi.
ACT 4:13 Amate in Peter le John te hangsanna a mu uh ciang in, lai he ngawl le pilna nei ngawl te, ci he uh a, lamdangsa mama uh hi; taciang amate sia Jesus taw omkhawm ngei hi, ci zong he kik uh hi.
ACT 4:14 Taciang a damsak pa sia amate taw a dingkhawm nginge a mu uh hu in, tua thu langpan in bangma a pau thei bua uh hi.
ACT 4:15 Amate thuneite kungpan pusuak tu in thu a piak zawk uh ciang, amate bek thu kikum khawm uh a,
ACT 4:16 Hite banglaw tu hi ziam? banghangziam cile amate in a cepte tak nalamdang te vawt uh a, Jerusalem ah a om mi theampo mai ah vawt uh hi; taciang hi thu i nial thei bua hi.
ACT 4:17 Ahihang hi thu mite sungah kizel thua ngawl tu in ahizong, kuama tungah hi min taw thuhil ngawl tu ahizong, nasiatak in thawmvau tawng, ci uh hi.
ACT 4:18 Taciang amate sam uh a, Jesus min taw thuhil ngawlhet tu le son nawn ngawl tu in thupia uh hi.
ACT 4:19 Ahihang Peter le John in, Pathian thu sang in note i thu man tu sia Pathian mai ah a pha le a phangawl noma in khensat vun.
ACT 4:20 Banghangziam cile ka mu uh thu le ka zak uh thu te son ngawl in ka om thei bua uh hi, ci in zo uh hi.
ACT 4:21 Tua ahikom amate in a thawmvau zawk uh ciang in, bangbang in danpia tu ci a heak ngawl uh hu in suatak uh hi, banghangziam cile mi theampo in hi a sep uh te hang in Pathian minthang pok tek uh hi.
ACT 4:22 Banghangziam cile hi cidamna nalamdang a tungah a kilangpa sia kum sawm li val zo hi.
ACT 4:23 A suatak zawk uh ciang, amate a lawmte kungah pai uh a, thiampi lian te le upa te in amate tungah a son theampo sonkik uh hi.
ACT 4:24 Tua thu amate in a zak uh ciang in, thinkhat lung khat in Pathian kungah au tek uh a, Topa awng, Nangma sia van le lei, tuipi le a sung om theampo a vawt Pathian na hihi:
ACT 4:25 Na naseam David tungtawn a son thu, banghang in Gentile mite thin-uk ziam, taciang mihing te banghang in matlap nei ngawl thu te ngaisun uh ziam?
ACT 4:26 Leitung kumpi te ding uh a, taciang ngam uk te zong ki kaikhawm in Topa le Christ langpan uh hi.
ACT 4:27 Banghangziam cile sathau na buaksa Nangma i a thiangtho nauno Jesus sia Herod le Pontius Pilate, Gentile mite le Israel mite taw, ki kaikhawm tek in, nasiatak in langpan uh hi,
ACT 4:28 Banghangziam cile na khut taw na vawt tu te le na khensatsa ngaisutna te na khuangkhim natu a hihi.
ACT 4:29 Tu in Topa awng, amate i hong thawmnvauna te en in: na sal te tungah na thu pualak tu in hangsanna hongpia tan,
ACT 4:30 Na nauno thiangtho Jesus min taw cina te damsak tu le musakna te le nalamdang te vawt tu in na ban hong phal ta in, ci in thungen khawm uh hi.
ACT 4:31 Amate thu a nget zawk uh ciang in, a kikhopna mun ling hi; taciang amate sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh a, Pathian thu hangsantak in son uh hi.
ACT 4:32 Taciang thu um mihonpi te thinkhat lungkhat taw in omkhawm tek uh hi: kuama in a neisa te uh keima a hi, ci ngawl uh hi; ahihang amate neisa na theampo neikhawm tek uh hi.
ACT 4:33 Topa Jesus thawkikna thu ssawltak te in vangletna lianpi taw tettipang uh a: amate tungah hesuakna lianpi om hi.
ACT 4:34 Amate sungah a ki tangsam khat zong a om bua uh hi: banghangziam cile lo ngam te, a hibale inn nei te in zuak uh hi, taciang a sum nga uh teng keng uh a,
ACT 4:35 Sawltak te peang ah koi tek uh hi: taciang khatsim i kisapna bang in hawm uh hi.
ACT 4:36 Taciang Joses, sawltak te in Barnabas a ci uh, Barnabas i a khiakna sia, henepna tapa a kici pa, ama sia Levi minam hi a, Cyprus ngam mi a hihi,
ACT 4:37 Tua pa in a lo zuak a, a dangka keng in, sawltak te peang ah koi hi.
ACT 5:1 Ahihang Ananias kici mi khat om a, a zi Sapphira taw a neisa uh zuak hi,
ACT 5:2 Taciang a zi i heakpui nataw a man pawlkhat phualseal uh a, pawlkhat hong paipui in, sawltak te peang ah koi hi.
ACT 5:3 Ahihang Peter in, Ananias awng, banghang in Tha Thiangtho theam tu in le lo man pawlkhat phualseal tu in Satan in na thinsung hong dimsak ziam?
ACT 5:4 Lo a om lai in, nangma a hi ngawl ziam? taciang na zuak zawkciang zong, nangma thu ma hi ngawl ziam? banghang in na thinsung ah hibang ngaisun ni ziam? mihing theam hi ngawl in, Pathian theam hi zaw ni hi, ci hi.
ACT 5:5 Taciang Ananias in hi kammal te a zak ciang puk in, thi hi: hithu te a za theampo tungah launa lianpi hong theng hi.
ACT 5:6 Taciang tangval te ding in, tuun uh hi, taciang puasang ah zawng in, vui uh hi.
ACT 5:7 Nai thum bang a kihal zawkciang in, bang thu piang ci zong he ngawl pi in a zi hong tum hi.
ACT 5:8 Taciang Peter in a kungah, na lo uh hi za taw zuak nu ziam? hong son tan, ci dong hi. Taciang ama in, hi za ma hi, ci hi.
ACT 5:9 Tuazawkciang in Peter in ama kungah, bangbang in Topa Thaa ze-et tu in thukim thei nu ziam? en in, na pasal vui te i peang sia kongkha bul ah om hi, taciang amate in puasang ah hong zawng tu uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 5:10 Tua zawkpo ciang in Peter peang ah puksuk in, thi hi: taciang tangval te hong tum uh a, a thisa in mu uh hi, taciang, puasang ah zawng uh a, a pasal kungah vui uh hi.
ACT 5:11 Taciang pawlpi le hi thu a za theampo tungah launa lianpi hong theng hi.
ACT 5:12 Sawltakte i khut tungtawn in musakna le nalamdang tampi mite sungah vawt uh a; thu umte theampo Solomon buk sungah ki thukim tak in omtek uh hi.
ACT 5:13 Amate sia ngual in pok mama napi, a dang kuama in ki pawlpui ngawl hi.
ACT 5:14 Taciang thu um mi numei le pasal mihonpi sia Topa kungah tam seseam ki belap hi.
ACT 5:15 Cina te lamdung ah hong paipui uh a, Peter in a kantan laitak in, a lim in pawlkhat te lia tu in lupna le luppha te taw sial uh hi.
ACT 5:16 Jerusalem kimkot khua tampi pan in mihonpi te zong hongpai uh a, cina te le doai te i zawthawk te zong hong paipui uh hi: taciang amate a vekpi in dam siat hi.
ACT 5:17 Tuazawkciang in thiampi sang le ama taw a om Sadducee te theampo thin-ukna taw dim in hong ding uh a,
ACT 5:18 Sawltak te man in, thong sungah khia uh hi.
ACT 5:19 Ahihang Topa vantungmi in zan ciang in thonginn kongkha te hong a, pusua siat hi,
ACT 5:20 Taciang, pai vun a, ding in biakinn sung mipi te tungah hi nuntakna thu theampo son tavun, ci hi.
ACT 5:21 Amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, zingtung in biakinn sungah tum uh a, thuhil uh hi. Ahihang thiampi sang le a naseam te hongpai uh a, thudokpi te le Israel upa te theampo sam hi, taciang amate in ngual sawl in sawltak te paipuisak hi.
ACT 5:22 Ahihang palik te a thet ciang in, thong sungah a mu ngawl uh ciang, heakkik in son uh a,
ACT 5:23 Thonginn phatak in a kikhak in mu khu hi, taciang thongcing te zong a puasang kongkha mai ah ding nginge hi: ahihang ka hon uh ciang in, a sungah mihing khat zong ka mu bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 5:24 Hi thu te thiampi sang, biakinn lampui te le thiampi lian te in a zak uh ciang in, bang thu hithong ziam, ci in lungmang mama uh hi.
ACT 5:25 Tasia ciang in mi khat hongpai a, en vun, thong sung na khum mihing te biakinn sungah ding in mite thuhil san uh hi, ci son hi.
ACT 5:26 Tuazawkciang in biakinn lampui le palik te pai hong pai uh a, amate zawthawk thu zang ngawl in paipui hi: banghangziam cile mite in suangtum taw a den tu a lau uh hang a hihi.
ACT 5:27 Amate in sawltak te paipui uh a, thudokpi te mai ah dingsak uh hi: taciang thiampi sang in amate thu dong a,
ACT 5:28 Hi min taw thuhil ngawl tu in nasiatak in thu hongpia zo hi ngawl khu ziam? taciang, en vun, Jerusalem sia note i hilna taw kidimsak siat zo nu hi, taciang hisia pa thisan sia kote tungah hong thengsak nuam nu hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 5:29 Taciang Peter le a dang sawltak te in zo kik uh a, mihing te thu sang in Pathian thu ka zui zaw tu uh hi.
ACT 5:30 Note in thing tungah that in, na khai uh Jesus sia ka pu le pa te i Pathian in thokiksak hi.
ACT 5:31 Israel te maw kisikik na le maw maisakna pia tu in Ama sia Pathian in a ziatsang khut taw To le Ngumpa in lamsang zo hi.
ACT 5:32 Taciang kote sia hi thu te i tetti te ka hi uh hi; taciang Pathian in a thu a zui te tungah a piak Tha Thiangtho zong tetti a hihi, ci uh hi.
ACT 5:33 Amate in tua thu a zak uh ciang in, nasiatak in a thin uh uk a, sawltak te that tu in ngaisun uh hi.
ACT 5:34 Tuazawkciang in thudokpi te sung pan Pharisee khat, Gamaliel a kici, thukham taw kisai doctor a hi, mi theampo sungah a ki zakta pa in, sawltak te tawmvei sung pusuaksak tu in thupia a;
ACT 5:35 Amate tung ah, no Israel mite, hi thu taw kisai in na vawt tu uh thu kidawm vun.
ACT 5:36 Banghangziam cile hi te om ma in Theudas a kici khat piang ngei a, ama le ama sia mi thupi khat bang in ki suangtak mama hi; mihing zali kiim in beal phot napi, ama ki that hi; taciang a thu zuite theampo ki thethang siat a, bokik siat hi.
ACT 5:37 Hisia pa om ma in Galilee mi, Judas kici misim hun laitak in hong piang leleau a, a nungzui mi tamma kaizawn hi: ama zong bokik veve a; a thuzui te theampo a vekpi in, ki thethang leleau hi.
ACT 5:38 Taciang tu in kong son hi, hi te pial vun a, amate om in om lel tahen: banghangziam cile hi ngaisutna, a hibale, hi nasep sia mihing tung pan ahile, bokik siat lel tu hi:
ACT 5:39 Ahihang, hisia sia Pathian kung pan ahile, na zozo batu uh hi; Pathian langpan in a do zong na suak thei zawsap tu uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 5:40 Amate in Gamaliel i son thu lungkim tek uh hi: taciang sawltak te sam uh a, a sat zawkciang in, Jesus min taw thuhil nawn ngawl tu in thupia a, suatak uh hi.
ACT 5:41 Taciang amte Jesus min hang in maizumna thuaktak in a cepte hu in angtang mama in thudokpi te mai pan pusuak uh hi.
ACT 5:42 Taciang nisim in biakinn sung le inn tatuam ah tatsat ngawl in Jesus Christ thuhil in pualak tek uh hi.
ACT 6:1 Tua hun sung, nungzui te hong khan ciang in, Greek te in Hebrew te langpan in kamtam na hong piang hi, banghangziam cile Greek meingong te sia nisim an a hawm uh ciang in ki ngaingonsak hi.
ACT 6:2 Tua zawkciang in sawltak sawm le ni te in nungzui mihonpi te amate kungah sam a, kote Pathian thu nusia in an ka hawm tu uh sia lungkim huai ngawl hi.
ACT 6:3 Tua ahikom, suapui te awng, noma sung pan in a belcing minpha, Tha Thiangtho le ciimna taw a kidim mi sali hong zong tavun a, hi nasep amate i ap tu hi.
ACT 6:4 Ahihang kote thungen le Pathian thu sungah a tawntung in ka kipumpiak tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 6:5 Taciang amate sonbang in mihonpi theampo lungkim uh a: amate in, upna le Tha Thiangtho taw a kidim Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Antioch khua mi Judah biakna ah a tum Nicolas te teal uh hi.
ACT 6:6 Amate sia sawltak te mai ah dingsak uh a, thu a ngetsak uh ciang in, amate lutung ah a khut nga uh hi.
ACT 6:7 Taciang Pathian thu hong khang a; Jerusalem ah nungzui te nasiatak in hong ki belap hi; taciang thiampi tampi te in upna thu zui uh hi.
ACT 6:8 Taciang upna le vangletna taw a kidim Stephen in, mite sungah a lian mama nalamdang le lim tumdang lianpi te vawt hi.
ACT 6:9 Tuazawkciang in A Suaktate synagogue a kici, synagogue sungah Cyrene mite, Alexandria mite, Cilicia mite le Asia mite Stephen taw thu kinial uh hi.
ACT 6:10 Amate in Stephen i ciimna le thaa taw a pauna te a nalh zo bua uh hi.
ACT 6:11 Tuazawkciang in amate in mite sumnguk pia ku uh a, tua te in, hisia pa in Moses le Pathian langpan in mindaisak na kammal te a pau sia kote in ka za uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 6:12 Taciang amate in mihonpi te, upa te le thukhamhil te hol uh a, Stephen kungah hongpai uh hi, taciang thudokpi te kungah paipui uh a,
ACT 6:13 Hisia pa in mun thiangtho le thukham langpan in mindaisak na kammal te tatsat ngawl in pau hi, ci uh hi, tabang in leilot tetti tampi koi uh hi:
ACT 6:14 Banghangziam cile, Nazareth mi Jesus in hi mun susia tu a, Moses i hongpiak thukham te lai tu hi, ci in hisia pa in a son ka za uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 6:15 Thudokpi te thukhen na mun ah a to theampo in, Stephen sia phatak in sal uh a, a maitang sia vantungmi te maitang bang in mu uh hi.
ACT 7:1 Tuazawkciang in thiampi sang in, hi thu te tabangma ziam? ci hi.
ACT 7:2 Taciang Stephen in, suapui te le pa te awng, ngai vun; i pa Abraham sia Haran ah a om ma, Mesopotamia ah a omlai tak in, a vanglian Pathian ama tungah kilang a,
ACT 7:3 Ama tung ah, na ngam le na mipui te sung pan in pusuak in a, kong lak tu ngam ah pai in, ci hi.
ACT 7:4 Tuazawkciang in Chaldaeans ngam pan pusuak a, Haran khua ah om hi: tua mun pan a pa a thi ciang in, tu in na omna uh mun, hi ngamsung ah ki khin hi.
ACT 7:5 Taciang hi ngam sungah a peang ngak natu na ngawn, mun pia ngawl hi: ahihang ama le a suan le pal te hi ngam pia tu in ta a nei ma in, kamciam pia zo hi.
ACT 7:6 Taciang Pathian in hi bang in son hi, a suan le pal te ngamdang ah peam tu uh a; kum zali sung sal tang in ngimna thuak tu uh hi.
ACT 7:7 Taciang a saltanna mun minam te keima in thu ka khen tu hi, tua zawkciang in amate pusuak tu uh a, hi mun ah keima na seam tu uh hi, ci in Pathian in ci hi.
ACT 7:8 Taciang Pathian in Abraham sia vunteap tanna kamciam pia hi: taciang Abraham in Isaac nei a, ni liat ni ciang in a vunteap tansak hi; taciang Isaac in Jacob nei a; taciang Jacob in minam makai sawm le ni te nei hi.
ACT 7:9 Taciang minam makai te in ki enna hang in Joseph sia Egypt ngam ah zuak uh hi napi: Pathian in ompui a,
ACT 7:10 Haksatna theampo sung pan suatak in, Egypt kumpipa Pharaoh mai ah ciimna le maipha pia hi; taciang Egypt ngam le ama inn theampo tungah a uk tu in vawt hi.
ACT 7:11 Egypt ngam le Canaan ngamsung theampo ah kialtung a, taciang haksatna lianpi theng ahikom in i pu i pa te bangma neak tu muzo ngawl uh hi.
ACT 7:12 Ahihang Jacob in Egypt ngam ah an om hi, ci a zak ciang in, i pu le pa te a masabel in paisak hi.
ACT 7:13 Taciang a ni veina ciang in Joseph in a suapui te kungah ama thu hesak hi; taciang Joseph i mealheak te Pharaoh kungah hesak hi.
ACT 7:14 Tuazawkciang Joseph in paisak a, a pa Jacob le a mealheak theampo mihing sawm sali le nga te ama kungah sam hi.
ACT 7:15 Tua ahikom Jacob sia Egypt ngam ah pai a, ama le i pupi te tuak ah thi hi,
ACT 7:16 A luanghawm sia Shechem ah pua uh a, Abraham in Hamor tapa kung pan dangka taw a lei sa than ah vui hi. Hamor sia Shechem i pa a hihi.
ACT 7:17 Ahihang Pathian i Abraham tung kiciamna taw a kamciamna hun hong nai ciang in, Egypt ngam ah amate khang in pung seseam uh hi,
ACT 7:18 Joseph a he ngawl a dang kumpi khat hong khan dong in pung uh hi.
ACT 7:19 Tua kumpipa in i mipui te philphit tak in theambawl uh a, nausen te a nungta ngawl tu in vawk tu in i pupi te sia phatngawlna taw vawtsia uh hi.
ACT 7:20 Tua hun in Moses suak a, ama sia hoi mama hi, taciang a pa inn ah tha thum sung ki vak hi:
ACT 7:21 Taciang ama sia a puasang ah a ki vawk ciang in, Pharaoh tanu in la a, ama tapa tu in vak hi.
ACT 7:22 Tua Moses in Egypt te pilna theampo sin a, ama sia kampau le sepna ah lawcing mama hi.
ACT 7:23 Taciang ama sia kum sawmli a phak ciang in, a suapui Israel tate ve nopna a thinsung pan hong suak hi.
ACT 7:24 Israel mi khat a man ngawl in a thuak a mu ciang in, tua pa ngum a, a vawtsia Egypt pa sia phulam in that hi:
ACT 7:25 Banghangziam cile Pathian in ama khut zang in amate suatak tu hi, ci a suapui te in he tu in ngaisun hi:
ACT 7:26 A zingciang in Israel mi ni a kihau te kungah pai a, leptua sawm in, note u nau nu hi; banghang in kihau nu ziam? ci hi.
ACT 7:27 Ahihang a innpam pa a vawtsia pa in Moses sawn a, nang akua in kote tungah thunei le thukhen tu in hong vawt ziam?
ACT 7:28 Zei ni Egypt pa na thalup bang in hong that nuam ni ziam? ci hi.
ACT 7:29 Tuazawkciang hisia pa i kampau hang in Moses tai a Midian ngam ah peamta in om hi, tua mun ah tapa ni nei hi.
ACT 7:30 Kum sawm li a bo ciang in, Sinai mual duisung ah Topa vantungmi sia lophung kuang bang in kilang hi.
ACT 7:31 Tasia Moses in a mu ciang in, a mu thu lamdangsa hi: en tu in a neak ciang in, Topa aw ama tungah theng a,
ACT 7:32 Keima sia na pu le pa te i Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian le Jacob Pathian ka hihi, ci hi. Tuazawkciang in Moses sia ling a, en zong en ngam ngawl hi.
ACT 7:33 Tuazawkciang in Topa in ama kungah, na peangdap sut in: banghangziam cile na dinna mun sia a thiangtho leitang a hihi.
ACT 7:34 Keima in ka mu zo hi, Egypt ngam ah ka mite haksatna keima in mu zo khi hi, taciang amate tauna ka za zo a, suatak tu in kong tuaksuk hi. Taciang tu in hongpai tan, Egypt ngam ah hong sawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 7:35 Hi Moses sia amate in nial uh a, nangma sia hong uk tu le thukhen tu in a kua in hong vawt ziam? ci uh hi. Pathian in Moses sia lophung sung pan ama tungah a kilang vantungmi i khut tungtawn in ukpa le ngumpa tu in paisak hi.
ACT 7:36 Moses in amate pusua pui a, tua zawkciang in Egypt ngam, san tuipi le senneal ngam sungah kum sawmli sung, nalamdang le musakna tampi te lak hi.
ACT 7:37 Topa na Pathian in keima bang kamsang khat, na suapui te sung pan ka piangsak tu hi; note in a thu na ngai tu uh hi, tabang in Israel tate tungah a sonpa sia Moses a hihi.
ACT 7:38 Ama sia senneal ngamsung a om pawlpi te kungah ahizong, Sinai mual ah vantungmi taw a ki paupui na ah ahizong, taciang i pu i pa te taw ahizong, omkhawm ngei a: ama sia eite tungah hongpiak tu a nungta kammal te a sang pa a hihi:
ACT 7:39 I pu i pa te in thu ni ngawl uh a, amate kung pan sawnthal uh hi, taciang amate thinsung pan in Egypt ngam ah heakkik uh hi,
ACT 7:40 Amate in Aaron tung ah, kote i mai ah a pai tu in pathian te hong vawtsak tan: banghangziam cile Egypt ngam pan hong pusua hi Moses sia bangsuak, ci ka he bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 7:41 Taciang tua hun sung in amate in khuino vawt uh a, milim tungah biakpiakna pia uh hi, taciang amate khut taw a vawttawm nate tungah lungdam in om uh hi.
ACT 7:42 Tuazawkciang in Pathian in amate nungngat a, van aksi te bia tu in koicip hi; kamsang te laibu sungah a ki atsa bang in, Maw, no Israel minam te, senneal ngam ah kum sawm li sung a ki thatlum ngamsa te le biakpiakna te nong pia uh ziam?
ACT 7:43 Note in Molech i biakbuk le na aksi pathian Remphan, na biak tu in na vawttawm uh milim te na keng uh hi: tua ahikom keima in note Babylon ngalkhat dong in kong paipui tu hi.
ACT 7:44 I pu le pa te in senneal ngam sungah biakbuk tetti te nei hi, Moses tung son uh a, a mu uh lim bang in, vawt tu in sawl uh hi.
ACT 7:45 Tuazawkciang in i pu le pa te in tua biakbuk sia Gentile te i neisa ngamsung ah Joshua taw tumpui uh hi, tua Gentile te sia Pathian in David hun dong i pu le pa te mai pan in hawlkhia siat hi.
ACT 7:46 David in Pathian mai ah maipha nga a, Jacob Pathian atu biakbuk sa tu in ngen hi.
ACT 7:47 Ahihang Solomon in Pathian atu in inn sa hi.
ACT 7:48 Ahihang a sangbel Pathian sia khut taw a kisa biakinn sungah om ngawl hi; kamsang i a son na ah,
ACT 7:49 Vantung sia ka kumpi tokhum hi a, leitung sia ka peang ngakna hi, bangbang inn kei atu satu nu ziam? a hibale ka tawlngak na mun sia bang ziam?
ACT 7:50 Hi nate theampo sia keima khut taw ka vawt hi ngawl ziam? ci hi.
ACT 7:51 Note ngawng ngu khoh te le thinsung le nakheng vunteap tan ngawl te awng, note in Tha Thiangtho na khak tawntung uh hi; na pu le pa te i a vawt uh bang in note in zong na vawt uh hi.
ACT 7:52 Kamsang te sung pan na pu le pa te in a vawtsiat ngawl khat beak a om ziam? Mi thutang pa hongpai natu thu a pualak te amate in that uh a; tu in note sia tua mi thutang pa a zuak te le a that te na hi uh hi:
ACT 7:53 Vantungmi te i huna taw thukham na sang uh a, na zui bua uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 7:54 Amate in hi thu te a zak uh ciang in, nasiatak in thin-uk mama uh a, a ha te ngoai uh hi.
ACT 7:55 Ahihang Stephen sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim in, vantung lam tangtak in ento hi, taciang Pathian vangletna le Jesus sia Pathian ziatsang ah a ding mu hi.
ACT 7:56 En vun, van ki hong a, Pathian ziatsang ah mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi, ci hi.
ACT 7:57 Tuazawkciang in aw ngingtak in au uh a, a bil uh hum in, ki lomtang in Stephen sangah hong tai uh hi,
ACT 7:58 Taciang khuapua ah nawt uh a, suangtum taw deang uh hi: taciang tetti te in a nik le puan te tangvalpa peang ah koi uh hi, tua tangvalpa min sia Saul a hihi.
ACT 7:59 Amate in Stephen sia suangtum taw deang uh hi, taciang Stephen in, Pathian sam a, Topa Jesus awng, ka tha hong sang tan, ci hi.
ACT 7:60 Taciang ama khupdin in, Topa awng, hi mawna sia amate tungah koi heak in, ci in a ngingtak in au hi, tabang a au zawkciang in ama mutthip hi.
ACT 8:1 Taciang Stephen i thina ah Saul a lungkim hi. Tua hun sung in Jerusalem pawlpi langpan in vawtsiatna lianpi om hi; sawltak te simngawl, thu um mite theampo sia Judah ngam le Samaria ngam muntheampo ah peakkeak uh hi.
ACT 8:2 Stephen sia biakna sang a kipia mite in zawng in vui uh hi, taciang nasiatak in kaa uh hi.
ACT 8:3 Saul ahile, inn sim ah tum a, numei pasal ci ngawl in kaikeak a, taciang thonginn ah ap in, pawlpi susia hi.
ACT 8:4 Tua ahikom mun theampo ah a ki thethang te mun tatuam ah pai in Pathian thu tangko tek uh hi.
ACT 8:5 Tuazawkciang in Philip sia Samaria khuapi ah pai a, amate tungah Christ thuhil hi.
ACT 8:6 Taciang Philip in nalamdang te a vawtna za uh a, a mu uh hu in a thuhil nate mite in kilomtang in phatak in ngai uh hi.
ACT 8:7 Banghangziam cile doai te nangawn in au in, amate i thin-apsak mihing te sung pan pusuak uh hi: taciang pumzaw te le peangbai te zong damsak hi.
ACT 8:8 Taciang tua khuapi sungah lungdamna lianpi om hi.
ACT 8:9 Ahihang tua mun ah Simon a kici mi khat om a, ama sia nidang in tua khuapi sungah bum le ai zang in Samaria mite bum a, ama le ama mi thupi khat in ki son hi.
ACT 8:10 Mi theampo, a nobel pan a lianbel dong in a thu phatak in ni uh a, hisia pa sia Pathian vangletna lianpi hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 8:11 Hun saupi sung bum le ai taw ngual a bum hu in, ngual in ama zakta uh hi.
ACT 8:12 Ahihang Philip in Pathian kumpingam le Jesus Christ min taw kisai thu te a hil ciang in, numei zong pasal zong tui ki phum uh hi.
ACT 8:13 Tuazawkciang in Simon ama tatak zong in um hi: taciang tui a ki phum zawkciang in, Philip taw ki thawl hi, taciang nalamdang le musakna a kivawtte lamdangsa mama in en hi.
ACT 8:14 Tu in Jerusalem a om sawltak te in Samaria mite in Pathian thu sang zo uh hi, ci a zak uh ciang in Peter le John sia amate kungah paisak uh a:
ACT 8:15 Amate a thet uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho a nga thei natu in thungetsak hi:
ACT 8:16 (Banghangziam cile Tha Thiangtho sia kuama tungah theng ngawl lai hi: Topa Jesus min taw tui ki phum bek sang pheang uh hi.)
ACT 8:17 Tuazawkciang in Peter le John in amate tungah a khut te nga uh hi, taciang amate in Tha Thiangtho sang uh uh.
ACT 8:18 Taciang sawltak te in khutngakna tungtawn in Tha Thiangtho piakna sia Simon in a mu ciang in, sawltak te dangka pia a,
ACT 8:19 Akuapo tungah khut ka nga ahizong Tha Thiangtho a san thei natu in, hi vangletna kei zong hong pia tavun, ci hi.
ACT 8:20 Ahihang Peter in ama tung ah, na dangka sia nangma taw lalcip tahen, banghangziam cile nangma in Pathian letsong sia dangka taw lei thei tu in na ngaisun hi.
ACT 8:21 Nangma sia hi thu taw kisaina na nei bua hi: banghangziam cile Pathian mai ah na thinsung phangawl hi.
ACT 8:22 Tua ahikom hina phatngawlna pan in kisik in a, Pathian kungah thungen in, tabang hile na thinsung ngaisutna mawna hong maisak tu hi.
ACT 8:23 Banghangziam cile nangma sia a kha mama thinkha sungah na om a, phatngawlna in hong hencip hi, ci ka he hi, ci hi.
ACT 8:24 Tuazawkciang in Simon in, na son thu te theampo khat zong ka tungah hong thet ngawl natu in, Topa tungah thu hong ngetsak tavun, ci hi.
ACT 8:25 Taciang amate in Topa thuhil le tetti a pan zawk uh ciang Jerusalem ah heakkik uh a, Samaria mite khua tampi ah lungdamna thuhil uh hi.
ACT 8:26 Taciang Topa vantungmi in Philip tung ah, ding in a, Jerusalem pan thangsang Gaza paina lampi ah paisuk in, tua mun sia senneal ngam a hihi, ci hi.
ACT 8:27 Taciang Philip ding in pai hi: taciang, en in, Ethiopa mi cil ki nget khat, Ethiopia kumpinu Candace khut nuai ah za lian mama le neisa theampo a keampa sia Jerusalem ah Pathian bia tu in hongpai a,
ACT 8:28 Ama sia a ciakik lam in, siphu leang to in kamsang Isaiah laibu sim hi.
ACT 8:29 Thaa in Philip tung ah, neakphei in a, hi siphu leang tungah ama taw paikhawm vun, ci hi.
ACT 8:30 Philip sia tua pa kungah tai a, kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim za hi, taciang na sim sia na tel ziam? ci hi.
ACT 8:31 Tua pa in, mi khatpo in hong hil bua ahile, bangbang in tel thei tu khi ziam? ci hi. Taciang ama in Philip sia siphu leang tungah kato in ama taw tokhawm tu in sam hi.
ACT 8:32 Laithiangtho a sim na mun sia, Ama sia ngaw tu in a ki paipui tuu bang a hihi; taciang a mulmet pa mai ah a ham ngawl tuuno bang in, Ama sia a kam zong ka ngawl hi:
ACT 8:33 Ki zawnsak na sungah a man ngawl in thukhenna thuak hi: taciang akua in ama suan te tungah tangko tu ziam? banghangziam cile ama nuntakna sia hi leitung pan in la uh hi, a ci na mun a hihi.
ACT 8:34 Taciang tua cil ki nget pa in Philip zo kik a, kong thum hi, hong son tan, kamsang in akua thu son ziam? ama thu ziam, a hibale midang thu son ziam? ci hi.
ACT 8:35 Tuazawkciang in Philip in a kam hong a, tua laithiangtho pan kipan in, Jesus thu dong ama tungah hil hi.
ACT 8:36 Tabang in amate lampi dung ah a pai uh laitak in, tui omna mun ah theng uh hi: tua cil ki nget pa in, en in, hi mun ah tui om hi; tui ki phum tu bang in hong khak ziam? ci hi.
ACT 8:37 Taciang Philip in, na thinsung theampo taw na um le, ki phum thei ni hi, ci hi. Taciang ama in, Jesus Christ sia Pathian Tapa hi, ci ka um hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 8:38 Ama in siphu leang tawlnga tu in thupia hi: taciang a ni in tuisung ah tuaksuk uh a, Philip in ama tuiphumna pia hi.
ACT 8:39 Taciang amate tui sung pan a pusua uh ciang in, Topa Thaa in Philip lato a, tua pa in mu kik nawn ngawl hi: taciang lungdamtak in a lampi dung ah paisuak hi.
ACT 8:40 Ahihang Philip sia Azotus khua ah, mite in mu uh hi: Caesarea a thet dong khuapi theampo ah Pathian thuhil hi.
ACT 9:1 Taciang Saul in Topa nungzui te that tu in nasiatak in thawmvau tawntung lai a, thiampi sang pa kungah pai in,
ACT 9:2 Ama tung pan in, Damascus synagogue te tung piak tu lai te ngen hi, tua mun ah Topa lampi zui te a mu le, numei pasal ci ngawl, hen in Jerusalem ah paipui sawm hi.
ACT 9:3 Ama a khualhaw na, Damascus hong theng dektak hi: taciang thakhatthu in van pan khuavak in a kimkot teng tan hi:
ACT 9:4 Ama sia lei ah pusuk a, Saul, Saul, banghang hong vawtsia ni ziam? ci aw za hi.
ACT 9:5 Saul in, Topa awng, akua ni ziam? ci hi. Taciang Topa in, Keima sia na vawtsiat Jesus khi hi: nangma atu in a zum khat sui sia thuakhak mama hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:6 Taciang ama ling va dil le laukawm in, Topa awng, bang hong vawtsak nuam ni ziam? ci hi. Taciang Topa in ama tung ah, Ding in a, khuapi sungah pai in, taciang na vawt hamtang tu thu kong son tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:7 Taciang ama taw khualhaw te in aw nging za uh hinapi, mihing khat zong mu ngawl uh a hikom kamkhat zong pau ngawl in ding uh hi.
ACT 9:8 Saul sia lei pan tho to a; a mit a ha ciang in, mihing kuama mu ngawl hi: ahihang amate in a khut pan kai a, Damascus khua sungah paipui uh hi.
ACT 9:9 Taciang ni thum sung khua mu ngawl a, an ne ngawl in tui zong dawn ngawl hi.
ACT 9:10 Damascus khuasung ah Ananias a kici nungzui khat om hi; taciang Topa in mangmuna sung pan in ama kungah, Ananias awng, ci hi. Taciang ama in, en in, Topa awng, keima hiak ah ka om hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:11 Topa in ama tung ah, Ding in a, a Tang, a kici lampi ah pai tan, taciang Judah inn ah Tarsus khuami, Saul a kici mi khat zong in: banghangziam cile, en in, ama thungen in om hi,
ACT 9:12 Taciang ama in Ananias a kici mi khat tum a, khua a mu thei natu in, ama tungah a khut a ngak sia mangmuna sungah mu zo hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:13 Ananias in, Topa awng, Jerusalem ah na mithiangtho te kungah phat ngawlna a vawt bangza in tam ci, hisia pa thu mi tampi te tung pan in ka za zo hi:
ACT 9:14 Taciang na min hong sam theampo hen tu in thiampi lian te tung pan thuneina nei hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 9:15 Ahihang Topa in Ananias tung ah, Pai in, banghangziam cile ama sia keima atu in a kiteal beal hi a, Gentile mite, kumpi te le Israel tate mai ah ka min a pua tu pa a hihi:
ACT 9:16 Banghangziam cile keima in ama sia ka min hang in a thuak hamtang tu te bangza in lian ziam, ci sia ka lak tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:17 Taciang Ananias pai a, inn sungah tum hi; Saul tungah a khut nga a, suapui pa Saul awng, khua mu in, Tha Thiangtho taw na dim thei natu, nong pai na lampi, na tungah hong kilang Topa Jesus in hong sawl hi, ci hi.
ACT 9:18 Tasia pociang in Saul i mit pan in ngasalip a kibang khat tak hi: taciang thakhatthu in khuamu hi, taciang ding a, tui ki phum hi.
ACT 9:19 Saul sia an a neak zawkciang in, a thadim hi. Tuazawkciang in Damascus ah nungzui te taw ni tampi sung omkhawm uh hi.
ACT 9:20 Tua zawkpo ciang synagogue sungah Christ sia Pathian Tapa hi, ci in thuhil hi.
ACT 9:21 Ahihang a zate theampo in lamdangsa mama uh a, ama sia Jerusalem ah Jesus min a lo te theampo a susia pa hi ngawl ziam, amate a hen zawkciang, thiampi lian te kungah a paipui nop hang hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
ACT 9:22 Ahihang Saul sia thahat seseam a, Jesus in Christ a hihi, ci a pualak hu in, Damascus a om Judah mite buaisak mama hi.
ACT 9:23 Ni tampi a cin zawkciang in, Judah mite in ama that tu in kikum khawm uh hi.
ACT 9:24 Ahihang amate i pan hunlam Saul in he hi. Taciang amate in Saul that tu in kongpi te sun taw zan taw cing uh hi.
ACT 9:25 Tuazawkciang in nungzui te in Saul sia zan in paipui uh a, bawm taw luphung pan in khiasuk uh hi.
ACT 9:26 Saul sia Jerusalem a thet ciang in, nungzui te taw kikop sawm hi: ahihang amate in Saul sia nungzui hi, ci um ngawl in lau uh hi.
ACT 9:27 Ahihang Barnabas in panpui a, sawltak te kungah paipui hi, taciang lampi ah ama in Topa mu a, Topa zong in ama paupui hi, ci le, Damascus ah Jesus min taw hangsantak in Pathian thuhil hi, ci amate tungah tangko hi.
ACT 9:28 Taciang Saul sia Jerusalem ah amate taw sungtum le pusuak in omtek uh hi.
ACT 9:29 Taciang Topa Jesus min taw hangsantak in thuhil a, Greek mite taw ki nial uhhi: tua ahikom amate in Saul that nuam uh hi.
ACT 9:30 Tua thu suapui te in a heak uh ciang in, Caesaria ah paipui uh a, Tarsus ah puak uh hi.
ACT 9:31 Tuazawkciang in Judah ngam, Galilee ngam le Samaria ngam theampo ah pawlpi te thinnopna taw kiptak in om uh hi; taciang Topa zatakna le Tha Thiangtho henepna sungah nungta in, khangto uh hi.
ACT 9:32 Peter sia mun tatuam ah khualhaw a, Lydda khua a om mithiangtho te kung theng hi.
ACT 9:33 Tua mun ah Aeneas a kici khat taw ki mu hi, ama sia a pumzaw a, lupmun tungah kum liat sung tho thei ngawl in lum hi.
ACT 9:34 Peter in ama tung ah, Aeneas awng, Jesus Christ in hong damsak hi: tho in a, na lupna zial in, ci hi. Tasia pociang in tho hi.
ACT 9:35 Taciang Lydda le Sharon ah a om theampo in mu uh a, Topa sangah heakkik uh hi.
ACT 9:36 Tu in Joppa khua ah Tabitha a kici nungzui khat om hi. Tabitha a khiakna sia Dorcas a cinopna a hihi: hi numei in na pha tampi vawt a, mizawng tampi hu hi.
ACT 9:37 Tua ni in, ama sia a cina in thi hi: taciang amate in a luang a sil zawk uh ciang, inn tung doituam ah sial uh hi.
ACT 9:38 Lydda sia Joppa taw kinai ahikom in nungzui te in Peter tua mun ah om hi, ci za uh a, manlangtak in hongpai natu in, mihing sawl in sam uh hi.
ACT 9:39 Taciang Peter ding in amate taw pai hi. A thet uh ciang in Peter sia inntung doituam ah paipui uh hi: tua mun ah meingong te theampo a hui ah ding in kap lialua uh a, a nuntaklai a ta laktong le puan te zong lak hi.
ACT 9:40 Peter in amate pusuaksak siat a, khupdin in thu a nget zawkciang, a luang sangah kihei in, Tabitha, tho in, ci hi. Taciang a mit hong hak hi: Peter a mu ciang in, to hi.
ACT 9:41 Peter in a khut thak in kaito a, mithiangtho te le meingong te a sap zawkciang in, a nungta in ap hi.
ACT 9:42 Tua thu sia Joppa khua sung theampo ah thang a; mi tampi in Topa um uh hi.
ACT 9:43 Peter sia Joppa khua ah savun vawtpa Simon kungah ni tampi sung om hi.
ACT 10:1 Caesarea khua ah Cornelius a kici khat om hi, ama sia Italy ngalkap hon, a kici ngalkap zakhat uk ngalkapmang a hihi,
ACT 10:2 Ama sia biakna sangah a kipia, a innkuan bup taw Pathian zakta khat, mizawng te huna tampi a pia, tatsat ngawl in Pathian tungah thu a ngen pa a hihi.
ACT 10:3 Nitak nai thum kiim pawl in a thiangtak in a mangmuna sungah, Pathian vantungmi khat a kungah hongpai a, Cornelius, ci in sam hi.
ACT 10:4 Tua vantungmi laukawm in en a, bang thu ziam, Topa? ci hi. Vantungmi in, na thungetna te le mizawngte na hu nate Pathian mai ah theng a, Pathian in hong ciamte hi.
ACT 10:5 Tu in mihing pawlkhat Joppa ah paisak in, Simon Peter kici pa samsak tan.
ACT 10:6 Ama sia tuipi hui ah a teang savun vawt Simon inn ah zintung hi: hi Simon inn sia tuihui ah om a, ama in na vawt tu a kilawm te hong son tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:7 Cornelius a paupui vantungmi a heakkik zawkciang in, a naseam ni le biakna sang ki pia a, tatsat ngawl in ama a cing ngalkap khat sam hi;
ACT 10:8 Hi thu te theampo a son zawkciang in, Joppa ah paisak hi.
ACT 10:9 A zingciang in, amate khual a haw uh laitak, Joppa a thet dektak uh ciang, Peter sia sun nai sawmleni kiim pawl in, inn tungah thungen tu in kato hi:
ACT 10:10 Peter sia a ngil hong kial mama a, an ne nuam zo hi: ahihang amate i an neak tu a vawt laitak in mangmu hi.
ACT 10:11 Van kihong a, puan a ki pheak kingli nei a lian mama na koina taw akibang khat leitung ama kungah hong ki khiasuk mu hi:
ACT 10:12 A sungah peang li nei nganhing a tatuam, sapi te, a bokvak te le van a leang vacim te om hi.
ACT 10:13 Aw khat in ama tung ah, Peter awng; tho in, ngo in a, ne in, ci hi.
ACT 10:14 Ahihang Peter in, hi ngawl hi, Topa awng; banghangziam cile a nin le a thiangtho ngawl te ne ngei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:15 Pathian in a thianthosak te nin hi ci heak in, taciang tua aw in a nivei na son thua hi.
ACT 10:16 Hisia thumvei dong tabang in vawt hi: taciang tua na koina sia van ah ki lato kik hi.
ACT 10:17 Peter in hi mangmuna a mu sia a khiakna a lungman laitak in, en vun, Cornelius kung pan a kisawlte Simon inn zong in kongbiang mai ah ding uh hi.
ACT 10:18 Taciang a sap zawkciang in, Peter a kici Simon sia hiak ah hong tung ziam, ci in dong uh hi.
ACT 10:19 Peter in tua mangmuna thu a ngaisut laitak in, Thaa in, en in, mihing thum in nang hong zong hi.
ACT 10:20 Tua ahikom tho in a, tuaksuk in, bangma lungmang heak in, banghangziam cile amate sia keima i sawl a hihi, ci hi.
ACT 10:21 Tuazawkciang in Peter sia Cornelius i sawl te kungah tuaksuk a, en vun, na zon uh sia keima khi hi: banghang in hongpai nu ziam? ci hi.
ACT 10:22 Amate in, ngalkap zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa, mi thutang, Pathian a zakta le Judah minam theampo sungah minpha, Cornelius in Pathian kung pan kidop piakna thu theng a, a thiangtho vantungmi in ama inn ah nangma hongsawl hi, taciang namgma thuhil ngai tu hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 10:23 Tuazawkciang in Peter in amate innsung ah sam a, amate zan taam uh hi. A zingciang in Peter sia amate taw pai khawm a, Joppa ah suapui te in zong zui uh hi.
ACT 10:24 A zingciang in amate sia Caesarea ah tum uh hi. Taciang Cornelius in a mealheak te le a lawmte kaikhawm khol in ngak tek uh hi.
ACT 10:25 Peter a tum ciang in, Cornelius in muak a, a peang ah kun in bia hi.
ACT 10:26 Ahihang Peter in ama kaito a, ding in; keima zong mihing ma khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:27 Peter in a paupui kawm in innsung ah tum uh a, a pai tam mama mu hi.
ACT 10:28 Peter in amate tung ah, Judah mi khat mi namdang te taw ki thawl tu, a hibale, a kungah pai tu sia ngeina om ngawl hi, ci na he tek uh hi; ahihang khatpo sia a nin, a hibale, a thiangtho ngawl, a kici ngawl natu in Pathian in hong lak zo hi.
ACT 10:29 Tua ahikom note kungah hong sawl pociang, nial ngawl in kongpai hi: tua ahikom bang deina in hong sam nu ziam? ci kong dong hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:30 Taciang Cornelius in, a bosa ni li lai in hi hun ciang dong an ka tang hi; nitak nai thum in ka innsung ah thu ka ngen hi, taciang, en in, puan pak sil mikhat ka mai ah hong ding a,
ACT 10:31 Cornelius awng, na thungetna hong hong ki za zo a, mizawngte na hu nate Pathian mai ah ki ciamte hi.
ACT 10:32 Tua ahikom Peter a kici Simon sia hiak ah sam tu in Joppa ah mi sawl in; ama sia tuihui ah savun vawtpa Simon inn ah tung hi: taciang hongpai ciang in ama in thu hong hil tu hi, ci hong son hi.
ACT 10:33 Tua ahikom tasia pociang in na kungah mi hongpaisak khi hi; taciang nongpai man in pha hi. Tua ahikom tu in Pathian kung pan na thupiak theampo ngai tu in, ka vekpi in hi mun Pathian mai ah om khawm khu hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:34 Tuazawkciang in Peter in a kam hong a, Pathian sia mi doidan nei ngawl hi, a ci thuman sia ka umhi:
ACT 10:35 Ama a zakta te le thutanna a vawt minam peuma sia Pathian in sang hi.
ACT 10:36 Na theampo i Topa: Jesus Christ tungtawn in a ki pualak kilemna thu sia Pathian in Israel te kungah paisak hi:
ACT 10:37 Tua ka son thu note in na he uh a, John in tui a phum zawk ciang Galilee pan kipan, Judah ngamsung theampo ah a tangko thu a hi;
ACT 10:38 Nazareth mi Jesus sia Pathian in Tha Thiangtho le vangletna taw sathau buak hi: napha vawt in pai a, doai i nencip te theampo damsak hi; banghangziam cile Ama sia Pathian in ompui hi, ci thu a hihi.
ACT 10:39 Kote sia Jerusalem pan kipan in Judah ngamsung ah a vawt theampo i tetti te ka hi uh hi; amate in Jesus that uh a, thing tungah khai uh hi:
ACT 10:40 Pathian in Ama sia ni thum ni ciang in thokiksak a, a kilang in lak hi;
ACT 10:41 Mi theampo tungah hi ngawl in, Pathian mai ah tealsa tetti te, thina pan a thawkkik zawkciang in Ama taw a ne le a dawn khawm kote tungah hong lak hi.
ACT 10:42 Taciang midang te tungah phuang tu le Ama sia mihing le mithi te thukhen tu in Pathian in nasep a piak a hihi, ci tettipang tu in thu hong pia hi.
ACT 10:43 Ama a umte theampo mihing sim in ama min vangletna taw a mawna uh ki maisak tu hi, ci in kamsang theampo in son uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 10:44 Peter in hi thu te a son laitak in Pathian thu a za te tungah Tha Thiangtho hong theng hi.
ACT 10:45 Taciang Peter taw hongpai te theampo, vunteap tanna a umte in lamdangsa mama uh hi, banghangziam cile Gentile te tungah zong Tha Thiangtho letsong buak hi.
ACT 10:46 Banghangziam cile amate in, kam tatuam in a pau uh za uh hi. Taciang Pathian pok uh hi. Tua zawkciang in Peter in zo kik a,
ACT 10:47 Koma bangma in Tha Thiangtho a sang te tuiphumna sang ngawl tu in, khatpo in tui a khak thei tu ziam? ci hi.
ACT 10:48 Taciang Peter in Topa min taw tuiphumna sang tu in thupia hi. Tuazawkciang in amate in Peter kungah ni tampi taam tu in ngen uh hi.
ACT 11:1 Gentile te in zong Pathian thu sang zo uh hi, ci Judah ngamsung ah a om sawltak te le suapui te in za uh hi.
ACT 11:2 Taciang Peter sia Jerusalem ah a thet ciang in, vunteap tan te in ama nalh uh a,
ACT 11:3 Vunteap tan ngawl te kungah na pai a, amate taw an na ne hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 11:4 Ahihang Peter in tua thu a kipat pan in sonkik a, a ban a ban in amate son siat hi,
ACT 11:5 Joppa khua ah thu ka nget laitak in, ka mangmuna sungah, puanlam zai mama taw a kibang kingli nei na koina khat van pan hong ki khiasuk a, ka kungah hong theng hi:
ACT 11:6 A tungah phatak in ka en a, ka ngaisut ciang in, a sungah leitung nganhing peang li nei a tatuam, sapi te, a bokvak te le van a leang vacim te ka mu hi.
ACT 11:7 Taciang aw khat ka za a, Peter awng, tho in, ngo in a, ne in, hong ci hi.
ACT 11:8 Ahihang keima in, hi ngawl hi, Topa awng: banghangziam cile a nin, ahibale, a thiangtho ngawl peuma ka kamsung ah bangmahun in tum ngei ngawl hi, ka ci hi.
ACT 11:9 Ahihang van pan in tua aw in, Pathian i a thianthosak te nangma in nin hi ci heak in, ci in hong zo kik hi.
ACT 11:10 Hisia bang in thumvei dong hong ci hi: taciang a vekpi in van ah lato kik siat hi.
ACT 11:11 Taciang, en vun, tasia pociang in Caesarea pan hong kisawl mihing thum te ka omna mun inn ah hong theng uh hi.
ACT 11:12 Taciang in bangma ngaisun nawn ngawl in amate taw pai tu in Thaa in hong sawl hi. Tuabek domngawl in hi suapui luk te in hong zui uh hi, taciang Cornelius innsung ah tum tek khu hi:
ACT 11:13 Taciang Cornelius in a innsung ah vantungmi a mu na thu hong son hi, tua vantungmi ding a a kungah, Joppa khua ah mi sawl in a, Peter a kici Simon sam in;
ACT 11:14 Ama in thu hong hil tu a, tabang in nangma le na innkuan bup in ngupna na nga tu uh hi, ci in son hi.
ACT 11:15 Taciang thuhil ka kipan a, a kipat in kote tungah Tha Thiangtho hong thet bangma in amate tung zong ah theng hi.
ACT 11:16 Tuazawkciang in, John in tui taw tuiphumna hong pia takpi hi; ahihang note Tha Thiangtho taw tuiphumna na sang tu uh hi, a ci Topa kammal ka phawkkik hi.
ACT 11:17 Banghangziam cile Pathian in Topa Jesus Christ a umte tungah letsong a piak sia, kote hongpiak taw a kibang a hihi; Pathian khak zo tu in keima sia akua khi ziam? ci hi.
ACT 11:18 Amate in hi thu te a zak uh ciang in, thim khipkhep in om uh a, Pathian in Gentile mite zong nuntakna atu maw ki sikkik na pia zohi, ci in Pathian poktek uh hi.
ACT 11:19 Stephen thu pan vawtsiatna hang in mun tatuam ah a ki thethang te sia, Phoenicia, Cyprus le Antioch ciang dong pai uh a, Pathian thu midang te tungah hil ngawl in Judah mite tung bek ah hil uh hi.
ACT 11:20 Ahihang Cyprus le Cyrene a om mi pawlkhat te in, Antioch a thet ciang in, Greek te paupui a, Topa Jesus thuhil hi.
ACT 11:21 Taciang Topa khut amate tungah om hi: tabang in mi tampi te in um uh a, Topa kungah hong heakkik uh hi.
ACT 11:22 Tuazawkciang in hi thupha sia Jerusalem pawlpi dong ah hong theng hi: taciang amate in Antioch dong pai tu in Barnabas sawl uh hi.
ACT 11:23 Antioch ah Barnabas a thet ciang in Pathian i hesuakna mu a, angtang mama hi, taciang amate theampo in thinsung takpi taw Topa beal tu in hanthawn hi.
ACT 11:24 Banghangziam cile Barnabas sia mipha hi a, Tha Thiangtho le upna taw kidim hi: taciang mi tampi te Topa kungah kibelap hi.
ACT 11:25 Tuazawkciang in Barnabas sia Saul zong tu in Tarsus ah pai hi:
ACT 11:26 A mu ciang in Antioch ah paipui hi. Ama te sia kum khat sung buppi pawlpi taw kipawlkhawm uh a, mi tampi te thuhil hi. Taciang nungzui te sia, Christian te, a kici phitbel na sia Antioch khua ah a hihi.
ACT 11:27 Tua hun sung in kamsang te sia Jerusalem pan in Antioch ah hongpai uh hi.
ACT 11:28 Amate sung pan Agabus a kici kamsang khat hong ding a, leitung mun theampo ah kialpi tung tu hi, ci in thaa in telsak hi: tua kialpi sia Claudius Caesar hun lai in tung hi.
ACT 11:29 Nungzui te in amate hi thei za tek taw Judah ngam a om suapui te hu na thak tu in khensatna nei tek uh a:
ACT 11:30 Amate in upa te kungah Barnabas le Saul te khut tungtawn in thak uh hi.
ACT 12:1 Tua hun pawl in Herod kumpipa in pawlpi sung mi pawlkhat te vawtsiat tu in man hi.
ACT 12:2 Taciang John i suapuipa James sia namsau taw that hi.
ACT 12:3 Hi thu in Judah mite lungkimsak hi, ci a mu ciang in, Peter zong mat thua sawm hi. Tol saw ngawl anluum poai hun sung a hihi.
ACT 12:4 Peter a mat zawkciang in thongtaksak a, ngalkap sawm le luk tei cin tu in ap hi; paisanpoai zawkciang in mihon mai ah pusua tu in ngeal hi.
ACT 12:5 Tua ahikom Peter sia thong sungah koi nginge hi: ahihang pawlpi te in ama atu in Pathian tungah tatsat ngawl in thungetsak uh hi.
ACT 12:6 Taciang Herod in a pusua tu ni zan ciang in, Peter sia ngalkap ni te ki laklaw ah thikkol ni taw hen in mu hi: a cingte in kongkha maipan in thonginn cing nginge uh hi.
ACT 12:7 En vun, Topa vantungmi a kungah hongpai a, thonginn sungah khuavak tang hi: Peter pang pan in beang a, thosak hi, taciang manlang in tho in, ci hi. Taciang in a khut pan thikkhau te tak hi.
ACT 12:8 Vantungmi in ama kungah, na kawngkhau kil in a, na peangdap bul in, ci hi. Taciang a son bang in Peter in vawt hi. Na puan sil in a, hong zui tan, ci hi.
ACT 12:9 Peter pusuak in, vantungmi zui hi; taciang vantungmi i vawt teng sia a tatak hi, ci a he bua hi; ahihang mangmu bang in ki ngaisun hi.
ACT 12:10 Inn doi khat na le doi ni na a kan zawkciang in, khuapi sung paina thik kongpi dong theng hi; tua thik kongpi sia amathu in kihong a: amate a puasang ah pusuak uh hi, taciang lampi khat dungzui in a pai zawk uh ciang; vantungmi in Peter nusia hi.
ACT 12:11 Peter a khang hong ciim a, a tel thiang kik ciang, tu in a thiangtak in ka tel hi, Topa in Ama vantungmi sawl in, Herod khut le Judah mite lametna pan in hong suatak zo hi, ci hi.
ACT 12:12 Peter in hi thu a ngaisut zawkciang in, Mark a kici John nu Mary te inn ah pai hi; tua mun ah mi tampi te thungen in ki khawmtua uh hi.
ACT 12:13 Taciang Peter in kongpi i kongkha a kik ciang in, Rhoda a kici naseam nu in ngai tu in pai hi.
ACT 12:14 Taciang Rhoda in Peter aw hi, ci a heak ciang in, lungdam lei ahikom kongpi hong ngawl in, innsung ah tai hi, taciang kongpi mai ah Peter ding hi, ci in son hi.
ACT 12:15 Amate in, mawmaw ni hi, ci uh hi. Ahihang, a tatak a hihi, ci valeng hi. Tuazawkciang in amate in, ama i vantungmi hi tu hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 12:16 Ahihang Peter in king top lai hi: taciang amate in kongkha a hon uh ciang in, Peter mu uh a, lamdangsa mama uh hi.
ACT 12:17 Ahihang Peter in a thim natu in a khut taw lak a, Topa in thong sung pan bangbang in pusua, ci thu amate tungah pualak hi. Taciang James le suapui te kungah pai tavun a hi thu te son tavun, ci hi. Taciang amate pusuak uh a mundang ah pai uh hi.
ACT 12:18 Khua a vak pociang Peter sia bangsuak ci thu taw kisai in ngalkap te sungah buaina lianpi hong piang hi.
ACT 12:19 Herod in Peter a zon ciang in, mu ngawl a, a cing te thusit in, thalup natu thu pia hi. Taciang Herod sia Judah ngam pan pusuak a Caesarea ah pai a, tua mun ah tam hi.
ACT 12:20 Herod sia Tyre le Sidon mite tungah nasiatak in lungkim ngawl hi: ahihang amate thu kisitak in Herod kungah hongpai uh hi, taciang kumpipa lupna inndoi cingpa Blastus pawlvawt uh in, kilemna ngen uh hi; banghangziam cile amate ngam sia Herod ngam sung pan hongpai an le tui taw nungta a hi uh hi.
ACT 12:21 A ciangtan ni in Herod sia kumpi puan taw ki pua a, kumpi tokhum tungah to in mipi te tungah thu son hi.
ACT 12:22 Taciang mipite in, hisia sia mihing aw hi ngawl hi, pathian aw hi, ci in au uh hi.
ACT 12:23 Tasia pociang Topa vantungmi in Herod vel hi, banghangziam cile ama in Pathian minthanna pia ngawl hi: ama sia than in ne a, thi hi.
ACT 12:24 Ahihang Pathian thu khang in ki zel hi.
ACT 12:25 Barnabas le Saul sia amate nasep a man uh ciang in Jerusalem pan hong heakkik uh a, Mark a kici John hong tonpui uh hi.
ACT 13:1 Antioch pawlpi sungah, kamsang le sya pawlkhat om hi; amate sia Barnabas, Niger a kici Simeon, Cyrene khuami Lucius, ngam uk Herod taw a khang khawm pa Manaen le Saul te a hihi.
ACT 13:2 Amate sia Topa naseam uh a, an a tan uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho in Barnabas le Saul sia amate ka sap nathu nasep seam tu in a tuam in hong koi tuamsak tavun, ci hi.
ACT 13:3 Taciang amate antang in thu a nget zawk uh ciang, Barnabas le Saul tungah khut nga in, paisak uh hi.
ACT 13:4 Tha Thiangtho in a sawl bangma in, Barnabas le Saul sia Seleucia ah pai uh a; tua mun pan in Cyprus ah tembaw taw pai uh hi.
ACT 13:5 Taciang amate Salamis ah a om uh laitak in, Judah te synagogue te sungah Pathian thuhil uh hi: taciang amate a hu tu in John zong om hi.
ACT 13:6 Tuikul sung theampo pai uh a, Paphos dong theng uh hi, tua mun ah mitbum thiam, leilot kamsang, Judah mi Bar-jesus a kici khat taw ki mu uh hi:
ACT 13:7 Ama sia Sergius Paulus a kici mipil ngam ukpa taw om khawm hi; tua Sergius Paulus in Pathian thu a zak nop man in Barnabas le Saul sam hi.
ACT 13:8 Ahihang a min khiakna mitbum thiam a kici Elymas in, ngam ukpa a upna pan ki khealsak tu in Barnabas le Saul te khak hi.
ACT 13:9 Tuazawkciang in Paul zong a kici Saul sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim in, Elymas tangtak in en a,
ACT 13:10 Nang doaimangpa tapa, leilot thu le seksolna taw a kidim, phatngawlna theampo i ngal, Topa lampi pha te suksiatna pan in tawlnga ngawl lai tu ni ziam?
ACT 13:11 Tu in, en in, Topa khut na tungah om hi, na mittaw tu a, a ciangtan hun sung theampo ni na mu batu hi, ci hi. Taciang thakhatthu in a tungah meikai le khuamial hong theng a; a khut pan a len tu te zong in pai hi.
ACT 13:12 Ngam ukpa in a vawt te a mu ciang in um a, Topa hilna te lamdangsa mama hi.
ACT 13:13 Tu in Paul le a lawm te sia Paphos pan in ngunkuang taw pai uh a, Pamphylia ngam Perga theng uh hi: taciang John sia amate kung pan paikhia in Jerusalem ah cia kik hi.
ACT 13:14 Ahihang Perga pan a pai uh ciang in, Pisidia ngam Antioch theng uh a, sabbath ni in synagogue sungah tum in to hi.
ACT 13:15 Taciang thukham le kamsang te a sim zawkciang ulian te in ngual paisak a, no u le nau te, mite atu in hanthotna kammal nei na hi uh le, son vun, ci hi.
ACT 13:16 Taciang Paul dingto in, a khut van hi, Israel mite le no Pathian zakta te, ngai vun.
ACT 13:17 Hi Israel mite Pathian in i pu le pa te teal a, Egypt ngam ah peamta bang in a om laitak in lamsang hi, taciang a ban sangpi taw Egypt ngam pan in pusua hi.
ACT 13:18 Taciang senneal ngam sungah kum sawmli kiim anvak hi.
ACT 13:19 Canaan ngam a om minam sali te a suksiat zawkciang in, amate ngam sia aisan in hawm uh hi.
ACT 13:20 Tuazawkciang in kamsang Samuel hun hong thet ma kum zali le sawm nga sung, Pathian in thukhenmang te pia hi.
ACT 13:21 Tuazawkciang in amate in kumpi ngen uh a: Pathian in Benjamin minam Kish i tapa Saul sia kum sawmli sung pia hi.
ACT 13:22 Saul a hepkhiat zawkciang Pathian in David sia amate kumpi tu in lamsang hi; taciang ama thu Pathian in tettipang a, ka lungtang bang a nei Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi, ama in ka deina theampo khuangkhim tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 13:23 Pathian in ama kamciam bang in Israel te ngumtu David suan Jesus tungding hi:
ACT 13:24 Jesus hongpai ma in John in mawna ki sikkik na taw kisai tuiphumna thu Israel mite theampo tungah hil masa zo hi.
ACT 13:25 Taciang John in a nasep a man tu ciang in, note in keima kua nong ci uh ziam? Keima sia Ama ka hi bua hi. Ahihang, en vun, ka nung pan in khat hongpai a, a peangdap khau sutsak tu zong ka kilawm bua hi, ci hi.
ACT 13:26 U le nau te awng, Abraham tate le note sungah Pathian a zakta te, hi ngupna thu sia note tungah hong kipuak a hihi.
ACT 13:27 Banghangziam cile Jerusalem a omte le ulian te in Jesus a heak ngawl uh hang ahizong, sabbath ni sim in a sim kamsang te kammal te zong a heak ngawl lai uh hu in, amate in Jesus mawsak in kamsang te thu tangtungsak uh hi.
ACT 13:28 Amate in Jesus tungah thi tak mawna a mu bua uh hi, ahihang Ama sia that tu in Pilate kungah ngen uh hi.
ACT 13:29 Jesus thu a ki atkholsa theampo te sia amate in a tangtunsak zawk uh ciang, thing tung pan in khiasuk uh a, than ah vui uh hi.
ACT 13:30 Ahihang Pathian in Ama sia thina pan thokiksak hi:
ACT 13:31 Ama taw Galilee pan Jerusalem dong a pai te in, ni tampi sung mu uh a, tua te sia midang te tungah Ama i tetti te a hi uh hi.
ACT 13:32 Taciang note tungah lungdamna thupha kote in kong tangko uh hi, tua thu sia i pu le pa te tung a kivawt kamciam a hihi,
ACT 13:33 Tua thu sia Pathian in ko a tate kungah Jesus a thawkiksak na tungtawn in khuagkhimsak hi; Psalm ni na sungah, Nangma sia ka Tapa na hihi, tu ni in kong nei zo hi, ci in ki atkhol hi.
ACT 13:34 Taciang Ama sia muat ngawl tu in thina pan a thawkik na thu taw kisai in, David i a muantak hesuakna kong pia tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 13:35 Mundang Psalm sung ma ah, na mi Thiangtho a muatthong tu na oai bua hi, ci hi.
ACT 13:36 Banghangziam cile David in Pathian deina bang in ama hun mihing te atu na a sep zawkciang mu a, a pu le pa te kungah vui in a pumpi muat hi:
ACT 13:37 Ahihang Pathian in a thawkiksak pa sia, a pumpi muat ngawl hi.
ACT 13:38 Tua ahikom u le nau te, hisia pa tungtawn in note tungah maw maisakna thu kong hil uh hi, ci kong hesak hi:
ACT 13:39 Moses thukham tungtawn in na san thei ngawl uh thutang suana sia Jesus upna tungtawn in a um theampo na theampo pan in thutang suana nga hi.
ACT 13:40 Tua ahikom kamsang te sonkhol nate note tungah hong thet thei ngawl natu in;
ACT 13:41 En vun, no ngual selno thei te, lamdangsa vun a, lalcip tavun: banghangziam cile no hun sungah, ka vawt nasep sia bangbang po ahizong na um bua tu uh hi, a ci thu sia kidawm vun, ci hi.
ACT 13:42 Taciang Judah te synagogue sung pan a pusua ciang in, Gentile mite in mai sabbath ni ciang in hi thu te hil tu in ngen uh hi.
ACT 13:43 Mipi te kikhop a man uh ciang in, Judah mi tampi le Judah biakna sung a tum Gentile te in Paul le Barnabas te zui uh hi: Paul le Barnabas in Pathian thuthiamna sungah om suak tu in hanthawn uh hi.
ACT 13:44 A mai nipi Sabbath ni ciang in Pathian thu ngai tu in tua khuapi sung om buppi phial hongpai uh hi.
ACT 13:45 Ahizong Judah mite in mihonpi a mu uh ciang in, hazatna taw kidim uh a, Paul i thuhil nate langpan le sonsia in pau uh hi.
ACT 13:46 Tuazawkciang in Paul le Barnabas te hangsan seseam uh a, Pathian thu note kong hil phot uh kul hi: ahihang note in na vawk uh a, noma le noma tawntung nuntakna nga tu kiphu ngawl in thu na khen uh hi, en vun, ko Gentile te sangah ka kihei zo uh hi.
ACT 13:47 Banghangziam cile Topa in thu hongpiakna ah, Gentile mite khuavak hi tu in, lei mong khat dong ngupna atu hi tu in kong koi zo hi, ci hi.
ACT 13:48 Hi thu sia Gentile te in a zak uh ciang in, lungdam mama uh a, Topa thu poktek uh hi: taciang tawntung nuntakna nga tu in a koi sa te in um uh hi.
ACT 13:49 Topa thu sia tua ngamsung theampo ah kizel hi.
ACT 13:50 Ahihang Judah mite in biakna sang a ki pumpiak te le a zatakhuai nupi te, khuasung a om ulian te hanthawn uh hi, taciang Paul le Barnabas te nasia seseam in vawtsia uh a, amate ngamsung pan in hawlkhia uh hi.
ACT 13:51 Ahihang Paul le Barnabas te in a peang tung a bang leivui te thin uh a, Iconium sangah pai uh hi.
ACT 13:52 Taciang nungzui te sia lungdamna le Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh hi.
ACT 14:1 Iconium ah Paul le Barnabas te a ni in Judah te synagogue sungah paikhawm uh a, thuhil uh hi. Tabang in Judah mite le Greek mite mihon tampi in um uh hi.
ACT 14:2 Ahihang a um ngawl Judah mite in Gentile mite hanthawn uh a, a um suapui te langpan nopna thinsung phangawl nei tu in vawt uh hi.
ACT 14:3 Tua ahikom amate in Topa sungah hangsantak in thuhil uh a, hun saupi sung tam uh hi, tabang in Pathian hesuakna thu tettipanna atu in musakna te le nalamdang te amate khut tungtawn in vawt thei na pia hi.
