ACT 14:4 Ahihang khuapi sung a om mihonpi te kikhen uh hi: pawlkhat te in Judah mite sang pang uh a, a dang pawlkhat te in sawltak te sang pang uh hi.
ACT 14:5 Gentile mite, Judah mite le lampui te in amate selno uh a, suangtum taw sep tu in a del uh ciang,
ACT 14:6 Amate in he uh a, Lycaonia ngamsung a om Lystra khua, Derbe khua le a kimlepam ngam te ah tai uh hi.
ACT 14:7 Taciang tua mun ah lungdamna thupha hil uh hi.
ACT 14:8 Lystra ah a khealzaw, a nu sung pan a sua pan kipan a peangbai a, a vak ngei ngawl mi khat om hi:
ACT 14:9 Tuapa in Paul thuhilna za hi: Paul in ama sia tangtak in en a, dam natu upna nei hi, ci a heak ciang in,
ACT 14:10 Na peang tungah a tangtak in ding in, ci in a ngingtak in sawl hi. Taciang tua pa tawn in lampai hi.
ACT 14:11 Mihon te in Paul i na vawt a mu uh ciang in, amate Lycaonia kam taw, pathian te mihing bang in eite kungah hong tuaksuk uh hi, ci in a ngingtak in au uh hi.
ACT 14:12 Amate in Barnabas sia, Jupiter, ci uh hi; Paul sia a thuhilpi ahikom in Mercurius, ci uh hi.
ACT 14:13 Tuazawkciang in a khua mai ah a om Jupiter thiampi in khuital le pakkual te kongpi ah paipui a, mihon te taw biakpiakna piak sawm hi.
ACT 14:14 Tua thu sawltak te, Paul le Barnabas in a zak uh ciang in, a nik le puan te eau keak uh hi, taciang mihon sungah tai kawm in au uh a,
ACT 14:15 Banghang in hibang te vawt nu ziam? kote zong note bangma ka hi uh hi, hi a thupi ngawl nate pan in vantung, leitung, tuipi le a sung om theampo a vawt a nungta Pathian sangah kihei tu in note tungah thu ka hil uh hi:
ACT 14:16 Abosa hun sungah Pathian in minam theampo te amate lampi tek ah paisak hi.
ACT 14:17 Ahihang Pathian in Ama le Ama sia tetti om ngawl in koithong ngawl a na pha vawt hi, van pan in nguatui le anlak hun te hongpia a, eite i thinsung te an le lungdamna taw hong dimsak hi, ci hi.
ACT 14:18 Taciang hi thu te hil uh a, mipi te in amate tungah biakpiakna vawt ngawl tu in khak zo vamial uh hi.
ACT 14:19 Taciang Antioch le Iconiam ah Judah mi pawlkhat te in, mihon te hanthawn uh a, Paul sia suangtum taw a den zawk uh ciang in, thi zo sa uh a, khua puasang ah kaikeak uh hi.
ACT 14:20 Ahihang nungzui te a kiimkot ah a din tek uh laitak in thoto a, khuasung ah tum hi: taciang a zingciang in Barnabas taw Derbe ah pai uh hi.
ACT 14:21 Paul le Barnabas in Derbe khua ah lungdamna thu hil uh a, mi tampi a hil zawk uh ciang in, Lystra, Iconiam le Antioch ah heakkik uh hi.
ACT 14:22 Nungzui te nuntakna kipsak uh a, upna sungah om paisuak tu le Pathian kumpingam sungah haksatna tampi kantan in i tum hamtang tu hi, ci in hanthawn uh hi.
ACT 14:23 Taciang amate in pawlpi tatuam ah upa te nasep pia hi, taciang antang in thungetsak a, amate upna Topa tungah ap uh hi.
ACT 14:24 Taciang amate in Pisidia ngam sung theampo a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Pamphylia theng uh hi.
ACT 14:25 Perga ah thu a hil zawk uh ciang in, Attalia ah pai uh hi:
ACT 14:26 Tua mun pan in tembaw taw Antioch sangah pai uh a, Antioch ah amate sepnasa te a seam tu in Pathian i thuthiamna sungah apna a neisakna mun a hihi.
ACT 14:27 Taciang amate Antioch a thet uh ciang in, pawlpi munkhat ah kaikhawm uh a, Pathian in amate taw a sep uh te Gentile te kungah upna kongkha a honsak na thu te son uh hi.
ACT 14:28 Tua mun ah a nungzui te taw hun tampi omkhawm uh hi.
ACT 15:1 Judah ngam pan hongpai mi pawlkhat te in, Moses thukham bang in vunteap na tan bua uh le, ngupna nga thei ngawl tu nu hi, ci in suapui te hil uh hi.
ACT 15:2 Amate Paul le Barnabas taw thu kisik ngawl na le ki nial na nasia mama nei uh ahikom in, Antioch a om pawlpi te in Paul, Barnabas le mi pawlkhat te hi thudokna taw kisai Jerusalem ah sawltak te le upa te kungah then tu in khensat uh hi.
ACT 15:3 Pawlpi in lamkal ah amate tha uh a, Phoenicia le Samaria kantan in pai hi, taciang Gentile te i kikhealna thu pualak uh hi: taciang suapui te theampo nasiatak in lungdamsak uh hi.
ACT 15:4 Amate Jerusalem a thet uh ciang in pawlpi, sawltak te le upa te in muak uh a, Pathian in amate tungtawn a vawt nate theampo son uh hi.
ACT 15:5 Ahihang Pharisee te sungpan thu um pawlkhat te in Gentile thu umte sia vunteap tan kul a, Moses thukham zong zui tu in thupiak kul hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 15:6 Taciang hi thu ngaisun khawm tu in sawltak te le upa te munkhat ah ki kaikhawm uh hi.
ACT 15:7 Thu tampi a ki nial zawk uh ciang, Peter ding a, amate tung ah, u le nau te awng, Gentile mite in keima kam pan in lungdamna thupha za uh a, a up theina tu in, tuma hiat in Pathian in eite sung pan keima hong teal hi, ci na he uh hi.
ACT 15:8 Taciang thinsung a he Pathian in tettipang a, eite tungah hongpiak bang in amate zong Tha Thiangtho pia hi;
ACT 15:9 Taciang eite le amate kilaklaw ah ki bat ngawlna bangma koi ngawl a, upna tungtawn in amate thinsung te thiangthosak hi.
ACT 15:10 Tua ahikom, tu in, i pu le pa te le eite in zong i puak zawk ngawl hakkol sia nungzui te ngawng ah koi in banghang Pathian ze-et nu ziam?
ACT 15:11 Ahihang Topa Jesus Christ i thuthiamna tungtawn in amate ngupna a nga uh bangma in eite zong i nga tu hi, ci in ka um hi, ci hi.
ACT 15:12 Tuazawkciang in Paul le Barnabas te in Gentile te sungah Pathian in amate zang in a vawt nalamdang tatuam te a son uh ciang in, mihon pi te in thim khipkhep in ngai uh hi.
ACT 15:13 Amate thim khipkhep in a om zawk uh ciang in, James in, u le nau te awng, hong ngai tavun:
ACT 15:14 Ama min atu mi teal tu in Pathian in amasabel in Gentile mite tungah a pai na thu Simon in hong pualak zo hi.
ACT 15:15 Taciang hi thu sia kamsang te kammal in zong lungkim uh a,
ACT 15:16 Hi thu zawkciang in kong paikik tu a, a puksa David i biakbuk ka sa kik tu hi; taciang a lal sa sia kasakik tu a, ka dingsak kik tu hi:
ACT 15:17 Tabang in a tanglai mihing te le Ama min taw a sap Gentile te theampo in Topa zong tu uh hi, ci in hi thu te theampo a vawt Topa in ci hi.
ACT 15:18 Pathian in leitung piancil pan in a nasep theampo he siat hi, ci ki at zo hi.
ACT 15:19 Tua ahikom keima i thukhenna sia, Gentile mite sung pan in Pathian sangah a kihei te nawngkaisak bua tawng:
ACT 15:20 Ahihang milim taw in a thiangtho ngawl te, paktat mawna, tawlsan in a kithat sa te le thisan te pial tu in lai kong thak zaw hi.
ACT 15:21 Banghangziam cile Moses i thukham sia nidang pek pan in khua tatuam ah ki hil a, synagogue te sung zong ah sabbath nisim in ki sim tawntung hi, ci hi.
ACT 15:22 Tuazawkciang in amate sung pan in a tealsa te, suapui te sungah a thupibel Judah a kici Barsabas le Silas te sia, Paul le Barnabas te taw Antioch ah paisak tu in, sawltak te le elder te pan kipan pawlpi buppi in lungkim uh hi:
ACT 15:23 Taciang amate in hibang in laithak at uh a, sawltak te, elder te le suapui te in Antioch, Syria le Cilicia a om Gentile suapui te hong paupui khu hi:
ACT 15:24 Kote kung pan in mi pawlkhat te note kungah hongpai uh a, koma thupiak hi ngawl napi, vunteap na tan hamtang uh kul hi, ciang thukham zong na zui hamtang uh kul hi, ci in hong sawl na kammal in note hong nawngkaisak a, na nuntakna uh hong susia hi, ci thu ka za uh hi:
ACT 15:25 Munkhat ah thu kisi in omkhawm tek a, ka teal uh mihing te, ka it mama uh Barnabas le Paul taw note kungah kong paisak tu uh pha ka sa uh hi.
ACT 15:26 Amate sia i Topa Jesus Christ min atu in a nuntakna dong a pia ngam te a hi uh hi.
ACT 15:27 Tua ahikom Judah le Silas te kong paisak uh a, lai kong thak uh bangma in amate in a kam uh taw hongson tu uh hi.
ACT 15:28 Banghangziam cile note tungah hi a kisam nate simngawl a lianzaw vanngit kong sot ngawl tu uh sia Tha Thiangtho le kote in pha kasa uh hi;
ACT 15:29 Tabang in note in milim tungah na piak uh sa te, thisan, tawlsan in a kingo sa te le paktat mawna te pial vun: tabang te pan in noma le noma na ki keamcing uh le, a pha ngamta na hi uh hi. Na damtek tavun, ci in laithak at uh hi.
ACT 15:30 Tua ahikom amate a paikhiat uh ciang in Antioch theng uh hi: mihon te munkhat ah a ki kaikhop zawk uh ciang in, laithak sia pia uh hi:
ACT 15:31 Tua laithak a sim zawk uh ciang in, henepna thu ahikom in lungdam mama uh hi.
ACT 15:32 Taciang Judah le Silas te zong kamsang te ahi uh bangma in, suapui te thu tampi taw hanthawn uh a, kipsak uh hi.
ACT 15:33 Tua mun ah tawlkhat sung a om zawk uh ciang in, suapui te kung pan sawltak te kungah thinnuam takin paisak uh hi.
ACT 15:34 Ahihang Silas sia tua mun ah om nuam lai hi.
ACT 15:35 Paul le Barnabas te Antioch ah omsuak a, midang tampi te taw Topa thuhil in tangko uh hi.
ACT 15:36 Tawlkhat sung zawkciang in, Paul in Barnabas kungah, Topa thu i hil na uh mun khua tatuam ah suapui te ve tu in paikik tawng, bangbang in om ziam, ci en tawng, ci hi.
ACT 15:37 Taciang Barnabas in Mark a kici John sia amate taw tonpui tu in ngaisun hi.
ACT 15:38 Ahihang Paul in Pamphylia pan in amate taw kikhen a, nasep na mun ah a pai ngawl hu in, amate taw tonpui tu phangawl hi, ci ngaisun hi.
ACT 15:39 Tua thu Paul le Barnabas nasiatak in ki nial uh a, khat le khat kikhen uh hi: taciang Barnabas in Mark tonpui a, Cyprus sangah tembaw taw pai hi;
ACT 15:40 Taciang Paul in Silas teal a, suapui te i Pathian thuthiamna sungah apna taw in pai uh hi.
ACT 15:41 Taciang Syria le Cilicia ngamsung theampo ah pai kakoai uh a, pawlpi te kipsak uh hi.
ACT 16:1 Paul sia Derbe le Lystra theng hi: taciang, en vun, nungzui khat om a, a min sia Timothy kici hi, a nu sia Judah mi hi a, thu um mi a hihi; ahihang a pa sia Greek mi a hihi:
ACT 16:2 Lystra le Iconium a om suapui te in Timothy sia phatson mama uh hi.
ACT 16:3 Timothy sia Paul in tonpui nuam ahikom in a vunteap tansak hi, banghangziam cile tua kiim a om Judah mite theampo in a pa sia Greek mi hi, ci he uh hi.
ACT 16:4 Amate khuapi tatuam te ah a pai uh kawm in, Jerusalem ah a om sawltak te le upa te in zui tu le kepcing tu in a khensat uh thu sia, a pai na uh khua tatuam te ah ap uh hi.
ACT 16:5 Tua ahikom pawlpi te upna sungah kho uh a, nisim in khang uh hi.
ACT 16:6 Tu in amate Phrygia le Galatia ngam a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho in Asia ngam ah Pathian thuhil tu khak hi,
ACT 16:7 Mysia ngam a thet zawk uh ciang in, Bithynia ngamsung ah paisawm uh hi: ahihang Thaa in a pai tu uh oai ngawl hi.
ACT 16:8 Taciang amate Mysia ngam kantan uh a, Troas theng uh hi.
ACT 16:9 Tua zan in Paul in mangmu hi; Macedonia mi khat ding a, Macedonia ah hongpai tan a, kote hong hu tan, ci in ngen hi.
ACT 16:10 Paul in a mangmu zawkpo ciang in, Macedonia ah lungdamna thupha tangko tu in Topa in hong sam hi, ci thiangtak in tel ka hi uhkom, pai tu in ka hanciam uh hi.
ACT 16:11 Tua ahikom Troas pan in ngunkuang taw ka pai uh a, Samotracia ah a tangtan in ka pai uh hi, taciang a zingciang in Neapolis ka theng uh hi;
ACT 16:12 Tua mun pan in Macedonia ngamkhen sung pan khuapi lianbel Philippi ka theng uh hi, Philippi khua sia Rome te in ngamkeak in a ukna ngam a hihi: tua khuapi sungah tawlkhat sung ka om uh hi.
ACT 16:13 Sabbath ni in ngunhui khuapi ah ka pai uh hi, thungetna mun ah ka to uh a, hongpai numei te ka paupui uh hi.
ACT 16:14 Taciang Lydia a kici Thyatira khua mi, puan sandup a zuak numei khat om a, ama sia Pathian bia khat a hihi: ama in Paul i thuhilna te ngai tu in Topa in a thinsung honsak hi.
ACT 16:15 Ama le a innkuanpui te tui a ki phum zawk uh ciang in, Topa tungah muantak hi, ci in nong mu uh ahile, ka inn ah hongpai tavun a, tua mun ah hong taam tavun, ci in hong sam a, hong thum hi.
ACT 16:16 Thungen tu ka pai uh ciang in, a sungah maisang thu sonkhol theina thaa nei a, a to te atu in dangka tampi a ngasak naseam numei no khat in hong muak hi:
ACT 16:17 Ama in Paul le kote nung pan in hongzui a, hi mite sia ngupna lampi hong lak tu a sangbel Pathian i sal te a hi uh hi, ci in au hi.
ACT 16:18 Taciang ama in hibang in ni tampi sung vawt hi. Ahihang Paul a thin-uk in le-et a, tua thaa kungah, Jesus Christ min taw hi numei sung pan pusuak tu in thu kong pia hi, ci hi. Tuahun laitak lian in pusuak hi.
ACT 16:19 A to te in dangka tampi nga natu lametna om nawn ngawl hi, ci a mu uh ciang in Paul le Silas te man uh a, thukhen zum ulian te kungah kai uh hi.
ACT 16:20 Taciang ulian te kungah paipui a, hi Judah mite in i khuapi nasiatak in buaisak hi,
ACT 16:21 Ko Rome mite in ka san thei ngawl uh le ka zui ngawl uh ngeina te hil hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 16:22 Taciang mihonpi te hong ding tek uh hi: taciang ulian te in zong a puan uh eaukeaksak uh a, Paul le Silas te vel tu in thupia uh hi.
ACT 16:23 Amate in nasiatak in a sat zawk uh ciang in, thonginn sungah khia uh a, thong cing pa in phatak a cin natu in vaitha hi:
ACT 16:24 Thu a vaithak thonginn cingpa in, thonginn doi sungah khumsuk a, a peang te uh peangkol bul in koi hi.
ACT 16:25 Zan laitak in Paul le Silas te thungen uh a, Pathian pok na lasa khawm uh hi: taciang thongtak te in ngai uh hi.
ACT 16:26 Thakhatthu in zin nasiatak hong ling a, thong innbul te ki lok hi: tasia pociang in kongkha te a vekpi in ki hong siat a, a ki hen na uh theampo zong ki sut siat hi.
ACT 16:27 Thongcingpa hong khanglo a, kongkha te a ki hong a mu ciang in, thongtak te taisiat zo sa a, a namsau dok in, ama le ama ki tha sawm hi.
ACT 16:28 Ahihang Paul ngingtak in au a, nangma le nangma ki vawtsia heak in: banghangziam cile ka vekpi in hi mun ah ka om nginge uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 16:29 Tuazawkciang in thongcingpa in mei ngen a, hong bingbung hi, taciang ling vadil kawm in hongpai a, Paul le Silas te mai ah bok hi,
ACT 16:30 Taciang amate pusua a, ka topa te awng, ngupna ka nga natu in bang ka vawt tu ziam? ci hi.
ACT 16:31 Amate in, Topa Jesus Christ um in a, nangma le na innkuanpui te in ngupna na nga tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 16:32 Taciang Paul le Silas te in ama innsung ah a omte theampo tungah Topa thuhil uh hi.
ACT 16:33 Tua zan in thongcingpa in amate pusua a, a liamma uh te silsak hi; taciang ama le a innkuanpui theampo tui ki phum pai uh hi.
ACT 16:34 Saul le Silas sia ama inn ah ciapui a, amate mai ah anlui hi, taciang ama le a innkuanpui theampo in Pathian um uh a, lungdam mama uh hi.
ACT 16:35 A zingciang in, ulian te in palik mang te sawl a, tua mihing te pusua vun, ci hi.
ACT 16:36 Taciang thongcingpa in Paul kungah, ulian te in note sam tu in mi sawl hi; tua ahikom tu in pusuak vun a, thinnuamtak in pai vun, ci hi.
ACT 16:37 Ahihang Paul in amate tung ah, kote sia Rome ngammi hi napi, mawsiatna om ngawlpi kilangtak in hong sat a, thong hong taksak hi; tu in kuama heak ngawl in hong hawlkhia nuam ziam? hi thei ngawl hi; ahihang amate hongpai ta hen a hong suatak tahen, ci hi.
ACT 16:38 Taciang palik mang te in hi thu a ulian te kungah son uh hi: taciang amate Rome ngam mi hi, ci a zak uh ciang in, ulian te patau mama uh hi.
ACT 16:39 Taciang amate hongpai uh a, Paul te thum uh hi, taciang suatak uh a, tua khuapi sung pan pusuak tu in sawl uh hi.
ACT 16:40 Amate thong sung pan pusuak uh ah, Lydia te innsung ah tum uh hi: taciang suapui te a mu uh ciang in heneam uh a, paikik uh hi.
ACT 17:1 Paul le Silas te Amphipolis le Apollonia a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Thessalonica theng uh hi, tua mun ah Judah te synagogue om hi:
ACT 17:2 Taciang Paul sia ama ngeina bang in, synagogue sungah tum a, sabbath ni nithum sung amate taw laithiangtho sung thu te kikum uh hi.
ACT 17:3 Christ sia a thuak kul hamtang a hina le thina pan thokik hamtang tu hi; ci in note tungah ka pualak hi Jesus sia Christ a hihi, ci in pualak in hil thiang hi.
ACT 17:4 Amate sung pan pawlkhat te in um uh a, Paul le Silas te kipawlpui uh hi; taciang tua te sungah biakna sang a kipumpiak Greek mihon tampi le numei lampui tampi kihel uh hi.
ACT 17:5 Ahihang a um ngawl Judah mite in haza uh a, van zuakna lamdung a vakvai mannung ngawl mite sam uh hi, taciang honpi khat hong pha uh a khuapi sungah buaina piangsak uh hi, taciang Jason i inn sim uh a, mipi mai ah pusua tu in zong uh hi.
ACT 17:6 Taciang amate in a mu ngawl uh ciang in, Jason le suapui pawlkhat te khuapi ulian te kungah kai uh a, hileitung lumlet te himun zong ah hongpai uh hi;
ACT 17:7 Amate sia Jason in ama inn ah tungsak hi: hi te theampo in Caesar thupiakna te langpan uh a, Jesus a kici a dang kumpi khat om hi, ci uh hi, ci in au lialua uh hi.
ACT 17:8 Hi thu te mipi te le khuapi ulian te in a zak uh ciang in, buai mama uh hi.
ACT 17:9 Taciang Jason le a dang te sia a kisam za dangka liausak uh a, tua zawkciang in thaa kik uh hi.
ACT 17:10 Zan ciang in suapui te in Paul le Silas te Berea ah a zan a zan in paisak uh hi: tua mun a thet uh ciang in Judah mite i synagogue sungah tum uh hi.
ACT 17:11 Hi te sia Thessalonica mite sang in a thinsung uh phazaw hi, thalawptak in thu ngai uh a, tua a ngai uh thu te a man le man ngawl nisim laithiangtho sungah zong uh hi.
ACT 17:12 Tua ahikom amate sung panmi tampi in um uh a; a zatak huai Greek nupi pasal tampi zong kihel uh hi.
ACT 17:13 Ahihang Thesslonica a om Judah mite in Berea khua ah zong Paul in Pathian thuhil hi, ci a heak uh ciang in, hongpai uh a, mipi te thawn uh hi.
ACT 17:14 Tua zawk pociang in suapui te in Paul sia tuipi sangah paisak uh hi: ahihang Silas le Timothy sia Berea ah taamlai hi.
ACT 17:15 Paul a tha te in Athens dong tha uh hi: taciang Silas le Timothy sia manlangtak a pai natu in Paul kung pan thupiak nga uh a, pai uh hi.
ACT 17:16 Paul in Athen pan Silas le Timothy te ngak in a om laitak, tua khuapi sungah milim biakna bebek om hi, ci a mu ciang in, a thinsung sutha mama hi.
ACT 17:17 Tua ahikom Judah biakna lampui te taw synagogue sungah thu ki nial uh a, vanzuakna ah a kisikpui te taw nisim in ki nial uh hi.
ACT 17:18 Tuazawkciang in thu ngaisun thiam Epicurean te le Stoic te taw ki mu uh hi. Taciang pawlkhat te in, hi a papau sia bang son ziam? a dang pawlkhat te zong in, hisia pa sia ngamdang te pathian te thu son hi tu hi, ci uh hi: banghangziam cile Paul in amate tungah Jesus le a thawkikna thu son hi.
ACT 17:19 Taciang amate in Paul man uh hi, taciang Areopagas ah paipui uh a, hi hilna thak na son te kote zong ka heak tu uh kisam ziam?
ACT 17:20 Banghangziam cile a tumdang te ka bil uh ah nong zasak hi: hi thu te i deina sia bangziam, ci ka he nuam uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 17:21 Banghangziam cile Athen mite le leangna te theampo in thuthak son tu, a hibale ngai tu simngawl bangma dang atu amate hun a zang bua uh hi.
ACT 17:22 Tuazawkciang in Paul sia Mars mual laizang ah ding a, no Athen mite, note sia na theampo nasiatak thuciing cimteam mama te na hi uh hi, ci kong he hi.
ACT 17:23 Banghangziam cile ka vakawm in biakna sang na hanciam nate uh ka en a, a ki he ngawl pathian atu ci a ki at biaktau khat ka mu hi. Tua ahikom note in he ngawlpi in na biak uh Pathian thu kong pualak hi.
ACT 17:24 Tua Pathian sia leitung le a sung om theampo a vawtpa a hihi, ama sia van le lei i Topa hi a, khut taw a kisa biakinn sungah om ngawl hi;
ACT 17:25 Pathian sia mi theampo tungah nuntakna, husanna le na theampo a piapa ahikom, mihing te khut taw i vawtsak tu bangma kisam ngawl hi;
ACT 17:26 Taciang Ama in leitung theampo ah a om minam theampo sia thisan khat in vawt a, amate om tu hun te le a om natu mun te zong ngealkholsak siat hi;
ACT 17:27 Tabang in amate in Topa zong uh a, tham in a mu thei natu a hihi, Pathian sia eite khatsim kuama taw ki khuala ngawl hi:
ACT 17:28 Banghangziam cile i nungta a, i tuk i dian le i hina theampo sia Ama sungah a hihi; tasia bangma in na laphuak te in zong, eite zong Ama suan te i hihi, ci hi.
ACT 17:29 Tabang in Pathian suan te i hi man in, mihing te khutthiam le ngaisutna taw a kivawt kham, ngun le suangtum milim bang in Pathian sia i ngaisut tu hi ngawl hi.
ACT 17:30 Mihing te in Pathian a heak ma hunlai in Pathian in a mu ngawl bang in omthong ngei napi; tu in mun theampo ah a om mi theampo maw ki sikkik natu in thupia hi:
ACT 17:31 Banghangziam cile nasep a piaksa mihing khat zang in leitung ah thutang suana tungtawn thu a khen tu ni ciangtan zo hi; tua thu sia a ma a hihi, ci in mi theampo tungah kilangsak tu in tua pa sia thina pan thokiksak zo hi, ci hi.
ACT 17:32 Amate in mithi te thawkikna thu a zak uh ciang in, mi pawlkhat te in selno uh hi: a dang te in, hi thu nangtung pan ka za kik nuam uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 17:33 Taciang Paul sia amate sung pan in pusuak hi.
ACT 17:34 Ahihang mi pawlkhat te in ama beal uh a, um uh hi: tua te sungah Areopagas mi Dionysius, Damaris a kici nupi khat le midang te zong kihel uh hi.
ACT 18:1 Hiteng zawkciang in Paul sia Athens pan pai a, Corinth theng hi;
ACT 18:2 Taciang Aquila a kici Judah mi khat taw ki mu hi, ama sia Pontus ah a suak hi a, a zi Prisilla taw Italy pan a thet zawk uh ngei ngawl lai hi; banghangziam cile Claudius in Judah mi theampo Rome pan pusuak tu in thupia hi: taciang Paul sia amate kungah hongpai hi.
ACT 18:3 Amate taw khutthiam kibang ahi uhkom in amate kungah taam a, naseam khawm uh hi: banghangziam cile amate sia puanbuk khui te a hi uh hi.
ACT 18:4 Sabbath ni sim in synagogue sungah Judah mite le Greek mite thu sonpui in kaizawn tawntung uh hi.
ACT 18:5 Macedonia pan Silas le Timothy te a thet ciang in, Jesus sia Christ hi, ci thu Paul in Judah mite tungah hanciam in tettipang hi.
ACT 18:6 Amate in Paul langpan uh a, a sonsiat uh ciang in, Paul in a puan thin a, na thisan uh noma lutung ah om tahen; kei ka hile na thisan uh pan ka thiang hi: tu pan kipan in Gentile te kungah ka pai tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 18:7 Taciang Paul sia tua mun pan pai a, Justus innsung ah tum hi, ama in Pathian bia a, a inn sia synagogue taw kinai na a hihi.
ACT 18:8 Synagogue makai lianbel Crispus le a innkuanpui theampo in Topa um uh hi; taciang Corinth mi tampi te in zong za in um uh a, tui kiphum uh hi.
ACT 18:9 Tuazawkciang in Topa in mangmuna taw zan ciang inb Paul paupui a, Lauheak in a, thuhil in, om thong heak in:
ACT 18:10 Banghangziam cile keima in kong ompui hi, kuama in hong vawtsia ngawl tu hi: banghangziam cile hi khuapui sungah keima in mi tampi ka nei hi, ci hi.
ACT 18:11 Taciang Paul sia tua mun ah kumkhat le tha luk sung om suak a, amate sungah Pathian thuhil hi.
ACT 18:12 Gallio sia Rome ngam uk a sep lai in, Judah mite in thu kisitak in Paul langpan uh a, thukhenna tokhum mai ah paipui uh a,
ACT 18:13 Hisia pa in thukham paltan in Pathian bia tu in ngual kaizawn hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 18:14 Paul pau tu a kipat ciang in, Gallio in Judah mite kungah, hi thu sia a man ngawl le thusia hile, Maw, no Judah mite, note tungah thinsausak tu kisam ci in ngaisun khi hi:
ACT 18:15 Ahihang hi thu sia na thukham uh sung a thu le min te ki nialna ahile, noma in khensat tawm vun; banghangziam cile kei sia tabang thu te tungah thukhen ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 18:16 Taciang amate thukhen zum pan in hawlkhia siat hi.
ACT 18:17 Tuazawkciang in Greek mite in synagogue makai lianbel Sosthenes man uh a, thukhen na mai ah sat uh hi. Taciang Gallio in hi thu te awlmawk ngawl hi.
ACT 18:18 Taciang in Paul sia Corinth khua ah tawlkhat sung a om zawkciang in, suapui te nusia a, Pricilla le Aquila te taw Syria ah tembaw taw pai hi; taciang Cenchrea ah a sam met hi: banghangziam cile kamciam na a nei hang a hihi.
ACT 18:19 Ephesus khua theng uh a, tua mun ah Pricilla le Aquila te nusia hi: ahihang ama vateak synagogue sungah tum in, Judah mite taw thu kikum khawm uh hi.
ACT 18:20 Amate in ngei zaw hiat om tu a nget uh ciang, thukim pui ngawl hi;
ACT 18:21 Ahihang kikhenna kam te nusiat a, Jerusalem ah hi poai sia bangbangpo ahizong ka kihel kul hamtang hi; ahihang Pathian deina a om ahile, note kungah heakkik tu khi hi, ci hi. Taciang Ephesus pan in tembaw taw pai hi.
ACT 18:22 Caesarea a thet ciang in, pawlpi te paupui a, Antioch sangah pai hi.
ACT 18:23 Tua mun ah tawlkhat sung hun a zak zawkciang in pusuak kik a, nungzui te theampo hanthawn tu in Galatia le Phrygia ngamsung theampo ah pai hi.
ACT 18:24 Taciang Alexandria khua ah a suak Judah mi Apollos a kici khat Ephesus ah hong theng hi, ama sia kamthiam mama a, laithiangtho taw kisai zong thahat mama hi.
ACT 18:25 Hisia pa sia Topa lampi taw kisai phatak a kihil mi a hihi; taciang thaalam ah thalawp mama a, Topa thu te thupitak in a son le a hil pa a hihi, ahihang John i tuiphumna thu bek he hi.
ACT 18:26 Taciang synagogue sungah hangsantak in thuhil kipan a: Aquila le Pricilla te in a zak uh ciang in, amate kungah sam hi, taciang Pathian lampi a kimtak in hilcian hi.
ACT 18:27 Apollos sia Achaia ngamkhen ah pai nuam ahikom, Ephesus khua a om suapui te in Achaia a om nungzui te kungah lai thak uh a, Apollos a san natu uh in hanthawn uh hi, a thet ciang in thu um mite sia hesuakna tungtawn in nasiatak in hu hi:
ACT 18:28 Banghangziam cile Jesus sia Christ hi, ci thu laithiangtho zang in a kilangtak in lak a, Judah mite nasiatak in zo hi.
ACT 19:1 Apollos sia Corinth khua ah a om laitak in, Paul in saksang ngam te kantan a, Ephesus hong theng hi: tua mun ah nungzui pawlkhat te taw kimu uh a,
ACT 19:2 Amate kungah, na up zawk uh Tha Thiangtho na sang zo uh ziam? ci hi. Taciang amate in Paul tung ah, Tha Thiangtho a om hunlam zong ka za ngei bua uh hi, ci uh ih.
ACT 19:3 Taciang Paul in amate tung ah, bang tuiphumna sang nu ziam? ci hi. Taciang amate in, John i tuiphumna ka sang uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 19:4 Tuazawkciang in Paul in hibang in ci hi. John in mawna ki sikkikna tuiphumna hongpia takpi a, mite tungah a nung pan hongpai tu Christ Jesus sia amate in a up tu uh a hihi, ci hi.
ACT 19:5 Amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, Topa Jesus min taw tui ki phum uh hi.
ACT 19:6 Taciang Paul in amate tungah a khut a ngak ciang in, Tha Thiangtho sia amate tungah hong theng hi; taciang kam tatuam taw in pau uh a, mailam thu zong pualak uh hi.
ACT 19:7 Amate a vekpi in pasal sawmleni khawng a hi uh hi.
ACT 19:8 Paul sia synagogue sungah tum a, Pathian kumpingam thu taw kisai in thuhil le hanthawn in, tha thum sung hangsantak in thuhil hi.
ACT 19:9 Ahihang pawlkhat te a thinsung khauh uh a um ngawl in, mipi mai ah tua lampi phat ngawlna thu son uh hi, taciang Paul sia amate kung pan pusuak a, nungzui te tuamkhen in Tyrannus sanginn khat sungah nisim in thu kikum khawm uh hi.
ACT 19:10 Hi bangin kum ni sung zomsuak uh hi; tua ahikom Asia ngamsung a om Judah mite le Greek mite theampo in Topa Jesus thu za kim uh hi.
ACT 19:11 Pathian in Paul i khut te zang in a tuan in nalamdang te vawt hi:
ACT 19:12 Ama pumpi pan in dialno le kawngkhau te cina te kungah paipui uh a, cina te sung pan in natna te le doai te pusuak hi.
ACT 19:13 Mun theampo ah vak a thaa ngilo a hawlkhia Judah mi pawlkhat om hi, thaa ngilo a neite tungah Topa Jesus min lo uh a, Paul i a hil Jesus tungtawn in thu hong pia khu hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 19:14 Judah mi thiampi lian Sceva tapa sali te in tabang in vawt uh hi.
ACT 19:15 Taciang tua thaa ngilo in, Jesus ka he hi, taciang Paul zong ka he hi; ahihang note a kuate nu ziam? ci in zo hi.
ACT 19:16 Taciang a sungah thaa ngilo a neipa sia amate tungpan baw in buan ngawp a, zothal hi, tua ahikom amate tua innsung pan pumnguak le liamma taw tai mang uh hi.
ACT 19:17 Taciang hi thu sia Ephesus a om Judah mite le Greek mite theampo in he uh hi; taciang amate tungah launa hong theng a, Topa Jesus min pok tek uh hi.
ACT 19:18 Thu um tampi te hongpai uh a, amate mawna te pualak in a sep a vawt uh te zong pholak uh hi.
ACT 19:19 Mitbum thiam tampi te zong a laibu te uh munkhat ah hong paipui uh a, mi theampo mai ah mei taw hal uh hi: tua laibu te i man a tuat uh ciang in, ngun dangka then nga man hi.
ACT 19:20 Tua ahikom Pathian thu in zo a nasiatak in khang uh hi.
ACT 19:21 Hi thu te a tawp zawk, paul in Macedonia ngam le Achaia ngam te a kantan zawkciang in, Jerusalem ah pai tu in ngealkhol hi, tua mun ah ka thet zawkciang in Rome zong mu hamtang lai tu khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 19:22 Tua ahikom ama a hu tu te sung pan in, Timothy le Erastus te sia Macedonia ah heakkik uh a; ama sia Asia ngamsung ah tawmvei sung om lai hi.
ACT 19:23 Tua hun in hi lampi thu hang in buaina lianpi piang hi.
ACT 19:24 Banghangziam cile ngun seak thiam Demetrius a kici pa in Artimis doai numei atu in biakinn lim te ngun taw in vawt a, khutthiam neite kungah a met tam mama then hi;
ACT 19:25 Tua a nasep kibang naseam te kaikhawm a, hi khutthiam tungtawn in hau na i nga hi, ci na he uh hi.
ACT 19:26 Tua bekdom ngawl, Ephesus bek ah hi ngawl in, Asia ngamsung bup dektak ah, hi Paul in khut taw a ki vawt te Pathian hi ngawl hi, ci a, mi tampi te hanthawn in kikhealsak hi, ci zong mu in na za uh hi:
ACT 19:27 Tua ahikom i khutthiam sia mannung ngawl a sua tu lauhuai bek domngawl in; Asia ngam theampo le leitung bup i biak Artemis doai nu i biakinn zong ki thusimngawl tu hi, taciang a minthanna susia tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 19:28 Taciang hi thu te amate in a zak uh ciang in thin-uk na taw kidim uh a, Ephesus mite i Artemis sia thupi hi, ci in au uh hi.
ACT 19:29 Taciang tua Khuapi sia buaina taw kidim hi: Paul i khualhaw pui Macedonia mi Gaius le Aristarchus te man uh a, poai etna sungah thukimtak in manlangtak in tum tek uh hi.
ACT 19:30 Paul sia mihon te kungah a tum sawm ciang in, nungzui te in oai ngawl hi.
ACT 19:31 Taciang Asia ngam ukpa i lawm te zong poai etna sungah tum ngawl tu in a kungah ngual sawl in, ngen hi.
ACT 19:32 Tua ahikom pawlkhat te in thu khat au uh a, a dang pawlkhat te in thudang au uh hi: banghangziam cile a tamzaw in banghang in ki kaikhawm, ci he ngawl in, mihonpi te buai mama hi.
ACT 19:33 Judah mite in Alexander sia mipi sung pan in kaikeak a, mai ah sawn uh hi. Taciang Alexander in a khut taw lak a, mipi te kungah ama le ama ki ngum in thuson nuam hi.
ACT 19:34 Ahihang amate in Alexander sia Judah mi hi, ci a heak uh ciang in, Ephesus mite i Artemis sia thupi hi, ci in a vekpi in nai ni sung aw khat sua in au va nuau uh hi.
ACT 19:35 Taciang khuapi lai-at pa in mipi te a thim zawkciang in, no Ephesus mite, Ephesus khuapi sia a lian mama Artemis doai nu Jupiter pan in hong tak milim bia hi, ci a he ngawl a kua om ziam?
ACT 19:36 Hi thu te sia kuama i nial thei ngawl thu ahikom in, na om khipkhep tu uh hi a, bangma ngaisun ngawl in na pheang tat tu uh hi ngawl hi.
ACT 19:37 Banghangziam cile hi mun ah na paipui uh hi te sia, pawlpi van a suttol te hi ngawl a, na doai nu uh mindaisak te zong hi ngawl hi.
ACT 19:38 Tua ahikom Demetrius le khutthiam nei te khatpo taw ki langpan in thu a om ahile, thukham sia a ki hong sa in om hi, taciang ngam uk te zong om ahikom in: amate khat le khat thu ki sua khawm ta uh hen.
ACT 19:39 Ahihang thu dang te taw kisai in na kan nuam uh le, ngeina bang in a ki kaikhawm mipi te in khensat tahen.
ACT 19:40 Banghangziam cile tu ni i buaina hang in thu dong tu in hong sap tu lauhuai hi, hibang ngeina om ngawl in i kikhoptua na sia a hang son tu le i nei tuan bua hi, ci hi.
ACT 19:41 Hibang in a son zawkciang, a ki kaikhawm te ciakik siat uh hi.
ACT 20:1 Buaina a bo zawkciang, Paul in nungzui te a kungah sam a, a koai zawkciang in, Macedonia ah pai tu in pusuak hi.
ACT 20:2 Tua ngamsung mun tatuam te ah pai a, thu tam mama taw hanthawn in tha a piak zawkciang, Greece ngam theng hi,
ACT 20:3 Tua mun ah tha thum sung om hi. Syria ah tembaw taw a paisawm ciang in, Judah mite in pang ahikom in Macedonia pan heakkik tu in ngeal hi.
ACT 20:4 Asia ngamsung a pai ciang in Berea khua mi Sopater; Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus le Secundus; Derbe khua mi Gaius le Timothy, Asia ngam pan Tychicus le Trophimus te in tonpui hi.
ACT 20:5 Amate ka mai ah pai masa uh a, Troas pan hong ngak uh hi.
ACT 20:6 Tol saw ngawl anluum poai ni zawkciang in, Philippi pan in tembaw taw ka pai uh a, ni nga sung ka pai zawk uh ciang amate kung Troas ka theng uh hi, tua mun ah ni sali sung ka om uh hi.
ACT 20:7 Nipi kalkhat sung ni masabel ni in, nungzui te anluum bal tu in a ki kaikhop uh ciang, Paul in amate tungah Pathian thuhil a, a zingciang pai tu hi zo ka hi uhkom in; zankim dong thuhil suak hi.
ACT 20:8 Amate kikhopna mun inn tung doi ah mei-inn tam mama om hi.
ACT 20:9 Taciang Eutychus a kici tangval khat a to kawm in, a mutsuak mama hi: taciang Paul in ngei mama thuhil ahikom, lusu in inn dawl thum na pan taksuk a, a thisa in tawm uh hi.
ACT 20:10 Taciang Paul tuaksuk in, tangval pa tungah bok hi, taciang koai a, Paul in buai heak vun, banghangziam cile a sungah a nuntakna om hi, ci hi.
ACT 20:11 Taciang Paul inn tung a kato kik ciang in, anluum balnen uh a, ne khawm uh hi, khuavak dong ngei mama thu a sonkhop zawkciang in Paul pai hi.
ACT 20:12 Amate in tangval pa a nungta in hong paipui uh hu in, amate a thin uh nuam mama hi.
ACT 20:13 Paul muak kawm tu in tembaw taw Assos ah ka pai uh hi: banghangziam cile ama in peang taw pai tu ngaisun ahikom, hong sonkholsa a hihi.
ACT 20:14 Assos ah Paul taw ka ki situa uh a, ama ka muak uh hi, taciang Mitylene ka theng uh hi.
ACT 20:15 Tua mun pan in tembaw taw ka pai khawm leleau uh a, a zingciang in Chios ngalkhat ka theng uh hi; taciang a zingciang in Samos ka theng uh a, Trogyllium ah ka ngiak uh hi; taciang a zingciang in Miletus ka theng uh hi.
ACT 20:16 Banghangziam cile Paul in Asia ah hun zang ngawl tu le Ephesus pan tembaw taw pai tu in ngeal hi: banghangziam cile a suak thei tu ahile, Pentecost ni in Jerusalem ah manlang in theng nuam hi.
ACT 20:17 Taciang Miletus pan in Ephesus ah mi paisak in, pawlpi upa te samsak hi.
ACT 20:18 Amate a thet ciang in, Paul in amate tung ah, Asia ngamsung ka thet masabel pan in, note kung ka om sung theampo bangbang in ka om, ci sia na heak uh a hihi,
ACT 20:19 Thinsung kiniamkhiak le thitui tampi taw Topa na ka seam hi, taciang Judah mite in hong pang tawntung uh ahikom ka tungah mawsiatna te hong theng hi:
ACT 20:20 Taciang note tungah phattuamna khat zong khet nei ngawl khi hi, ahihang mihonpi te mai ah ahizong, inn khat zawk inn khat ah ahizong, hong lak in hong hil khi hi,
ACT 20:21 Judah mite le Greek mite tungah zong, Pathian tungah mawmaina le i Topa Jesus Christ tungah upna thu tetti ka pang hi.
ACT 20:22 Tu in, Jerusalem ah pai tu in Thaa in hong hen a, ka tungah bang thu piang tu, ci zong ka he bua hi:
ACT 20:23 Ahizong khuapi tatuam ah hencip le haksatna te in hong ngak hi, ci Tha Thiangtho in tettipang hi.
ACT 20:24 Ahihang Topa Jesus kung pan ka san Pathian thuthiamna lungdamna thupha tetti pan nasep sia, lungdamna taw ka zaw thei natu in, hi thu te in hong lingsak zo ngawl a, ka nuntakna zong pamai ka sa bua hi.
ACT 20:25 Taciang tu in, en vun, Pathian kumpingam thuhil in ka pai na mun theampo ah note in ka maitang nong mu kik nawn ba tu uh hi, ci ka he hi.
ACT 20:26 Tua ahikom mi theampo i thisan pan in ka suakta hi, ci in tu ni note tungah tetti kong pang hi.
ACT 20:27 Banghangziam cile Pathian i tupna a vekpi in note tungah ka pualak tu khet ka nei bua hi.
ACT 20:28 Tua ahikom Ama thisan taw a lei sa, Pathian pawlpi an vak tu le keamcing tu in Tha Thiangtho in a koi sa note atu in ahizong, tuu hon theampo atu in ahizong, kidawm tavun.
ACT 20:29 Banghangziam cile ka pai zawkciang in ngia ngilo te note sungah hong tum tu a, tuu hon te khoaikhe ngawl tu hi.
ACT 20:30 Noma sung mama pan in pawlkhat te pusuak tu uh a, nungzui te kaizawn tu in a man ngawl thu te son tu uh hi.
ACT 20:31 Tua ahikom en vun, kum thum sung tawntung sun le zan tawlnga ngawl in thitui taw mi theampo kidop natu thu ka hil hi, ci phawk tawntung tavun.
ACT 20:32 Tu in, suapui te awng, Pathian le Ama thuthiamna kammal kong ap hi, Ama in hong khangtosak zo tu a, mithiangtho te theampo sungah ngamh hong pia tu hi.
ACT 20:33 Kuama i puansil nikten, le kham le ngun te ka eang bua hi.
ACT 20:34 Hi ka khut taw keima le ka ompuite kisapna atu in na ka seam hi, ci sia note in na he uh hi.
ACT 20:35 Tabang in note in zong keima bang naseam a, thaneam te na hu uh kul hi, ci le, Nga na sang in piak na ah thupha tamzaw hi, ci Topa Jesus i son kammal te na phaw tawntung natu uh in hi thu te theampo a vekpi in kong laksiat zo hi, ci hi.
ACT 20:36 Paul in a thuson man ciang in khupdin a, amate theampo taw thungen khawm uh hi.
ACT 20:37 Taciang amate theampo nasiatak in kap uh a, Paul ngawngkoai in nam uh hi,
ACT 20:38 Kuama in a maitang mu nawn ngawl tu, ci a kammal hang in khuangai tuansap uh hi. Taciang amate in tembaw kung dong tha uh hi.
ACT 21:1 Amate kung pan ka pai uh ciang in, tembaw taw a tangtan in ka pai uh a, Coos ka theng uh hi, a zingciang in Rhodes ka theng uh a, tua mun pan in Patara ka paisuak uh hi:
ACT 21:2 Phoenicia pai tu tembaw ka mu uh a, a sung ka tum zawk uh ciang ka pai uh hi.
ACT 21:3 Cyprus ka mu uh ciang in veisang ka zuan uh a, Syria sangah ka pai uh hi, taciang Tyre ah ka tawlnga uh hi: banghangziam cile tua mun ah tembaw i puak van te khia uh hi.
ACT 21:4 Taciang nungzui te taw ka kimu uh a, ni sali sung ka taam uh hi: amate in, Paul sia Jerusalem a pai tu hi ngawl hi, ci in Thaa tungtawn in son hi.
ACT 21:5 Tua hun teng zawkciang in, ka pusuak kik uh a, ka paisuak uh hi; taciang amate a vekpi in a zite le a tate uh taw, khuapi puasang dong hong tha uh a: tuihui ah khupdin in thu ka ngen khawm uh hi.
ACT 21:6 Taciang khat le khat ka kikhen zawk uh ciang, tembaw sung ka tum uh a, amate zong inn sangah cia uh hi.
ACT 21:7 Tyre pan in khualhaw ka man uh ciang in Ptolemais ka theng uh hi, taciang suapui te ka paupui uh a, amate taw ni khat sung ka om uh hi.
ACT 21:8 A zingciang in koma Paul le a lawmte ka pai uh a, Caesarea ka theng uh hi: taciang thupha puak Philip innsung ah ka tum uh a, ka taam uh hi, Philip sia upa sali sung pan khat a hihi.
ACT 21:9 Taciang Philip in tanu li nei hi, amate sia ngaknu thiangtho te hi a, mailam thu pualak uh hi.
ACT 21:10 Tua mun ah ni tampi sung ka taam uh hi, tua mun ah Judah ngam pan in Agabus a kici kamsang khat hong theng hi.
ACT 21:11 Taciang ka kung uh ah hongpai ciang in, Paul i kawngkhau la a, ama khut le peang te hen hi, taciang, hi kawngkhau neipa sia Judah mite in Jerusalem ah hen tu a, Gentile mite khut sungah ap tu hi, ci in Tha Thiangtho in ci hi, ci hi.
ACT 21:12 Hi thu ka zak uh ciang in, koma le tua mun a omte in Paul sia Jerusalem pai ngawl tu in ka thum uh hi.
ACT 21:13 Tuazawkciang in Paul in, banghang in kap in ka thin hong nosak nu ziam? banghangziam cile ki hen tu bek hi ngawl, Jerusalem ah Topa Jesus min hang in thi tu zong ka ki nging khol zo hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 21:14 Taciang ka sonpui zawk ngawl uh ciang in, ka tawlnga uh a, Topa deina bang hi tahen, ka ci uh hi.
ACT 21:15 Tua ni teng zawkciang in ka van te uh ka ki thoai uh a, Jerusalem ah ka pai uh hi.
ACT 21:16 Caesarea a om nungzui pawlkhat te in zong hong zui uh a, ka ngia natu uh mun Syprus mi Mnason zong hong tonpui uh hi, Mnason sia a kipatcil pan kipan in nungzui khat a hihi.
ACT 21:17 Jerusalem ka thet uh ciang in, suapui te in angtangtak in hong muak uh hi.
ACT 21:18 A zingciang Paul taw James kungah ka tum uh a; upa te theampo zong om uh hi.
ACT 21:19 Paul in amate nukset a, a tuan in Gentile te sung a nasep na tungtawn in Pathian i nasep nate pualak hi.
ACT 21:20 Amate in tua thu a zak uh ciang in, Topa minthang pok uh a, thukham taw kisai a citak mama Judah mi tul tampi te in um uh hi; ci mu uh hi:
ACT 21:21 Nangma in Moses thukham na nusia tu a, amate tate zong vunteap tan kul ngawl hi, taciang ngeina te zong a zui tu uh hi ngawl hi, ci in na hil hi, ci thu Gentile mite sungah a om Judah mite theampo tungah phawksak hi.
ACT 21:22 Tua ahikom bang vawt tu khu ziam? mihonpi te hong ki kaikhop kul hamtang tu hi: banghangziam cile amate in nong thet hunlam he tu hi.
ACT 21:23 Tua ahikom kong son uh bang in vawt in: amate tungah kiciamna a nei mi li ka nei uh hi;
ACT 21:24 Amate taw pai tavun a, thiansuana vawt tavun, amate lu mettol hen a, a bo na dangka te zong piaksak in: taciang nangma taw kisai thu te sia bangma thupi ngawl hi; ahizong nangma vateak in thukham bang zui in nanungta hi, ci thu mi theampo in he tu hi.
ACT 21:25 A um Gentile mite taw kisai in, tabang thu te bangma zui ngawl tu in, lai ka thak zo uh hi, ahihang milim te tung a kipia thisan, tawlsan in a ki ngo sa te le paktat nate pan in amate le amate kikeam tahen, ci hi.
ACT 21:26 Tua ahikom Paul in a zingciang in mihing li te paipui a, amate taw thianthona vawt khawm uh hi, taciang biakinn sungah tum uh a, thianthona hun a bo tu ni le amate khatsim atu biakpiakna piak tu zong hil hi.
ACT 21:27 Ni sali a bo ciang in, Asia ngam Judah mite biakinn sungah Paul a mu uh ciang in, mi theampo hanthawn uh a, Paul man uh hi,
ACT 21:28 Israel mite awng, hong hu tavun: hisia pa in mun tatuam a om mi theampo, thukham le hi mun langpan in thuhil hi: tuabek domngawl in Greek mite zong biakinn sungah tumpui a, hi mun thiangtho ninsak hi, ci in au uh hi.
ACT 21:29 Banghangziam cile amate in Ephesus khua mi Trophimus taw Jerusalem ah a mu ngei uh ahikom biakinn sungah tumpui hi, ci muangmaw uh hi.
ACT 21:30 Taciang khuapi bup hong linglawng a, mipi te tai kheukho uh hi: taciang amate in Paul man uh a, biakinn sung pan in kaikeak uh hi: tasia pociang kongkha te khak siat hi.
ACT 21:31 Amate in Paul that tu a paipui uh ciang in, tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah, Jerusalem buppi buaina piang hi, ci thu theng hi.
ACT 21:32 Ama in ngalkap te le zakhat uk ngalkapmang te sam pai a, mipi te sangah tai uh hi: taciang amate in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa le ngalkap te a mu ciang in, Paul sia vel nawn ngawl in tawlnga hi.
ACT 21:33 Tuazawkciang in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa sia Paul kungah hongpai a, a mat zawkciang thikkol ni taw hen tu in thupia hi; taciang ama akua ziam, cile bangvawt ziam, ci dong hi.
ACT 21:34 Taciang mihonpi sung pan in mi pawlkhat te in a tuam in au uh a, pawlkhat te in a tuam in au uh hi: tabang in ngalkap mangpa in buaina thu thiangtak in a tel thei ngawl hu in, Paul sia ngalkap inn huang sungah tumpui tu in thupia hi.
ACT 21:35 Keallei tung a thet ciang in, ngalkap te in dom uh hi, banghangziam cile mipi te in nawm ngawp uh hi.
ACT 21:36 Banghangziam cile mihonpi te in a nung pan zui uh a, hisia pa that vun, ci in au kawm uh hi.
ACT 21:37 Paul sia ngalkap inn huang sungah a paipui tu uh ciang in, tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah, kong paupui thei tu ziam? ci hi. Taciang ngalkap mangpa in Greek kam pau thei ni ziam?
ACT 21:38 Nangma sia tu masia buaina vawt a, tualthat mi tul li duisung ah a paipui Egypt mi pa hi ngawl ni ziam? ci hi.
ACT 21:39 Ahihang Paul in, keima sia Cilicia ngamsung ah khua thathong a hi ngawl, khuapi khat a hi Tarsus a om Judah mi ka hihi: taciang, hi mipi te tungah thuson hun nong piak natu kong thum hi, ci hi.
ACT 21:40 Ngalkap mangpa in thuson hun a piak ciang in, Paul sia keallei tungah ding a, mipi te a khut taw van hi. Taciang mipi te a thim khipkhep uh ciang in, amate tungah Hebrew kam taw thuson a,
ACT 22:1 Suapui te le pa te awng, keima le keima ka ki hukna kammal te hong ngaisak tavun, ci hi.
ACT 22:2 Amate in Hebrew kam taw a pau a zak uh ciang in, thim seseam uh a: taciang Paul in,
ACT 22:3 Keima sia Judah mi tatak ka hihi, Silicia ngamsung ah khuapi khat ahi Tarsus ah ka suak hi, ahihang hi Jerusalem ah ka khang a, Gamaliel peang ah pu le pa te i ngeina a cing in hong hil hi, taciang tu ni in note bangma in Pathian sangah thalawptak in ka om ngei hi.
ACT 22:4 Taciang Topa lampi a zui te vawtsia in, ka that hi, taciang numei le pasal ci ngawl in ka hen a, thong sungah ka ap hi.
ACT 22:5 Thiampi sang le thudokpi te theampo in zong keima atu in tettipang hi: Damascus a omte hen tu le Jerusalem ah paipui in, danpiak natu lai te ka nga zawkciang in Damascus ah ka pai hi.
ACT 22:6 Taciang khual ka haw a, Damascus ka thet dektak sun hun pawl in, van pan in khuavak tang mama ka kimkot ah thakhathu in hong tang pimpem hi.
ACT 22:7 Lei ah ka puk a, aw khat in, Saul, Saul, banghang hong vawtsia ni ziam? hong ci ka za hi.
ACT 22:8 Taciang keima in, Topa awng, nang akua ni ziam? ci in ka zo hi. Taciang Ama in keima tung ah, Keima sia na vawtsiat Nazareth mi Jesus ka hihi, hong ci hi.
ACT 22:9 Taciang ka kungah omte in khuavak sia mu takpi uh a, lau mama uh hi; ahihang keima hong paupui pa i aw a za bua uhhi.
ACT 22:10 Taciang keima in, Topa awng, bang vawt tu khi ziam? ka ci hi. Topa in keima tung ah, Tho in a, Damascus ah pai in; tua mun ah na vawt tu in kong sawl theampo te hong kison tu hi, hong ci hi.
ACT 22:11 Tua a vanglian khuavak hang in khua ka mu thei bua hi, ka kung a omte in a khut uh taw hong kai uh a, Damascus ka theng hi.
ACT 22:12 Tua mun ah Ananias a kici mi khat om hi, ama sia thukham bang in biakna sangah a kipumpiak hi a, tua mun ah a om Judah mite sungah a ki phatson pa khat a hihi,
ACT 22:13 Tua Ananias sia ka kungah hongpai a, a din kawm in, suapui pa Sawl awng, khua mu kik in, hong ci hi. Tua hun lian in ama ka en hi.
ACT 22:14 Taciang ama in ka kungah, i pu le pa te Pathian in Ama deina he tu le, mi thutang khat mu tu a, a kam pan a pusuak kammal ngai tu in hong teal zo hi.
ACT 22:15 Banghangziam cile nangma sia na mu le na zak te ngual theampo tungah Ama tetti na hi tu hi.
ACT 22:16 Taciang, tu in bang ngak ni ziam? tho in a, tui ki phum in, taciang na mawna te sil in a, Topa min sam in, hong ci hi.
ACT 22:17 Tuazawkciang Jerusalem ka theng kik a, biakinn sungah thu ka nget laitak in, mang khat ka mu hi;
ACT 22:18 Tua mun ah Topa in, Manlang in, taciang Jerusalem pan manlangtak in pusuak in: banghangziam cile amate in keima taw kisai in na tettipanna hong sang ngawl tu uh hi, hong ci hi.
ACT 22:19 Taciang keima in Topa awng, Nang hong umte synagogue sung theampo ah sat in thong ka taksak hi, ci amate in hong he hi:
ACT 22:20 Taciang nangma ngalhang Stephen thisan a luan lai zong in, keima zong a hui ah ka ding a, a thina ah ka lungkim in a that te i puan te ka kepsak hi, ka ci hi.
ACT 22:21 Taciang Topa in ka tung ah, Pai in: banghangziam cile Gentile mite kung a khuala mama na ah kong paisak tu hi, hong ci hi.
ACT 22:22 Hi thu a son dong amate in ngai uh hi, tua zawkciang in a ngingtak in au uh a, hibang mihing that vun, leitung ah om heak tahen: banghangziam cile ama sia a nungta tu ki phu ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 22:23 Amate a au kawm in, a puan u te hawkkeak uh a, leivui van ah lawn ngawp uh hi.
ACT 22:24 Tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa in Paul sia ngalkap inn huang sungah tumpui tu in thupia hi, taciang ama langpan in banghang mipi te au ziam? ci a heak natu in Paul sat a, thu dong tu in vaitha hi.
ACT 22:25 Ahihang amate in savun khauhual taw a hen uh ciang in, Paul in zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah, thu a kisit ngawl lai Rome ngam mi khat sat tu ngeina ziam? ci hi.
ACT 22:26 Tua thu zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in a zak ciang in, tul khat uk ngalkap mangpa tung ah, na nasep kidawm in: banghangziam cile hisia pa sia Rome mi hi, ci hi.
ACT 22:27 Tuazawkciang in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa hongpai a, nangma sia Rome mi na hi ziam? hong son tan, ci hi. Paul in, hi khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 22:28 Taciang tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa in, Rome mi ka hina sia dangka tampi pia in ka nga hi, ci in zo hi. Taciang Paul in, ahihang kei ka sua pan in Rome mi ka hihi, ci hi.
ACT 22:29 Tua zawk pociang in thudong tu te Paul kung pan paikhia uh hi: taciang tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa zong Paul sia Rome mi hi, ci a heak zawkciang in, patau mama hi, banghangziam cile ama in Paul man in a lehhen hang a hihi.
ACT 22:30 A zingsang ciang in, Judah mite in Paul thusitna thu a tel thiang nop uh hu in, a hen nate sutsak uh a, thiampi lian te le, thudokpi te hongpai tu in thupia hi, taciang Paul paipui uh a, amate mai ah koi hi.
ACT 23:1 Paul in thudokpi te tangtak in en a, u le nau te awng, tu ni dong Pathian mai ah sia le pha khentel theina thinsung pha taw ka nungta hi.
ACT 23:2 Taciang thiampi sang Ananias sia Paul kungah ding a, Paul i muk pan sat tu in thupia hi.
ACT 23:3 Tuazawkciang in Paul in, nang a ngo ki zut pangpi, Pathian in hong sat tu hi: banghangziam cile thukham bang in thukhen tu in to napi, banghang thukham taw ki lebul in keima sat tu in thu pia ni ziam? ci hi.
ACT 23:4 Taciang Paul kungah a ding te in, Pathian i thiampi sang thusimngawl ni ziam? ci uh hi.
ACT 23:5 Tuasiaciang Paul in, suapui te awng, ama sia thiampi sang hi, ci ka he bua hi: banghangziam cile, na mihing lampui te phatngawlna kampau heak in, ci in ki atsa om hi, ci hi.
ACT 23:6 Ahihang Paul in pawlkhat te sia Saducee te hi a, a dang te sia Pharisee te hi, ci a heak ciang in, thudokpi te sungah, u le nau te awng, keima sia Pharisee ka hihi, Pharisee i tapa ka hihi: mithi te lametna le thawkikna thu dong tu in hongsam uh hi, ci au hi.
ACT 23:7 Tabang in a son zawkciang in, Pharisee te le Saducee te ki laklaw ah ki thusik ngawl na hong om a: mihonpi kikhen siat hi.
ACT 23:8 Banghangziam cile Saducee te in thawkikna, vantungmi le thaa om ngawl hi ci uh hi: ahihang Pharisee te in a vekpi in om hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 23:9 Nasiatak in au ngawp uh hi: taciang Pharisee te sung pan in thukhamhil te hong ding uh a, hisia pa a phatngawlna ka mu bua uh hi: ahihang thaa a hibale, vantungmi in paupui ahile, Pathian i do batu hi, ci in nasiatak in nial uh hi.
ACT 23:10 A thu kisik ngawlna a nasiat seseam ciang in, tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa in, Paul sia amate in a laithap tu uh lau ahikom, ngalkap te tuaksuk in, amate sung pan lakeak tu le, ngalkap inn huang sungah paipui tu in thupia hi.
ACT 23:11 Taciang a zingzan ciang in Topa sia paul kungah ding a, Paul, hangsantak in om in: banghangziam cile Jerusalem ah keima thu tetti na pan bang in, Rome ah zong pang hamtang tu ni hi, ci hi.
ACT 23:12 A zingsang ciang in, Judah mi pawlkhat te ki kaikhawm uh a, Paul a thalup mateng, an ne ngawl le tui dawn ngawl tu, ci in kiciamna vawt uh hi.
ACT 23:13 Hi kiciamna a vawt te sia mihing sawmli val pha uh hi.
ACT 23:14 Taciang amate thiampi lian te le ulian te kungah pai uh a, Paul ka thalup uh mateng bangma ne ngawl tu in kiciamna lianpi ka vawt zo uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 23:15 Tua ahikom tu in, noma le thudokpi te in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah, Paul thu a kicingzaw dong tu bang in na kungah a zingciang hong paipui tu in son vun: taciang kote in, a nai na pan, that tu in ka kinging khol tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 23:16 Taciang amate in tabang in suam tu a ngeal khop uh sia Paul i nau nu i tapa in a zak ciang in, ngalkap inn huang sungah tum a, Paul tungah son hi.
ACT 23:17 Tuazawkciang in Paul in zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa te sung pan khat a kungah sam a, hi tangvalpa tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah paipui tu in son hi: banghangziam cile ama in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa tung sonnop nei hi, ci hi.
ACT 23:18 Tua ahikom tua ngalkap mangpa in tangvalpa sia tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah paipui a, thongtak pa Paul in keima hong sam hi, taciang na kungah thuson tu a nei hi tangvalpa paipui tu in hong ngen hi, ci hi.
ACT 23:19 Tuazawkciang in tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa in tangvalpa a khut pan len a, a tuam in paipui hi, taciang bang hong son nuam ni ziam? ci in dong hi.
ACT 23:20 Tangvalpa in, Judah mite in Paul thu a cingzaw dong tu bang in zingciang thudokpi te kungah paipui tu in hong ngen tu ci in, lungkim zo uh hi.
ACT 23:21 Ahihang amate thu zui heak in: banghangziam cile mihing sawmli val in Paul suam nuam in pang uh hi, Paul a thalup uh mateng an ne ngawl le tui dawn ngawl tu in, kiciamna nei zo uh hi: taciang, amate sia nangma tung pan kamciam ngak in kinging khol in om uh hi, ci hi.
ACT 23:22 Tua ahikom tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa in tangval pa kungah, hi thu te nong son sia kuama tung son heak in, ci in vaitha a, ciasak hi.
ACT 23:23 Taciang ama in zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa sam a, ngalkap za ni, siphu ngalkap sawm sali le teipi ngalkap za ni te tu zan nai kua in Caesarea pai tu in kinging khol vun;
ACT 23:24 Paul i to tu nganhing te zong vaihawmsak vun a, taciang ngam uk Felix tungah bangma tat ngawl in puak vun, ci hi.
ACT 23:25 Taciang hibang in laithak at hi:
ACT 23:26 Claudius Lysias in a phabel ngam uk Felix tungah paupuina lai kong thak hi.
ACT 23:27 Hisia pa sia Judah te in man uh a, a thalup tu uh hi napi: Rome mi hi, ci ka he a, ngalkap te taw pai in ka hun hi.
ACT 23:28 Taciang amate i mawsiat na thu ka heak nop hu in thudokpi te kungah ka paipui hi:
ACT 23:29 Ama a mawsiatna uh sia amate thukham thu ki dokna te hi, ci ka he hi, ahihang thina tak le thongtak khop tu mawna bangma nei ngawl hi.
ACT 23:30 Taciang Judah mite in hisia pa suam sawm tawntung uh hi, ci thu hong ki son pociang in, na kungah hong puak khi hi, taciang a mawsiat te zong nangma mai ah son tu in thu ka pia hi, Na dam ta in, ci hi.
ACT 23:31 Tuazawkciang in ngalkap te zong thupiakna bang in Paul la uh a, Antipatris ah zan ciang in paipui uh hi.
ACT 23:32 A zingciang in siphu ngalkap te sia ama taw pai tu in nusia a, a dang te ngalkap huang sungah heakkik uh hi:
ACT 23:33 Caesaria a thet uh ciang in, laithak sia ngam uk pa tungah ap uh a, Paul zong a mai ah ap uh hi.
ACT 23:34 Ngam uk pa in laithak a sim zawkciang, koisung pan ziam, ci in dong hi, Taciang Caesaria pan hi, ci a heak ciang in;
ACT 23:35 Nangma hong mawsiat te hong thet ciang in, na thu ka ngai kik tu hi, ci hi. Taciang Herod i thukhenna mun innpi sungah keam tu in thupia hi.
ACT 24:1 Ni nga zawkciang in thiampi sang Ananias sia ulian te le thusungpa Tertullus taw tuaksuk khawm uh a, Tertullus in paul thu sia ngam ukpa kungah son hi.
ACT 24:2 Taciang Paul a sap uh ciang in Tertullus in mawsiat a, taciang Felix kungah, nangma hang in kilemna lianpi ka nei uh hi, na ukna tungtawn in hi mite tungah nong deisakna hang in phatna tampi nong vawtsak a,
ACT 24:3 Tua thu te sia a tawntung in mun tatuam ah lungdamna taw in ka na sang uh hi, maw thinsung phabel Felix awng, ci hi.
ACT 24:4 Ahitazong, hun saupi hong nawngkaisak ngawl in a tomno kong son tu thu thinsautak in nong ngaisak natu in kong thum hi.
ACT 24:5 Banghangziam cile hisia pa sia ngual nawngkaisak, leitung theampo ah Judah mi theampo sungah ki nialna a piangsak le Nazaren pawl te makaipa ka mu zo uh hi:
ACT 24:6 Ama sia biakinn ninsak tu in zong pai zo hi: ama ka man uh a, ka thukham uh bang in thu ka khen nuam uh hi.
ACT 24:7 Ahihang tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa Lysias hongpai a, ka khutsung uh pan in hong lakkeaksak hi,
ACT 24:8 Ama a mawsiat te na kungah hongpai natu in thupia hi: nangma vateak in thu dong le te kote i mawsiatna hi thu te a vekpi in na he tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 24:9 Taciang Judah mite in zong hi thu te man hi, ci in thukim uh hi.
ACT 24:10 Pual sia ngam uk pa in thuson tu in a khut taw a lak zawkciang in, nangma sia hi minam tungah kum tampi thukhenpa na hihi, ci ka heak ciang in lawptak in keima thu kong son tu hi:
ACT 24:11 Jerusalem ah Pathian bia tu in ka pai zawk ni sawm le ni ni pha pheang hi, ci na he tu hi.
ACT 24:12 Amate in biakinn sungah midang taw thu ka ki nial hong mu ngawl hi, taciang synagogue le khuapi sungah mipi te ka buaisak zong hong mu bua uh hi:
ACT 24:13 Tu in hong mawsiatna thu te sia amate in tetti lak tu a he bua uh hi.
ACT 24:14 Ahihang hi thu sia na kungah kong pualak hi, ka pu le pa te Pathian ka bia a, thukham le kamsang te sungah a ki at theampo ka up hu in, amate in tua thu sia umkhial hi hong ci uh hi:
ACT 24:15 Taciang mi thutang le thutang ngawl kibang tek in mithi te thawkikna om tu hi, ci amate in lametna a nei uh bangma in, keima zong Pathian tungah lametna ka nei hi.
ACT 24:16 Taciang Pathian le mihing tungah khial tha ngawl in, sia le pha heak na thinsung thiangtho nei tu, ka hanciam theitawp in ka hanciam tawntung hi.
ACT 24:17 Tu in kum tampi zawkciang ka mipui te kungah mizawng te huna le piakna te keng in ka pai hi.
ACT 24:18 Biakinn sungah thianthona ka vawt zawkciang in, Asia ngam pan hongpai Judah mite in hong mu a, mihonpi le buaina om ngawl hi.
ACT 24:19 Asia ngam pan hongpai Judah mite in keima mawsiatna tu nei ahile amate vateak na mai ah hongpai tu kilawm hi.
ACT 24:20 Ahibale, hi mun a omte in, na phangawl ka vawt hong mu le, thudokpi te mai ah hong son tahen,
ACT 24:21 Amate sungah ka din laitak in ka au na aw khat, mithi te thawkikna thu simngawl, tu in nangma in thu dong tu in nong sap natu thu dang om ngawl hi, ci hi.
ACT 24:22 Felix in hi thu te a zakciang in, tua lampi thu heakna a cingzaw in nei ahikom a ni khin a, tulkhat uk ngalkap mangpa Lysias hong thet ciang in, na thukhen kik tu khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 24:23 Taciang zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa kungah, Paul keamcing tu le, a suaktatak in omsak natu ahizong, taciang ama khoi tu le a kung hongpai a lawm te kuama khak ngawl natu in thupia hi.
ACT 24:24 Tua zawk a ngei ngawl in Felix a zi Drusilla taw hongpai hi, Drusilla sia Judah mi hi a, Paul sam in, Christ sungah a upna thu te ngai hi.
ACT 24:25 Taciang Paul in thutang suana, kitekna le hong theng tu thukhenna thu te sonpui a, Felix sia lau in ling hi, taciang, tu in pai phot tan a, hun pha a om ciang in kong sam kik tu hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 24:26 Paul in a suatak thei natu in dangka hong pia tu hi, ci lamen ahikom Felix in Paul sia tu le tu in sam a, paupui tawntung hi.
ACT 24:27 Ahihang kum ni zawkciang in Porcius Festas sia Felix inndoi sungah tum a: Judah mite lungkimsak tu dei ahikom, Felix in Paul sia pusua ngawl in thongsung ah nusia hi.
ACT 25:1 Festus sia tua ngamkhen sung a thet zawk ni thum ciang in, Caesarea pan Jerusalem ah paito hi.
ACT 25:2 Tuazawkciang in thiampi sang le Judah mi makai te in Paul langpan na thu son in, thum uh hi.
ACT 25:3 Paul sia lamkal pan suam tu in pang uh a, a thalup nop uh hu in, Jerusalem ah puak tu in ngen uh hi.
ACT 25:4 Ahihang Festus in, Paul sia Caesarea ah kepcing tu a hihi, ci in zo hi, taciang ama zong hai ngawl in Caesarea ah pai sawm hi.
ACT 25:5 Tua ahikom note sung pan a pai thei tu te keima taw hongpai tavun a, Paul in phat ngawlna nei ahile mawsiat vun, ci hi.
ACT 25:6 Festus sia amate sungah ni sawm val taam a, Caesarea pai hi; taciang a zingciang in thukhenna tokhum tungah to a, Paul paipui tu in thupia hi.
ACT 25:7 Taciang Paul a thet ciang in, Jerusalem pan hongpai Judah mite a kimkot ah ding uh a, Paul tungah tetti a lak thei ngawl uh, thuak zawk a hi ngawl mawsiatna tampi suan uh hi.
ACT 25:8 Paul in Judah mite thukham langpan in ahizong, biakinn langpan in ahizong, taciang Caesar langpan in ahizong, ka vawtkhial khat zong om ngawl hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 25:9 Ahihang Festus in Judah mite lungkimsak nuam ahikom, Paul kam zo kik a, Jerusalem ah pai in ka mai ah hi thu te taw kisai thukhen tu na uk ziam? ci hi.
ACT 25:10 Tasia ciang Paul in, ka thu hong khensak tu a kilawm Caesar thukhenna tokhum ah ka ding hi: nangma in a thiangtak in na heaksa bangma in Judah mite tungah bangma a man ngawl vawt ngawl khi hi.
ACT 25:11 Banghangziam cile keima sia thukham paltan, a hibale, thi tu kilawm mawna vawt ka hile, thi tu ka nial bua hi: ahihang hi mite i hong mawsiatna khat zong a man om ngawl ahile, kuama in amate tungah hong ap thei ngawl tu hi. Caesar tungah thusungkik tu khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 25:12 Festus in thudokpi te taw a kikup zawkciang in, Caesar kungah thusungkik tu ni ziam? Caesar kungah pai tu ni hi, ci in zo hi.
ACT 25:13 Ni pawlkhat sung a ngei zawkciang in kumpipa Agrippa le Bernice te Caesarea ah Festus nukset tu in hongpai uh hi.
ACT 25:14 Taciang amate Caesarea ah ni tampi a om zawk uh ciang in, Festus in kumpipa tung ah, Felix in thong a taksak khat om hi, ci in Paul thu pualak a:
ACT 25:15 Jerusalem ah ka pai lai in, thiampi lian te le Judah mi ulian te in Paul i thu hong son uh a, ama thukhen tu in hong ngen uh hi.
ACT 25:16 Amate kungah, mawsiatna a thuak pa sia a mawsiat te taw maitang kisi tu in, amate i mawsiatna thu taw kisai, ama atu thuson hun pia masa ngawl in, mi khatpo that tu in ap tu sia Rome mite i ngeina hi ngawl hi, ci in ka zo hi.
ACT 25:17 Tua ahikom amate in hi mun ah hongpai uh ciang in, a zingciang khangkhan ngawl in thukhenna tokhum tungah ka to a, hisia pa hong paipui natu in thu ka pia hi.
ACT 25:18 Ama a mawsiat te a din uh ciang in, ka ngaisut bang in mawsiatna bangma a son bua uh hi:
ACT 25:19 Ahihang amate thuciin taw kisai in thudokna te, taciang Jesus a kici mi khat thi zo a, Paul in tua pa nungta hi, ci hi.
ACT 25:20 Taciang tabang thudokna te um ngawl ka hikom, hi thu te hang in thukhenna thuak tu in Jerusalem ah na pai tu ziam, ci ka dong hi.
ACT 25:21 Ahihang Paul in Augustus mai ah thusung kik tu in hong ngen ahikom, Caesar kungah ka puak mateng keamcing tu in thu pia khi hi, ci hi.
ACT 25:22 Tasiaciang Agrippa in Festus tung ah, tua pa thu sia keima vateak zong in ka ngai tu hi, ci hi. Taciang Festus in zingciang in na ngai tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 25:23 A zingciang in, Agrippa le Bernice te sia thupitak in hongpai khawm uh hi, taciang tulkhat uk ngalkap mang te le khuapi sungah mi thupi te taw thu kikup ngai na mun inndoi sungah hong tum khawm uh a, Festus thupiakna bang in Paul paipui uh hi.
ACT 25:24 Taciang Festus in, kumpipa Agrippa le hi mun ka kung a om mi theampo awng, hisia pa en vun, ama sia Jerusalem le hi mun ah om Judah mihonpi theampo in ka kungah a thu hong then uh a, ama sia a nungta tu kilawm ngawl hi, ci au uh hi.
ACT 25:25 Ahihang ama in thi tu kilawm zadong a vawt bangma ka mu ngawl ciang in, ama in zong Augustus kungah thusungkik tu hong nget hu in, ama puak tu in thu ka khensat zo hi.
ACT 25:26 Ahihang ka topa kungah bangma at tu ka nei bua hi, Tua ahikom ama sia note i mai ah kong paipui hi, a tuan in kumpipa Agrippa awng, thu na dok zawkciang in, at tu nei thei tha tu khi hi.
ACT 25:27 Banghangziam cile thongtak khat sia ama langpan in mawsiatna bangma kilang ngawlpi in puak tu phangawl tu in ka ngaisun hi, ci hi.
ACT 26:1 Agrippa in Paul tung ah, nangma thu a son tu in hun kong pia hi, ci hi. Tuazawkciang in Paul in a khut phal in, ama thu hibang in son in zo hi:
ACT 26:2 Kumpipa Agrippa awng, tu ni in Judah mite i hong mawsiatna hi thu te taw kisai in na mai ah keima vateak in hong zo tu ka hi man in, keima le keima hampha ka kisa hi:
ACT 26:3 A tuan in nangma sia Judah mite ngeina te le thudokna theampo ah a telbel na hihi, ci ka he hi: tua ahikom thinsautak in nong ngaisak tu kong thum hi.
ACT 26:4 Ka nolai pan kipan in ka nuntak zia sia, a masabel ka omna Jerusalem a om ka mipui Judah mite theampo in hong he hi;
ACT 26:5 Amate in keima thu tettipang nuam uh hile, ka biakna uh i ngeina a khobel, Pharisee khat in ka nungta hi, ci sia a kipat pan ma in hong heak sa uh a hihi.
ACT 26:6 Tu in Pathian in ka pu le pa te kungah a vawt kamciam i lametna hu in thukhenna thuak in ka ding hi:
ACT 26:7 Tua hong thengpheang tu kamciam sungah lametna nei in ka mipui sawm le ni te in sun le zan tawlnga ngawl in, Pathian na ka seam uh hi. Tua lametna hang in, kumpi Agrippa awng, Judah mite in keima hong mawsak uh hi.
ACT 26:8 Pathian in mithi te thosak kik tu hi, ci sia banghangin uptak ngawl thu in ngaisun nu ziam?
ACT 26:9 Nazareth khua mi Jesus min langpan in na tampi vawt tu kilawm hi, ci in keima tatak in zong ngaisun takpi ngei khi hi.
ACT 26:10 Tuathu sia keima in zong Jerusalem ah ka vawt ngei hi: thiampi lian te kung pan in sep thei na thu ka nga a, mithiangtho te thongsung ah ka khum hi; taciang amate thalup a thuak ciang zong, amate langpan in lungkimpui khi hi.
ACT 26:11 Synagogue tatuam sungah zong ka vawtsia bul a, amate zawthawk vawt in Pathian min ka sonsiasak hi; taciang amate tungah ka thin-uk mama hu in, ngamdang khuapi ciangdong zong amate ka vawtsia ngei hi.
ACT 26:12 Tabang in thiampi lian te kung pan thuneina le thupiakna taw Damascus ka pai ciang in,
ACT 26:13 Kumpipa awng, sun laitak in, lampi ah van pan in ni sang a tangzaw khuavak ka mu hi, tasia in keima le ka lawm te kimkot ah hong tang hi.
ACT 26:14 Taciang ka vekpi in lei ah ka puk siat uh a, Hebrew kam taw, Saul, Saul, banghang in hong vawtsia ni ziam? so zum khat sui ek tu sia nangma atu in haksak mama hi, ci aw khat in hong paupui ka za hi.
ACT 26:15 Taciang keima in, akua ni ziam, Topa? ka ci hi. Taciang in, Keima sia na vawtsiat Jesus ka hihi.
ACT 26:16 Ahihang tho in a, nangma peang tungah ding in: banghangziam cile hi ngealna atu in na kungah kong kilaak zo hi, na musa hi thu te le kong lak laitu thu te atu in naseam tu le tetti tu in kong vawt tu hi;
ACT 26:17 Nangma sia Judah mite le Gentile mite kung pan in kong suatak tu hi,
ACT 26:18 Amate i mit honsak tu ahizong, taciang khuamial pan in khuavak ah le Satan vangletna pan in Pathian kungah a heakkiksak tu, tabang in mawmaisak na nga tu le keima sungah upna tungtawn in a ki thiangthosak sa te sungah ngamhlua tu in, amate tungah tu in kong sawl hi, hong ci hi.
ACT 26:19 Tua ahikom, maw kumpipa Agrippa awng, van pan in hongpai ka mangmuna thu ka nial bua hi.
ACT 26:20 Amasabel in Damascus, taciang Jerusalem, taciang Judah ngamsung theampo le Gentile te kungah amate mawna ki sikkik a, Pathian kungah a heakkik thei natu le ki sikkik nataw a kiphu nasep te a sep natu in thu ka hil hi.
ACT 26:21 Hi thu te hang in Judah mite in biakinn sungah hong man uh a, hong that nuam uh hi.
ACT 26:22 Pathian panpuina ka nga hu in, tuni dong tatsat ngawl in a lian a no te tungah a kibang in tetti ka pang a, kamsang te le Moses in hong theng tu hi, ci a sonsa thu te simngawl a dang bangma ka son bua hi:
ACT 26:23 Tua Christ sia thuak tu a, ama sia mithi te sung pan in a masabel thokik tu hi, taciang Judah mite le Gentile mite kungah khuavak thu tangsak tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 26:24 Taciang Paul in ama atu thu a son zawkciang in, Festus in aw ngingtak taw, Paul awng, na thin-am hi; a tamlei na sinna in na thin hong amsak hi, ci hi.
ACT 26:25 Ahihang Paul in, ka thin-am ngawl hi, a phabel Festus awng: ahihang thuman le ciimkam te ka pau hi.
ACT 26:26 Banghangziam cile kumpipa in hi thu te he hi, a mai ah suaktatak in ka son hi: hi thu te theampo sia a kung pan in a ki phualseal khat zong om ngawl hi; banghangziam cile hi thu sia a kingsong mun ah a kivawt hi ngawl hi, ci sia keima in ka tel thiang hi.
ACT 26:27 Kumpipa Agrippa awng, kamsang te na um ziam? Na um hi, ci ka he hi, ci hi.
ACT 26:28 Tasia ciang Agrippa in Paul kungah, Christian suak tu in hong kaizawn zo dektak ni hi, ci hi.
ACT 26:29 Taciang Paul in, nangma bek hi ngawl in, tu ni ka thusonna a za note theampo, dektak cibek hi ngawl in, thongtak thu simngawl keima bang tatak na hi thiangtho natu uh Pathian tungah ka thungetna a hihi, ci hi.
ACT 26:30 Paul in thu a son zawkciang in, kumpipa, ngam uk Bernice te a topui te taw ding uh a:
ACT 26:31 Amate a kingsong ah a pai zawk uh ciang in, hisia pa in thina tu kilawm le thongtak khop natu bangma vawt ngawl hi, ci amate sungah son tek uh hi.
ACT 26:32 Tuazawkciang in Agrippa in Festus kungah, hisia pa in Caesar kungah thusungkik tu ngen hibale, suataksak tu hi napi, ci hi.
ACT 27:1 Italy ah teambaw taw pai tu a ki khensat zawkciang in, amate in Paul le a dang thongtak te sia Augustus ngalkaphon sungah zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa Julius kungah ap uh hi.
ACT 27:2 Taciang Adramyttium tembaw sungah ka tum uh a, Asia ngam tuipi dung zui in pai tu ka kipan uh hi; Macedonia ngam Thessalonica khua mi Aristarchus a kici khat zong kote taw hong ki thawl hi.
ACT 27:3 A zingciang in Sidon ah ka tawlnga uh hi. Taciang Julius in Paul sia phat vawt a, a lawmte kungah pai in, ama le ama thathak la tu in suaktatak in ap hi.
ACT 27:4 Tua mun pan in ka ki patkik uh ciang in, koma sangah hui hongpai ahikom Cyprus nuai pan in ka pai uh hi.
ACT 27:5 Cilicia le Pamphylia tuipi tungah ka pai zawk uh ciang, Lycia ngam khuapi Myra ka theng uh hi.
ACT 27:6 Tua mun ah zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in Italy a pai tu Alexandria tembaw mu a; tua tembaw sungah hong tumsak hi.
ACT 27:7 Taciang dadam in ni tampi sung ka pai zawk uh ciang in, Cnidus tangtan haksatak in ka theng uh hi, hui in hong khak ahikom in, Crete tuikul nuai pan Salmone ah a tangtan in ka pai uh hi;
ACT 27:8 Taciang haksatak in ka kantan uh a, A Pha Tembaw Tawlngakna Mun, a kici na mun ka theng uh hi; tua mun sia Lasea khuapi taw ki nai hi.
ACT 27:9 Tu in hun tampi ka zak zawk uh ciang in, antan hun zong bo zo a, tembaw taw khualhaw tu sia lauhuai hi, ci in Paul in kidopna tu son hi,
ACT 27:10 Taciang amate tung ah, hi tembaw taw khualhaw tu sia vanpuak te le tembaw atu bek hi ngawl in, eite nuntakna dong in haksatna le siatsuana tampi om tu hi, ci i he hi, ci hi.
ACT 27:11 Ahihang zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in Paul i thuson te sang in, tembaw hawlpa le a neipa thu um zaw hi.
ACT 27:12 Tua tembaw tawlngakna mun sia phalbi hun sung om natu phangawl ahikom, ahi thei le Phenice thet dong paisuak tu a, tua mun ah phalbi sung theampo om tu a tamzaw in ngaisutna pia uh hi; tasia sia Crete tembaw tawlngakna mun hi a, nitum na thangsang le nitumna saksang maingat in om hi.
ACT 27:13 Taciang thangsang pan hui in hongseam va hiau a, amate in a ngealna theng zo hi, ci ngaisun uh a, Crete nai na pan in pai uh hi.
ACT 27:14 Ahihang a hai ngawl in, Euroclydon a kici sumpei bang in huipi hong ki nuai ngawp hi.
ACT 27:15 Ka tembaw uh sia hui in nuaicip a, tua hui nawk zo ngawl ahikom in, hui in a ukna mun theampo ah hong paipui hi.
ACT 27:16 Clauda a kici tuikul nuai pan in ka pai uh laitak in, haksatak in ngunkuang ka dom uh a;
ACT 27:17 Tembaw tungah ka domto zawk uh ciang in, tembaw a kho natu in ngunkuang sia khau taw hen hi; taciang senneal tam na mun ah tembaw awk tu lau uh ahikom tembaw puankhak te khiasuk uh a, hui in a uk na munpo ah hong paipui hi.
ACT 27:18 Huipi in nasiatak in hong nuaicip veve ahikom in, a zingciang in tembaw zaangsak uh hi;
ACT 27:19 Taciang ni thum na ciang in kote i khut vateak taw in tembaw vanpuak te ka vawk uh hi.
ACT 27:20 Taciang ni tampi sung ni le aksi te ki mu nawn ngawl a, huipi nasiatak in hong vak lai ciang in, ka suatak natu uh lametna theampo bosiat zo hi.
ACT 27:21 Ahihang ngei mama an a ki ngawl zawkciang, Paul sia amate laizang ah ding a, ka thu nong man tu uh hi napi, Crete pan in pai ngawl hileang, hi haksatna le supna te i thuak batu hi.
ACT 27:22 Tuin thinnuamtak in om tu in kong hanthawn hi: banghangziam cile tembaw simngawl, note sungah mihing nuntakna khat zong bo ngawl tu hi.
ACT 27:23 Banghangziam cile tuzan in keima hong nei le a na ka sepsak Pathian vantungmi ka kungah hong ding a,
ACT 27:24 Paul awng, lau heak in; nangma sia Caesar mai ah hong paipui hamtang tu khi hi: taciang, en in, nangma taw tembaw tung khualhaw te theampo Pathian in hong pia zo hi, hong ci hi.
ACT 27:25 Tua ahikom, thinnuam in om vun: banghangziam cile Pathian in keima hong sonsa bang in tangtung tu hi, ci ka um hi.
ACT 27:26 Ahihang tuikul khatpo ah hui in hong vawk hamtang tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 27:27 Ahihang zan sawm le zan ni na ciang in, Adria tuipi sungah loksuk lokto in hong paipui a, zankim laitak pawl in tembaw naseam te in tuihui lei ki nai zo hi, ci muangmaw uh hi;
ACT 27:28 Taciang tui a te uh ciang in pi za le kul thuk hi, ci he uh hi: taciang tawm a khuala zawhiat a pai zawkciang in te kik a, pi sawmkua thuk hi, ci he uh hi.
ACT 27:29 Tuazawkciang in tembaw in suangpi a taithak tu a lau uh hu in, tembaw nungsang pan thikkapui li khia uh a, khuavak natu in thu ka ngen khawm uh hi.
ACT 27:30 Taciang tembaw naseam te tembaw sung pan in a puasang ah tai sawm uh a, ngunkuang tuipi sungah a khiak uh ciang in, tembaw lusang pan in thikkapui te khia tu bang in ki omsak uh hi,
ACT 27:31 Paul in zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa le ngalkap te kungah, hi mite tembaw sung a om nginge bua ahile, kuama suakta thei ngawl tu nu hi, ci hi.
ACT 27:32 Tuazawkciang in ngalkap te in ngunkuang khii na khau te sattan a, ngunkuang khia uh hi.
ACT 27:33 Khuavak dektak ciang in, Paul in amate theampo an ne tu in thum a, tuni sia a kizom in antang in, bangma ne ngawl in na om uh ni sawm le ni li na hi zo hi.
ACT 27:34 Tua ahikom an tawmtek ne tu in kong thum hi: banghangziam cile hisia sia na dam natu uh a hihi: banghangziam cile na lu tung uh pan in samzam khat zong tong ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
ACT 27:35 Tabang a ci zawkciang in, anluum la a, amate theampo i mai ah Pathian tung lungdam a ko zawkciang in: balnen in ne hi.
ACT 27:36 Tuazawkciang in amate theampo thinnuam tek uh a, an tawmtek ne uh hi.
ACT 27:37 Tembaw sungah ka vekpi uh in mihing zani le sawm sali le luk ka pha uh hi.
ACT 27:38 Amate an a kham in a neak tek zawk uh ciang in, zungtang te tuipi sungah khuasuk uh a, tembaw vanzaangsak hi.
ACT 27:39 Khua hong vak ciang in, koisung ngam ci a he bua uh hi: ahihang amate in kingkoai khat sia valbo taw ki thua mu uh a, a suakthei le tua sungah tembaw tumpui sawm uh hi.
ACT 27:40 Taciang thikkapui te sattan in tuipi sungah nusia hi, taciang tembaw khiina khau te sut uh a, tembaw maisang puankhak sia hui i mut tu in khak uh hi, taciang tembaw sia tuihui sangah paisak hi.
ACT 27:41 Tembaw sia tuipi ni ki siktua na mun ah theng a, senneal tungah awksak uh hi; taciang a maisang sia senneal sungah tumsak uh a, tung thei ngawl in awk hi, ahihang a nungsang sia tuihual hat mama in tamthamsak hi.
ACT 27:42 Ngalkap te, thongtak te that siat tu in kikum uh hi, tabang hibale thongtak te tui op tu a, tai siat tu hi.
ACT 27:43 Ahihang zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in, Paul a ngup nop hu in, amate i ngealna khak a; tui op thiam peuma amasabel in tuisung ah leangsuk tu le tuihui dong op tu in thupia hi:
ACT 27:44 A tanglai pawlkhat te sia thingpheak tung le pawlkhat te tembaw bek thingpheak te tung pan in tuihui ah bangma tat ngawl in theng siat uh hi.
ACT 28:1 Amate a suatak zawk uh ciang in, tua tuikul sia Melita kici hi, ci he uh hi.
ACT 28:2 Ngua hong zu a, khuasik mama ahikom in mimawl te in mei hong tawsak uh a, ka vekpi in hong sang in, kote hong phatvawt mama uh hi.
ACT 28:3 Taciang Paul in thing lomkhat hong toai in, meisung ah a bumsuk ciang, sa ahikom in ngul khat hong pusuak a, Paul i khut tungah hong ki vial hi.
ACT 28:4 Taciang mimawl te in Paul i khut ah a ngu hang mama ngulpui in pom ci a mu uh ciang in, hisia pa sia tualthat hi nanak tu hi, tuipi sung pan suakta napi, phulakna in nungtasak tuan ngawl hi, ci in amate kikum uh hi.
ACT 28:5 Taciang Paul in tua nganhing sia meisung ah thing a, bangma tat ngawl hi.
ACT 28:6 Ahihang amate in banghun ciang hong tumkeak tam maw, a hibale, banghun ciang upmawk ngawlpi, puk in a thi tam maw, ci in encik uh hi: ahihang hun saupi sung a etcik zawk uh ciang in, bangma a phatmawk ngawl ciang, amate in a ngaisutna uh khealkik a, hisia pa sia pathian hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 28:7 Tua mun ah tuikul ukpa in lo ngam nei a, tua pa min sia Publius kici hi; ama in phatak in hong sang a, ni thum sung hong taamsak hi.
ACT 28:8 Taciang in, Publius i pa sia cisa natna le ngilsan vei in lum hi: Paul a kungah pai a, thungen in a tungah khut nga a, damsak hi.
ACT 28:9 Tua ahikom hibang a vawt zawkciang in, tuikul sung a natna nei theampo zong hongpai uh a, dam uh hi:
ACT 28:10 Amate in letsong tam mama hongpia uh a, ka din uh ciang in ka kisap uh na tampi tembaw tungah hong koisak uh hi.
ACT 28:11 Tha thum zawkciang phalbi sung theampo tuikul ah ka om uh a, Castor le Pollux ci khiakna nei Alexandria tembaw taw ka pai uh hi.
ACT 28:12 Syracuse ah ka tawlnga uh a, tua mun ah ni thum sung ka om uh hi.
ACT 28:13 Tua mun pan pusuak in ka kiimveal uh a, Rhegium ka theng uh hi: ni khat zawkciang in, thangsang pan hui hong va ahikom, a zingciang in Puteoli ka theng uh hi:
ACT 28:14 Tua mun ah suapui te ka mu uh a, amate in ni sali om tu in hong ngen uh hi: tabang in Rome sangah ka pai uh hi.
ACT 28:15 Rome a om suapui te in ka thu a zak uh ciang in, koma muak tu in Appii vanzuak na le zintun inn thum kici na pan in hongpai uh hi: taciang Paul in amate a mu ciang in, Pathian pok a, thinnuam in om uh hi.
ACT 28:16 Rome ka thet uh ciang in, zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa in thongtak te thonginn cing topa kungah ap hi: ahihang Paul sia ama nguak in a cingtu ngalkap khat taw omsak hi.
ACT 28:17 Ni thum zawkciang in, Paul in Judah makai te munkhat ah kaikhawm a: hongpai uh ciang in, amate tung ah, u le nau te awng, mite le ka pu le pa te ngeina langpan in ka vawt na bangma om ngawl hi napi, Jerusalem pan in thongtak tu in Rome mite khut sungah hong ap uh hi.
ACT 28:18 Thu hong dong uh a, thina tak mawna bangma vawt ngawl ci mu a hi uh man in, Rome mite in hong suatak nuam uh hi.
ACT 28:19 Ahihang Judah mite in a nial uh ciang in, ka mipui te ka mawsak tu hi ngawl napi, Caesar kungah thusungkik ngawl in suak thei nawn ngawl hi.
ACT 28:20 Tua ahikom, hi thu hang in noma taw kimu tu le paupui tu in hong sam ka hihi: Israel te lametna atu in thikkol thak ka thuak hi, ci hi.
ACT 28:21 Taciang amate in Paul tung ah, nangma taw kisai in Judah ngam pan laithak nga ngawl khu hi, taciang suapui te sung pan in hongpai uh a na phatngawlna thu a son khat zong om ngawl hi.
ACT 28:22 Ahihang na ngaisutna ka za nuam uh hi: banghangziam cile hite pawl te thu taw kisai in, mun tatuam ah midangte langpan in kampau hi, ci ka he uh hi, ci uh hi.
ACT 28:23 Taciang amate in Pual sia nikhat a ciangtansak zawk uh ciang in, a tunna ah mi tampi hongpai uh a; tuate tungah Pathian kumpingam thu tettipang in hilcian hi, Moses thukham le kamsang laibu te sung pan in Jesus thu taw kisai in zingpan kipan nitak sang dong hanthotna nei hi.
ACT 28:24 Taciang a son thu te sia mi pawlkhat te in um uh a, pawlkhat te in a um bua uh hi.
ACT 28:25 Ama te sungah a thu uh a kisik ngawl uh ciang in, pai uh a, tua zawkciang in Paul in thu khat son hi, Tha Thiangtho in kamsang Isaiah tungtawn in i pu le pa te tung ah,
ACT 28:26 Hi mite tungah pai tan a, son in, a zak in za napi, na tel bua uh hi; a mu in mu napi, na tel thei tuan bua uh hi:
ACT 28:27 Banghangziam cile, hi minam te sia a mit uh te khua mu ngawl, a bil uh te khua za ngawl, a thinsung in bangma tel thiam ngawl in a nuntak dan te zong ki kheal ngawl uh ahikom in, a natna uh te zong ka damsak ngawl dong in amate sia a thin uh pui lei a, a bil uh te in khua za hak bek domngawl a mit uh te zong thi siat hi, ci in a mantak in son hi.
ACT 28:28 Tua ahikom Pathian i ngupna sia Gentile mite tungah ki puak zo a, amate in tua thu ngai tu uh hi, ci in kong phawksak hi, ci hi.
ACT 28:29 Paul in hi thu te a son zawkciang in, Judah mite pai uh a, amate sungah nasiatak in thu kikum uh hi.
ACT 28:30 Paul sia a sap tawm inn ah kum ni sung om hi, taciang a kungah hongpai theampo sang a,
ACT 28:31 Pathian kumpingam thupha hil le Topa Jesus Christ taw kisai thu te hangsantak in hil a, kuama in khaktan ngawl hi.
ROM 1:1 Jesus Christ i sal, Sawltak a hi tu in a ki samtuam le Pathian lungdamna thupha atu koituam, keima Paul in,
ROM 1:2 Laithiangtho sungah Ama kamsang te taw in hong kamciam sa,
ROM 1:3 A Tapa, i Topa Jesus Christ thu taw kisai in, Ama sia cilesa taw in David suan sung pan piang a hihi;
ROM 1:4 Taciang Pathian Tapa a hina sia, vangletna taw ahizong, thianthona thaa taw ahizong, thina pan thawkikna tungtawn in ahizong, a ki tangko sa a hihi:
ROM 1:5 Jesus Christ tungtawn in thuthiamna le Sawltak hina ka sang zo uh hi, banghangziam cile minam theampo sungah upna thu manna sia Ama min atu a hihi:
ROM 1:6 Tua thu theampo sung pan note zong Jesus Christ in hong sam hi:
ROM 1:7 I Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ kungpan thuthiamna le thinnopna sia, Pathian itna le mithiangtho te a kici Rome ah a omte na vekpi tungah hong om tahen, ci in kong paupui hi.
ROM 1:8 Na upna uh sia leitung theampo ah ki son ahikom, note theampo atu in Jesus Christ tungtawn in a masabel in ka Pathian tungah ka lungdam hi.
ROM 1:9 Banghangziam cile ka thungetna theampo ah tatsat ngawl in hong hel tawntung khi hi, ci sia Ama Tapa i lungdamna thupha sungah ka thaa taw a na ka sepsak Pathian sia ka tetti a hihi;
ROM 1:10 Pathian deina a om le bangbang po ahizong hai ngawl in note kungah kong pai thei natu in, thu ka ngen tawntung hi.
ROM 1:11 Banghangziam cile note kong mu nuam mama hi, tabang in thaa letsong te hong pia in, a tawp dong na kip thei natu uh a hihi;
ROM 1:12 Tabang ka ci ciang in, note le keima sia upna tungtawn in khat le khat ki henep khop thei natu thu a hihi.
ROM 1:13 Suapui te awng, Gentile mite sung bangma in note sungah zong nga pha ka nei thei natu in, tam veipi note kungah hong haw tu in ka ngealsa hi napi, ahihang tudong hong haw thei ngawl lai khi hi, ci he ngawl in na om tu uh ka dei bua hi.
ROM 1:14 Keima sia Greek mite le mimawl te ahizong; mipil te le a pil ngawl te tungah ahizong leiba khi hi.
ROM 1:15 Tua ahikom Rome khua ah a om note kungah zong, ka hi thei za in lungdamna thuhil tu in ka ki ngingkhol zo hi.
ROM 1:16 Christ lungdamna thu atu in ka mai a zum bua hi: banghangziam cile hi lungdamna thu sia amasabel in Judah mite tung ah, taciang Greek mite tung ah, a um khatsim ngupkhiatna atu in Pathian i vangletna a hihi.
ROM 1:17 Banghangziam cile, a thutang peuma upna taw in nungta tu hi, ci a ki at sa bangma in, tua lungdamna thu sungah Pathian i thutanna sia upna pan upna ah kilang hi.
