2CO 13:2 Kongpai kik ahile note hong dawm ngawl tu khi hi, ci in mawna vawt te ahizong, ngualdang te tungah zong ahizong, ni veina note kung kong pai lai in kong sonsa bek domngawl in, tu in note kungah ka om ngawl hang, note kungah a om bang in kong sonkhol hi:
2CO 13:3 Note kungah ka thaneam bua hi, ahihang note sungah a vanglian Christ in keima sungah thu hong hilna tetti na zon uh hu in, kong dawm bua tu hi.
2CO 13:4 Banghangziam cile Christ sia thaneamna taw thinglamte tungah that napi, Pathian vangletna tungtawn in nungta hi. Kote zong Christ sungah ka tha uh neam hi, ahihang note tungah Pathian i vangletna tungtawn in Christ taw ka nungta tu uh hi.
2CO 13:5 Note upna sungah na om le om ngawl noma le noma ki sittel vun a, ki ze-et vun. Note sia a ngina ngawl na hi bana uh le, note sungah bangbang in Jesus Christ om ziam, ci sia noma le noma he ngawl na hi uh ziam?
2CO 13:6 Ahihang kote sia a ngina ngawl te ka hi bua uh hi, ci sia note in he tu in hong um khi hi.
2CO 13:7 Kote sia a ngina ngawl te bang hi napi, tetti lak nataw ka kilaak thei natu uh hi ngawl in, note in thuman na seam uh a, na phangawl na vawt ngawl natu uh in Pathian tungah thu ka ngen hi.
2CO 13:8 Banghangziam cile eite in thuman langpan in bangma i seam thei bua hi, ahihang thuman atu in i seam thei hi.
2CO 13:9 Banghangziam cile note na thahat uh a, kote ka thaneam uh ciang in ka angtang uh hi: taciang note i cialcin natu zong kong deisak uh hi.
2CO 13:10 Tua ahikom siatsua natu hi ngawl in khantosak natu in Pathian hongpiak thuneina bang in, note kungah ka om ciang in a khauh lei in ka zak ngawl natu in, note taw ka om ngawl laitak in hi thu te hong at ka hihi.
2CO 13:11 Akhakbel ah, suapui te awng, na dam tek tavun. Cialcing tavun a, henepna pha nga tavun, thu kisi in om vun a, thinnopna sungah nungta vun; taciang itna le thinnopna Pathian in hong ompui tu hi.
2CO 13:12 Khat le khat a thiangtho ki napna taw ki nukset vun.
2CO 13:13 Mi thiangtho theampo in hong paupui hi.
2CO 13:14 Topa Jesus Christ i thuthiamna, Pathian i itna le Tha Thiangtho i kipawlkhopna sia note theam po tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
GAL 1:1 Mihing te sungpan hi ngawl, mihing tungtawn zong hi ngawl, a hihang Jesus Christ le Ama sia thina pan a thokiksak Pa Pathian tungtawn in sawltak a hi Paul;
GAL 1:2 Taciang ka kungah a om suapui te in, Galati a om pawlpi te tung ah:
GAL 1:3 Pa Pathian le i Topa Jesus Christ tung pan thuthiamna le thinnopna hong om tahen,
GAL 1:4 Tu hun hunsia kawm sung pan kote suaktasak tu in i Pa Pathian deina bang in kote mawna te atu in Ama le Ama ki pia zo hi:
GAL 1:5 Ama tungah minthanna a kumtawn in om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
GAL 1:6 Note sia Christ i thuthiamna sungah hong sampa tung pan in lungdamna thupha dang ah manlangtak in na ki khin uh sia lamdang kong sa hi:
GAL 1:7 Tua thu sia lungdamna thupha dang a om hang hi ngawl hi; ahihang note hong nawngkaisak le Christ i lungdamna thupha a lai nuam pawlkhat om hi.
GAL 1:8 Ahihang kote, a hibale, van pan in vantungmi khat in note tungah ka hil sa uh lungdamna thupha simngawl, lungdamna thupha dang hong hil ahile, ama sia hamsiatna thuak tahen.
GAL 1:9 Kong son sa uh bangma in, tu zong kong son kik hi, na san sa uh thu simngawl, lungdamna thu dang note tungah hong hil khatpo a omle, ama sia hamsiatna thuak tahen.
GAL 1:10 Banghangziam cile tu in mihing te, a hibale Pathian lungkimsak tu ka uk ziam? a hibale mihing te lungkimsak tu zong khi ziam? banghangziam cile mihing te ka lungkimsak lai ahile, Christ i naseam ka hi batu hi.
GAL 1:11 Ahihang suapui te awng, ka hil sa lungdamna thupha sia mihing tung pan hi ngawl hi, ci kong hesak hi.
GAL 1:12 Banghangziam cile mihing tung pan ka san hi ngawl a, mihing i hilna zong hi ngawl hi, ahihang Jesus Christ kilaakna tungtawn in ka san a hihi.
GAL 1:13 Banghangziam cile Judah biakna sungah a bosa hun sung in ka nuntak zia, bangza son zawkngawl in Pathian pawlpi ka vawtsiat le ka siatsua thu ahizong:
GAL 1:14 Ka mipui te sung Judah biakna sungah ka khanngual te sang in a nasia zaw in pulepa ngeina sungah ka thinkho hu in ka tungtuanna thu ahizong, na za zo uh hi.
GAL 1:15 Ahizong Pathian a lungkim ciang in Ama thuthiamna tungtawn in ka nu ngilsung pan a tuam in hong koi a, hong sam hi,
GAL 1:16 Gentile mite tungah Ama thu ka hil thei natu in; a Tapa kei tungah hong kilaak ciang in, mihing kuama zong ka kuailaw pai bua hi:
GAL 1:17 Ka mai ah sawltak te kung Jerusalem ah zong ka pai bua hi; ahihang Arabia ah ka pai a, Damascus ah ka heakkik hi.
GAL 1:18 Kumthum zawkciang in Peter taw ki mu tu in Jerusalem ah ka pai a, a kungah ni sawm le ni nga sung ka om hi.
GAL 1:19 Ahihang Topa i suapui pa James simngawl a dang sawltak te kuama ka mu bua hi.
GAL 1:20 Tu in, en vun, note tungah ka at thu te Pathian mai ah leilot thu son ngawl khi hi.
GAL 1:21 Tuazawkciang in Syria le Cilicia ngam ah ka pai hi;
GAL 1:22 Tua hun laitak in Judah ngam pawlpi te in mimal in hong he balai uh hi:
GAL 1:23 Ahihang amate in, a bosa hun sungah hong vawtsia pa in khatvei lai a siatsua upna thu tu in hil hi, ci in a zak bek in za uh hi.
GAL 1:24 Taciang keima tungtawn in amate in Pathian pok uh hi.
GAL 2:1 Kum sawm le kum li zawkciang Barnabas taw Jerusalem ah ka heak kik uh a, Titus zong ka tonpui uh hi.
GAL 2:2 Pathian i thu pualakna hang in ka pai hi, taciang Gentile mite tungah ka hil lungdamna thupha sia amate tungah ka hil hi, ahihang ka sepnasa ahizong, ka sep lai tu ahizong, mannung ngawl a suak tu ka dei ngawl hu in, lampui te samtuam in ka son hi.
GAL 2:3 Ahihang ka kung a om Greek minam Titus zong vunteap tan tu in zawthawkthu taw ka sawl bua uh hi:
GAL 2:4 Christ Jesus sungah ka nei uh suatakna thu dawpku tu in hongpai a pai khial suapui te in sal hina sungah hongpaipui thei natu in hong tumpui ku uh hang a hihi:
GAL 2:5 Lungdamna thupha sia note tungah tatsat ngawl a om thei natu in a paikhial suapui te tawmvei sung zong a thu ngai in mun ka pia bua uh hi.
GAL 2:6 Ahizong hi lampui bang in a ngaisut uh te sia kuapo ahizong, kei atu bangma poimaw ngawl hi: Pathian in a puatham muna bangin kuama sang ngawl hi: banghangziam cile a lampui bang in a ki ngaisun te in ka kungah bangma hong belap tuan ngawl hi:
GAL 2:7 Ahihang vunteap tan te atu lungdamna thupha sia Peter tungah ap a, vunteap tan ngawl te atu lungdamna thupha sia keima tungah hong ap hi, ci sia amate in mu uh hi.
GAL 2:8 Banghangziam cile vunteap tan te kungah sawltak hina sia Peter sungah cialcingtak in a vawt bang in, vunteap tan ngawl te tungah sawltak hina sia keima sungah hong vawt hi:
GAL 2:9 Taciang khuam bang a hi James, Peter le John te in keima tung hong ki pia thuthiamna a heak uh ciang in, Peter te sia vunteap tan te kungah ahizong, kote sia Gentile te kungah ahizong, pai tu in ki pawlkhopna ziatsang khut sia keima le Barnabas tungah hong pia uh hi.
GAL 2:10 Mizawng te phaw tawntung tu sia amate in hong deisak khat hi a; tua thu sia hanciam in ka sep uh a hihi.
GAL 2:11 Ahihang Antioch ah Peter hongpai ciang in maitang kisi in ama ka nalh hi, banghangziam cile ama maw hi.
GAL 2:12 Banghangziam cile James kung pan mihing khatpo hongpai masia theampo Peter sia Gentile mite taw anne khawm uh hi: ahihang amate hongpai ciang in, vunteap tan te a lau hu in Gentile mite taw ki pawl nawn ngawl a, ama bek a tuam in om hi.
GAL 2:13 Taciang a dang Judah mite zong Peter bangma in om uh a; tabang in amate ngamtat bang in Barnabas zong law siat hi.
GAL 2:14 Ahihang amate sia lungdamna thupha bang in thumantak in a nuntak ngawl uh a mu uh ciang in, amate theampo mai ah, Peter tung ah, nangma sia Judah minam na hi a, Judah mite bang in ngamta ngawl in, Gentile mite bang in na ngamta ahile, banghang in Gentile mite sia Judah mite bangma in ngamta tu banghang hanthawn ni ziam? ka ci hi.
GAL 2:15 Eite sia cilesa ngeina bang in Judah mite i hi a, Gentile mawnei te i hi bua hi,
GAL 2:16 Mihing khat sia thukham zuina tungtawn in thutang ki suaksak hi ngawl hi, ahihang Jesus Christ upna tungtawn in thutang a ki suaksak a hihi, ci he in, Jesus Christ i um zo hi, tabang in thukham zuina tungtawn hi ngawl in, Christ i upna tungtawn in thutang a ki suaksak te i hi thei natu a hihi: banghangziam cile thukham zuina tungtawn in mihing kuama thutang ki suaksak ngawl tu hi.
GAL 2:17 Ahihang, Christ tungtawn in thutang suana i zong ahile, eima le eima mawnei i hihi, ci i mu hi, tua ahikom Christ sia mawna naseam a hi ziam? hi ngawl het hi.
GAL 2:18 Banghangziam cile ka siatsua nate kasakik ahile, keima le keima sia thukham paltan ka suak hi.
GAL 2:19 Banghangziam cile keima sia Pathian sungah ka nuntak thei natu in, thukham tungtawn in thukham sangah mithi ka hihi.
GAL 2:20 Keima sia Christ taw thinglamte tungah ka ki that zo hi: ahihang, ka nungta hi; keima ka hi nawn bua hi, ahihang ka sungah Christ nungta hi: taciang ka pumpi sungah tu in ka nuntakna sia keima hong it a, keima atu in Ama le Ama a ki pia Pathian Tapa upna tungtawn in ka nungta hi.
GAL 2:21 Keima in Pathian thuthiamna ka nial bua hi: banghangziam cile thutang suana sia thukham tungtawn in hongpai ahile, Christ thina sia bangma mannung ngawl hi.
GAL 3:1 Maw Galati mi mawmaw te, thinglamte tung a ki khai Jesus Christ sia note mai ah a kilangtak in hong kilak zo a, thuman zui ngawl tu in akua in hong bum ziam?
GAL 3:2 Note in thukham na zuina uh tungtawn in Thaa na sang uh ziam, a hibale nazak uh thu na upna uh tungtawn in a hi ziam? hi thu bek note tung pan ka he nuam hi.
GAL 3:3 Mawmaw lalawm nu ziam? Thaa taw na kipan zo uh a, tu in note in cilesa taw tawpsak tu nu ziam?
GAL 3:4 Hi thu tu dong in a luithathong in a om lai le, na tampi sia a luithathong in thuak na hi uh ziam?
GAL 3:5 Tua ahikom note tungah na a seam Thaa in note sungah nalamdang te a vawtna sia thukham zuina tungtawn a hi ziam, a hibale na zak uh thu upna tungtawn ziam?
GAL 3:6 Abraham in Pathian um a, tua a upna sia thutang suana in ceptesak hi.
GAL 3:7 Tua ahikom upna a nei peuma sia Abraham tate a hihi, ci sia note in he ta tun.
GAL 3:8 Laithiangtho in, upna tungtawn in Gentile mite sia Pathian in thutang suaksak tu hi, ci a lak khol hu in, nangma tungtawn in minam theampo in thupha sang tu hi, ci in Abraham tungah lungdamna thupha son zo hi, ci hi.
GAL 3:9 Tua ahikom upna a nei peuma sia a muantak Abraham taw thupha sang hi.
GAL 3:10 Banghangziam cile thukham zuina a suang theampo sia hamsiatna nuai ah om hi: banghangziam cile, thukham laibu sungah a ki at theampo a ban a ban in a zui suak ngawl peuma hamsiatna thuak hi, ci in ki at hi.
GAL 3:11 Ahihang Pathian mai ah kuama thukham tungtawn in thutang suasakna nga ngawl hi, ci thu thiangtak in kilang hi: banghangziam cile a thutang mihing sia upna tungtawn in nungta tu hi.
GAL 3:12 Taciang thukham sia upna taw kisai ngawl hi: ahihang, thukham a zui peuma thukham sungah nungta tu hi.
GAL 3:13 Christ sia eite atu in hamsiatna thuak a, thukham hamsiatna sung pan in hong tan zo hi: banghangziam cile thing tungah a ki khai peuma hamsiatna thuak a hihi, ci in ki at hi:
GAL 3:14 Taciang Jesus Christ tungtawn in Abraham thupha sia Gentile mite tungah a thet thei natu le, eite in upna tungtawn in Thaa kamciam i nga thei natu a hihi.
GAL 3:15 Suapui te awng, mihing ngeina bang in kong son hi; mihing kamciam ahihang, a kipsak sa ahile, kuama in vawkthong ngawl hi, zong belap thua ngawl hi.
GAL 3:16 Tu in Abraham le a suanlepal te tungah kamciam te vawt hi, Mi tampi bang in, suanlepal te, ci ngawl hi; ahihang khat bang in, na suan, ci hi, tua thu sia Christ a hihi.
GAL 3:17 Hi thu kong son hi, Pathian in Christ sungah a kipsak kamciam sia kum zali le sawm thum zawkciang zong thukham in vawk thei ngawl hi, tabang in kamciam sia a mannung ngawl suaksak thei ngawl hi.
GAL 3:18 Banghangziam cile ngamh sia thukham taw kisai ahile, kamciam taw kisai hong suak hi: ahihang hi ngamh sia Pathian in Abraham tungah kamciam tungtawn in a piak a hihi.
GAL 3:19 Tabang ahile banghang in thukham pia ziam? Hi thu sia kamciam a piak Abraham i suan a thet mateng thukham paltan te hu in a ki belap a hihi; taciang hi thu sia palai seam pa i khutsung ah vantungmi te i a piak nasep a hihi.
GAL 3:20 Tu in palai sia mihing khat atu hi ngawl hi, ahihang Pathian sia khat a hihi.
GAL 3:21 Tabang ahile thukham in Pathian kamciam te langpan a hi ziam? Langpan ngawl hi: banghangziam cile nuntakna a pia thei thukham om hile, thutang suana sia thukham tungtawn vateak in hongpai tu hi.
GAL 3:22 Ahihang a um peuma sia Jesus Christ upna tungtawn in kamciam piak tu in laithiangtho in mi theampo sia mawna nuai ah khum siat hi.
GAL 3:23 Ahihang upna hong thet mateng, hong ki lang pheang tu upna sungah hong khum a thukham nuai ah hong keam a hihi.
GAL 3:24 Tua ahikom in upna tungtawn in thutang suana i nga thei natu in, Christ kungah hong paipui tu in eite hong keamcing sia thukham a hihi.
GAL 3:25 Ahihang tua upna a thet zawkciang in, eite hong keamcing sia i nuai ah i om nawn bua hi.
GAL 3:26 Banghangziam cile note theampo sia Christ Jesus upna tungtawn in Pathian tate na hi uh hi.
GAL 3:27 Banghangziam cile Christ sungah tuiphumna a sang peuma in Christ sil zo na hi uh hi.
GAL 3:28 Judah le Greek ci om ngawl, sal le a suakta ci zong om ngawl hi, numei le pa ci zong om ngawl hi: banghangziam cile note theampo Christ Jesus sungah khat na hi uh hi.
GAL 3:29 Taciang Christ i neisa na hi uh le, Abraham i suanlepal na hi uh hi, taciang kamciam bang in ngamh lua te na hi uh hi.
GAL 4:1 Tu in hibang i ci tu hi, tua ngamhlua pa sia na theampo ah to hi napi, patang a hi laiteng theampo, sal taw bangma ki tumdang ngawl hi;
GAL 4:2 Ahihang a pa i ciangtan hun a cin dong a keam te le a uk te nuai ah om hi.
GAL 4:3 Tasia bangma in eite zong patang i hi lai in, leitung thu kipatna sal hina nuai ah i taang ngei hi:
GAL 4:4 Ahihang a hun a cin ciang in, Pathian in a Tapa hongpaisak a, numei sung pan, thukham nuai ah hong suak hi,
GAL 4:5 Tabang in thukham nuai ah a om eite hong tan tu a, ta hina i nga thei natu a hihi.
GAL 4:6 Taciang tapa te nahi uhkom na thinsung uh ah Pathian in a Tapa Thaa hong pia a, Abba, Pa awng, ci in au hi.
GAL 4:7 Tua ahikom sal na hi nawn bua uh hi, tapa na hi uh hi, taciang tapa na hile, Christ tungtawn in Pathian ngamhlua pa na hihi.
GAL 4:8 Ahizong Pathian na heak uh ma in, Pathian a hi tatak ngawl te i na na seam ngei uh hi.
GAL 4:9 Ahihang tu in, Pathian na heak zawk uh ciang, a hibale Pathian in note hong heak zawkciang, thaneam, a kipat pan khutdaw ngen te le sal dinmun ah banghang in heakkik nuam nu ziam?
GAL 4:10 Note in ni te, tha te, hun te le kum te na tang uh hi.
GAL 4:11 Note atu ka nasepna te sia a mannung ngawl lel a hi tu ka lau mama hi.
GAL 4:12 Suapui te awng, keima bang in om vun, ci in kong thum hi; banghangziam cile keima zong note bangma in ka om hi: note in kei tungah nong takhial bua uh hi.
GAL 4:13 Note tungah amasabel lungdamna thupha ka hil lai in cilesa lam ah natna tungtawn in ka phuang hi, ci na he uh hi.
GAL 4:14 Taciang ka pumpi sungah a om ze-et na sia note in zawngsak in nong nial bua uh hi; ahihang Pathian vantungmi bang in ahizong, Christ Jesus bang in ahizong, nong sang uh hi.
GAL 4:15 Tabang ahile na son uh thupha sia koisia ziam? banghangziam cile a suakthei tu hile note in na mittang te dong khel in hong pia nuam nu hi, ci sia keima in tetti ka pang hi.
GAL 4:16 Tua ahikom, note thuman kong son hu in na ngal uh suak khi ziam?
GAL 4:17 Amate in thalawptak in hong thinbot hi, ahihang tua hong thinbot na sia phangawl hi; note in amate na thinbot thei natu uh in a tuam in hong koi nuam uh hi.
GAL 4:18 Ahihang note kungah ka om lai bek hi ngawl in, na pha sungah a tawntung thalawptak in kideisak sia pha hi.
GAL 4:19 Ka tano te awng, nau tun nat thuak bang in kong nei na hi uh a, Christ lim le meal na nei uh dong nau tun nat ka thuak lai tu hi,
GAL 4:20 Tu in ka aw sua lai tu in note kungah ka om nuam hi; banghangziam cile note kong muan ngawl hang a hihi.
GAL 4:21 No thukham nuai ah a om nuam te, hong son tavun, note thukham thu za ngawl nu ziam?
GAL 4:22 Banghangziam cile, Abraham in tapa ni nei hi, khat sia a sila nu i tapa hi a, a dang khat sia a suakta nu i tapa a hihi, ci ki at hi.
GAL 4:23 Sila nu i tapa sia cilesa ngeina bang in piang hi; ahihang a suakta nu i tapa sia kamciam tungtawn in a piang a hihi.
GAL 4:24 Hi thu te sia telsakna hi a: hi nupi ni te sia thukham ni te a hihi; khat sia Sinai mual pan hi a, sila hina a piangsak Hagar a hihi.
GAL 4:25 Banghangziam cile Hagar sia Arabia ngam a om Sinai mual hi a, tu in Jerusalem taw a kibang a hihi, taciang a tate taw sila hina sungah om hi.
GAL 4:26 Ahihang vantung Jerusalem sia a suakta nu hi a, ama sia eite theampo i nu a hihi.
GAL 4:27 Banghangziam cile, nang nau nei ngei ngawl numei ciing awng, lungdam in; nang nau tun thuak ngei ngawl nu, mun theampo thawn in au in: banghangziam cile pasal nei nupi sang in a ki hamsiat nupi in ta tamzaw nei hi, ci in ki at hi.
GAL 4:28 Tu in, suapui te awng, eite sia Isaac bang in kamciam tate i hihi.
GAL 4:29 Ahihang cilesa ngeina bang in a piangpa in Thaa ngeina taw a piang pa sia vawtsia hi, tuzong in tabangma hi lai hi.
GAL 4:30 Ahihang laithiangtho in bang ci ziam? Sila nu le a tapa hawlkhia in: banghangziam cile sila nu i tapa le a suakta nu i tapa te sia ngamh lua khawm thei ngawl tu hi.
GAL 4:31 Tua ahikom, suapui te awng, eite sia sila nu i tate i hi bua hi, ahihang a suakta nu i tate i hihi.
GAL 5:1 Tua ahikom Christ in a suakta in hong vawt a, tua suatakna sungah kiptak in ding vun, taciang sila hina hakkol pua kik nawn heak vun.
GAL 5:2 En vun, keima Paul in kong ci hi, vunteap na tan uh ahile, Christ sia note atu phattuamna bangma om ngawl tu hi.
GAL 5:3 Banghangziam cile vunteap tan khatsim tung ah, ama in thukham vekpi zui tu in leiba pa hi, ci in tetti ka pang kik hi.
GAL 5:4 Note sungah a kuamapo thukham tungtawn in thutang a ki suaksak te atu in, Christ sia note tungah bangma vangletna nei ngawl suak a; thuthiamna pan in na puk uh hi.
GAL 5:5 Banghangziam cile eite in upna tungtawn in thutang suana i lametna sia Tha tungtawn in i ngak hi.
GAL 5:6 Banghangziam cile Jesus Christ sungah vunteap tanna in bangma phatuam ngawl hi, taciang vunteap tan ngawl zong phatuam tuan ngawl hi; ahihang itna taw kisai upna bekma phatuam hi.
GAL 5:7 Note phatak in na tai uh hi; thuman thu zui ngawl tu in akua in hong khak ziam?
GAL 5:8 Hi sapna sia note hong sam pa kung pan hongpai hi ngawl hi.
GAL 5:9 Tol tawmno in anvui buppi thosak hi.
GAL 5:10 Note in ngaisutna dang na nei batu uh hi, ci sia Topa tungtawn in note sungah muanna ka nei hi: ahihang note hong nawngkaisak peuma sia akuapo ahizong thukhenna thuak tu hi.
GAL 5:11 Taciang suapui te awng, keima in vunteap tan na thu ka hil lai ahile, banghang vawtsiatna thuak tu khi ziam? ka hil ahile thinglamte hang in lutu thei nateng bo siat zo hi.
GAL 5:12 Note hong nawngkaisak te sattan in pe kik nawn ngawl vet tu ka dei hi.
GAL 5:13 Banghangziam cile, suapui te awng, suatakna sungah hong sam zo hi; tua suatakna sia na pumpi atu hunpha bek in zang heak vun, ahihang itna taw khat le khat ki hu tavun.
GAL 5:14 Banghangziam cile thukham theampo sia, noma le noma na ki it bang in na innpam te it in, ci kammal khat sungah ki khuangkhim hi.
GAL 5:15 Ahihang note khat le khat ki pet in na ki lopval uh le, khat le khat ki siatsua ngawl tu in kidawm vun.
GAL 5:16 Hi thu kong son hi, Tha sungah nungta vun, taciang cilesa deina tangtungsak heak vun.
GAL 5:17 Banghangziam cile cilesa in Thaa langpan in thangai a, Thaa in zong cilesa langpan in thangai hi: taciang hi te sia khat le khat ki do uh hi: tua ahikom note deina nate na vawt thei bua uh hi.
GAL 5:18 Ahihang note sia Thaa in hong makai ahile, thukham nuai ah na om bua uh hi.
GAL 5:19 Tu in cilesa nasep nate kilang a, tabang te sia; palngul mawna, paktat mawna, thiantho ngawl na, maizum heak ngawl na,
GAL 5:20 Milim biakna, bum le ai toai na, ngaimawkna, ki ban ngawl na, pawlkhenna, thin-ukna, ki el na, kikhenna, ki hil khial na,
GAL 5:21 Hazatna, tualthat, zukham le kham thei tatuam taw nopsakna te a hihi: taciang hibang te sia a bosa hun sungah ka sonsa bangma in, tabang nate a seam peuma Pathian kumpingam lua ngawl tu uh hi.
GAL 5:22 Ahihang Thaa i nga sia, itna, lungdamna, thinnopna, thinsauna, thinneamna, phatna, upna,
GAL 5:23 Nunneamna, ki tek na: tabang te taw ki lebul in thukham om ngawl hi.
GAL 5:24 Taciang Christ i mite in a cilesa deina le thangaina te sia thinglamte tungah that zo uh hi.
GAL 5:25 Eite Thaa sungah i nungta le, Thaa deina bang in nung ta tawng.
GAL 5:26 Eite khat le khat thin ki uksak le ki haza in a mannung ngawl vangletna dei bua tawng.
GAL 6:1 Suapui te awng, khatpo mawna sungah a puk le, no thaa mite in tabang mi khat sia thinneamna thaa taw phongkik vun; noma le noma ki khoi vun, tabang a hibale note zong ze-etna na thuak tu uh hi.
GAL 6:2 Khat le khat na vanngit uh na ki dawn vun a, tabang in Christ deina na khuangkhim tu uh hi.
GAL 6:3 Banghangziam cile mi khatpo sia bangma hi ngawl napi, ama le ama thupitak in a ki ngaisun le, ama le ama ki theam a hihi.
GAL 6:4 Ahihang mihing khatsim in ama nasep kilangsak tahen, tabang in ngualdang te tungah hi ngawl in ama sungah lungdamna nei tu hi.
GAL 6:5 Banghangziam cile mihing khatsim in ama vanngit pua hamtang tahen.
GAL 6:6 Pathian thu a sin peuma in a hil pa sia na pha theampo hawm tahen.
GAL 6:7 Mihing te in hong theam heak hen; Pathian sia selnona hi ngawl hi: banghangziam cile mihing khat in a poai po at kik tu hi.
GAL 6:8 Banghangziam cile ama cilesa sungah thaici a poai sia in cilesa siatsuana at kik tu hi; ahihang Thaa sungah thaici a poai peuma in Thaa i tawntung nuntakna at kik tu hi.
GAL 6:9 Taciang na pha sepna ah thaneam in om batawng: banghangziam cile thaneam ngawl in i omle, a hun a cin ciang in i at kik tu hi.
GAL 6:10 Tua hikom hunpha i nei bang in mi theampo tungah na pha seam tek tawng, a tuan in upna innkuan te tungah seam tawng.
GAL 6:11 Note tungah keima khut vateak taw laimal lianpi kong at zo hi, ci sia note in na mu uh hi.
GAL 6:12 Cilesa lam a hoi a kilangsak nuam te in vunteap tan tu in hong kaizawn tu uh hi; tua thu sia amate in Christ thinglamte hang in vawtsiatna a thuak ngawl natu uh bek a hihi.
GAL 6:13 Banghangziam cile vunteap tan te amate mama zong thukham zui ngawl hi; ahihang note i pumpi tungah amate vanglian tu in vunteap tan tu hong deisak uh a hihi.
GAL 6:14 Ahizong i Topa Jesus Christ thinglamte simngawl ki suantak tu dang bangma ka nei bua hi, leitung sia keima atu in thinglamte tungah ki that zo hi, taciang keima zong leitung atu in thinglamte tungah ka ki that zo hi.
GAL 6:15 Banghangziam cile Christ Jesus sungah vunteap tanna in bangma phatuam ngawl hi, taciang vunteap tan ngawl zong bangma phatuam tuan ngawl hi, ahihang a thak bitphuana sia phatuam hi.
GAL 6:16 Taciang hi thukham bang in a nungta theampo le Pathian i Israel te tungah thinnopna le hesuakna om tahen.
GAL 6:17 Tu pan kipan in kuama in hong nawngkaisak heak tahen: banghangziam cile ka pumpi ah Topa Jesus i ceptena meima pawn te om hi.
GAL 6:18 Suapui te awng, i Topa Jesus Christ i thuthiamna sia na thaa uh taw hong om khawm tahen. Amen.
EPH 1:1 Pathian deina bang in Jesus Christ i sawltak keima Paul in, Christ Jesus sungah a thuman le Ephisa a om mithiangtho te:
EPH 1:2 I Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ kung pan thuthiamna le thinnopna sia note tungah hong om tahen.
EPH 1:3 Ih Topa Jesus Christ i Pa le Pathian tungah lungdam ko tawng! Banghangziam cile Christ taw kipumkhatna sungah ama in eite sia vantung ngam taw kisai thupha theampo hong pia hi.
EPH 1:4 Leitung a ki bitphua ma in hong it ahikom Amai ah a thiangtho le paubangngawl i hi thei natu in Christ sungah hong teal zo hi:
EPH 1:5 Pathian in Ama deina le lungkimna bang in Jesus Christ tungtawn in ta i sua thei natu in hong tealkhol zo hi,
EPH 1:6 Ama thuthiamna manpha pok tu in a it a Tapa sungah san thei a hi tu in hong vawt zo hi.
EPH 1:7 A dimlet thuthiamna bang in, Ama sungah Christ thisan tungtawn in tatna le maw maisakna i nei hi;
EPH 1:8 Ama in eite tungah pilna le heakna theampo hong khangsak zo hi;
EPH 1:9 Ama sungah a ngealkhol na le a pha a lungkimna bang in, Ama deina thuku sia eite tungah hong hesak hi.
EPH 1:10 Taciang hunkhenna hun te a cin ciang in vantung na theampo le leitung na theampo te sia a vekpi in Christ sungah ki kaikhawm siat tu hi:
EPH 1:11 Na theampo sia Ama deina le a ngaisutna bang in vawt a, Ama ngealna bang in hong teal hi, tabang in Ama sungah ngamh i lua zo hi:
EPH 1:12 Tabang in Christ sungah lametna amasabel a nei eite tungtawn in Pathian minthanna i pok tu hi.
EPH 1:13 Ama na muang uh a, note tatna lungdamna thupha thuman kammal na zak zawk uh, Ama na up uh ciang kamciam Tha Thiangtho taw hong ciamte zo hi,
EPH 1:14 Tua Tha Thiangtho sia Ama minthanna pok tu in a leisa nate a tat kik mateng, i lua tu ngamh atu in vaukhaamna a hihi.
EPH 1:15 Tua ahikom keima zong Jesus Christ sungah na upna uh le mithiangtho te theampo na itna uh thu ka zak zawkciang in,
EPH 1:16 Note atu in Pathian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi, ka thungetna ah hong hel tawntung khi hi;
EPH 1:17 Tabang in minthanna i Pa, i Topa Jesus Christ i Pathian in note tungah pilna thaa le Ama heakna sungah thu pualakna hong pia tahen.
EPH 1:18 Note in Ama sapna i lametna, mithiangtho te i a minthang ngamh le hauna na heak thei natu uh in, na thinsung mit hong vaksak hi,
EPH 1:19 Taciang Ama vangletna lian nasep ngeina bang in, a um eite tungah Ama vangletna bangza in lian ziam,
EPH 1:20 Tua vangletna taw Christ sia thina pan thokiksak a, Ama ziatsang vantung ah a koi ciang in Christ sungah a vawt a hihi,
EPH 1:21 Ama sia thuneina, vangletna, hatna le ukzawkna theampo ahizong, taciang tu hun le hongpai lai tu hun sungah min theampo sang in ahizong, nasiatakin sang zaw hi:
EPH 1:22 Taciang Ama peangnuai ah na theampo koi siat a, pawlpi i na theampo tungah a lubel dinmun pia hi,
EPH 1:23 Tasia Ama pumpi hi a, na theampo ah na theampo taw a dimsak tu Ama pilna a hihi.
EPH 2:1 Na tatkhialna uh te le na mawna uh te sungah na thi zo uh a, tua pan in hong nungtasak kik hi;
EPH 2:2 A bosa hun sungah leitung ngeina bang in ahizong, hui sung a om vangletna a ukpa ngeina bang in ahizong in, thu ni ngawl tate sungah na a seam thaa ngeina bang in ahizong, note na nungta ngei uh hi:
EPH 2:3 Eite zong ngualdang te bangma in a bosa hun sungah cilesa deina sungah i nungta a, i pumpi le i thinsung i deina teng i kicingsak hi; taciang cilesa ngeina bang in thin-ukna i tate i hihi.
EPH 2:4 Ahihang thuthiamna taw a dim Pathian in itna lianpi taw hong it hi,
EPH 2:5 Mawna sungah i thi laitak in, Christ taw hong nungta khawmsak hi, thuthiamna tungtawn in ngupna na nga uh hi;
EPH 2:6 Taciang hong tho khawmsak zo a, Christ Jesus sungah van ah hong to khawmsak hi:
EPH 2:7 Tua thu sia hongpai tu hun sungah eite tungah Ama thuthiamna i a lamdang hauna sia a phatna sungah Christ Jesus tungtawn in hong lak thei natu a hihi.
EPH 2:8 Banghangziam cile note sia thuthiamna hang in upna tungtawn in ngupna na nga zo uh hi; taciang tua ngupna sia note pan in hong piang hi ngawl hi: hi sia in Pathian letsong a hihi:
EPH 2:9 Sepna hang hi ngawl hi, tua ahikom kuama ki suantak tu hi ngawl hi.
EPH 2:10 Banghangziam cile eite sia Pathian i khutma te i hihi, Christ Jesus sungah nasep pha te a seam tu in a ki bitphua te i hihi, tua nasep pha te sungah i nuntak thei natu in Pathian in hong ciangtan hi.
EPH 2:11 Tua ahikom a bosa hun sungah note sia cilesa deina taw Gentile mite na hi uh a, cilesa deina taw in khut taw vunteap tan te in vunteap tan ngawl te, hong ci uh hi, ci phawk tawntung tavun;
EPH 2:12 Tua hun in note in Christ na nei bua uh hi, Israel minam sungah ki hel ngawl in peamta te na hi uh hi, taciang kamciam thu te pan zong peamta te na hi uh hi, taciang leitung ah Pathian na nei bua uh a, lametna zong na nei bua uh hi:
EPH 2:13 Nidang in note sia a khuala mama na ah na om ngei uh a, Christ thisan tungtawn in hong naisak kik a, tu in Christ Jesus sungah na om uh hi.
EPH 2:14 Banghangziam cile Ama sia i thinnopna hi a, Ama in pumkhat in hong vawt hi, taciang i ki laklaw ah hong khak kidalna sia baltham zo hi;
EPH 2:15 Ama in ki ngalvawtna, biakna ngeina sung a om thupiak te sia Ama pumpi sungah bosak siat zo hi; banghangziam cile Ama sungah mihing ni sia mihing thak khat vawt tu in kilemna vawt hi;
EPH 2:16 Taciang thinglamte tungtawn in mihing ni sia Pathian tungah pumpi khat hi tu a, kilemna vawtsak tu in, ki ngalvawtna that hi:
EPH 2:17 Taciang a khualapi a om note le a nai a omte tungah Christ hongpai a, kilemna thu hong hil hi.
EPH 2:18 Banghangziam cile Christ tungtawn in ahizong, Thaa khat tungtawn in ahizong, Pa kungah i tum thei hi.
EPH 2:19 Tua ahikom, tu in note sia peamta te le ngamdang mite na hi nawn bua uh hi, ahihang mithiangtho te taw ngam khat i mi le Pathian innkuanpui na hi uh hi;
EPH 2:20 Taciang note sia sawltak te le kamsang te i phungkawng tungah a kisa te na hi uh a, Jesus Christ ama cikteak sia a lianbel phungkawng a hihi;
EPH 2:21 Ama sungah innpi theampo phatak in ki zom dimdiam a, Topa sungah biakinn thiangtho a hi tu in na khang khawm tek uh hi:
EPH 2:22 Ama sungah note sia Thaa tungtawn in Pathian om natu in munkhat ah a kisa khawm te na hi uh hi.
EPH 3:1 Hisia thu hu in keima Paul sia no Gentile te atu, Jesus Christ min taw thongtak pa ka hihi,
EPH 3:2 Note kungah Pathian thuthiamna a keamcing tu nasep sia keima tungah hong pia hi, ci thu na za zo uh ahile:
EPH 3:3 Nidang in tawmno ka at sa bangma in, hong kilaak na tungtawn in thuku sia ka tungah hong he sak hi,
EPH 3:4 Tua ka at thu na sim uh ciang in Christ i thuku ka heakna sia note in na telthiam tu uh hi,
EPH 3:5 Tua thuku sia tu in Ama sawltak te le kamsang thiangtho te tungah Thaa tungtawn in a kilang bang in, hun tatuam sungah mihing te tungah he sak ngei ngawl hi;
EPH 3:6 Tabang in Gentile mite sia lungdamna thupha tungtawn in ngamhlua te le pumpi khat sungah pumkhat suak tu in Christ sungah Ama kamciam a sang khawm te a hi thei natu a hihi:
EPH 3:7 Ama i a vanglian nasepna tungtawn in ka tungah hongpiak Pathian thuthiamna letsong bang in, hi lungdamna thupha naseam tu in hong vawt hi.
EPH 3:8 A kikan zo ngawl Christ i hauna thu sia Gentile mite sungah ka hil thei natu in, mithiangtho theampo sungah a nobel sang in a no zaw keima tungah hi thuthiamna hong pia hi;
EPH 3:9 Jesus Christ tungtawn in na theampo a bitphua Pathian sungah, leitung piancil pan kipan a phualseal ki pawlkhopna thuku sia mi theampo tungah hong musak tu hi:
EPH 3:10 Tu in vantung ah thuneina te le vangletna te sia pawlpi in Pathian pilna tampi a heak thei natu ngealna a hihi,
EPH 3:11 Tua thu sia tawntung ngealna bangma in i Topa Christ Jesus sungah ngealna hi a:
EPH 3:12 Tua i Topa Christ Jesus sungah Ama i upna tungtawn in hangsan le kimuanna taw tum thei na i nei hi.
EPH 3:13 Tua ahikom note atu in ka haksatna sungah na thaneam ngawl tu uh ka dei hi, banghangziam cile hi haksatna sia note vangletna a hihi.
EPH 3:14 Hi thu hang in i Topa Jesus Christ i Pa tungah ka khupdin a,
EPH 3:15 Vantung le leitung a om innkuan buppi sia minphuasa a hihi,
EPH 3:16 Tabang in Ama minthanna hauna bang in A Thaa thahatna taw note i sungsang mihing tha hong dim tu in ahizong;
EPH 3:17 Na thinsung uh ah Christ sia na upna uh tungtawn in om tu a; itna sungah zungtha le zungkip in na om thei natu uh ahizong,
EPH 3:18 Mi thiangtho te taw Christ itna a zaina, a sauna, a thukna le a sanna, na heak thei natu uh ahizong;
EPH 3:19 Tua Christ itna sia heakna sang in sangzaw a, Pathian kicinna taw na theampo na kidim thei natu uh ahizong, thu kong ngetsak hi.
EPH 3:20 Tu in kote sungah naseam pa vangletna bang in, i ngetna ahibale, i ngaisutna theampo i tungah a dimlet in na a seam thei pa tung ah,
EPH 3:21 Pawlpi sung le Christ Jesus tungtawn in hun theampo sungah tawp ni nei ngawl leitung dong in minthang tahen. Amen.
EPH 4:1 Tua ahikom, Topa atu thong a tak keima in, note hong ki sapna taw a kiphu in nungta tu in kong thum hi,
EPH 4:2 Ki niamkhiakna le nunneamna, thinsauna, itna taw khat le khat na ki dual tavun;
EPH 4:3 Thinnopna taw ki khiina sungah ki pumkhatna Thaa sia hanciam in na keamcing tavun.
EPH 4:4 Lametna khat sungah note hong sap bang in, pumpi khat om a, Thaa khat om hi;
EPH 4:5 Topa khat, upna khat le tuiphumna khat om hi,
EPH 4:6 Pathian khat om a mi theampo i Pa a hihi, Ama sia na theampo i tungah om a, mi theampo sungah om hi, taciang note theampo i sung zong ah om hi.
EPH 4:7 Ahihang Christ i letsong a tena bang in eite khatsim sia thuthiamna hong pia tek hi.
EPH 4:8 Tua ahikom Ama sia a sangna ah a ki lakto lai in, ngal mat te tonpui a, mihing te tungah tel te pia hi, ci hi.
EPH 4:9 Tu in ama sia ki lato zo hi, i cile, lei nuai sangah tuaksuk masa hi ngawl ziam?
EPH 4:10 A nuaisang ah a tuaksuk pa sia vantung a sang mama na ah a kato pa ma hi a, Ama in na theampo kicingsak tu hi.
EPH 4:11 Taciang Ama in pawlkhat te sia sawltak nasep; taciang pawlkhat te sia kamsang nasep; taciang pawlkhat te sia thuphapuak nasep; taciang pawlkhat te sia pastor te le sya nasep pia hi;
EPH 4:12 Hi tel te a piakna sia mithiangtho te picingsak tu in ahizong, Pathian nasep seam tu ahizong, taciang Christ pumpi khantosak natu ahizong:
EPH 4:13 Eite theampo in upna ki pumkhatna ah i thet tek thei natu in ahizong, Pathian Tapa i heakna sungah mi picing i hi thei natu in ahizong, Christ i kicinna tena ah i picin thei natu ahizong:
EPH 4:14 Tu pan kipan in hilna huiva in a ukna mun theampo ah a letkhiat le mihing te thimthelna le leilot thu taw a kitheam patang te i hi nawn batu hi;
EPH 4:15 Ahihang thutak sia itna taw son tu a, na theampo sungah i lutang Christ sungah i khang tek tu hi:
EPH 4:16 Ama Christ i tung pan in pumpi theampo phatak in kizom siat a, ngu le tang khatsim taw kizom siat hi, pumpi khen khatsim i nasep theina, hatna, tena bang in, pumpi sia khang tu a, itna sungah ama le ama ki khangtosak tu hi.
EPH 4:17 Tua ahikom hi thu kong son hi, taciang Topa sungah tetti ka pang hi, tabang in tu pan kipan in Gentile dang te in amate thinsung ah a mannung ngawl te ngaisun a, a nuntak uh bang in note na nungta heak vun,
EPH 4:18 Amate i heakna sia mial a, amate sungah mawmawtna tungtawn in Pathian nuntakna taw kikhen uh hi, banghangziam cile amate thinsung mit uh taw a hihang a hihi:
EPH 4:19 Amate sia maizum zong he nawn ngawl uh a, a thiangtho ngawl te sia duhopna taw vawt tu in amate le amate ki ap uh hi.
EPH 4:20 Ahihang note in Christ thu sia tabang hi ngawl tu in na sin bua uh hi;
EPH 4:21 Christ thu na za zo uh a, Ama in hong hil zo ahile, thuman sia Jesus sungah a ombang in:
EPH 4:22 Cilesa thangaina i theamna bang in a kisia sa nidang lai mihing lui nuntakzia te na sut tavun;
EPH 4:23 Taciang na thinsung uh le na thaa uh sia ki puapha tahen;
EPH 4:24 Thutang suana le thianthona man tatak sungah Pathian a kisun in bitphua na, mi thak hina sia sil tavun.
EPH 4:25 Tua ahikom leilot thu te vawk vun a, mihing khatsim in a innpam ah thuman son tahen: banghangziam cile eite sia pumpi khat i pumpi khen te i hihi.
EPH 4:26 Note thin-uk vun a, maw heak vun: na thin-ukna uh ni tumpui heak vun:
EPH 4:27 Satan hunpha pia heak vun.
EPH 4:28 Nguta thei te in ngu nawn heak tahen; naseam zaw tahen, nasep pha sia ama khut te taw seam tahen, tabang in ama in a kisam te pia thei tu hi.
EPH 4:29 Na kam pan in kammal sia te pusuak heak hen, ahihang a zate tungah thuthiamna na seam tu le khantosak natu in zak tu kammal pha te pusuak zaw tahen.
EPH 4:30 Taciang tatkhiatna ni dong note ceptena hong khen Pathian Tha Thiangtho sia thinna sak heak vun.
EPH 4:31 A val lei phat ngawlna, thin-ukna, thinsona, aw ngampui in ausatna, kam phangawl pau le deisakna phangawl te note kung pan in vawk siat vun:
EPH 4:32 Taciang note khat le khat tungah thinneamna taw phatna vawt vun a, Christ hang in Pathian in na mawna uh hong maisak bang in khat le khat ki maisak tavun.
EPH 5:1 Tua ahikom note itna' tate bang in Pathian zui te na hi uh hi;
EPH 5:2 Christ in hong it a, Pathian tungah ngimnamtui biakpiakna atu in ama le ama a ki piak bang in, itna sungah nungta vun.
EPH 5:3 Ahihang mithiangtho te na hi zawk uh bangma in paktatna, thiantho ngawlna theampo, a hibale, duhop nate sia note sungah khatvei zong son kul ngawl in om nawn heak tahen;
EPH 5:4 A lipkhap huai, mawmawt kampauna le ciammuina kammal phangawl te pau heak vun: tua te sang in lungdamna thu son zaw vun.
EPH 5:5 Banghangziam cile pasal pumpi zuak te, a thiangtho ngawl te, milim bia te a kici a duhop te sia Christ le Pathian kumpingam sungah ngamhlua ngawl tu hi, ci na he uh hi.
EPH 5:6 Kuama in a mannung ngawl kammal te taw hong theam heak tahen: banghangziam cile hi thu te hang in thuni ngawl tate tungah Pathian thin-ukna theng hi.
EPH 5:7 Tua ahikom note sia amate taw a ki pawl te na hi heak vun.
EPH 5:8 Banghangziam cile note sia khatveilai in khuazing na hi ngei uh hi, ahihang tu in note sia Topa sungah khuavak na hi uh hi: tua ahikom khuavak tate bang in nungta vun:
EPH 5:9 Banghangziam cile Thaa i nga sia na theampo sungah phatna, thutang suana le thuman a hihi;
EPH 5:10 Topa tungah a san thamman sia bangziam, ci tetti na lak vun.
EPH 5:11 Taciang bangma phattuamna om ngawl khuazing naseam te taw ki pawlkhopna nei heak vun, ahihang amate tek zaw tavun.
EPH 5:12 Banghangziam cile amate in kuama heak ngawl in a vawt uh nate a son tu uh zong a mai uh zum hi.
EPH 5:13 Ahihang tekna theampo te sia khuavak in kilangsak hi: banghangziam cile na theampo a kilangsak sia khuavak a hihi.
EPH 5:14 Tua ahikom, nang a mutthip pa awng, khanglo in a, thina pan tho in, taciang Christ in khuavak hong pia tu hi, ci hi.
EPH 5:15 Tua ahikom mi mawmaw te bang hi ngawl in, mipil te bang in kidawm in nungta vun,
EPH 5:16 Tu hun sia hunphangawl ahikom, hun la in zangthiam vun.
EPH 5:17 Tua ahikom mawmaw heak vun, ahihang Topa deina a telthiam te hi zaw tavun.
EPH 5:18 A valkan thei ahi, sapittui na kham heak vun; tuasang in Thaa taw na kidim zaw vun;
EPH 5:19 Noma le noma Psalm la, pokna la le tha la te taw ki paupui vun, na thinsung uh pan Topa tungah lasa in oai vun;
EPH 5:20 I Topa Jesus Christ min taw Pa Pathian tungah a tawntung in na theampo atu in lungdamko vun;
EPH 5:21 Pathian zatakna sungah khat le khat thu ki ni tavun.
EPH 5:22 Zi te awng, Topa tung na kiap uh bangma in na pasal uh te tungah noma le noma ki ap vun.
EPH 5:23 Banghangziam cile pasal sia zi i lutang a hihi, tasia bangma in Christ sia pawlpi i lutang a hihi: taciang Ama sia a pumpi tanpa a hihi.
EPH 5:24 Tua ahikom pawlpi in Christ thu a nit bang in, zi te in na theampo sungah a pasal te thu ni tahen.
EPH 5:25 Pasal te awng, Christ in pawlpi a it bangma in, na zi te uh it vun, taciang Christ in pawlpi atu in a nuntakna pia hi;
EPH 5:26 Tabang in Ama in tui taw a sil bang in Pathian thu taw thiangtak in thiangthosak tu ahizong,
EPH 5:27 Tabang in a minthang pawlpi sia a nin bang ngawl, a hibale a vunton ngawl, a hibale tabang na dang tatuam om ngawl, ahihang a thiangtho le paubang ngawl in Ama tungah a ap thei natu a hihi.
EPH 5:28 Tua ahikom pasal te in a zi te sia amate pumpi a it bang in a it tu a hihi. A zi a it peuma in ama le ama ki it a hihi.
EPH 5:29 Banghangziam cile pasal in, ama pumpi ngaimaw ngei ngawl hi; ahihang Topa in pawlpi vak in a khoi bangma in, a zi vak in khoi hi:
EPH 5:30 Banghangziam cile eite sia Ama pumpi sungah pumpikhen te, a pumpi le a ngu te i hihi.
EPH 5:31 Hi thu hang in pasal in a pa le a nu nusia tu a, a zi beal tu hi, taciang amate ni sia pumkhat hi tu hi.
EPH 5:32 Hi thu sia thuku lianpi a hihi: ahihang Christ le pawlpi thu taw kisai in kong son a hihi.
EPH 5:33 Ahihang note sungah a tuan in khatsim in a zi sia ama le ama a ki it bang in ahizong; taciang a zi in zong a pasal zakta tahen.
EPH 6:1 Tate awng, Topa sungah na nu le na pa te uh thu ni vun: banghangziam cile hisia sia a man a hihi.
EPH 6:2 Na nu le na pa zakta in; hi thu sia kamciam taw a masabel thupiak a hihi;
EPH 6:3 Tabang in nang atu in pha tu hi, taciang leitung ah na khansau tu hi.
EPH 6:4 Taciang, no pa te awng, na tate uh thinsosak heak vun; ahihang Topa kepna le hil nate bang in khangtosak tavun.
EPH 6:5 Sila te awng, cilesa ngeina sungah na to te thu sia lau le ling kawm in ahizong, thinsung takpi taw ahizong, Christ thu na nit uh bang in ni vun;
EPH 6:6 Amate muna ah mihing lungkimsak te bangbek hi ngawl in; Christ i sila te bang in, Pathian deina sia na thinsung uh pan seam tavun;
EPH 6:7 Na nasep uh ciang in mihing te atu seam bang hi ngawl in, Topa atu seam bang in, deisakna pha taw seam tavun:
EPH 6:8 Sila ahizong, a suakta ahizong, akuamapo na pha a vawt theampo atu in Topa tung pan sangkik tu hi, ci sia he tavun.
EPH 6:9 Taciang, no to te awng, tabangma in na sila te tungah vawt vun, lauthawn heak vun a: note zong van ah Topa na nei uh hi; Ama in kuama doidan nei ngawl hi.
EPH 6:10 Akhakbel in, ka suapui te awng, Topa le a hitheina vangletna sungah hattak in om vun.
EPH 6:11 Doaimangpa ngitlo theamna te langpan in na din zawk natu uh, Pathian ngalhiam theampo sil vun.
EPH 6:12 Banghangziam cile cilesa le thisan langpan in i do bua hi, ahihang thuneina te, vangletna te, hileitung khuazing a uk te, tungsang i a man ngawl thaa te i do hi.
EPH 6:13 Tua ahiciang hunphangawl te sungah na nalh zawk natu uh in le na theampo na vawt zawk uh ciang na din zawk thei natu uh in, Pathian ngalhiam theampo la vun.
EPH 6:14 Tua ahikom thuman kawngkhau kil vun a, thutang suana awmdal bel vun;
EPH 6:15 Taciang kilemna lungdamna thupha hil tu kingin na peangdap bul vun;
EPH 6:16 Na theampo i tung ah, upna lum toai vun, taciang a phangawl pa i thal mei-kuang theampo dal in na mit thei tu uh hi.
EPH 6:17 Ngupna lukhu khu vun, taciang Pathian thu Thaa namsau toai vun:
EPH 6:18 Thaa sungah note i kisapna le thungetna theampo taw tatsat ngawl in thungen vun, taciang mithiangtho theampo atu in hanciam in thungetna taw ngak vun;
EPH 6:19 Taciang keima zong lungdamna thuku hesak tu in hangsantak in ka kam ka kat thei natu ahizong, ka hil tu thu hongpiak thei natu ahizong,
EPH 6:20 Tua lungdamna thupha atu in keima sia tongciin ka hi thei natu in, hencipna zong ka thuak hi: tua sungah ka son tu a kilawm thu hangsantak in ka son thei natu in thu hong ngetsak tavun.
EPH 6:21 Ahizong Topa sungah a muanhuai naseam le ka it suapui pa Tychicus in, keima thu le la theampo hong hesak tu hi:
EPH 6:22 Ama sia ka thu le la te hong hesak tu le, na thinsung uh he nepna na nga thei natu, tupna taw note kungah kong paisak a hihi.
EPH 6:23 Suapui te tung ah, Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ tung pan thinnopna le itna sia upna taw hong om tahen.
EPH 6:24 Citakna taw i Topa Jesus Christ a it te theampo tungah thuthiamna hong om tahen. Amen.
PHI 1:1 Jesus Christ i sal te, Paul le Timothy in, Philippi a om Christ Jesus sungah mithiangtho te, husya te le pawlpi upa te:
PHI 1:2 I Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ tung pan thuthiamna le thinnopna sia note tungah hong om tahen.
PHI 1:3 Note kong phaw sim in ka Pathian ka pok hi,
PHI 1:4 Note theampo atu thu ka nget sim in tatsat ngawl lungdamkona taw ka ngen hi,
PHI 1:5 Lungdamna thupha sungah na ki pawlkhopna uh hu in a ni phitbel ni pan tu ni dong;
PHI 1:6 Hi thu sung mama ah ki muanna ka nei hi, note sungah nasep pha a pan pa in Jesus Christ ni dong seam suak tu hi:
PHI 1:7 Note theampo i thu ka ngaisut tawntung sia thuman a hihi, banghangziam cile ka thinsung ah na om uhhi; thong ka tak ciang ahizong, lungdamna thupha ka dinpui a, ka kipsak ciang ahizong, note theampo in ka thuthiamna taw nong dinpui uh hi.
PHI 1:8 Jesus Christ i itna sungah na vekpi uh in bangza in hong phawk khi ziam, ci sia Pathian ka tetti a hihi.
PHI 1:9 Taciang na ki itna uh sia heakna le thukhenna theampo sungah tam seseam a khan natu ahizong;
PHI 1:10 Tabang in note Christ ni dong thintak le khialna om ngawl in, a phabel nate nalak thei natu uh ahizong;
PHI 1:11 Jesus Christ tungtawn in thutang suana i nga te taw kidim a, Pathian minthanna le pokna na hi thei natu uh in, thu ka ngen hi.
PHI 1:12 Ahihang suapui te awng, ka tungah hong theng thu te sia lungdamna thupha ki zel na hong suak hi;
PHI 1:13 Tua ahikom tua Christ i sungah ka thongtakna sia kumpi innsung theampo le mun tatuam ah kilang hi;
PHI 1:14 Taciang Topa sungah suapui tampi te sia thong ka tak hu in, ki muang saseam a, launa om ngawl in Pathian thu sia hangsan seseam in son uh hi.
PHI 1:15 Pawlkhat te in Christ thu sia hazatna le enna taw in hil uh hi; taciang pawlkhat te in deisakna pha taw son uh hi:
PHI 1:16 Pawlkhat te in Christ thu sia ki enna taw hil uh a, thintak taw a hil bua uh hi, keima thongtakna sia haksatna ki belap tu in ngaisun uh hi:
PHI 1:17 Ahihang a dang pawlkhat te in keima sia lungdamna thupha a panpui tu in hong ki koi ka hina tel a, itna taw phuang uh hi.
PHI 1:18 Tabang ahile bang hi tu ziam? Ahi tazong, a son theam uh ahizong, a hibale, thuman taw ahizong, bangbang po ahizong Christ thuhil ahi na uh le ka lungdam hi, taciang maisang zong ka lungdam suak tu hi.
PHI 1:19 Banghangziam cile na thu ngetna uh le Jesus Christ i Thaa panpuina tungtawn in hi thu sia ka suatakna hong suak tu hi, ci ka he hi,
PHI 1:20 Ka thinsung takpi taw muang in ka lamet bangma in, bang thu po ahizong ka mai a zum bua hi, ahihang hangsanna theampo taw tatsat ngawl in ka pumpi sungah nuntakna tungtawn in, a hibale thina tungtawn in, Christ sia lapsang hi tu hi,
PHI 1:21 Banghangziam cile keima atu in nuntakna sia Christ a hihi, taciang thina zong phattuamna om hi.
PHI 1:22 Ahizong ka pumpi sungah ka nungta ahile, hisia in ka nasep i nga a hihi: ahihang bang teal zaw tu ci ka he bua hi.
PHI 1:23 Banghangziam cile thu ni ki laklaw ah ka tangciak hi, pusuak a, Christ taw omkhop tu ka uk hi; tasia phazaw hi:
PHI 1:24 Ahihang pumpi sungah om tu sia note atu in kisam zawpek hi.
PHI 1:25 Taciang hi ki muanna ka nei hu in, na upna uh i lungdamna a tam seseam thei natu in, pumpi sungah om tu sia note theampo taw kizom in ka om tu hi, ci ka he hi;
PHI 1:26 Tabang in note kungah kong paikikna tungtawn in Jesus Christ sungah keima atu in na lungdamna uh sia dimlet seseam tu hi.
PHI 1:27 Na nuntak zia uh sia Christ i lungdamna thupha bek taw hi tahen: tabang in keima hongpai in note te kong mu a, a hibale keima ka om ngawl sungah, note sia thaa khat sungah kiptak in ma na pang khawm uh a, lungdamna thupha upna atu in thinsung khat taw na hanciam tek na uh thu ka zak thei natu a hihi;
PHI 1:28 Taciang na ngal te uh hang in bangma lau heak vun: tabang te sia amate atu in siatsuana kilangsak te a hihi, ahihang note atu in Pathian i ngupna a hihi.
PHI 1:29 Banghangziam cile note kungah Christ taang in ama up tu bek in hong pia ngawl a, Ama atu in thuak tu zong hong pia hi;
PHI 1:30 Keima sungah na mu uh ki langpanna le tu in na zak uh thu sia, note in zong na nei uh thu a hihi.
PHI 2:1 Christ sungah thapiakna, itna i henepna, Thaa i ki pawlkhopna, note sungah hesuakna te khatpo a omle,
PHI 2:2 Note in thinsung le itna a kibang nei in, thu kisi in om vun a, ka lungdamna hong kicingsak tavun.
PHI 2:3 Ki enna, a hibale, phattuamna om ngawl ki phatsakna taw bangma vawt heak vun; ahihang thinsung ki niamkhiatna taw mi khatsim in ngualdang te sia amate sang a phazaw in ngaisun tahen.
PHI 2:4 Mi khatsim in ama atu bek en ngawl in, ngualdang atu zong en tahen.
PHI 2:5 Christ Jesus i thinsung bang note sungah zong om tahen:
PHI 2:6 Christ in Pathian pianzia nei hi, ahihang Pathian taw a kikim tu in suam tu ngaisun ngawl hi:
PHI 2:7 Ahihang Ama le Ama minthanna nei ngawl in kivawt hi, taciang sila pianzia la a, mihing bang in hong piang hi:
PHI 2:8 Mihing bang in hong om a, ama le ama ki niamkhiak in, thina ciangdong in thu ni a, thinglamte tung dong ah hong thi hi.
PHI 2:9 Tua ahikom Pathian in a sang mama in lamsang a, Ama sia min theampo sang in a sangzaw min pia hi:
PHI 2:10 Tabang in vantung a omte ahizong, leitung a omte ahizong, lei nuai a omte theampo te ahizong, Jesus min sia khup theampo khupdin tu uh a;
PHI 2:11 Taciang in Jesus Christ sia Topa hi, ci in Pa Pathian minthanna tu in leii theampo in pualak tu hi.
PHI 2:12 Tua ahikom ka it te awng, note tatsat ngawl in thu na nit uh bangma in, keima ka om ciang bek hi ngawl in, tu in ka om ngawl ciang zong thu ni seseam in, na nei uh ngupna sia lau le liing kawm in zomsuak tavun.
PHI 2:13 Banghangziam cile ama lungkimna pha bang in na sepnop natu uh le na sep thei natu uh in note sungah na a seam sia Pathian a hihi.
PHI 2:14 Na theampo sia phun ngawl le ki nial ngawl in seam tavun:
PHI 2:15 Tabang in tote sia paubang ngawl le lau ngawl, ki tei kul ngawl Pathian tate na hi tu uh a, thimthel le lampial minam te sung leitung ah khuavak bang in na taang tu uh hi;
PHI 2:16 Nuntakna thu kiptak in len vun; tabang in mannung ngawl in tai le mannung ngawl in naseam ka hi batu a, Christ ni ciang in ka ki suangtak thei tu hi.
PHI 2:17 Taciang note i upna atu in biakpiakna le piakna sungah a ki pia tu ka hile, ka lungkim hi, taciang note theampo taw ka lungdam khawm tu hi.
PHI 2:18 Tasia bangma in note zong na lung uh dam hi, taciang keima taw lungdam ta vun.
PHI 2:19 Ahihang Topa Jesus muanna taw a hai ngawl in Timothy sia note kungah kong paisak tu hi, tabang in note i dinmun ka heak ciang in keima zong ka thinnuam tu hi.
PHI 2:20 Banghangziam cile keima thinsung bang in note i na dinmun uh hong deisak kuamadang a om bua hi.
PHI 2:21 Banghangziam cile mi theampo in Jesus Christ taw kisai te zong ngawl in, amate taw kisai teng bek zong uh hi.
PHI 2:22 Ahihang Timothy sia tapa le pa bang in lungdamna thupha taw Pathian na seam hi, ci in tetti hong lakna na he uh hi.
PHI 2:23 Tua ahikom keima pai zia tu ka heakpo ciang in, ama hongpaisak pai tu in lametna ka nei hi.
PHI 2:24 Ahihang Topa muang in keima mama zong a hai ngawl in kongpai tu hi.
PHI 2:25 Taciang ka suapui pa le ka nasep pui, ka ngalkap seppui, ahizong note atu thupuak le ka kisapna sungah hong khoi Epaphroditus sia note kungah kongpaisak kul tu hi, ci ka ngaisun hi.
PHI 2:26 Banghangziam cile ama in note theampo hong phawk hi, taciang ama sia thinngimna taw kidim hi, banghangziam cile ama sia a cina hi, ci na za zo uh hi.
PHI 2:27 Banghangziam cile ama thidektak in a cina hi: ahihang Pathian in a tungah hesuakna nei hi; ama tung bek hi ngawl in, keima i khuangaina tungah a dang khuangaina a kibelap thua ngawl natu in, keima tung zong hesuakna hong nei hi.
PHI 2:28 Tua ahikom deisakna tak taw note kungah hongpaisak khi hi, tabang in ama na mu kik uh ciang in, note na lung uh dam tu a, keima zong ka khuangaina pan ka suakta tu hi.
PHI 2:29 Tua ahikom Topa sungah ama sia lundamna taw na sang vun; taciang tabang te upat in na pok tavun:
PHI 2:30 Banghangziam cile keima nong khoi tu uh a kisam lai te kicingsak tu in, a nuntakna zong haza ngawl a, Christ atu a nasepna hu in ama thi dektak liang hi.
PHI 3:1 Akhakbel in, ka suapui te awng, Topa sungah lungdam vun, Note tungah thu ka sonsa khat son kikik tu sia kei atu thu haksa hi ngawl hi, ahihang note atu in hi thu sia a bit le a muanhuai a hihi.
PHI 3:2 Ui te pan na kidawm vun, na phangawl a vawt te kidawm vun, pumpi a susia thei te kidawm vun.
PHI 3:3 Banghangziam cile eite sia vunteap tan te i hi a, Pathian sia thaa taw i bia hi, taciang Christ Jesus sungah i lungdam a, cilesa taw kisai in ki muanna i nei bua hi.
PHI 3:4 Keima in cilesa lam ah suan le muan tu ka nei hi. Ngual dang khatpo in cilesa lam ah suan tu ka nei hi, ci a ngaisun le, kei a tamzaw ka nei hi:
PHI 3:5 Ni liat ni in vunteap ka tan hi, Israel minam, Benjamin suan, Hebrew mi sung pan Hebrew mi tatak ka hihi; thukham zui nataw cileang Pharisee ka hihi;
PHI 3:6 Thalawp in sepna lam ah pawlpi vawtsia pa ka hihi; thukham sungah thutang suana taw kisai in paubang ngawl khi hi.
PHI 3:7 Ahihang hi te theampo sia keima atu in bang phatuam ziam, tabang te sia keima in Christ atu in supna in ka ngaisun hi.
PHI 3:8 Uplak tu bangma om ngawl hi, taciang ka Topa Christ Jesus heakna sia a tungnung bel ahi hu in, na theampo te supna in ka ngaisun hi: Ama atu in na theampo supna ka thuak zo hi, taciang Christ ka san thei natu in, tua nate theampo sia eak bang in ka ngaisun hi,
PHI 3:9 Taciang keima thukham zuina hu in thutang suana ka nei bua hi, ahihang thutang suana sia Christ upna tungtawn hi a, upna hu in Pathian i thutang suana taw Christ sungah hong mu tu hi:
PHI 3:10 Tabang in Christ le a thawkikna vangletna ahizong, Ama thina ciangdong thuakkhawm tu in a thuakna te taw ki pawlkhopna ahizong, ka heak thei natu a hihi;
PHI 3:11 Bangbangpo ahizong mithi te thawkikna sungah ka kihel thei natu a hihi.
PHI 3:12 Ka nei zo hi, ci hi ngawl in, ka cialcing zo hi, cina zong hi ngawl hi: ahihang Christ Jesus in keima hong heak bang in, keizong ka heak thei natu in tai kawm in ka del hi.
PHI 3:13 Suapui te awng, keima le keima ka pom zo hi, ci ka ki ngaisun bua hi: ahihang hi thu khat ka seam hi, nungsang thu te manngil a, maisang hong thengpheang tu nate pom tu in ka del hi,
PHI 3:14 Christ Jesus sungah Pathian in tungsang pan hong sapna zawna thaman atu in ka mungtupna sangah ka mainawt hi.
PHI 3:15 Tua ahikom eite thaa lam ah a picing te theampo in hibang thinsung nei khawm tek tawng: taciang na khatpo ah ngaisutna dang na nei uh ahile, hi thu sia Pathian in note tungah hong pualak tu hi.
PHI 3:16 Bangbangpo hikale tudongciang ih zuisa hi ngeina taw mainawt tawng.
PHI 3:17 Suapui te awng, ka nuntak zia hong ette tek tavun, ette tu in na nei uh kote bangbang in nungta khu ziam, ci hong en nginge tavun.
PHI 3:18 Banghangziam cile mi tampi te sia amate nuntakzia te hu in, Christ thinglamte i ngalte suak uh hi, ci sia tu le tu in kong son zo hi, taciang tu zong in kap kawm in kong son hi:
PHI 3:19 Amate i tawpna tu sia siatsuana hi a, amate i Pathian sia amate i ngilpi a hihi, taciang amate in leitung nate ngaisun uh a, amate i ki suantakna sia maizumna sungah om hi.
PHI 3:20 Banghangziam cile i nuntakzia sia van ah om hi; tua mun pan in ngumpa Topa Jesus Christ i ngak hi:
PHI 3:21 Ama in na theampo sia a nuai ah koi a, a sep thei na vanglian taw in a thaneam i pumpi sia, Ama minthanna pumpi taw a kibang in hong zeam tu a, hong laisak tu hi.
PHI 4:1 Tua ahikom, ka it suapui te le ka phaw te awng, ka lungdamna le ka kham lukhu, ka it mama te, Topa sungah kiptak in ding vun.
PHI 4:2 Euodias le Syntyche te, Topa sungah ngaisutna kibang nei tu in amate ka thum hi.
PHI 4:3 Taciang, nang a tatak in ka hakkol puakpui, lungdamna thupha sungah ka nasep pui nupi te le Clement te hu in a, taciang nuntakna laibu sungah amate min a ki at ka nasep pui dang te zong hu in.
PHI 4:4 Topa sungah lungdam tawntung vun: taciang kong ci kik hi, lungdam vun.
PHI 4:5 Na dikna uh mi theampo in hong he tahen. Topa sia a nai mama na ah om hi.
PHI 4:6 Bangma atu in thinngim heak vun; ahihang na theampo ah thungen le na kisapna uh tek sia lungdam ko kawm in na nget nop uh te Pathian tungah hesak tavun.
PHI 4:7 Taciang telthiamna theampo sang in a tungnungbel Pathian i thinnopna in, na thinsung uh le na ngaisutna uh te sia Christ Jesus tungtawn in hong keamcing tu hi.
PHI 4:8 Akhakbel in, suapui te awng, bangpo ah a dik, a thuman, a thutang, a thiangtho, a deihuai, minpha, nuntak zia pha a om ahile, taciang poktak a om le, hi thu te ngaisun tavun.
PHI 4:9 Kote tung pan na sinsa, na san sa, na zak sa le na mu sa uh thu te, seam vun; taciang thinnopna Pathian in hong ompui tu hi.
PHI 4:10 Ahihang Topa sungah nasiatak in ka lungdam hi, tu in a khakbel nong deisakna uh thaksuak kik hi; tua thu sia note in hong deisak nu hi, ahihang hunpha na nei bua uh hi.
PHI 4:11 Ka kisapna hang in ka pau hi ngawl hi: banghangziam cile bangbang dinmun ah ka om zong in, tua thu sungah ka lungkim tu in ka sinsiat sa a hihi.
PHI 4:12 Kisapna taw nuntakna bangbang, ci sia ka he hi, taciang a dim a ha in nei bangbang ziam, ci zong ka he hi: mun tatuam ah le na theampo sungah, ngilva le ngilkial, neival le kisapna sungah nuntak zia ka sin zo hi.
PHI 4:13 Hong thahatsak Christ tungtawn in na theampo ka seam thei hi.
PHI 4:14 Ahi tazong ka haksatna nong thuakpuina uh sia, na pha mama a vawt na hi uh hi.
PHI 4:15 Tu in no Philippi mite in zong na he uh hi, tabang in lungdamna thupha a kipatna Macedonia pan ka pai lai in, piakna lam le ngana lam ah note simngawl pawlpi dang te in hong panpui bua uh hi.
PHI 4:16 Banghangziam cile Thessalonica ah zong ka kisapna khatvei nong thakkik uh hi.
PHI 4:17 Letsong ka dei hang hi ngawl hi; ahihang na sum kholna mun uh ah a met tampi a khan tu ka dei hang hi zaw hi.
PHI 4:18 Ahihang note tung pan in Epaphroditus tungah nong thak uh te ka nga hu in na theampo tampi tak, a dim in ka nei hi, tuate sia Pathian lung a kimsak ngim namtui, a san thamman biakpiakna a hihi.
PHI 4:19 Ahizong ka Pathian in na kisapna theampo Ama minthanna sung a om hauna bang in Jesus Christ tungtawn in hong pia tu hi.
PHI 4:20 Tu in Pathian le i Pa tungah minthanna a tawntung in om tahen. Amen.
PHI 4:21 Christ Jesus sungah mithiangtho khatsim nukset vun. Keima taw a om suapui te in hong paupui hi.
PHI 4:22 Mi thiangtho theampo in hong paupui hi, a tuan in Ceasar innkuanpui te in hong paupui hi.
PHI 4:23 I Topa Jesus Christ i thuthiamna sia note theampo tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
COL 1:1 Pathian deina tungtawn in Jesus Christ i sawltak Paul le i suapui pa Timothy,
COL 1:2 Colossae a om mithiangtho te le Christ sungah a thuman suapui te: I Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ tung pan in thuthiamna le thinnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
COL 1:3 Pathian le i Topa Jesus Christ i Pa tung ah,
COL 1:4 Christ Jesus sungah na upna uh le mithiangtho theampo tungah na nei uh itna thu ka zak uh pan kipan in, lungdam ko in, thu kong ngetsak tawntung uh hi.
COL 1:5 Banghangziam cile vantung sia note atu a ki koi lametna hi a, nidang in lungdamna thupha thuman thu na za zo uh hi;
COL 1:6 Tua lungdamna thupha na za uh a, Pathian thuthiamna sia thuman taw na heak uh ni pan kipan, leitung theampo ah a thet bangma in, note tungah zong hong theng hi; taciang note sungah a nga bang in leitung theampo ah zong nga pha nga hi:
COL 1:7 Ka it uh sila le ka nasep pui Epaphras tung pan zong na sin sa uh bangma in, ama sia note atu in a thuman Christ i naseam a hihi;
COL 1:8 Ama in Thaa sungah note i itna thu zong kote tungah hong pualak zo hi.
COL 1:9 Hi thu hang in kote zong, note i thu ka zak uh ni pan kipan, thaa lam telthiamna le ciimna sungah, Ama deina heakna taw na kidim thei natu uh deisakna ahizong;
COL 1:10 Tabang in Topa lungkimsakna taw a ki phu in na nuntak thei natu uh ahizong, nasep pha khatsim sungah tampitak na nga thei natu uh le Pathian heakna sungah na khanto thei natu uh ahizong;
COL 1:11 Ama i a vanglian minthanna bang in, hatna theampo taw hong thahatsak tu a, thuakzawkna le thinsauna theampo sungah lungdamna taw na kidim thei natu uh ahizong, note atu tatsat ngawl in thu ka ngen tawntung uh hi;
COL 1:12 Khuavak sungah mithiangtho te i ngamh a lua pui te a hi tu in hong vawt Pathian tungah lungdam ka ko hi:
COL 1:13 Ama in khuazing i thuneina pan in kong suaktasak zo a, a it a Tapa i ukna sungah hong khin zo hi:
COL 1:14 Tapa sungah a thisan tungtawn in tatkhiatna le maw maisakna i nei hi:
COL 1:15 Ama sia a ki mu thei ngawl Pathian i lim le meal hi a, a ki piangsak theampo sungah tapa upa bel a hihi:
COL 1:16 Banghangziam cile Ama tungtawn in na theampo piangsak zo hi, vantung a om na theampo le leitung a om theampo, a ki mu thei le a ki mu thei ngawl na theampo, kumpi tokhum te, ukna te, thuneina te, vangletna te le na theampo te sia Ama in piangsak zo a, taciang Ama atu a hihi:
COL 1:17 Taciang Ama sia na theampo om ma in om zo a, na theampo sia Ama tungtawn in kip hi.
COL 1:18 Ama sia pumpi a kici pawlpi i lutang a hihi: Ama sia a kipatcilna hi a, na theampo sungah Ama sia tungnungbel a hi thei natu in, thina pan tapa upa bel a hihi.
COL 1:19 Banghangziam cile Tapa sungah na theampo a cing in a omtu sia Pathian i lungkimna a hihi;
COL 1:20 Taciang Ama tungtawn in leitung a om nate le vantung a om nate theampo sia Ama tungah, thinglamte tung a thisan tungtawn in kilemna vawt hi.
COL 1:21 Taciang note, Pathian taw na kikhen uh a, nasep phangawl te hang in na thinsung uh ah Pathian i ngal te na hi ngei uh hi,
COL 1:22 Ahihang tu in, note sia a thiangtho, a ki mawsiat thei ngawl le ki tek kul ngawl in Ama mai ah piak tu in a pumpi thina tungtawn in kilemna vawt zo hi:
COL 1:23 A kip le a kho in upna sungah hong zom zo a, na zak uh lungdamna thupha lametna pan na ki khin bua uh ahile, tua lungdamna thupha sia van nuai ah a ki piangsak na theampo tung a ki pualak thu a hihi; tua mun ah keima Paul sia Pathian naseam tu in hong vawt hi;
COL 1:24 Tu in note atu ka thuakna te sungah ka lungdam hi, tua thu sia a kisam lai Christ i haksatna te sia pawlpi a kici a pumpi atu in keima pumpi sungah ka dimsak hi:
COL 1:25 Pathian thu a khuangkhim natu in Pathian i nasep note atu hongpiak bang in, Pathian naseam in hong vawt zo hi;
COL 1:26 Khang tampi sung a ki phualseal thuku sia tu in Ama mithiangtho te tungah hong kilangsak zo hi:
COL 1:27 Hi a tuanngen thuku i hauna sia mithiangtho te tung pan Gentile mite tungah Pathian in hesak nuam hi; tua thu sia note sungah a om Christ hi a, minthanna i a lametna a hihi:
COL 1:28 Christ Jesus sungah mi theampo picing in hongpiak thei natu ciimna theampo taw mi theampo sia kidopna pia in ka hil uh hi:
COL 1:29 Tua thu sia keima zong Ama vangletna bang in na ka seam hi, tua vangletna in ka sungah thahattak in na seam hi.
COL 2:1 Banghangziam cile note le Laodicea a omte ahizong, maitang kisi in hong mu ngei ngawl lai te atu in deisakna lianpi ka nei na thu na heak tu uh ka dei hi;
COL 2:2 Tabang in amate thinsung sia henepna nga tu a, itna khau taw ki hen khawm in, Pa Pathian le Christ thuthuk heak theina tungtawn in a dim thinmuanna le hauna theampo na nei tu uh hi;
COL 2:3 Christ sungah ciimna le heakna i neisa te theampo sia ki phualseal hi.
COL 2:4 Kuama in theamna kammal te taw hong kaizot thei ngawl natu in hi thu kong son hi.
COL 2:5 Banghangziam cile ka pumpi taw note kungah ka om ngawl hang, thaa taw note kungah hong om khi hi, Christ sungah na upna uh a kip zia le na nuntak zia uh a hoi te en in ka lungdam hi.
COL 2:6 Tua ahikom note Topa Christ Jesus sang zo na hi uh bangma in, Ama sungah nungta vun:
COL 2:7 Ama sungah zungtha in, na nuntakna uh inn bang in sa tavun, upna sungah kho vun, hong ki hil sa bang in, tua thu sungah lungdamkona taw na kidim tavun.
COL 2:8 Khatpo in leitung ciimna le a mannung ngawl theamna te taw hong siatsua thei ngawl natu in kidawm vun, tua thu in mihing te i pulepa ngeina le leitung piancil pan ngeina hi a, Christ i ngeina bang hi ngawl hi.
COL 2:9 Banghang ziam cile Christ sungah Pathian hina kicing sia pumpi taw in om hi.
COL 2:10 Taciang note Christ sungah na kicing uh a, Ama sia thuneina le vangletna theampo i lutang a hihi.
COL 2:11 Note sia Christ sungah khut taw hi ngawl vunteap tan te na hi uh a, Christ vunteap tanna tungtawn in pumpi sungah cilesa khialna te na nusia siat zo uh hi:
COL 2:12 Tuiphumna sungah Ama taw a ki vui te na hi uh hi, taciang note mithi te kung pan Ama a thokiksak Pathian nasep na upna uh tungtawn in Ama taw na thokik zo uh hi.
COL 2:13 Taciang na mawna te uh le na cilesa vunteap tan ngawl na sungah na thi uh laitak in, Ama taw hong nungtasak a, note i khialna theampo hong maisak hi;
COL 2:14 Eite langpang in khut taw a ki at biakna zeksa te sia eite taw ki lebul hi, taciang tua thu hong phiatsak a eite sung pan hong laksak in, Ama thinglamte tungah kilcip hi.
COL 2:15 Taciang thuneina te le vangletna te bosak hi, taciang a kilangtak in hong lak a, tua te i tungah thinglamte tungtawn in zo thal hi.
COL 2:16 Tua ahikom neak le dawn huvau ahizong, ni le tha le sabbath ni thu huvau ahizong, kuama in note thu hong khen heak tahen:
COL 2:17 Tua bang te sia hong theng pheang tu thu te i lim a hihi; ahihang a pumpi sia Christ a hihi.
COL 2:18 A ki niamkhiak theam te le vantungmi te a bia te, a mu ngawl uh nate sungah tum uh a, a mannung ngawl cilesa thinsung taw a ki phasak peuma in na thaman uh hong theam heak tahen,
COL 2:19 Ama in lutang muang ngawl hi, tua lutang pan in ngu le tang te le thangui te tungtawn in pumpi buppi vaak hi, taciang khau bang in ki pheak khawm siat a, Pathian in khangtosak hi.
COL 2:20 Tua ahikom note leitung i bulpi thu te pan kipan in Christ taw na thi zo uh ahile, leitung ah a nungta bang in biakna ngeina thu te,
COL 2:21 (Tham heak vun; tep heak vun; len heak vun;
COL 2:22 Ta te theampo sia mangthang siat tu hi;) mihing te i thupiak te le updan te banghang in ni nu ziam?
COL 2:23 Tabang ngeina te sia cilesa lungkimna hi ngawl a, amate deina bang in biakna le ki niamkhiatna, taciang ama pumpi thusimngawlna taw pilna a ki langsak hi bek hi.
COL 3:1 Note Christ taw na thokik khawm uh le, Christ to na Pathian ziatsang a om tungsang nate zong tavun.
COL 3:2 Leitung nate tung hi ngawl in, tunglam nate na thinsung uh ah koi vun.
COL 3:3 Banghangziam cile note sia na thi zo uh a, na nuntakna uh sia Christ taw Pathian sungah ki seal zo hi.
COL 3:4 Ka nuntakna uh a hi Christ hong kilang ciang in, note zong Ama taw minthanna sungah na kilang tu uh hi.
COL 3:5 Tua ahikom leitung ah a om na pumpikhen theampo; paktat na, thiantho ngawl na, ki tek thei ngawl lungngulna, cilesa deina, taciang duhopna a kici milim biakna te that siat vun:
COL 3:6 Banghangziam cile hi mawna te hang in thu ni ngawl tate tungah Pathian thin-ukna hong theng hi:
COL 3:7 Tua mawna te sungah na om uh lai in, note zong tua mawna te sungah na nungta ngei uh hi.
COL 3:8 Ahihang tu in hi thin-ukna, thangpaina, deisakna phangawl, sonsiatna, na kam uh sung pan kammal thiang ngawl theampo zong nusia vun.
COL 3:9 Mihing lui le a nasep te nu sia siat zo na hi uh hu in khat le khat ki theam nawn heak vun;
COL 3:10 Taciang mi thak hina na sil zo uh hi, tasia in mihing thak a bitphua pa lim le meal bang in heakna sungah a ki thaksua a hihi.
COL 3:11 Tua sungah Greek le Judah, vunteap tan le tan ngawl, mimawl te, Scythian, sila le a suakta te, ci om ngawl hi: ahihang Christ sia na theampo hi a, na theampo sungah om hi.
COL 3:12 Tua ahikom, Pathian hong tealna bang in, a thiangtho le a dei huai, hesuakna, phatna, thinsung ki niamkhiakna, nunneam le thinsauna te sil tavun;
COL 3:13 Khat le khat ki dual vun, khat le khat ki maisak vun, mi khatpo in ngualdang khat taw a ki hau le: Christ in note hong maisak bang in, note zong ki maisak tavun.
COL 3:14 Taciang hi te theampo tungah itna sil vun, tua itna in kicinna taw note hong hen khawm hi.
COL 3:15 Taciang Pathian i thinnopna in note i thinsung hong uk tahen, tabang hi tu in pumpi khat sungah hong sam khawm hi; lungdam ko thiam tavun.
COL 3:16 Note sungah Christ i kammal sia ciimna theampo taw hong dim tahen; hilna, khat le khat ki tek natu in Psalm la, pokna la le thaa la te na thinsung uh ah thuthiamna taw Topa tungah sa vun.
COL 3:17 Taciang na kampauna uh theampo, a hibale, na sep uh theampo te sia Topa Jesus min taw seam siat vun, Ama tungtawn in Pa Pathian tungah lungdam ko vun.
COL 3:18 Zi te awng, Topa sungah a kilawm ahi bangma, na pasal te tungah noma le noma ki ap tavun.
COL 3:19 Pasal te awng, na zi te it vun, taciang amate langpan in ngoltol heak vun.
COL 3:20 Ta te awng, na theampo ah na nu le na pa te thu ni vun: banghangziam cile hisia in Topa lungkimsak mama hi.
COL 3:21 Pa te awng, na tate uh thin-uksak heak vun, tabang a hibale, amate thinkiam tu hi.
COL 3:22 Sila te awng, cilesa ngeina bang in na to te thu sia, amate mitmuna ah mihing lungkimsak te bang bek hi ngawl in; Pathian zatakna taw na theampo ah thu ni vun:
COL 3:23 Bangpo na seam uh ahizong, na thinsung theampo taw, mihing te atu seam bang hi ngawl in, Topa atu seam bang in seam tavun;
COL 3:24 Topa kung pan na sep thaman ngamh na lua tu uh hi, ci he tavun: banghangziam cile note Topa Christ i na na seam uh hi.
COL 3:25 Ahihang a man ngawl a seam te in a man ngawl a sepna thaman sangkik tu hi: taciang kuama doidanna om ngawl hi.
COL 4:1 To te awng, note zong vantung ah To ka nei uh hi, ci he in, na sila te tungah a man le a kibang tek in pia vun.
COL 4:2 Tatsat ngawl in thungen vun, taciang lungdamko kawm in ngak vun;
COL 4:3 Christ thuthuk hil tu in Pathian in kongkha hong honsak thei natu in, kote atu zong thu hong ngetsak tavun, tua a tu in keima sia thongtak ka hihi:
COL 4:4 Tabang in ka son tu a kilawm bang in ka pualak thei natu in, thu hong ngetsak tavun.
COL 4:5 A puatham mite mai ah pilna taw nungta vun, hun zangthiam vun.
COL 4:6 Mihing khatsim sia bangbang in zo tu kilawm, ci na heak thei natu uh in, na kampauna uh a tawntung in thuthiamna taw hi tahen a, ci taw al tahen.
COL 4:7 Ka thu theampo sia Tychicus in hong hesak tu hi, ama sia i it suapui pa, a thuman naseam le Topa sungah ka nasep pui a hihi:
COL 4:8 Ama in note i zia le tong a heak thei natu le note hong henep thei natu ngealna taw, note kungah kong paisak a hihi;
COL 4:9 Note sungah a thuman khat a hi, i it suapui pa, Onesimus taw kong paisak hi. Amate in hi mun ah thu piang te theampo hong son tu hi.
COL 4:10 Ka thongtak pui Aristarchus in hong paupui hi, taciang Barnabas tupa, Marcus in zong hong paupui hi, ama tung pan thupiak te na sang uh hi: note kung hongpai ahile, ama na sang vun;
COL 4:11 Taciang Justus a kici Jesus in zong hong paupui hi, amate sia vunteap tan te a hihi. Hite bekma Pathian kumpingam sungah ka nasep pui te hi a, keima hong heneam te a hihi.
COL 4:12 Note i sung pan mikhat, Christ i naseam, Epaphras in hong paupui hi, Pathian deina theampo sungah cialcing in, na khuagkhim thei natu uh in a tawntung in thinsung takpi taw thu hong ngetsak hi.
COL 4:13 Banghangziam cile ama in no Laodicea a omte le Hierapolis a omte atu in lawpna lian mama nei hi, ci sia keima in tetti ka pang hi.
COL 4:14 I it mama syavuan Luke le Demas te in hong paupui hi.
COL 4:15 Laodicia a om suapui te ahizong, Nympha le a inn a om pawlpi te in ahizong, paupui vun.
COL 4:16 Taciang hi laithak sia noma sungah na sim zawk uh ciang in, Laodicea pawlpi te zong in sim tahen; taciang note zong Laodicea te kung pan laithak sia na sim vun.
COL 4:17 Taciang Archippus kungah, Topa sungah na san nasep khuangkhim tu in ki nging in, ci na son vun.
COL 4:18 Keima Paul in paupuina sia ka khut taw ka at a hihi. Ka thongtakna na phawk nginge vun. Note tungah thuthiamna om tahen. Amen.
1TH 1:1 Paul, Silas le Timothy te in, Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ sung a om Thessalonica pawlpi te tung ah: i Pa Pathian le Topa Jesus Christ tung pan in thuthiamna le thinnopna note tungah hong om tahen.
1TH 1:2 Note theampo atu in Pathian tungah tatsat ngawl in lungdam ka ko uh hi, ka thungetna uh sungah hong pawk tawntung khu hi;
1TH 1:3 I Pa Pathian mai ah na upna uh taw na sepna uh, itna taw in na sep uh te le i Topa Jesus Christ sungah na lametna uh taw na thuakzawkna uh te kong phawk tawntung uh hi;
1TH 1:4 Kong it suapui te awng, Pathian tealsa te na hi uh hi, ci ka he uh hi.
1TH 1:5 Banghangziam cile i lungdamna thupha sia note tungah kam bek in hong theng ngawl hi, ahihang Thaa Thiangtho sungah vangletna le thinmuanna tampi taw hong theng hi; note atu in note sungah kote bangbang mihing khu ziam, ci na he uh hi.
1TH 1:6 Taciang note in Pathian thu sia haksatna tampi le Tha Thiangtho kung pan hongpai lungdamna taw sang zo na hi uhkom in, kote le Topa nungzui te na suak zo uh hi:
1TH 1:7 Tua ahikom Macedonia le Achaia a om thu um theampo tungah ettetak te na hi tavun.
1TH 1:8 Bangbangziam cile note tung pan Topa thu hong thawn sia Macedonia le Achaia bek hi ngawl in, Pathian na upna uh sia mun tatuam ah ki zel kakoai hi; tua ahikom thudang bangma ka son tuan tu om ngawl hi.
1TH 1:9 Banghangziam cile note kungah bangbang in hong tum khu ziam, ci thu ahizong, a nungta le a thuman Pathian na seam tu in milim te kung pan in Pathian kungah bangbang in kihei nu ziam, ci thu ahizong;
1TH 1:10 Taciang hongpai pheang tu Pathian thin-ukna pan in hong suaktasak le thina pan a thawkiksak a Tapa Jesus vantung pan hongpai tu na ngak na thu uh ahizong, amate in hong tangko zo uh hi.
1TH 2:1 Banghangziam cile suapui te awng, note kungah kong tumna uh sia a luithathong hi ngawl hi, ci note mama in na he uh hi:
1TH 2:2 Ahihang note i na heak uh bangma in, Philippi ah maizumhuai tak in hong koi uh a, ka thuak zawk uh ciang zong, note kungah Pathian lungdamna thupha sia ki nialna tampi taw hil tu in Pathian sungah hangsanna ka nei uh hi.
1TH 2:3 Banghangziam cile kote i hanthotna sia khialna, thiantho ngawl na, le theamna hi ngawl hi:
1TH 2:4 Ahihang lungdamna thupha keamcing tu in Pathian in hong sawl bang in; mihing lungkimsak tu bang hi ngawl in, kote i thinsung a en Pathian lungkimsak te bang in ka pau uh hi.
1TH 2:5 Banghangziam cile na heaksa uh bangma in, banghun po ahizong sialpokna kammal te ka zang ngei bua uh hi, duhopna phualseal kammal te zong ka zang bua uh hi; Pathian sia ka tetti uh a hihi:
1TH 2:6 Christ i sawltak te ka hi uh bangma in, vanngit hong suan thei hi ka le ung, note tung pan ahizong, ngualdang tung pan ahizong, mihing tung pan in minthanna ka zong bua uh hi.
1TH 2:7 Ahihang nau keam nu in nauno te a khoi bang in, kote zong note sungah thin neamtak in kong om uh hi:
1TH 2:8 Note kong it mama uh hu in, note tungah Pathian lungdamna thupha bek hi ngawl in, ka nuntakna zong kong pia nuam uh hi, banghangziam cile note sia kong it mamate na hi uh hi.
1TH 2:9 Banghangziam cile, suapui te awng, ka nasep uh le ka thuak uh haksatna te, na phawk tawntung uh hi: banghangziam cile note kungah vanngit ka hi thei ngawl natu in sun le zan in na ka seam uh a, Pathian lungdamna thupha note kong hil uh hi.
1TH 2:10 No thu um mite sungah thiangtho tak, thutang tak le pauban na om ngawl in ka nungta uh hi, ci note le Pathian sia ka tetti te na hi uh hi:
1TH 2:11 Pa in a tate tungah a vawt bang in, kote in note sia bangbang in hong hantawn in, hong heneam khu ziam, taciang note tungah kong vaitha uh hi, ci na he uh hi,
1TH 2:12 Tabang in note sia Ama kumpingam le minthanna sungah hongsam Pathian taw a kilawm in na nuntak tu uh a hihi.
1TH 2:13 Hi thu hang in tatsat ngawl in Pathian tung lungdam ka ko uh hi, banghangziam cile kote tung pan in na zak uh Pathian thu na san uh lai in, mihing kammal bang in na sang bua uh hi, ahihang thuman bang in na sang uh hi, tua Pathian thu in a um note sungah phattuamna tampi taw na seam hi.
1TH 2:14 Banghangziam cile, suapui te awng, note Christ Jesus sungah Judah ngam a om Pathian pawlpi a zui te na suak uh hi: banghangziam cile amate in Judah mite tungah a thuak uh bang in, note zong na ngam mite tung pan na thuak uh hi:
1TH 2:15 Judah te in Topa Jesus le amate kamsang te that uh hi, taciang kote hong vawtsia uh a; Pathian lungkimsak ngawl uh hi, taciang mi theampo taw ki langpan uh hi:
1TH 2:16 Gentile te ngupna a nga thei natu in ka thuhil natu hong khak hi, taciang mawna taw kidim tawntung uh hi: banghangziam cile Pathian thin-ukna sia a khakbel in amate tungah hong theng hi.
1TH 2:17 Ahihang suapui te awng, thinsung bek hi ngawl in, cilesa lam taw tawmvei sung i ki khen a, note maitang mu nop na lianpi taw nasiatak in ka hanciam uh hi.
1TH 2:18 Tua ahikom note kungah kong pai nuam uh a, keima Paul vateak zong, khatvei kongpai kik nuam hi; ahihang Satan in hong khak hi.
1TH 2:19 Banghangziam cile kote i lametna, lungdamna le lungdamna kham lukhu sia bang ziam? I Topa Jesus Christ hongpai ciang in Ama mai ah note hi ngawl nu ziam?
1TH 2:20 Banghangziam cile note sia ka minthanna le lungdamna na hi uh hi.
1TH 3:1 Tua ahikom ka thuakzawk nawn ngawl uh ciang in, keima bek Athens ah tang leng pha tu hi, ci in ka ngaisun uh hi;
1TH 3:2 Taciang i suapui pa, Pathian naseam le Christ i lungdamna thupha sungah ka naseppui uh Timothy sia note kipsak tu le note i upna taw kisai in note heneam tu in kong paisak uh hi:
1TH 3:3 Tabang in hi haksatna hu in kuama hong lok bua tu hi: banghangziam cile kote sia hi haksatna te thuak tu in a ciangtan sate ka hi uh hi, ci sia note mama in na he uh hi.
1TH 3:4 Banghangziam cile note kungah ka om uh lai in, haksatna ka thuak tu uh hi, ci sia mantak in hong son zo khu hi; kong son uh bangma in hong theng takpi hi, ci na he uh hi.
1TH 3:5 Hi thu hang in, ka thuak zawk ngawl uh ciang in, na up thei natu uh in Timothy kong paisak uh hi, tabang hi bale, ze-et pa in hong ze-et tu a, ka nasepna uh te a luithathong suak tu hi.
1TH 3:6 Ahihang tu in Timothy sia note kung pan kote kungah hong theng zo hi, taciang na upna uh le itna lungdamna thupha hong puak hi, taciang note in phatak in tatsat ngawl nong phawk uh a, kote in note kong mu nop uh bangma in, nong mu nuam takpi uh hi:
1TH 3:7 Tua ahikom, suapui te awng, na upna uh tungtawn in ka haksatna uh le ka thinngimna uh theampo sungah nong heneam uh hi:
1TH 3:8 Banghangziam cile, note Topa sungah kiptak in na ding uh ahile, tu in kote ka nungta uh hi.
1TH 3:9 I Pathian mai ah note hang in, ka lungdamna uh theampo atu in, Pathian tungah bang pokna te ka pia kik tu uh ziam?
1TH 3:10 Note upna a ki samlai te a kicin thei natu ahizong, na maitang ka mu thei natu uh ahizong, sun le zan in nasiatak in thu ka ngen tawntung uh hi.
1TH 3:11 Tu in i Pa Pathian ama vateak le i Topa Jesus Christ in note omna kong paina ka lampi uh ah hong makai tahen.
1TH 3:12 Taciang kote in note kong it uh bang in, note khat le khat ahizong, mi theampo tung ahizong, Topa in itna sungah khang in hong pungsak tahen:
1TH 3:13 I Topa Jesus Christ sia a mithiangtho theampo taw hongpai ciang in, na thinsung uh te i Pa Pathian mai ah pauban na om ngawl, thianthona taw a tawpdong in hong kipsak tahen.
1TH 4:1 Tua bek domngawl in, suapui te awng, Pathian sia bangbang in lungkimsak tu, ci le na nuntakzia tu uh te ko te tung pan sang zo na hi uh bangma in, na khanto seseam thei natu uh in, Topa Jesus tungtawn in hantawn in kong thum uh hi.
1TH 4:2 Banghangziam cile Topa Jesus tungtawn in kong piak uh thupiak te na he uh hi.
1TH 4:3 Banghangziam cile na thiantho natu uh in, paktat mawna te na pial tu uh sia Pathian i deina a hihi:
1TH 4:4 Tabang in note sungah khatsim in ama i beal thianthona le zatakna taw bangbang in nei tu ci na heak tu uh kisam hi;
1TH 4:5 Pathian a he ngawl Gentile te bang in, a ki tek zo ngawl lungngulna nei heak vun:
1TH 4:6 Kote in kidop natu thu kong pia zo uh a, tetti ka pan uh sa bangma in, mi khat po in bang thu po ahizong seam khial heak tahen a, theamna taw a neisa laksak heak tahen: banghangziam cile Topa sia tabang te theampo phula pa a hihi.
1TH 4:7 Banghangziam cile Pathian in eite sia a thiangtho ngawl tu in hong sam ngawl hi, ahihang thiangtho tu in hong sam hi.
1TH 4:8 Tua ahikom ngual a thusimngawl te sia mihing thusimngawl hi ngawl a, Ama Thaa Thiangtho hong pia Pathian a thusim nagwl a hihi.
1TH 4:9 Ahihang u le nau ki itna taw kisai in note tungah lai kong at tu na kisam bua uh hi: banghangziam cile note khat le khat ki it tu in Pathian in hong hil zo hi.
1TH 4:10 Taciang Macedonia ngamsung theampo a om suapui te theampo tungah na vawt takpi uh hi: ahihang, suapui te awng, na itna uh khangsak seseam tu in kong thum uh hi;
1TH 4:11 Taciang thu kong piaksa uh bangma in, om khipkhep vun a, noma khut vateak taw noma na tek seam vun;
1TH 4:12 Tabang in a puasang mite tungah a man in na nungta tu uh a, bangma kisapna na nei batu uh hi.
1TH 4:13 Ahihang suapui te awng, ngualdang lametna nei ngawl te bang in, na khuangai ngawl natu uh in, a mu te thu taw kisai, he ngawl in na om tu uh ka dei bua hi.
1TH 4:14 Banghangziam cile Jesus sia thi a, thokik hi, ci i um ahile, Jesus sungah a mu te zong Pathian in Ama taw hong pui kik tu hi.
1TH 4:15 Banghangziam cile note tungah kong son uh hi thu te sia Topa kammal a hihi, Topa hong thet dong a nungta in a tanglai eite in a mu te i suangkhial bua tu hi.
1TH 4:16 Banghangziam cile Topa ama tatak vanpan in aw ngingtak taw ahizong, vantungmi i aw taw ahizong, Pathian i lemle taw ahizong, hong tuaksuk tu hi: taciang Christ sungah a thi te tho masa tu hi:
1TH 4:17 Tuazawkciang in a nungta lai eite sia van lai ah Topa muak tu in, amate taw mei sungah hong la khawm tu hi: taciang Topa taw a tawntung in i omkhawm tu hi.
1TH 4:18 Tua ahikom hi kammal te taw khat le khat na ki heneam tavun.
1TH 5:1 Ahi tazong suapui te awng, hun le khuahun thu te note tungah lai taw kong at tu ki sam ngawl hi.
